atk-s0519a:20: Tena yā bhāsitā netti, satthārā anumoditā;
atk-s0519a:34_0: Tattha kenaṭṭhena netti? Saddhammanayanaṭṭhena netti. Yathā hi taṇhā satte kāmādibhavaṃ
atk-s0519a:34_1: nayatīti “bhavanettī”ti vuccati, evamayampi veneyyasatte ariyadhammaṃ nayatīti saddhammanayanaṭṭhena
atk-s0519a:34_2: “nettī”ti vuccati. Atha vā nayanti tāyāti netti. Nettippakaraṇena hi karaṇabhūtena
atk-s0519a:34_3: dhammakathikā veneyyasatte dassanamaggaṃ nayanti sampāpentīti, nīyanti vā ettha etasmiṃ
atk-s0519a:34_4: pakaraṇe adhiṭṭhānabhūte patiṭṭhāpetvā veneyyā nibbānaṃ sampāpiyantīti netti. Na
atk-s0519a:34_5: hi nettiupadesasannissayena vinā aviparītasuttatthāvabodho sambhavati. Tathā hi vuttaṃ
atk-s0519a:34_6: – “tasmā nibbāyitukāmenā”tiādi. Sabbāpi hi suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanā nettiupadesāyattā,
atk-s0519a:35_0: Sā panāyaṃ netti pakaraṇaparicchedato tippabhedā hāranayapaṭṭhānānaṃ vasena. Paṭhamañhi
atk-s0519a:35_1: hāravicāro, tato nayavicāro, pacchā paṭṭhānavicāroti. Pāḷivavatthānato pana saṅgahavāravibhāgavāravasena
atk-s0519a:35_2: duvidhā. Sabbāpi hi netti saṅgahavāro vibhāgavāroti vāradvayameva hoti.
atk-s0519a:36_0: Tattha saṅgahavāro ādito pañcahi gāthāhi paricchinno. Sabbo hi pakaraṇattho “yaṃ
atk-s0519a:36_1: loko pūjayate”tiādīhi pañcahi gāthāhi apariggahito nāma natthi. Nanu cettha paṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:36_2: asaṅgahitanti? Nayidamevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, mūlapadaggahaṇena paṭṭhānassa saṅgahitattā.
atk-s0519a:36_3: Tathā hi vakkhati – “aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbā sāsanapaṭṭhāne”ti. Mūlapadapaṭṭhānāni
atk-s0519a:37_0: Vibhāgavāro pana uddesaniddesapaṭiniddesavasena tividho. Tesu “tattha katame soḷasa
atk-s0519a:37_1: hārā”ti ārabhitvā yāva “bhavanti aṭṭhārasa padānī”ti ayaṃ uddesavāro. “Assādādīnavatā”ti
atk-s0519a:37_2: ārabhitvā yāva “tettiṃsā ettikā nettī”ti ayaṃ niddesavāro. Paṭiniddesavāro pana hāravibhaṅgavāro
atk-s0519a:37_4: katamo desanāhāro”ti ārabhitvā yāva “ayaṃ pahānena samāropanā”ti ayaṃ hāravibhaṅgavāro.
atk-s0519a:37_5: Tattha “katamo desanāhārasampāto”ti ārabhitvā yāva “anupādisesā ca nibbānadhātū”ti
atk-s0519a:37_6: ayaṃ hārasampātavāro. Etthāha – hāravibhaṅgahārasampātavārānaṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇanti?
atk-s0519a:37_7: Vuccate – yattha anekehipi udāharaṇasuttehi eko hāro niddisīyati, ayaṃ hāravibhaṅgavāro.
atk-s0519a:37_8: Yattha pana ekasmiṃ sutte aneke hārā sampatanti, ayaṃ hārasampātavāro. Vuttañhetaṃ peṭake –
atk-s0519a:38: “Yattha ca sabbe hārā, sampatamānā nayanti suttatthaṃ;
atk-s0519a:40_0: Nayasamuṭṭhānasāsanapaṭṭhānavāravibhāgo pākaṭo eva. Sāsanapaṭṭhānavāro pana saṅgahavāre
atk-s0519a:40_1: viya uddesaniddesavāresupi na sarūpato uddhaṭoti. Etthāha – “idaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:40_2: mahāsāvakabhāsitaṃ, bhagavatā anumodita”nti ca kathametaṃ viññāyatīti? Pāḷito eva.
atk-s0519a:40_3: Na hi pāḷito aññaṃ pamāṇataraṃ atthi. Yā hi catūhi mahāpadesehi aviruddhā pāḷi, sā
atk-s0519a:40_4: pamāṇaṃ. Tathā hi agarahitāya ācariyaparamparāya peṭakopadeso viya idaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:40_5: ābhataṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmāssa nidānaṃ na vuttaṃ. Sāvakabhāsitānampi hi subhasutta-
atk-s0519a:40_6: anaṅgaṇasutta- kaccāyanasaṃyuttādīnaṃ nidānaṃ bhāsitanti? Nayidaṃ ekantikaṃ. Sāvakabhāsitānaṃ
atk-s0519a:40_8: nidānaṃ na bhāsitaṃ, na ca tāvatā tāni appamāṇaṃ, evamidhāpi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:41_0: Nidānañca nāma suttavinayānaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaupālittherādīhi mahāsāvakeheva bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0519a:41_1: idañca mahāsāvakabhāsitaṃ, theraṃ muñcitvā anaññavisayattā imissā vicāraṇāyāti kimetena
atk-s0519a:41_2: nidānagavesanena, atthoyevettha gavesitabbo, yo pāḷiyā aviruddhoti. Atha vā pāḷiyā
atk-s0519a:41_3: atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhāvato na imassa pakaraṇassa visuṃ nidānavacanakiccaṃ atthi, paṭisambhidāmagganiddesādīnaṃ viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:42_0: Idāni etasmiṃ pakaraṇe nānappakārakosallatthaṃ ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo – sabbameva
atk-s0519a:42_1: cetaṃ pakaraṇaṃ sāsanapariyeṭṭhibhāvato ekavidhaṃ, tathā ariyamaggasampādanato vimuttirasato
atk-s0519a:42_2: ca. Byañjanatthavicārabhāvato duvidhaṃ, tathā saṅgahavibhāgabhāvato dhammavinayatthasaṃvaṇṇanato
atk-s0519a:45_0: Tattha sāsanapariyeṭṭhibhāvatoti sakalaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahassa navaṅgassa
atk-s0519a:45_4: vuttaṃ. Saṅgahavibhāgabhāvo parato āvi bhavissati. Dhammavinayatthasaṃvaṇṇanatoti
atk-s0519a:45_6: nettivacanassa lakkhaṇattā udāharaṇasuttānañca lakkhiyattā vuttaṃ. Sabhāgavisabhāganiddesatoti
atk-s0519a:45_7: samānajātiyā dhammā sabhāgā, paṭipakkhā visabhāgā, taṃvicārabhāvatoti attho. Sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇadhammavibhāgatoti
atk-s0519a:45_8: pahānekaṭṭhasahajekaṭṭhatādisāmaññena ye dhammā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ nāmavatthādinā sādhāraṇā
atk-s0519a:45_9: tabbidhuratāya asādhāraṇā ca, taṃvibhāgato duvidhanti attho.
atk-s0519a:46_2: vuttasseva atthassa saṅgahagāthā anugīti, taṃtaṃsuttatthayojanavasena vippakiṇṇassa
atk-s0519a:46_3: pakaraṇassa saṅgāyanaṃ saṅgīti, sā therassa parato pavattitāti veditabbā, etāsaṃ
atk-s0519a:46_7: vibhāgavacanato cuddasavidhanti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyanti na papañcitaṃ.
atk-s0519a:48_0: Evaṃ anekabhedavibhatte nettippakaraṇe yadidaṃ vuttaṃ “saṅgahavibhāgavāravasena duvidha”nti,
atk-s0519a:48_1: tattha saṅgahavāro ādi. Tassāpi “yaṃ loko pūjayate”ti ayaṃ gāthā ādi. Tattha yanti
atk-s0519a:48_2: aniyamato upayoganiddeso, tassa “tassā”ti iminā niyamanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Lokoti kattuniddeso.
atk-s0519a:48_3: Pūjayateti kiriyāniddeso. Salokapāloti kattuvisesanaṃ. Sadāti kālaniddeso. Namassati
atk-s0519a:48_4: cāti upacayena kiriyāniddeso. Tassāti sāminiddeso. Etanti paccattaniddeso. Sāsanavaranti
atk-s0519a:48_6: Ñeyyanti kammavācakakiriyāniddeso. Naravarassāti “tassā”ti niyametvā dassitassa sarūpato dassanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:49_0: Tattha lokiyanti ettha puññāpuññāni tabbipāko cāti loko, pajā, sattanikāyoti attho.
atk-s0519a:49_1: Loka-saddo hi jātisaddatāya sāmaññavasena niravasesato satte saṅgaṇhāti. Kiñcāpi
atk-s0519a:49_2: hi lokasaddo saṅkhārabhājanesupi diṭṭhappayogo, pūjanakiriyāyogyabhūtatāvasena pana
atk-s0519a:49_3: sattalokavacano eva idha gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pūjayateti mānayati, apacāyatīti attho.
atk-s0519a:50_0: Lokaṃ pālentīti lokapālā, cattāro mahārājāno. Lokiyā pana indayamavaruṇakuverā lokapālāti
atk-s0519a:50_1: vadanti. Saha lokapālehīti salokapālo, “loko”ti iminā tulyādhikaraṇaṃ. Atha vā issariyādhipaccena
atk-s0519a:50_3: lokapālā. Tehi saha taṃtaṃsattanikāyo salokapālo lokoti vutto. Atha vā “dveme, bhikkhave,
atk-s0519a:50_4: sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālentī”ti vacanato hirottappadhammā lokapālā. Tehi samannāgato
atk-s0519a:50_5: loko salokapālo. Hirottappasampannā hi pāpagarahino sappurisā dhammacchandavantatāya
atk-s0519a:51_0: Sadāti sabbakālaṃ rattiñceva divā ca, sadāti vā bhagavato dharamānakāle tato parañca.
atk-s0519a:51_1: Atha vā sadāti abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya yāva sāsanantaradhānā, tato parampi vā. Mahābhinīhārato
atk-s0519a:51_2: paṭṭhāya hi mahābodhisattā bodhiyā niyatatāya buddhaṅkurabhūtā sadevakassa lokassa
atk-s0519a:51_3: pūjanīyā ceva vandanīyā ca honti. Yathāha bhagavā sumedhabhūto –
atk-s0519a:55: Devā manussā asurā ca, abhivādetvāna pakkamu”nti. ;
atk-s0519a:56_0: Namassati cāti keci kesañci pūjāsakkārādīni karontāpi tesaṃ apākaṭaguṇatāya namakkāraṃ
atk-s0519a:56_1: na karonti, na evaṃ bhagavato, yathābhūtaabbhuggatakittisaddatāya pana bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0519a:56_2: sadevako loko pūjayati ceva namassati cāti attho. “Sadā naramanusso”ti keci paṭhanti,
atk-s0519a:56_3: taṃ na sundaraṃ. Tassāti yaṃ sadevako loko pūjayati ceva namassati ca, tassa. Etanti
atk-s0519a:56_4: idāni vattabbaṃ buddhiyaṃ viparivattamānaṃ sāmaññena dasseti. Sāsanavaranti taṃ sarūpato
atk-s0519a:56_5: dasseti. Tattha diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ satte sāsati vineti
atk-s0519a:56_6: etenāti sāsanaṃ, tadeva ekantaniyyānaṭṭhena anaññasādhāraṇaguṇatāya ca uttamaṭṭhena
atk-s0519a:56_7: taṃtaṃabhipatthitasamiddhihetutāya paṇḍitehi varitabbato vā varaṃ, sāsanameva varanti
atk-s0519a:56_8: sāsanavaraṃ. Vidūhīti yathāsabhāvato kammakammaphalāni kusalādibhede ca dhamme vidantīti
atk-s0519a:56_9: vidū, paṇḍitamanussā, tehi. Ñātabbaṃ, ñāṇamarahatīti vā ñeyyaṃ. Naravarassāti purisavarassa,
atk-s0519a:57_1: sadevakena lokena pūjanīyo namassanīyo ca bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho, tassa loke
atk-s0519a:57_3: sāsanaṃ ādikalyāṇatādiguṇasampattiyā varaṃ aggaṃ uttamaṃ nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya paṇḍitavedanīyamevāti.
atk-s0519a:57_7: nāyaṃ dhammo duppaññassā”ti. Atha vā bhagavato sāsanaṃ pariññākkamena lakkhaṇāvabodhappaṭipattiyā
atk-s0519a:57_8: suññatamukhādīhi ogāhitabbattā aviññūnaṃ supinantenapi na visayo hotīti āha – “vidūhi
atk-s0519a:57_9: ñeyya”nti. Tathā ca vuttaṃ – “etu viññū puriso”tiādi.
atk-s0519a:58_0: Apare pana “taṃ tassa sāsanavara”nti paṭhanti, tesaṃ matena yaṃ-saddo sāsana-saddena
atk-s0519a:58_1: samānādhikaraṇoti daṭṭhabbo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti yaṃ sāsanavaraṃ salokapālo loko pūjayati
atk-s0519a:58_2: namassati ca, taṃ sāsanavaraṃ vidūhi ñātabbanti. Imasmiñca naye lokapāla-saddena
atk-s0519a:58_3: bhagavāpi vuccati. Bhagavā hi lokaggatāyakattā nippariyāyena lokapālo, tasmā “tassā”ti
atk-s0519a:58_4: lokapālassa satthunoti attho. Salokapāloti cettha lokapāla-saddo guṇībhūtopi satthuvisayattā
atk-s0519a:58_5: sāsana-saddāpekkhatāya sāmibhāvena sambandhīvisesabhūto padhānabhūto viya paṭiniddesaṃ arahatīti.
atk-s0519a:59_0: Kathaṃ pana sayaṃ dhammassāmī bhagavā dhammaṃ pūjayatīti? Nāyaṃ virodho. Dhammagaruno
atk-s0519a:59_1: hi buddhā bhagavanto, te sabbakālaṃ dhammaṃ apacāyamānāva viharantīti. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0519a:59_2: – “yaṃnūnāhaṃ yvāyaṃ dhammo mayā abhisambuddho, tameva dhammaṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā
atk-s0519a:60_0: Api ca bhagavato dhammapūjanā sattasattāhappaṭipattiādīhi dīpetabbā. Dhammassāmīti
atk-s0519a:60_1: ca dhammena sadevakassa lokassa sāmīti attho, na dhammassa sāmīti. Evampi namassatīti
atk-s0519a:60_2: vacanaṃ na yujjati. Na hi bhagavā kañci namassatīti, esopi niddoso. Na hi namassatīti
atk-s0519a:60_3: padassa namakkāraṃ karotīti ayameva attho, atha kho garukaraṇena tanninno tappoṇo
atk-s0519a:60_4: tappabbhāroti ayampi attho labbhati. Bhagavā ca dhammagarutāya sabbakālaṃ dhammaninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena
atk-s0519a:60_5: viharatīti. Ayañca attho “yena sudaṃ svāhaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”ti evamādīhi suttapadehi
atk-s0519a:60_6: dīpetabbo. “Vidūhi neyya”ntipi pāṭho, tassa paṇḍitehi saparasantānesu netabbaṃ pāpetabbanti
atk-s0519a:60_7: attho. Tattha attasantāne pāpanaṃ bujjhanaṃ, parasantāne bodhananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:61_0: Evaṃ bhagavato sadevakassa lokassa pūjanīyavandanīyabhāvo aggapuggalabhāvo ca vuccamāno
atk-s0519a:61_1: guṇavisiṭṭhataṃ dīpeti, sā ca guṇavisiṭṭhatā mahābodhiyā veditabbā. Āsavakkhayañāṇapadaṭṭhānañhi
atk-s0519a:61_3: Sā aviparītadhammadesanato tathāgate suppatiṭṭhitāti viññāyati. Na hi savāsananiravasesakilesappahānaṃ
atk-s0519a:61_4: anāvaraṇañāṇañca vinā tādisī dhammadesanā sambhavati. Iccassa catuvesārajjayogo.
atk-s0519a:61_6: pakāsitā hoti. Etādisī ca guṇavibhūti mahākaruṇāpubbaṅgamaṃ abhinīhārasampattiṃ purassaraṃ
atk-s0519a:61_7: katvā sampāditaṃ samattiṃsapāramisaṅkhātaṃ puññañāṇasambhāramantarena na upalabbhatīti
atk-s0519a:61_8: hetusampadāpi atthato vibhāvitā hotīti evaṃ bhagavato tīsupi avatthāsu sabbasattānaṃ
atk-s0519a:62_0: Dutiyanaye pana yasmā sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ saphalaṃ ariyamaggasāsanaṃ tassa ārammaṇabhūtañca
atk-s0519a:62_3: sakkaccaṃ savanadhāraṇaparipucchādīhi paricayaṃ karonto ca sadevako loko pūjayati
atk-s0519a:62_4: nāma. Lokanātho ca sammāsambodhippattiyā veneyyānaṃ sakkaccaṃ dhammadesanena “ariyaṃ
atk-s0519a:62_5: vo, bhikkhave, sammāsamādhiṃ desessāmi”, “maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko seṭṭho”, “yāvatā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0519a:62_6: dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati”, “khayaṃ virāgaṃ amataṃ
atk-s0519a:62_7: paṇītaṃ”, “ekāyano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”, “dhammaṃ vo, bhikkhave,
atk-s0519a:62_8: desessāmi ādikalyāṇa”ntiādīhi vacanehi thomanena ca pūjayati nāma. Tasmā sāsanavarassa
atk-s0519a:62_9: pūjanīyabhāvo idha vuccamāno anavasesato dhammaguṇe dīpetīti ye ariyabhāvādayo niyyānādayo
atk-s0519a:62_11: ca anekehi suttapadehi paveditā aneke dhammaguṇā, te niravasesato imāya gāthāya pakāsitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0519a:63_0: Yasmā pana ariyasaccappaṭivedhena samugghāṭitasammohāyeva paramatthato paṇḍitā bālyādisamatikkamanato,
atk-s0519a:63_1: tasmā bhāvitalokuttaramaggā sacchikatasāmaññaphalā ca ariyapuggalā visesato vidūti
atk-s0519a:63_2: vuccanti. Te hi yathāvuttasāsanavaraṃ aviparītato ñātuṃ netuñca saparasantāne sakkuṇantīti
atk-s0519a:63_3: aṭṭhaariyapuggalasamūhassa paramatthasaṅghassāpi idha gahitattā ye suppaṭipannatādayo
atk-s0519a:63_4: anekehi suttapadehi saṃvaṇṇitā ariyasaṅghaguṇā, tepi niravasesato idha pakāsitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0519a:64: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya sātisayaṃ ratanattayaguṇaparidīpanaṃ katvā idāni –
atk-s0519a:67_0: Vacanato saṅkhepato sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sāsanaṃ, taṃ pana sikkhattayaṃ ñāṇavisesavisayabhāvabhedato
atk-s0519a:67_1: avatthābhedato ca tividhaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Sutamayañāṇagocaro ca yo “pariyattisaddhammo”ti
atk-s0519a:67_2: vuccati. Cintāmayañāṇagocaro ca yo ākāraparivitakkadiṭṭhinijjhānakkhantīhi gahetabbākāro
atk-s0519a:67_4: ca yo “paṭivedhasaddhammo”ti vuccati. Evaṃ tividhampi sāsanaṃ sāsanavaranti padena
atk-s0519a:67_5: saṅgaṇhitvā tattha yaṃ paṭhamaṃ, taṃ itaresaṃ adhigamūpāyoti sabbasāsanamūlabhūtaṃ
atk-s0519a:67_6: attano pakaraṇassa ca visayabhūtaṃ pariyattisāsanameva tāva saṅkhepato vibhajanto
atk-s0519a:68_0: Tattha dvādasāti gaṇanaparicchedo. Padānīti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ. Tesu byañjanapadāni
atk-s0519a:68_1: pajjati attho etehīti padāni. Atthapadāni pana pajjanti ñāyantīti padāni. Ubhayampi
atk-s0519a:68_2: vā ubhayathā yojetabbaṃ byañjanapadānampi aviparītaṃ paṭipajjitabbattā, atthapadānaṃ
atk-s0519a:68_3: uttarivisesādhigamassa kāraṇabhāvato, tāni padāni parato pāḷiyaññeva āvi bhavissantīti
atk-s0519a:68_4: tattheva vaṇṇayissāma. Atthasūcanādiatthato suttaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ saṅgahesu –
atk-s0519a:71_0: Tadetaṃ tattha suttapiṭakavasena āgataṃ, idha pana piṭakattayavasena yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:71_1: “Dvādasa padāni sutta”nti vuttaṃ, yaṃ pariyattisāsananti attho. Taṃ sabbanti taṃ
atk-s0519a:71_2: “sutta”nti vuttaṃ sakalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ. Byañjanañca attho cāti byañjanañceva tadattho
atk-s0519a:71_3: ca. Yato “dvādasa padāni sutta”nti vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – atthasūcanādito suttaṃ
atk-s0519a:71_4: pariyattidhammo, tañca sabbaṃ atthato dvādasa padāni cha byañjanapadāni ceva cha
atk-s0519a:71_5: atthapadāni cāti. Atha vā yadetaṃ “sāsanavara”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ suttaṃ, pariyattisāsanassa
atk-s0519a:71_6: adhippetattā. Atthato pana dvādasa padāni, byañjanatthapadasamudāyabhāvato. Yathāha
atk-s0519a:71_7: – “byañjanañca attho cā”ti. Taṃ viññeyyaṃ ubhayanti yasmiṃ byañjane atthe ca vacanavacanīyabhāvena
atk-s0519a:71_8: sambandhe suttavohāro, tadubhayaṃ sarūpato viññātabbaṃ tattha katamaṃ byañjanaṃ katamo
atk-s0519a:72_0: Evaṃ “sāsanavara”nti vuttassa suttassa pariyattibhāvaṃ tassa ca atthabyañjanapadabhāvena
atk-s0519a:72_1: veditabbataṃ dassetvā idāni tassa pavicayupāyaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ padatthavibhāgena
atk-s0519a:73_0: Tattha soḷasa hārā etissāti soḷasahārā. Pañcanayā aṭṭhārasamūlapadāti etthāpi eseva
atk-s0519a:73_1: nayo. Atha vā soḷasa hārā soḷasahārā. Evaṃ itaratthāpi. Hāranayamūlapadāni eva hi
atk-s0519a:73_2: saṅkhepato vitthārato ca bhāsitāni nettīti. Sāsanassa pariyeṭṭhīti sāsanassa atthapariyesanā,
atk-s0519a:73_3: pariyattisāsanassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāti attho, sakalasseva vā sāsanassa atthavicāraṇāti
atk-s0519a:73_4: attho. Paṭipattipaṭivedhepi hi nettinayānusārena adhigacchantīti. Mahakaccānenāti
atk-s0519a:73_5: kaccoti purātano isi, tassa vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtoyaṃ mahāthero “kaccāno”ti vuccati. Mahakaccānoti
atk-s0519a:73_6: pana pūjāvacanaṃ, yathā mahāmoggallānoti, “kaccāyanagottaniddiṭṭhā”tipi pāṭho. Ayañca
atk-s0519a:73_7: gāthā nettiṃ saṅgāyantehi pakaraṇatthasaṅgaṇhanavasena ṭhapitāti daṭṭhabbā. Yathā
atk-s0519a:73_9: hārādisamudāyabhūtāyaṃ nettiyaṃ byañjanatthasamudāye ca sutte kiṃ kena viciyatīti
atk-s0519a:74_0: Tattha soḷasapi hārā mūlapadaniddhāraṇamantarena byañjanamukheneva suttassa saṃvaṇṇanā
atk-s0519a:74_2: suttassā”ti vuttā. Atthanayā pana yathāvuttaatthamukheneva suttassa atthasampaṭipattiyā
atk-s0519a:74_3: hontīti āha – “nayā tayo ca suttattho”ti. Ayañca vicāraṇā paratopi āgamissati. Keci
atk-s0519a:74_4: “nayo cā”ti paṭhanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Ubhayaṃ pariggahītanti hārā nayā cāti etaṃ
atk-s0519a:74_5: ubhayaṃ suttassa atthaniddhāraṇavasena parisamantato gahitaṃ sabbathā sutte yojitaṃ.
atk-s0519a:74_6: Vuccati suttaṃ vadati saṃvaṇṇeti. Kathaṃ? Yathāsuttaṃ suttānurūpaṃ, yaṃ suttaṃ yathā
atk-s0519a:74_7: saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ, tathā saṃvaṇṇetīti attho. Yaṃ yaṃ suttanti vā yathāsuttaṃ, sabbaṃ
atk-s0519a:74_8: suttanti attho. Nettinayena hi saṃvaṇṇetuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ nāma suttaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0519a:75: Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ – “sāsanavaraṃ vidūhi ñeyya”nti, tattha nettisaṃvaṇṇanāya visayabhūtaṃ pariyattidhammameva pakārantarena niyametvā dassetuṃ “yā cevā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:76_0: Tattha atthesu kataparicchedo byañjanappabandho desanā, yo pāṭhoti vuccati. Tadattho
atk-s0519a:76_1: desitaṃ tāya desanāya pabodhitattā. Tadubhayañca vimuttāyatanasīsena paricayaṃ karontānaṃ
atk-s0519a:76_2: anupādāparinibbānapariyosānānaṃ sampattīnaṃ hetubhāvato ekantena viññeyyaṃ, tadubhayavinimuttassa
atk-s0519a:76_3: vā ñeyyassa abhāvato tadeva dvayaṃ viññeyyanti imamatthaṃ dasseti yā ceva…pe… viññeyyanti.
atk-s0519a:76_4: Tatrāti tasmiṃ vijānane sādhetabbe, nipphādetabbe cetaṃ bhummaṃ. Ayamānupubbīti ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:76_5: vakkhamānā anupubbi hāranayānaṃ anukkamo, anukkamena vakkhamānā hāranayāti attho.
atk-s0519a:76_6: Navavidhasuttantapariyeṭṭhīti suttādivasena navaṅgassa sāsanassa pariyesanā, atthavicāraṇāti
atk-s0519a:76_7: attho. Sāmiatthe vā etaṃ paccattaṃ navavidhasuttantapariyeṭṭhiyā anupubbīti. Atha
atk-s0519a:76_8: vā anupubbīti karaṇatthe paccattaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathāvuttavijānane sādhetabbe
atk-s0519a:77_0: Etthāha – kathaṃ panettha geyyaṅgādīnaṃ suttabhāvo, suttabhāve ca tesaṃ kathaṃ sāsanassa
atk-s0519a:77_1: navaṅgabhāvo. Yañca saṅgahesu vuccati “sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ, niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ
atk-s0519a:77_2: veyyākaraṇa”nti, tathā ca sati suttaṅgameva na siyā. Athāpi visuṃ suttaṅgaṃ siyā,
atk-s0519a:77_3: maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā, gāthābhāvato dhammapadādīnaṃ viya, geyyaṅgasaṅgaho
atk-s0519a:77_4: vā siyā, sagāthakattā sagāthāvaggassa viya, tathā ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānanti. Vuccate –
atk-s0519a:80_0: Sabbassāpi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṃ sāmaññavidhi. Tathā hi “ettakaṃ tassa
atk-s0519a:80_1: bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ, sāvatthiyā suttavibhaṅge, sakavāde pañca
atk-s0519a:80_3: pana geyyādayo visesavidhayo tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitā. Tathā hi geyyassa sagāthakattaṃ
atk-s0519a:80_4: tabbhāvanimittaṃ. Lokepi hi sasilokaṃ sagāthakaṃ cuṇṇiyaganthaṃ geyya”nti vadanti.
atk-s0519a:80_5: Gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchitvā vissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa. Pucchāvissajjanañhi
atk-s0519a:80_6: “byākaraṇa”nti vuccati. Byākaraṇameva veyyākaraṇanti. Evaṃ sante sagāthakādīnampi
atk-s0519a:80_7: pañhāvissajjanavasena pavattānaṃ veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, geyyādisaññānaṃ
atk-s0519a:80_8: anokāsabhāvato “gāthāvirahe satī”ti visesitattā ca. Tathā hi dhammapadādīsu kevalaṃ
atk-s0519a:80_11: patiṭṭhitā, tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu
atk-s0519a:80_12: jātakasaññā. Satipi pañhāvissajjanabhāve sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa
atk-s0519a:80_13: labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitāti evaṃ tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena tesu
atk-s0519a:80_14: tesu suttavisesesu geyyaṅgādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti visesavidhayo suttaṅgato pare geyyādayo.
atk-s0519a:81_0: Yaṃ panettha geyyaṅgādinimittarahitaṃ suttaṃ, taṃ suttaṅgaṃ visesasaññāparihārena
atk-s0519a:81_1: sāmaññasaññāya pavattanatoti. Nanu ca sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ, niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ
atk-s0519a:81_2: veyyākaraṇanti suttaṅgaṃ na sambhavatīti codanā tadavatthā evāti? Na tadavatthā,
atk-s0519a:81_3: sodhitattā. Sodhitañhi pubbe gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa
atk-s0519a:81_5: na siyā”ti, tampi na, niruḷhattā. Niruḷho hi maṅgalasuttādīsu suttabhāvo, na hi tāni
atk-s0519a:81_6: dhammapadabuddhavaṃsādayo viya gāthābhāvena paññātāni, kintu suttabhāveneva. Teneva
atk-s0519a:82_0: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “sagāthakattā geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā”ti, tadapi natthi, yasmā sahatāññena.
atk-s0519a:82_1: Saha gāthāhīti hi sagāthakaṃ. Sahabhāvo ca nāma atthato aññena hoti, na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu
atk-s0519a:82_2: gāthāvinimutto koci suttappadeso atthi. Yo saha gāthāhīti vucceyya, na ca samudāyo
atk-s0519a:82_3: nāma koci atthi. Yadapi vuttaṃ – “ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānaṃ geyyaṅgasaṅgaho
atk-s0519a:82_4: siyā”ti, tadapi na aññato. Aññā eva hi tā gāthā, jātakādipariyāpannattā. Ato na tāhi
atk-s0519a:82_5: ubhatovibhaṅgādīnaṃ geyyaṅgabhāvoti evaṃ suttādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ aññamaññasaṅkarābhāvo
atk-s0519a:82_6: veditabbo. Yasmā pana sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ yathāvuttanayena atthānaṃ sūcanādiatthena
atk-s0519a:85_0: 1. Evaṃ saṅgahavārena saṅkhepato dassite hārādayo idāni vibhāgena dassetuṃ “tattha
atk-s0519a:85_1: katame soḷasa hārā”tiādidesanā āraddhā. Tattha tatthāti yaṃ vuttaṃ – “soḷasahārā
atk-s0519a:85_2: nettī”ti, tasmiṃ vacane, tissaṃ vā gāthāyaṃ, yāni hāranayamūlapadāni uddhaṭāni, tesūti
atk-s0519a:85_3: attho. Katameti pucchāvacanaṃ. Pucchā ca nāmesā pañcavidhā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā
atk-s0519a:85_4: vimaticchedanāpucchā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchāti. Tāsu ayaṃ kathetukamyatāpucchā.
atk-s0519a:85_5: Soḷasāti gaṇanavasena paricchedo. Tena nesaṃ na tato uddhaṃ adho cāti etaparamataṃ
atk-s0519a:85_6: dasseti. Sā cetaparamatā parato āvi bhavissati. Hārāti gaṇanavasena paricchinnānaṃ
atk-s0519a:86_0: Tattha kenaṭṭhena hārā? Harīyanti etehi, ettha vā suttageyyādivisayā aññāṇasaṃsayavipallāsāti
atk-s0519a:86_1: hārā, haranti vā sayaṃ tāni, haraṇamattameva vāti hārā phalūpacārena. Atha vā harīyanti
atk-s0519a:86_3: Atha vā hārā viyāti hārā. Yathā hi anekaratanāvalisamūho hārasaṅkhāto attano avayavabhūtaratanasamphassehi
atk-s0519a:86_7: kāmarāgādikilesahetukaṃ vūpasamentīti. Atha vā hārayanti aññāṇādīnaṃ hāraṃ apagamaṃ
atk-s0519a:86_8: karonti ācikkhantīti vā hārā. Atha vā sotujanacittassa haraṇato ramaṇato ca hārā
atk-s0519a:86_9: niruttinayena, yathā – “bhavesu vantagamano bhagavā”ti. Ayaṃ tāva hārānaṃ sādhāraṇato attho.
atk-s0519a:87_0: Asādhāraṇato pana desīyati saṃvaṇṇīyati etāya suttatthoti desanā, desanāsahacaraṇato
atk-s0519a:87_1: vā desanā. Nanu ca aññepi hārā desanāsaṅkhātassa suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanato desanāsahacārinovāti?
atk-s0519a:87_2: Saccametaṃ, ayaṃ pana hāro yebhuyyena yathārutavaseneva viññāyamāno desanāya saha
atk-s0519a:87_3: caratīti vattabbataṃ arahati, na tathā pare. Na hi assādādīnavanissaraṇādisandassanarahitā
atk-s0519a:88: Viciyanti etena, ettha vā padapañhādayo, viciti eva vā tesanti vicayo. Pāḷiyaṃ pana vicinatīti vicayoti ayamattho dassito.
atk-s0519a:89: Yuttīti upapattisādhanayutti, idha pana yuttivicāraṇā yutti uttarapadalopena “rūpabhavo rūpa”nti yathā, yuttisahacaraṇato vā. Idhāpi desanāhāre vuttanayena attho vitthāretabbo.
atk-s0519a:90: Padaṭṭhānanti āsannakāraṇaṃ, idhāpi padaṭṭhānavicāraṇātiādi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:91: Lakkhīyanti etena, ettha vā ekalakkhaṇā dhammā avuttāpi ekavacanenāti lakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:92: Viyūhīyanti vibhāgena piṇḍīyanti etena, ettha vāti byūho. Nibbacanādīnaṃ sutte dassiyamānānaṃ catunnaṃ byūhoti catubyūho, catunnaṃ vā byūho etthāti catubyūho.
atk-s0519a:93: Āvaṭṭīyanti etena, ettha vā sabhāgā visabhāgā ca dhammā, tesaṃ vā āvaṭṭananti āvaṭṭo.
atk-s0519a:94: Vibhajīyanti etena, ettha vā sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇānaṃ saṃkilesavodānadhammānaṃ bhūmiyoti vibhatti, vibhajanaṃ vā etesaṃ bhūmiyāti vibhatti.
atk-s0519a:95: Paṭipakkhavasena parivattīyanti iminā, ettha vā sutte vuttadhammā, parivattanaṃ vā tesanti parivattano.
atk-s0519a:96: Vividhaṃ vacanaṃ ekassevatthassa vācakametthāti vivacanaṃ, vivacanameva vevacanaṃ, vividhaṃ vuccati etena atthoti vā vivacanaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0519a:97: Pakārehi pabhedato vā ñāpīyanti iminā, ettha vā atthāti paññatti.
atk-s0519a:98: Otārīyanti anuppavesīyanti etena, ettha vā suttāgatā dhammā paṭiccasamuppādādīsūti otaraṇo.
atk-s0519a:99: Sodhīyanti samādhīyanti etena, ettha vā sutte padapadatthapañhārambhāti sodhano.
atk-s0519a:100: Adhiṭṭhīyanti anupavattīyanti etena, ettha vā sāmaññavisesabhūtā dhammā vinā vikappenāti adhiṭṭhāno.
atk-s0519a:101: Parikaroti abhisaṅkharoti phalanti parikkhāro, hetu paccayo ca, parikkhāraṃ ācikkhatīti parikkhāro, hāro, parikkhāravisayattā parikkhārasahacaraṇato vā parikkhāro.
atk-s0519a:102: Samāropīyanti etena, ettha vā padaṭṭhānādimukhena dhammāti samāropano. Sabbattha ca bhāvasādhanavasenāpi attho sambhavatīti tassāpi vasena yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:103_0: Tassāti yathāvuttassa hāruddesassa. Anugītīti vuttassevatthassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:103_1: anupacchā gāyanagāthā, tāsu osānagāthāya atthato asaṃkiṇṇāti padatthena saṅkararahitā,
atk-s0519a:103_2: tena yadipi keci hārā aññamaññaṃ avisiṭṭhā viya dissanti, tathāpi tesaṃ atthato saṅkaro
atk-s0519a:103_3: natthīti dasseti. So ca nesaṃ asaṅkaro lakkhaṇaniddese supākaṭo hoti. Etesañcevāti
atk-s0519a:103_4: etesaṃ soḷasannaṃ hārānaṃ. Yathā asaṅkaro, tathā ceva bhavati. Kiṃ bhavati? Vitthāratayā
atk-s0519a:103_5: vitthārena. Nayavibhatti nayena upāyena ñāyena vibhāgo. Etena taṃ eva asaṅkiṇṇataṃ
atk-s0519a:103_6: vibhāveti. Keci “vitthāranayā”ti paṭhanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ, ayañca gāthā kesuci potthakesu natthi.
atk-s0519a:104_0: 2. Evaṃ hāre uddisitvā idāni naye uddisituṃ “tattha katame”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha nayanti
atk-s0519a:104_1: saṃkilese vodānāni ca vibhāgato ñāpentīti nayā, nīyanti vā tāni etehi, ettha vāti
atk-s0519a:104_2: nayā, nayanamattameva vāti nayā, nīyanti vā sayaṃ dhammakathikehi upanīyanti suttassa
atk-s0519a:104_3: atthapavicayatthanti nayā. Atha vā nayā viyāti nayā. Yathā hi ekattādayo nayā sammā
atk-s0519a:104_7: abhisambhuṇantā veneyyānaṃ catusaccappaṭivedhāya saṃvattanti. Atha vā pariyattiatthassa
atk-s0519a:104_8: nayanato saṃkilesato yamanato ca nayā niruttinayena.
atk-s0519a:105_0: Nandiyāvaṭṭotiādīsu nandiyāvaṭṭassa viya āvaṭṭo etassāti nandiyāvaṭṭo, yathā hi nandiyāvaṭṭo
atk-s0519a:105_1: antoṭhitena padhānāvayavena bahiddhā āvaṭṭati, evamayampi nayoti attho. Atha vā nandiyā
atk-s0519a:105_2: taṇhāya pamodassa vā āvaṭṭo etthāti nandiyāvaṭṭo. Tīhi avayavehi lobhādīhi saṃkilesapakkhe
atk-s0519a:105_3: alobhādīhi ca vodānapakkhe pukkhalo sobhanoti tipukkhalo. Asantāsanajavaparakkamādivisesayogena
atk-s0519a:105_4: sīho bhagavā, tassa vikkīḷitaṃ desanāvacīkammabhūto vihāroti katvā vipallāsatappaṭipakkhaparidīpanato
atk-s0519a:105_5: sīhassa vikkīḷitaṃ etthāti sīhavikkīḷito, nayo. Balavisesayogadīpanato vā sīhavikkīḷitasadisattā
atk-s0519a:105_6: nayo sīhavikkīḷito. Balaviseso cettha saddhādibalaṃ, dasabalāni eva vā. Atthanayattayadisābhāvena
atk-s0519a:105_7: kusalādidhammānaṃ ālocanaṃ disālocanaṃ. Tathā ālocitānaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ atthanayattayayojane
atk-s0519a:105_8: samānayanato aṅkuso viya aṅkuso. Gāthāsu lañjeti pakāseti suttatthanti lañjako, nayo
atk-s0519a:105_9: ca so lañjako cāti nayalañjako. Gatāti ñātā, matāti attho. So eva vā pāṭho. Sesaṃ
atk-s0519a:106_0: 3. Evaṃ nayepi uddisitvā idāni mūlapadāni uddisituṃ “tattha katamānī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:106_1: Tattha mūlāni ca tāni nayānaṃ paṭṭhānabhāgānañca patiṭṭhābhāvato padāni ca adhigamūpāyabhāvato
atk-s0519a:106_2: koṭṭhāsabhāvato cāti mūlapadāni. Kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena, kucchitānaṃ vā pāpadhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:106_3: salanato viddhaṃsanato, kusānaṃ vā rāgādīnaṃ lavanato, kusā viya vā lavanato, kusena
atk-s0519a:106_4: vā ñāṇena lātabbato pavattetabbato kusalāni, tappaṭipakkhato akusalānīti padattho veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:107_0: Evaṃ gaṇanaparicchedato jātibhedato ca mūlapadāni dassetvā idāni sarūpato dassento
atk-s0519a:107_1: saṃkilesapakkhaṃyeva paṭhamaṃ uddisati “taṇhā”tiādinā. Tattha tasati paritasatīti
atk-s0519a:107_2: taṇhā. Avindiyaṃ vindati, vindiyaṃ na vindatīti avijjā, vijjāpaṭipakkhāti vā avijjā.
atk-s0519a:107_3: Lubbhanti tena, sayaṃ vā lubbhati, lubbhanamattameva vā soti lobho. Dosamohesupi
atk-s0519a:107_4: eseva nayo. Asubhe “subha”nti pavattā saññā subhasaññā. Sukhasaññādīsupi imināva
atk-s0519a:107_5: nayena attho veditabbo. Saṅgahanti gaṇanaṃ. Samosaraṇanti samoropanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:108_0: Paccanīkadhamme sametīti samatho. Aniccādīhi vividhehi ākārehi passatīti vipassanā.
atk-s0519a:108_1: Alobhādayo lobhādipaṭipakkhato veditabbā. Asubhe “asubha”nti pavattā saññā asubhasaññā,
atk-s0519a:108_2: kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ. Saññāsīsena hi desanā. Dukkhasaññādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0519a:109_0: Idaṃ uddānanti idaṃ vuttasseva atthassa vippakiṇṇabhāvena nassituṃ adatvā uddhaṃ
atk-s0519a:109_1: dānaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ uddānaṃ, saṅgahavacananti attho. “Cattāro vipallāsā”tipi pāṭho. Kilesabhūmīti
atk-s0519a:109_2: saṃkilesabhūmi sabbesaṃ akusaladhammānaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānattā. Kusalānaṃ yāni tīṇi
atk-s0519a:109_3: mūlāni. “Kusalānī”tipi paṭhanti. Satipaṭṭhānāti asubhasaññādayo sandhāyāha. Indriyabhūmīti
atk-s0519a:109_4: saddhādīnaṃ vimuttiparipācanindriyānaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānattā vuttaṃ. Yujjantīti yojīyanti.
atk-s0519a:109_5: Khoti padapūraṇe, avadhāraṇatthe vā nipāto. Tena ete evāti dasseti. Aṭṭhārasevāti
atk-s0519a:112_0: 4. Evaṃ uddiṭṭhe hārādayo niddisituṃ “tattha saṅkhepato”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha tatthāti
atk-s0519a:112_1: tasmiṃ uddesapāṭhe. Saṅkhepato netti kittitāti samāsato nettippakaraṇaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0519a:112_2: Hāranayamūlapadānañhi sarūpadassanaṃ uddesapāṭhena katanti. Ettha ca hāranayānaṃ –
atk-s0519a:114: Ettāvatā ca hetvādī, veditabbā hi viññunā.
atk-s0519a:115_0: Tesu avisesato visesato ca hāranayānaṃ attho dassito. Lakkhaṇādīsu pana avisesato
atk-s0519a:115_1: sabbepi hārā nayā ca yathākkamaṃ byañjanatthamukhena navaṅgassa sāsanassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanalakkhaṇā.
atk-s0519a:115_2: Visesato pana tassa tassa hārassa nayassa ca lakkhaṇaṃ niddese eva kathayissāma.
atk-s0519a:115_3: Kamādīni ca yasmā nesaṃ lakkhaṇesu ñātesu viññeyyāni honti, tasmā tānipi niddesato
atk-s0519a:117_0: 1. Yā pana assādādīnavatātiādikā niddesagāthā, tāsu assādādīnavatāti assādo ādīnavatāti
atk-s0519a:117_1: padavibhāgo. Ādīnavatāti ca ādīnavo eva. Keci “assādādīnavato”ti paṭhanti, taṃ na
atk-s0519a:117_2: sundaraṃ. Tattha assādīyatīti assādo, sukhaṃ somanassañca. Vuttañhetaṃ – “yaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0519a:117_3: pañcupādānakkhandhe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu
atk-s0519a:117_4: assādo”ti. Yathā cetaṃ sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, evaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇampi. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0519a:117_5: “so tadassādeti taṃ nikāmetī”ti “rūpaṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjatī”ti,
atk-s0519a:117_6: “saṃyojanīyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino”ti ca. Assādeti etāyāti vā assādo,
atk-s0519a:117_7: taṇhā. Taṇhāya hi kāraṇabhūtāya puggalo sukhampi sukhārammaṇampi assādeti. Yathā
atk-s0519a:117_8: ca taṇhā, evaṃ vipallāsāpi. Vipallāsavasena hi sattā aniṭṭhampi ārammaṇaṃ iṭṭhākārena
atk-s0519a:117_9: assādenti, evaṃ vedanāya sabbesaṃ tebhūmakasaṅkhārānaṃ taṇhāya vipallāsānañca assādavicāro veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:118_0: Kathaṃ pana dukkhādukkhamasukhavedanānaṃ assādanīyatāti? Vipallāsato sukhapariyāyasabbhāvato
atk-s0519a:118_1: ca. Tathā hi vuttaṃ – “sukhā kho, āvuso visākha, vedanā ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā.
atk-s0519a:118_2: Dukkhā vedanā ṭhitidukkhā vipariṇāmasukhā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā ñāṇasukhā aññāṇadukkhā”ti.
atk-s0519a:118_4: taṇhāya saṃkilesavatthuvibhaṅge nikkhepakaṇḍe ca taṇhāniddesavasena, vipallāsānaṃ
atk-s0519a:119_0: Ādīnavo dukkhā vedanā tissopi vā dukkhatā. Atha vā sabbepi tebhūmakā saṅkhārā ādīnavo.
atk-s0519a:119_1: Ādīnaṃ ativiya kapaṇaṃ vāti pavattatīti hi ādīnavo, kapaṇamanusso, evaṃsabhāvā ca
atk-s0519a:119_2: tebhūmakā dhammā aniccatādiyogena. Yato tattha ādīnavānupassanā āraddhavipassakānaṃ
atk-s0519a:119_3: yathābhūtanayoti vuccati. Tathā ca vuttaṃ – “yaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcupādānakkhandhā
atk-s0519a:119_4: aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṃ pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ādīnavo”ti. Tasmā
atk-s0519a:119_5: ādīnavo dukkhasaccaniddesabhūtānaṃ jātiyādīnaṃ aniccatādīnaṃ dvācattālīsāya ākārānañca
atk-s0519a:120_0: Nissarati etenāti nissaraṇaṃ, ariyamaggo. Nissaratīti vā nissaraṇaṃ nibbānaṃ. Ubhayampi
atk-s0519a:120_1: sāmaññaniddesena ekasesena vā “nissaraṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Pi-saddo purimānaṃ pacchimānañca
atk-s0519a:120_3: kāyānupassanādīnañca tadantogadhabhedānaṃ vasena nissaraṇaṃ vibhajitvā niddisitabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:121_0: Nibbānapakkhe pana kiñcāpi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā nippariyāyena vibhāgo natthi. Pariyāyena
atk-s0519a:121_1: pana sopādisesanirupādisesabhedena. Yato vā taṃ nissaṭaṃ, tesaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge
atk-s0519a:121_2: dassitappabhedānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ dvārānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ channaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ taṃtaṃdvārappavattānaṃ
atk-s0519a:121_4: channaṃ dhātūnaṃ dasannaṃ kasiṇāyatanānaṃ asubhānaṃ kesādīnaṃ dvattiṃsāya ākārānaṃ
atk-s0519a:121_5: pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ lokiyānaṃ indriyānaṃ
atk-s0519a:121_6: kāmadhātuādīnaṃ tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ kāmabhavādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhavānaṃ catunnaṃ
atk-s0519a:121_7: jhānānaṃ appamaññānaṃ āruppānaṃ dvādasannaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānañcāti evamādīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:122_0: Phalanti desanāphalaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti? Yaṃ desanāya nipphādīyati. Nanu ca nibbānādhigamo
atk-s0519a:122_1: bhagavato desanāya nipphādīyati. Nibbānañca “nissaraṇa”nti iminā vuttamevāti? Saccametaṃ,
atk-s0519a:122_2: tañca kho paramparāya. Idha pana paccakkhato desanāphalaṃ adhippetaṃ. Taṃ pana sutamayañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:122_4: khaṇe maggaṃ anabhisambhuṇantassa kālantare tadadhigamakāraṇabhūtaṃ sampattibhavahetu
atk-s0519a:122_5: ca siyā. Tathā hi vakkhati – “attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhacca, evaṃ maccutaro siyāti idaṃ phala”nti,
atk-s0519a:122_6: “dhammo have rakkhati dhammacārinti idaṃ phala”nti ca. Etena nayena devesu ca mānusesu
atk-s0519a:122_8: devarajjasirī cattāri sampatticakkāni sīlasampadā samādhisampadā tisso vijjā cha
atk-s0519a:122_9: abhiññā catasso paṭisambhidā sāvakabodhi paccekabodhi sammāsambodhīti sabbāpi sampattiyo
atk-s0519a:122_10: puññasambhārahetukā bhagavato desanāya sādhetabbatāya phalanti veditabbā.
atk-s0519a:123_0: Upāyoti ariyamaggapadaṭṭhānabhūtā pubbabhāgappaṭipadā. Sā hi purimā purimā pacchimāya
atk-s0519a:123_1: pacchimāya adhigamūpāyabhāvato paramparāya magganibbānādhigamassa ca hetubhāvato
atk-s0519a:123_2: upāyo. Yā ca pubbe vuttaphalādhigamassa upāyapaṭipatti. Keci pana “saha vipassanāya
atk-s0519a:123_3: maggo upāyo”ti vadanti, tesaṃ matena nissaraṇanti nibbānameva vuttaṃ siyā. Phalaṃ
atk-s0519a:123_4: viya upāyopi pubbabhāgoti vuttaṃ siyā, yaṃ pana vakkhati “sabbe dhammā…pe… visuddhiyāti
atk-s0519a:123_5: ayaṃ upāyo”ti. Etthāpi pubbabhāgappaṭipadā eva udāhaṭāti sakkā viññātuṃ. Yasmā pana
atk-s0519a:123_6: “te pahāya tare oghanti idaṃ nissaraṇa”nti ariyamaggassa nissaraṇabhāvaṃ vakkhati.
atk-s0519a:124: Āṇattīti āṇārahassa bhagavato veneyyajanassa hitasiddhiyā “evaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti vidhānaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati “suññato lokaṃ avekkhassu, mogharājāti āṇattī”ti.
atk-s0519a:125_0: Yogīnanti catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya yuttappayuttānaṃ veneyyānaṃ, atthāyāti vacanaseso.
atk-s0519a:125_1: Desanāhāroti etesaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ assādādīnaṃ vibhajanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
atk-s0519a:125_2: desanāhāro nāmāti attho. Etthāha – kiṃ panetesaṃ assādādīnaṃ anavasesānaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0519a:125_3: desanāhāro, udāhu ekaccānanti? Niravasesānaṃyeva. Yasmiñhi sutte assādādīnavanissaraṇāni
atk-s0519a:125_4: sarūpato āgatāni, tattha vattabbameva natthi. Yattha pana ekadesena āgatāni, na vā
atk-s0519a:125_5: sarūpena. Tattha anāgataṃ atthavasena niddhāretvā hāro yojetabbo. Ayañca attho desanāhāravibhaṅge
atk-s0519a:126_0: 2. Yaṃ pucchitanti yā pucchā, viciyamānāti vacanaseso. Vissajjitaṃ anugītīti etthāpi
atk-s0519a:126_1: eseva nayo. Tattha vissajjitanti vissajjanā, sā ekaṃsabyākaraṇādivasena catubbidhaṃ
atk-s0519a:126_2: byākaraṇaṃ. Ca-saddo sampiṇḍanattho, tena gāthāyaṃ avuttaṃ padādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tā
atk-s0519a:126_3: pana pucchāvissajjanā kassāti āha “suttassā”ti. Etena sutte āgataṃ pucchāvissajjanaṃ
atk-s0519a:126_4: vicetabbanti dasseti. Yā ca anugītiti vuttasseva atthassa yā anu pacchā gīti anugīti,
atk-s0519a:126_5: saṅgahagāthā, pucchāya vā anurūpā gīti. Etena pubbāparaṃ gahitaṃ. Byākaraṇassa hi
atk-s0519a:126_6: pucchānurūpatā idha pubbāparaṃ adhippetaṃ. Yā “pucchānusandhī”ti vuccati. Purimaṃ
atk-s0519a:126_7: “suttassā”ti padaṃ pubbāpekkhanti puna “suttassā”ti vuttaṃ. Tena suttassa nissayabhūte
atk-s0519a:126_8: assādādike pariggaṇhāti. Ettāvatā vicayahārassa visayo niravasesena dassito hoti.
atk-s0519a:126_9: Tathā ca vakkhati vicayahāravibhaṅge “padaṃ vicinati…pe… anugītiṃ vicinatī”ti.
atk-s0519a:127_0: Tattha sutte sabbesaṃ padānaṃ anupubbena atthaso byañjanaso ca vicayo padavicayo.
atk-s0519a:127_1: “Ayaṃ pucchā adiṭṭhajotanā diṭṭhasaṃsandanā vimaticchedanā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchā
atk-s0519a:127_2: sattādhiṭṭhānā dhammādhiṭṭhānā ekādhiṭṭhānā anekādhiṭṭhānā sammutivisayā paramatthavisayā
atk-s0519a:127_4: vissajjanaṃ ekaṃsabyākaraṇaṃ vibhajjabyākaraṇaṃ paṭipucchābyākaraṇaṃ ṭhapanaṃ sāvasesaṃ
atk-s0519a:127_5: niravasesaṃ sauttaraṃ anuttaraṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttara”ntiādinā vissajjanavicayo.
atk-s0519a:128_0: “Ayaṃ pucchā iminā sameti, etena na sametī”ti pucchitatthaṃ ānetvā vicayo pubbenāparaṃ
atk-s0519a:128_1: saṃsanditvā ca vicayo pubbāparavicayo. “Ayaṃ anugīti vuttatthasaṅgahā avuttatthasaṅgahā
atk-s0519a:128_5: sabbesañca dvāvīsatiyā tikesu dvācattālīsādhike ca dukasate labbhamānapadavasena
atk-s0519a:129_1: aniccatādīnaṃ ādiantavantatāya aniccantikatāya ca “aniccā”tiādinā sabbesañca lokiyadhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:129_5: Phalādīnaṃ taṃtaṃsuttadesanāya sādhetabbaphalassa tadupāyassa tattha tattha suttavidhivacanassa
atk-s0519a:129_6: ca vibhāganiddhāraṇavasena vicayo veditabbo. Evaṃ padapucchāvissajjanapubbāparānugītīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:130_0: 3. Sabbesanti soḷasannaṃ. Bhūmīti byañjanaṃ sandhāyāha. Byañjanañhi mūlapadāni viya
atk-s0519a:130_1: nayānaṃ hārānaṃ bhūmi pavattiṭṭhānaṃ, tesaṃ byañjanavicārabhāvato. Vuttañhi – “hārā
atk-s0519a:130_2: byañjanavicayo”ti, peṭakepi hi vuttaṃ – “yattha ca sabbe hārā, sampatamānā nayanti
atk-s0519a:130_3: suttatthaṃ. Byañjanavidhiputhuttā”ti. Gocaroti suttattho. Suttassa hi padatthuddhāraṇamukhena
atk-s0519a:130_4: hārayojanā. Tesaṃ byañjanatthānaṃ. Yuttāyuttaparikkhāti yuttassa ca ayuttassa ca
atk-s0519a:130_5: upaparikkhā. “Yuttāyuttiparikkhā”tipi pāṭho, yuttiayuttīnaṃ vicāraṇāti attho. Kathaṃ
atk-s0519a:130_6: pana tesaṃ yuttāyuttajānanā? Catūhi mahāpadesehi avirujjhanena. Tattha byañjanassa
atk-s0519a:130_7: tāva sabhāvaniruttibhāvo adhippetatthavācakabhāvo ca yuttabhāvo. Atthassa pana suttavinayadhammatāhi
atk-s0519a:130_8: avilomanaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana parato āvi bhavissati. Hāro yuttīti
atk-s0519a:130_9: niddiṭṭhoti evaṃ sutte byañjanatthānaṃ yuttāyuttabhāvavibhāvanalakkhaṇo yuttihāroti veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:131_0: 4. Dhammanti yaṃ kiñci suttāgataṃ kusalādidhammamāha. Tassa dhammassāti tassa yathāvuttassa
atk-s0519a:131_1: kusalādidhammassa. Yaṃ padaṭṭhānanti yaṃ kāraṇaṃ, yonisomanasikārādi sutte āgataṃ
atk-s0519a:131_2: vā anāgataṃ vā sambhavato niddhāretvā kathetabbanti adhippāyo. Itīti evaṃ, vuttanayenāti
atk-s0519a:131_3: attho. Yāva sabbadhammāti yattakā tasmiṃ sutte āgatā dhammā, tesaṃ sabbesampi yathānurūpaṃ
atk-s0519a:131_4: padaṭṭhānaṃ niddhāretvā kathetabbanti adhippāyo. Atha vā yāva sabbadhammāti suttāgatassa
atk-s0519a:131_5: dhammassa yaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ, tassapi yaṃ padaṭṭhānanti sambhavato yāva sabbadhammā
atk-s0519a:131_6: padaṭṭhānavicāraṇā kātabbāti attho. Eso hāro padaṭṭhānoti evaṃ sutte āgatadhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:131_7: padaṭṭhānabhūtā dhammā tesañca padaṭṭhānabhūtāti sambhavato padaṭṭhānabhūtadhammaniddhāraṇalakkhaṇo
atk-s0519a:132_0: 5. Vuttamhi ekadhammeti kusalādīsu khandhādīsu vā yasmiṃ kismiñci ekadhamme, sutte
atk-s0519a:132_1: sarūpato niddhāraṇavasena vā kathite. Ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā kecīti ye keci dhammā
atk-s0519a:132_2: kusalādibhāvena rūpakkhandhādibhāvena vā tena dhammena samānalakkhaṇā. Vuttā bhavanti
atk-s0519a:132_3: sabbeti te sabbepi kusalādisabhāvā, khandhādisabhāvā vā dhammā sutte avuttāpi tāya
atk-s0519a:132_4: samānalakkhaṇatāya vuttā bhavanti ānetvā saṃvaṇṇanāvasenāti adhippāyo. Ettha ca ekalakkhaṇāti
atk-s0519a:132_5: samānalakkhaṇā vuttā. Tena sahacāritā samānakiccatā samānahetutā samānaphalatā samānārammaṇatāti
atk-s0519a:132_6: evamādīhi avuttānampi vuttānaṃ viya niddhāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. So hāro lakkhaṇo nāmāti
atk-s0519a:132_7: evaṃ sutte anāgatepi dhamme vuttappakārena āgate viya niddhāretvā yā saṃvaṇṇanā,
atk-s0519a:133_0: 6. Neruttanti niruttaṃ, padanibbacananti attho. Adhippāyoti buddhānaṃ sāvakānaṃ vā
atk-s0519a:133_1: tassa suttassa desakānaṃ adhippāyo. Byañjananti byañjanena, karaṇe hi etaṃ paccattaṃ.
atk-s0519a:133_2: Kāmañca sabbe hārā byañjanavicayā, ayaṃ pana visesato byañjanadvāreneva atthapariyesanāti
atk-s0519a:133_3: katvā “byañjana”nti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati – “byañjanena suttassa neruttañca adhippāyo
atk-s0519a:133_4: ca nidānañca pubbāparānusandhi ca gavesitabbā”ti. Athāti padapūraṇamattaṃ. Desanānidānanti
atk-s0519a:133_5: nidadāti phalanti nidānaṃ, kāraṇaṃ, yena kāraṇena desanā pavattā, taṃ desanāya pavattinimittanti
atk-s0519a:133_6: attho. Pubbāparānusandhīti pubbena ca aparena ca anusandhi. “Pubbāparena sandhī”tipi
atk-s0519a:133_7: pāṭho, suttassa pubbabhāgena aparabhāgaṃ saṃsanditvā kathananti attho. Saṅgītivasena
atk-s0519a:133_8: vā pubbāparabhūtehi suttantarehi saṃvaṇṇiyamānassa suttassa saṃsandanaṃ pubbāparānusandhi.
atk-s0519a:133_9: Yañca pubbapadena parapadassa sambandhanaṃ, ayampi pubbāparānusandhi. Eso hāro catubyūhoti
atk-s0519a:133_10: evaṃ nibbacanādhippāyādīnaṃ catunnaṃ vibhāvanalakkhaṇo catubyūho hāro nāmāti attho.
atk-s0519a:134_0: 7. Ekamhi padaṭṭhāneti ekasmiṃ ārambhadhātuādike parakkamadhātuādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānabhūte
atk-s0519a:134_1: dhamme desanāruḷhe sati. Pariyesati sesakaṃ padaṭṭhānanti tassa visabhāgatāya aggahaṇena
atk-s0519a:134_2: vā sesakaṃ pamādādīnaṃ āsannakāraṇattā padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ kosajjādikaṃ dhammantaraṃ
atk-s0519a:134_3: pariyesati paññāya gavesati, pariyesitvā ca saṃvaṇṇanāya yojento desanaṃ āvaṭṭati
atk-s0519a:134_4: paṭipakkheti vīriyārambhādimukhena āraddhasuttaṃ vuttanayena pamādādivasena niddisanto
atk-s0519a:134_5: desanaṃ paṭipakkhato āvaṭṭeti nāma. Āvaṭṭo nāma so hāroti desanāya gahitadhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:134_6: sabhāgavisabhāgadhammavasena āvaṭṭanalakkhaṇo āvaṭṭo hāro nāmāti attho.
atk-s0519a:135_0: 8. Dhammanti sabhāvadhammaṃ, taṃ kusalādivasena anekavidhaṃ. Padaṭṭhānanti yasmiṃ
atk-s0519a:135_1: patiṭṭhite uttari guṇavisese adhigacchati, taṃ visesādhigamanakāraṇaṃ. Bhūminti puthujjanabhūmi
atk-s0519a:135_2: dassanabhūmīti evamādikaṃ bhūmiṃ. Vibhajjateti vibhāgena katheti. Sādhāraṇeti dassanapahātabbādināmavasena
atk-s0519a:135_3: vā puthujjanasotāpannādivatthuvasena vā sādhāraṇe avisiṭṭhe samāneti attho. Vuttavipariyāyena
atk-s0519a:135_4: asādhāraṇā veditabbā. Neyyo vibhattīti yathāvuttadhammādīnaṃ vibhajano ayaṃ hāro
atk-s0519a:135_5: vibhattīti ñātabboti attho. Tasmā saṃkilesadhamme vodānadhamme ca sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇato
atk-s0519a:136_0: 9. Niddiṭṭheti kathite sutte āgate, saṃvaṇṇite vā. Bhāviteti yathā uppannasadisā
atk-s0519a:136_1: uppannāti vuccanti, evaṃ bhāvitasadise bhāvetabbeti attho. Pahīneti etthāpi eseva
atk-s0519a:136_2: nayo. Parivattati paṭipakkheti vuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ ye paṭipakkhā, tesaṃ vasena parivattetīti
atk-s0519a:136_3: attho. Evaṃ niddiṭṭhānaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭipakkhato parivattanalakkhaṇo “parivattano hāro”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:137_0: 10. Vividhāni ekasmiṃyeva atthe vacanāni vivacanāni, vivacanāni eva vevacanāni, pariyāyasaddāti
atk-s0519a:137_1: attho. Tāni vevacanāni. Bahūnīti anekāni. Tu-saddo avadhāraṇe. Tena bahū eva pariyāyasaddā
atk-s0519a:137_2: vevacanahārayojanāyaṃ kathetabbā, na katipayāti dasseti. Sutte vuttānīti navavidhasuttantasaṅkhāte
atk-s0519a:137_3: tepiṭake buddhavacane bhāsitāni. Etthāpi tu-saddassa attho ānetvā yojetabbo, tena
atk-s0519a:137_4: pāḷiyaṃ āgatāniyeva vevacanāni gahetabbānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ekadhammassāti ekassa padatthassa.
atk-s0519a:137_5: Yo jānāti suttavidūti yathā “sappissa jānāhī”ti vutte “sappinā vicārehi, sappiṃ dehi,
atk-s0519a:137_6: dethā”ti vā āṇāpetīti attho, evaṃ yo suttakovido dhammakathiko ekassa atthassa bahūpi
atk-s0519a:137_7: pariyāyasadde vicāreti vibhāveti yojetīti attho. Vevacano nāma so hāroti tassa atthassa
atk-s0519a:137_8: vuttappakārapariyāyasaddayojanālakkhaṇo vevacanahāro nāma. Tasmā ekasmiṃ atthe anekapariyāyasaddayojanālakkhaṇo
atk-s0519a:138_0: 11. Dhammanti khandhādidhammaṃ. Paññattīhīti paññāpanehi pakārehi ñāpanehi, asaṅkarato
atk-s0519a:138_1: vā ṭhapanehi. Vividhāhīti nikkhepappabhavādivasena anekavidhāhi. So ākāroti yo ekassevatthassa
atk-s0519a:138_2: nikkhepappabhavapaññattiādivasena anekāhi paññattīhi paññāpanākāro. Ñeyyo paññatti
atk-s0519a:138_3: nāma hāroti paññattihāro nāmāti ñātabbo. Tasmā ekekassa dhammassa anekāhi paññattīhi
atk-s0519a:139_0: 12. Paṭiccuppādoti paṭiccasamuppādo. Indriyakhandhāti indriyāni ca khandhā ca. Dhātuāyatanāti
atk-s0519a:139_1: dhātuyo ca āyatanāni ca. Etehīti yo dvādasapadiko paccayākāro yāni ca dvāvīsatindriyāni
atk-s0519a:139_2: ye ca pañcakkhandhā yā ca aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo yāni ca dvādasāyatanāni, etehi sutte
atk-s0519a:139_3: āgatapadatthamukhena niddhāriyamānehi. Otarati yoti yo saṃvaṇṇanānayo ogāhati, paṭiccasamuppādādike
atk-s0519a:139_4: anupavisatīti attho. Otaraṇo nāma so hāroti yo yathāvutto saṃvaṇṇanāviseso, so otaraṇahāro
atk-s0519a:139_5: nāma. Ca-saddena cettha suññatamukhādīnaṃ gāthāyaṃ avuttānampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0519a:139_6: Evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādādimukhehi suttatthassa otaraṇalakkhaṇo otaraṇo hāro nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:140_0: 13. Vissajjitamhīti buddhādīhi byākate. Pañheti ñātuṃ icchite atthe. Gāthāyanti gāthāruḷhe.
atk-s0519a:140_1: Idañca pucchantā yebhuyyena gāthābandhavasena pucchantīti katvā vuttaṃ. Yamārabbhāti
atk-s0519a:140_2: sā pana gāthā yaṃ atthaṃ ārabbha adhikicca pucchitā, tassa atthassa. Suddhāsuddhaparikkhāti
atk-s0519a:140_3: padaṃ sodhitaṃ, ārambho na sodhito, padañca sodhitaṃ ārambho ca sodhitoti evaṃ padādīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:140_4: sodhitāsodhitabhāvavicāro. Hāro so sodhano nāmāti yathāvuttavicāro sodhano hāro nāma.
atk-s0519a:140_5: Evaṃ sutte padapadatthapañhārambhānaṃ sodhanalakkhaṇo “sodhano hāro”ti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:141_0: 14. Ekattatāyāti ekassa bhāvo ekattaṃ, ekattameva ekattatā, tāya ekattatāya. Eka-saddo
atk-s0519a:141_1: cettha samānasaddapariyāyo, tasmā sāmaññenāti attho. Visiṭṭhā mattā vimattā, vimattāva
atk-s0519a:141_2: vemattaṃ, tassa bhāvo vemattatā, tāya vemattatāya, visesenāti attho. Te na vikappayitabbāti
atk-s0519a:141_3: ye dhammā “dukkhaṃ samudayo”tiādinā sāmaññena, “jāti jarā kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:141_4: visesena ca sutte desitā, te “kimettha sāmaññaṃ, ko vā viseso”ti evaṃ sāmaññavisesavikappanavasena
atk-s0519a:141_5: na vikappayitabbā. Kasmā? Sāmaññavisesakappanāya vohārabhāvena anavaṭṭhānato kāladisāvisesādīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:141_6: viya apekkhāsiddhito ca. Yathā hi “ajja hiyyo sve”ti vuccamānā kālavisesā anavaṭṭhitasabhāvā
atk-s0519a:141_7: “purimā disā pacchimā disā”ti vuccamānā disāvisesā ca, evaṃ sāmaññavisesāpi. Tathā
atk-s0519a:141_8: hi “idaṃ dukkha”nti vuccamānaṃ jātiādiapekkhāya sāmaññampi samānaṃ saccāpekkhāya
atk-s0519a:141_9: viseso hoti. Esa nayo samudayādīsupi. Eso hāro adhiṭṭhānoti evaṃ suttāgatānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:141_10: avikappanavasena sāmaññavisesaniddhāraṇalakkhaṇo adhiṭṭhāno hāro nāmāti attho.
atk-s0519a:142_0: 15. Ye dhammāti ye avijjādikā paccayadhammā. Yaṃ dhammanti yaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ paccayuppannadhammaṃ.
atk-s0519a:142_1: Janayantīti nibbattenti. Paccayāti sahajātapaccayabhāvena. Paramparatoti paramparapaccayabhāvena,
atk-s0519a:142_2: anurūpasantānaghaṭanavasena paccayo hutvāti attho. Upanissayakoṭi hi idhādhippetā.
atk-s0519a:142_3: Purimasmiṃ avasiṭṭho paccayabhāvo. Hetumavakaḍḍhayitvāti taṃ yathāvuttapaccayasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a:142_4: janakādibhedabhinnaṃ hetuṃ ākaḍḍhitvā suttato niddhāretvā yo saṃvaṇṇanāsaṅkhāto,
atk-s0519a:142_5: eso hāro parikkhāroti evaṃ sutte āgatadhammānaṃ parikkhārasaṅkhāte hetupaccaye niddhāretvā
atk-s0519a:143_0: 16. Ye dhammāti ye sīlādidhammā. Yaṃmūlāti yesaṃ samādhiādīnaṃ mūlabhūtā, te tesaṃ
atk-s0519a:143_1: samādhiādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānabhāvena samāropayitabbāti sambandho. Ye cekatthā pakāsitā
atk-s0519a:143_3: ekatthā buddhamuninā paridīpitā, te aññamaññavevacanabhāvena samāropayitabbāti sambandho.
atk-s0519a:143_4: Samāropanañcettha sutte yathārutavasena niddhāraṇavasena vā gayhamānassa sikkhattayasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0519a:143_6: ca pahātabbassa pahānenāti pahānasamāropanāpi atthato dassitā eva hoti. Esa samāropano
atk-s0519a:145_0: 17. Evaṃ gāthābandhavasena soḷasapi hāre niddisitvā idāni naye niddisituṃ “taṇhañcā”tiādi
atk-s0519a:145_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha taṇhañca avijjampi cāti sutte āgataṃ atthato niddhāraṇavasena vā gahitaṃ
atk-s0519a:145_2: taṇhaṃ avijjañca yo netīti sambandho. Yo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso taṃ neti saṃkilesapakkhaṃ
atk-s0519a:145_3: pāpeti saṃkilesavasena suttatthaṃ yojetīti adhippāyo. Samathenāti samādhinā. Vipassanāyāti
atk-s0519a:145_4: paññāya, yo neti vodānapakkhaṃ pāpeti, tathā suttatthaṃ yojetīti adhippāyo. Saccehi
atk-s0519a:145_5: yojayitvāti nayanto ca taṇhā ca avijjā ca bhavamūlakattā samudayasaccaṃ, avasesā
atk-s0519a:145_6: tebhūmakadhammā dukkhasaccaṃ, samathavipassanā maggasaccaṃ, tena pattabbā asaṅkhatadhātu
atk-s0519a:145_7: nirodhasaccanti evaṃ imehi catūhi saccehi yojetvā. Ayaṃ nayo nandiyāvaṭṭoti yo taṇhāvijjāhi
atk-s0519a:145_9: nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso, ayaṃ nandiyāvaṭṭo nayo nāmāti attho. Ettha ca nayassa
atk-s0519a:145_10: bhūmi gāthāyaṃ “nayo”ti vuttā, tasmā saṃvaṇṇanāvisesoti vuttaṃ. Na hi atthanayo saṃvaṇṇanā,
atk-s0519a:145_11: catusaccapaṭivedhassa anurūpo pubbabhāge anugāhaṇanayo atthanayo. Tassa pana yā ugghaṭitaññuādīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:146_0: 18. Akusaleti dvādasacittuppādasaṅgahite sabbepi akusale dhamme. Samūlehīti attano
atk-s0519a:146_1: mūlehi, lobhadosamohehīti attho. Kusaleti sabbepi catubhūmake kusale dhamme. Kusalamūlehīti
atk-s0519a:146_2: kusalehi alobhādimūlehi yo neti. Nayanto ca kusalākusalaṃ māyāmarīciādayo viya abhūtaṃ
atk-s0519a:146_3: na hotīti bhūtaṃ. Paṭaghaṭādayo viya na sammutisaccamattanti tathaṃ. Akusalassa iṭṭhavipākatābhāvato
atk-s0519a:146_4: kusalassa ca aniṭṭhavipākatābhāvato vipāke sati avisaṃvādakattā avitathaṃ neti. Evametesaṃ
atk-s0519a:146_5: tiṇṇampi padānaṃ kusalākusalavisesanatā daṭṭhabbā. Atha vā akusalamūlehi akusalāni
atk-s0519a:146_6: kusalamūlehi ca kusalāni nayanto ayaṃ nayo bhūtaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ neti, cattāri
atk-s0519a:146_7: saccāni niddhāretvā yojetīti attho. Dukkhādīni hi bādhakādibhāvato aññathābhāvābhāvena
atk-s0519a:146_8: bhūtāni, saccasabhāvattā tathāni, avisaṃvādanato avitathāni. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā
atk-s0519a:146_9: “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathānī”ti. Tipukkhalaṃ taṃ nayaṃ
atk-s0519a:146_10: āhūti yo akusalamūlehi saṃkilesapakkhassa kusalamūlehi vodānapakkhassa suttatthassa
atk-s0519a:146_11: catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso, taṃ tipukkhalaṃ nayanti vadantīti attho.
atk-s0519a:147_0: 19. Vipallāsehīti asubhe subhantiādinayappavattehi catūhi vipallāsehi. Kileseti kilissanti
atk-s0519a:147_1: vibādhiyantīti kilesā, saṃkiliṭṭhadhammā, saṃkilesapakkhanti attho. Keci “saṃkilese”tipi
atk-s0519a:147_2: paṭhanti, kilesasahiteti attho. Indriyehīti saddhādīhi indriyehi. Saddhammeti paṭipattipaṭivedhasaddhamme,
atk-s0519a:147_3: vodānapakkhanti attho. Etaṃ nayanti yo subhasaññādīhi vipallāsehi sakalassa saṃkilesapakkhassa
atk-s0519a:147_5: etaṃ nayaṃ nayavidū saddhammanayakovidā, atthanayakusalā eva vā sīhavikkīḷitaṃ nayanti vadantīti attho.
atk-s0519a:148_0: 20. Veyyākaraṇesūti tassa tassa atthanayassa yojanatthaṃ katesu suttassa atthavissajjanesūti
atk-s0519a:148_1: attho. Tenevāha “tahiṃ tahi”nti. Kusalākusalāti vodāniyā saṃkilesikā ca tassa tassa
atk-s0519a:148_2: nayassa disābhūtadhammā. Vuttāti suttato niddhāretvā kathitā. Manasā volokayateti
atk-s0519a:148_3: te yathāvuttadhamme citteneva “ayaṃ paṭhamā disā ayaṃ dutiyā disā”tiādinā tassa tassa
atk-s0519a:148_4: nayassa disābhāvena upaparikkhati, vicāretīti attho. “Olokayate te abahī”tipi pāṭho.
atk-s0519a:148_5: Tattha teti te yathāvuttadhamme. Abahīti abbhantaraṃ, citte evāti attho. Taṃ khu
atk-s0519a:148_6: disālocanaṃ āhūti olokayateti ettha yadetaṃ olokanaṃ, taṃ disālocanaṃ nāma nayaṃ
atk-s0519a:148_7: vadanti. Khu-ti ca nipāto avadhāraṇe. Tena olokanameva ayaṃ nayo, na koci atthavisesoti dasseti.
atk-s0519a:149_1: karaṇabhūtena. Yena hi vidhinā tassa tassa atthanayassa yojanāya disā olokīyanti,
atk-s0519a:149_2: so vidhi disālocananti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Ukkhipiyāti uddharitvā, disābhūtadhamme
atk-s0519a:149_3: suttato niddhāretvāti attho. “Ukkhipiya yo samānetī”tipi paṭhanti, tassattho – “yo
atk-s0519a:149_4: tesaṃ disābhūtadhammānaṃ samānayanaṃ karotī”ti. Yanti vā kiriyāparāmasanaṃ. Samānetīti
atk-s0519a:149_5: samaṃ, sammā vā āneti tassa tassa nayassa yojanāvasena. Ke pana āneti? Sabbe kusalākusale
atk-s0519a:149_6: taṃtaṃnayadisābhūte. Ayaṃ nayoti samānetīti ettha yadetaṃ taṃtaṃnayadisābhūtadhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:149_7: samānayanaṃ, ayaṃ aṅkuso nāma nayoti attho. Etañca dvayaṃ “vohāranayo, kammanayo”ti ca vuccati.
atk-s0519a:150_0: 22. Evaṃ hāre naye ca niddisitvā idāni nesaṃ yojanakkamaṃ dassento “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:150_1: Tattha paṭhamaṃ soḷasa hārā “yojetabbā”ti vacanaseso. Hārasaṃvaṇṇanā paṭhamaṃ kātabbā
atk-s0519a:150_2: byañjanapariyeṭṭhibhāvatoti adhippāyo. Disalocanatoti disālocanena, ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0519a:150_3: Aṅkusena hīti hi-saddo nipātamattaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0519a:152_0: 23. Idāni yesaṃ byañjanapadānaṃ atthapadānañca vasena dvādasa padāni suttanti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a:152_1: tāni padāni niddisituṃ “akkharaṃ pada”ntiādimāha. Tattha apariyosite pade vaṇṇo akkharaṃ
atk-s0519a:152_2: pariyāyavasena akkharaṇato asañcaraṇato. Na hi vaṇṇassa pariyāyo vijjati, atha vaṇṇoti
atk-s0519a:152_3: kenaṭṭhena vaṇṇo? Atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṭṭhena. Vaṇṇo eva hi ittarakhaṇatāya aparāparabhāvena
atk-s0519a:152_4: pavatto padādibhāvena gayhamāno yathāsambandhaṃ taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vadati. Ekakkharaṃ
atk-s0519a:152_5: vā padaṃ akkharaṃ, keci pana “manasā desanāvācāya akkharaṇato akkhara”nti vadanti.
atk-s0519a:153_0: Padanti pajjati attho etenāti padaṃ, taṃ nāmapadaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ upasaggapadaṃ nipātapadanti
atk-s0519a:153_1: catubbidhaṃ. Tattha “phasso vedanā citta”nti evamādikaṃ satvappadhānaṃ nāmapadaṃ.
atk-s0519a:153_2: “Phusati vedayati vijānātī”ti evamādikaṃ kiriyāpadhānaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ. Kiriyāvisesaggahaṇanimittaṃ
atk-s0519a:153_3: “pa” iti evamādikaṃ upasaggapadaṃ. Kiriyāya satvassa ca sarūpavisesappakāsanahetubhūtaṃ
atk-s0519a:154_0: Byañjananti saṅkhepato vuttaṃ padābhihitaṃ atthaṃ byañjayatīti byañjanaṃ, vākyaṃ.
atk-s0519a:154_1: Taṃ pana atthato padasamudāyoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Padamattasavanepi hi adhikārādivasena
atk-s0519a:154_2: labbhamānehi padantarehi anusandhānaṃ katvāva atthasampaṭipatti hotīti vākyameva
atk-s0519a:154_3: atthaṃ byañjayati. Niruttīti ākārābhihitaṃ nibbacanaṃ nirutti.
atk-s0519a:155_0: Niddesoti nibbacanavitthāro niravasesadesanattā niddeso. Padehi vākyassa vibhāgo
atk-s0519a:155_1: ākāro. Yadi evaṃ padato ākārassa ko visesoti? Apariyosite vākye avibhajjamāne vā
atk-s0519a:155_2: tadavayavo padaṃ. Uccāraṇavasena pariyosite vākye vibhajjamāne vā tadavayavo ākāroti
atk-s0519a:155_3: ayametesaṃ viseso. Chaṭṭhaṃ vacanaṃ chaṭṭhavacanaṃ. Ākāro chaṭṭhavacanaṃ etassāti
atk-s0519a:155_4: ākārachaṭṭhavacanaṃ, byañjanapadaṃ. Ettha ca byañjananti imassa padassa anantaraṃ
atk-s0519a:155_6: padānupubbikaṃ pana icchantehi taṃ byañjanapadānantarameva kātabbaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati
atk-s0519a:155_7: “aparimāṇā byañjanā aparimāṇā ākārāti, byañjanehi vivarati ākārehi vibhajatī”ti ca.
atk-s0519a:155_8: Keci pana “ākārapadabyañjananiruttiyo ca niddeso”ti paṭhanti. Ettāva byañjanaṃ sabbanti
atk-s0519a:155_9: yānimāni akkharādīni niddiṭṭhāni, ettakameva sabbaṃ byañjanaṃ, etehi asaṅgahitaṃ
atk-s0519a:156_0: 24. Saṅkāsanāti saṃkhittena kāsanā. Pakāsanāti paṭhamaṃ kāsanā, kāsīyati dīpīyatīti
atk-s0519a:156_1: attho. Iminā hi atthapadadvayena akkharapadehi vibhāviyamāno atthākāro gahito. Yasmā
atk-s0519a:156_2: akkharehi suyyamānehi suṇantānaṃ visesavidhānassa katattā padapariyosāne padatthasampaṭipatti
atk-s0519a:156_3: hoti. Tathā hi vakkhati “tattha bhagavā akkharehi saṅkāseti padehi pakāsetīti, akkharehi
atk-s0519a:157_0: Vivaraṇāti vitthāraṇā. Vibhajanā ca uttānīkammañca paññatti ca vibhajanuttānīkammapaññatti.
atk-s0519a:157_1: Tattha vibhajanāti vibhāgakaraṇaṃ, ubhayenāpi niddisanamāha. Idha purimanayeneva
atk-s0519a:157_2: byañjanākārehi niddisiyamāno atthākāro dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Uttānīkammaṃ pākaṭakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:157_3: Pakārehi ñāpanaṃ paññatti. Dvayenāpi paṭiniddisanaṃ katheti. Etthāpi niruttiniddesasaṅkhātehi
atk-s0519a:157_4: byañjanapadehi niddisiyamāno atthākāro vutto, yo paṭiniddisīyatīti vuccati. Etehīti
atk-s0519a:157_5: etehi eva saṅkāsanādivinimuttassa desanātthassa abhāvato. Atthoti suttattho. Kammanti
atk-s0519a:157_6: ugghaṭanādikammaṃ. Suttatthena hi desanāya pavattiyamānena ugghaṭitaññuādiveneyyānaṃ
atk-s0519a:157_7: cittasantānassa pabodhanakiriyānibbatti. So ca suttattho saṅkāsanādiākāroti. Tena
atk-s0519a:158_0: 25. Tīṇīti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, tayoti vuttaṃ hoti. Navahi padehīti navahi koṭṭhāsehi.
atk-s0519a:158_1: Attho samāyuttoti attho sammā yutto na vinā vattati. Sabbassa hi buddhavacanassa
atk-s0519a:158_2: catusaccappakāsanato atthanayānañca catusaccayojanavasena pavattanato sabbo pāḷiattho
atk-s0519a:159_0: 26. Idāni yathāniddiṭṭhe desanāhārādike nettippakaraṇassa padatthe sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:159_1: gaṇanavasena paricchinditvā dassento “atthassā”tiādimāha. Tattha catubbīsāti soḷasa
atk-s0519a:159_2: hārā cha byañjanapadāni dve kammanayāti evaṃ catubbīsa. Ubhayanti cha atthapadāni
atk-s0519a:159_3: tayo atthanayāti idaṃ navavidhaṃ yathāvuttaṃ catubbīsavidhañcāti etaṃ ubhayaṃ. Saṅkalayitvāti
atk-s0519a:159_4: sampiṇḍetvā. “Saṅkhepayato”tipi pāṭho, ekato karontassāti attho. Ettikāti etappamāṇā,
atk-s0519a:159_5: ito vinimutto koci nettipadatthā natthīti attho.
atk-s0519a:160_0: Evaṃ tettiṃsapadatthāya nettiyā suttassa atthapariyesanāya yo “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”nti
atk-s0519a:160_1: nayehi paṭhamaṃ hārā saṃvaṇṇetabbāti hāranayānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanākkamo dassito, svāyaṃ
atk-s0519a:160_2: hāranayānaṃ desanākkameneva siddho. Evaṃ siddhe sati ayaṃ ārambho imamatthaṃ dīpeti
atk-s0519a:160_3: – sabbepime hārā nayā ca iminā dassitakkameneva suttesu saṃvaṇṇanāvasena yojetabbā, na uppaṭipāṭiyāti.
atk-s0519a:161_0: Kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ, yadete hārā nayā ca imināva kamena desitāti? Yadipi nāyamanuyogo
atk-s0519a:161_1: katthaci anukkame nivisati, api ca dhammadesanāya nissayaphalatadupāyasarīrabhūtānaṃ
atk-s0519a:161_2: assādādīnaṃ vibhāvanasabhāvattā pakatiyā sabbasuttānurūpāti suviññeyyabhāvato paresañca
atk-s0519a:161_3: saṃvaṇṇanāvisesānaṃ vicayahārādīnaṃ patiṭṭhābhāvato paṭhamaṃ desanāhāro dassito.
atk-s0519a:162_1: tassa anantaraṃ vicayo. Tathā hi vakkhati “padaṃ vicinati…pe… āṇattiṃ vicinati anugītiṃ vicinatī”ti.
atk-s0519a:163_0: Vicayena hārena pavicitānaṃ atthānaṃ yuttāyuttivicāraṇā yuttāti yuttivicāraṇabhāvato
atk-s0519a:163_1: vicayānantaraṃ yuttihāro vutto. Tathā hi vakkhati – “vicayena hārena vicinitvā yuttihārena yojetabba”nti.
atk-s0519a:164_1: padaṭṭhānacintanaṃ kattabbanti yuttihārānantaraṃ padaṭṭhānahāro dassito. Tathā hi
atk-s0519a:164_2: vakkhati – “yo koci upanissayo yo koci paccayo ca, sabbo so padaṭṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0519a:165_0: Yuttāyuttānaṃ kāraṇaparamparāya pariggahitasabhāvānaṃyeva ca dhammānaṃ avuttānampi
atk-s0519a:165_1: ekalakkhaṇatāya gahaṇaṃ kātabbanti dassanatthaṃ padaṭṭhānānantaraṃ lakkhaṇo hāro
atk-s0519a:165_2: vutto. Tathā hi lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅge “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
atk-s0519a:166_0: Atthato niddhāritānampi dhammānaṃ nibbacanādīni vattabbāni, na sutte sarūpato āgatānamevāti
atk-s0519a:166_1: dassanatthaṃ lakkhaṇānantaraṃ catubyūho vutto. Evañhi niravasesato atthāvabodho hoti,
atk-s0519a:166_2: evañca katvā “yadā hi bhikkhu atthassa ca nāmaṃ jānāti dhammassa ca nāmaṃ jānāti
atk-s0519a:166_3: tathā tathā naṃ abhiniropetī”ti anavasesapariyādānaṃ vakkhati. Tathā “punappunaṃ
atk-s0519a:166_4: gabbhamupetī”ti ettha “ye jarāmaraṇena aṭṭiyitukāmā bhavissanti, te bhavissanti bhojane
atk-s0519a:166_5: mattaññuno indriyesu guttadvārā”tiādinā sammāpaṭipattiṃ adhippāyabhāvena vakkhati.
atk-s0519a:167_1: pubbāparavicāre dassite tesaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammantarāvaṭṭanaṃ sukhena sakkā dassetunti
atk-s0519a:167_2: catubyūhānantaraṃ āvaṭṭo vutto. Teneva hi “ārambhatha nikkamathā”ti gāthāyaṃ ārambhanikkamanabuddhasāsanayogadhunanehi
atk-s0519a:168_1: padaṭṭhānato bhūmito ca vibhāgo sakkā sukhena yojitunti āvaṭṭānantaraṃ vibhattihāro
atk-s0519a:168_2: vutto. Yato vibhattihāravibhaṅge “katame dhammā sādhāraṇā? Dve dhammā sādhāraṇā,
atk-s0519a:168_3: nāmasādhāraṇā vatthusādhāraṇā cā”ti ārabhitvā “micchattaniyatānaṃ sattānaṃ aniyatānañca
atk-s0519a:168_4: sattānaṃ dassanappahātabbā kilesā sādhāraṇā, puthujjanassa sotāpannassa ca kāmarāgabyāpādā
atk-s0519a:169_0: Sāvajjānavajjadhammānaṃ sappaṭibhāgābhāvato tesaṃ vibhāge kate suttāgate dhamme akasirena
atk-s0519a:169_1: paṭipakkhato parivattetuṃ sakkāti vibhattianantaraṃ parivattanahāro vutto. Tathā
atk-s0519a:169_2: hi “sammādiṭṭhissa purisapuggalassa micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā bhavatī”ti paṭivibhattasabhāve
atk-s0519a:170: Paṭipakkhato parivattitāpi dhammā pariyāyavacanehi bodhetabbā, na sutte āgatāyevāti dassanatthaṃ parivattanānantaraṃ vevacanahāro vutto.
atk-s0519a:171_0: Evaṃ te dhammā pariyāyasaddatopi vibhāvitā hontīti pariyāyato pakāsitānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:171_1: pabhedato paññattivasena vibhajanaṃ sukhena sakkā ñātunti vevacanahārānantaraṃ paññattihāro
atk-s0519a:171_2: vutto. Tathā hi sutte āgatadhammānaṃ pariyāyapaññattivibhāgaṃ subodhanañca paññattihāravibhaṅge vakkhati.
atk-s0519a:172_1: sutte āgatadhammānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādādimukhena avadhāraṇaṃ sakkā dassetunti paññattianantaraṃ
atk-s0519a:172_2: otaraṇo hāro vutto. Tathā hi “uddhaṃ adho”ti gāthaṃ uddisitvā “vippamutto”ti padena
atk-s0519a:172_3: asekkhaṃ vijjaṃ niddhāretvā “vijjuppādā avijjānirodho”tiādinā paṭiccasamuppādaṃ udāharissati.
atk-s0519a:173_0: Dhātāyatanādīsu otāritānaṃ sutte padatthānaṃ pucchārambhavisodhanaṃ sakkā sukhena
atk-s0519a:173_1: sampādetunti otaraṇānantaraṃ sodhano hāro vutto. Tathā hi vakkhati – “yattha evaṃ
atk-s0519a:173_2: suddho ārambho, so pañho vissajjito bhavatī”tiādi.
atk-s0519a:174_0: Visodhitesu sutte padapadatthesu tattha labbhamānasāmaññavisesabhāvo sukaro hotīti
atk-s0519a:174_1: dassetuṃ sodhanānantaraṃ adhiṭṭhāno hāro dassito. Sodhano hi adhiṭṭhānassa bahūpakāro,
atk-s0519a:174_2: tato eva hi “yathā yathā vā pana pucchitaṃ, tathā tathā vissajjayitabba”nti vakkhati.
atk-s0519a:175_2: parikkhāro vutto. Tathā hi vakkhati “asādhāraṇalakkhaṇo hetu, sādhāraṇalakkhaṇo paccayo.
atk-s0519a:175_3: Yathā kiṃ bhave, yathā aṅkurassa nibbattiyā bījaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ, pathavī āpo ca sādhāraṇā”tiādi.
atk-s0519a:176_0: Asādhāraṇe sādhāraṇe ca kāraṇe dassite tassa attano phalesu kāraṇākāro tesaṃ hetuphalānaṃ
atk-s0519a:176_1: pabhedato desanākāro bhāvetabbapahātabbadhammānaṃ bhāvanāpahānāni ca niddhāretvā
atk-s0519a:176_2: vuccamānāni sammā suttassa atthaṃ tathattāvabodhāya saṃvattantīti parikkhārānantaraṃ
atk-s0519a:176_3: samāropano hāro dassitoti. Idaṃ hārānaṃ anukkamakāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:177_0: Nayānaṃ pana veneyyattayappayojitattā atthanayattayūpadesassa tadanukkameneva nandiyāvaṭṭādīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:177_1: tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ kamo veditabbo. Ugghaṭitaññuādayo hi tayo veneyyā nandiyāvaṭṭādayo
atk-s0519a:177_2: payojenti. Tasmā te uddesaniddesapaṭiniddesā viya yathākkamaṃ tesaṃ upakārāya savaṃttantīti.
atk-s0519a:177_3: Tathā hi nesaṃ cattāro cha aṭṭha ca mūlapadā niddiṭṭhā. Itarassa pana nayadvayassa
atk-s0519a:177_4: atthanayattayassa bhūmiyā ālocanaṃ tassa tattha samānayanañcāti iminā kāraṇena uddesakkamo
atk-s0519a:177_5: veditabbo. Na hi sakkā anoloketvā samānetunti.
atk-s0519a:178_0: Etaparamatā ca hārānaṃ ettakehi pakāravisesehi atthanayattayasahitehi suttassa attho
atk-s0519a:178_1: niddhāriyamāno veneyyānaṃ alamanuttarāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā samadhigamāyāti veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:178_2: Dassanabhūmisamanuppattiatthā hi nettippakaraṇadesanāti. Atha vā etadantogadhattā
atk-s0519a:178_3: sabbesaṃ suttassa saṃvaṇṇanāvisesānaṃ ettāvatā hārānaṃ daṭṭhabbā. Yattakā hi suttassa
atk-s0519a:179_0: Tathā hi ye keci suttassa saṃvaṇṇanāpakārā niddisīyanti. Seyyathidaṃ – suttassa samuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:179_1: vattabbaṃ, adhippāyo vibhāvetabbo, anekadhā padattho saṃvaṇṇetabbo, vidhi anuvādo
atk-s0519a:179_2: ca veditabbo, virodho samādhātabbo, anusandhiyā anurūpaṃ nigametabbanti. Tathā suttassa
atk-s0519a:179_3: payojanaṃ piṇḍattho padattho anusandhi codanā parihāro ca atthaṃ vadantena vattabbāti.
atk-s0519a:180: Tathā tisso kathā ekanāḷikā caturassā nisinnavattikā. Tattha pāḷiṃ vatvā ekekapadassa atthakathanaṃ ekanāḷikā nāma.
atk-s0519a:181: Paṭipakkhaṃ dassetvā paṭipakkhassa upamaṃ dassetvā sapakkhaṃ dassetvā sapakkhassa upamaṃ dassetvā kathanaṃ caturassā nāma.
atk-s0519a:182: Visabhāgadhammavaseneva pariyosānaṃ gantvā puna sabhāgadhammavaseneva pariyosānagamanaṃ nisinnavattikā nāma.
atk-s0519a:183: Bhedakathāya tatvakathāya pariyāyavacanehi ca suttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbanti ca evamādayo. Tesampi ettheva avarodho, yasmā te idha katipayahārasaṅgahitāti.
atk-s0519a:184_0: Nayānaṃ pana yasmā ugghaṭitaññuādayo tayo eva veneyyā saccābhisamayabhāgino tadatthāya
atk-s0519a:184_1: ca atthanayadesanā, tasmā satipi saṃkilesavodānadhammānaṃ yathāvuttamūlapadabhedato
atk-s0519a:184_2: vaḍḍhetvā vibhajitabbappakāre tathā mūlapadāni avaḍḍhetvā veneyyattayavaseneva etaparamatā
atk-s0519a:184_3: vuttā. Navasu navasu eva hi mūlapadesu sabbesaṃ saṃkilesavodānadhammānaṃ antogadhabhāvato
atk-s0519a:184_4: na tāni vaḍḍhetabbāni veneyyattayādhikārato na hāpetabbānīti nayānaṃ etaparamatā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a:185_0: Kammanayānaṃ pana ālocanasamānayanato aññassa pakārantarassa asambhavato etaparamatā.
atk-s0519a:185_2: Tesu hetūti kāraṇaṃ, yo dhammotipi vuccati, so pana paccayabhāvena ekavidho. Kārako
atk-s0519a:185_3: sampāpakoti duvidho. Puna kārako ñāpako sampāpakoti tividho. Hetuhetu paccayahetu
atk-s0519a:185_4: uttamahetu sādhāraṇahetūti catubbidho. Paccayadhammo kusalo akusalo saddo ariyamaggoti
atk-s0519a:185_5: pañcavidho. Tathā sabhāgahetu asabhāgahetu ajjhattikahetu bāhirahetu janakahetu pariggāhakahetu
atk-s0519a:185_6: sādhāraṇahetu asādhāraṇahetu samanantarahetu paramparahetu sahajātahetu asahajātahetu
atk-s0519a:186_0: Phalampi paccayuppannabhāvena ekavidhaṃ. Adhigantabbatopi sampāpakahetuvasena phalapariyāyo
atk-s0519a:186_3: asabhāgahetunibbattanti evamādivasena anekavidhañcāti veditabbaṃ. Tathā lokiyaṃ lokuttaranti.
atk-s0519a:186_4: Tattha lokuttaraṃ cattāri sāmaññaphalāni. Lokiyaphalaṃ duvidhaṃ kāyikaṃ mānasañca.
atk-s0519a:186_5: Tattha kāyikaṃ pañcadvārikaṃ, avasiṭṭhaṃ mānasaṃ. Yañca tāya tāya suttadesanāya sādhetabbaṃ, tadapi phalanti.
atk-s0519a:187_0: Bhūmīti sāsavabhūmi anāsavabhūmi saṅkhatabhūmi asaṅkhatabhūmi dassanabhūmi bhāvanābhūmi
atk-s0519a:187_1: puthujjanabhūmi sekkhabhūmi asekkhabhūmi sāvakabhūmi paccekabuddhabhūmi sammāsambuddhabhūmi
atk-s0519a:187_2: jhānabhūmi asamāhitabhūmi paṭipajjamānabhūmi paṭipannabhūmi paṭhamābhūmi yāva catutthībhūmi
atk-s0519a:187_3: kāmāvacarabhūmi yāva lokuttarabhūmīti bahuvidhā. Tattha sāsavabhūmi parittamahaggatā
atk-s0519a:187_4: dhammā. Anāsavabhūmi appamāṇā dhammā. Saṅkhatabhūmi nibbānavajjā sabbe sabhāvadhammā.
atk-s0519a:187_5: Asaṅkhatabhūmi appaccayā dhammā. Dassanabhūmi paṭhamamaggaphaladhammā. Bhāvanābhūmi
atk-s0519a:187_6: avasiṭṭhamaggaphaladhammā. Puthujjanabhūmi hīnamajjhimā dhammā. Sekkhabhūmi cattāro
atk-s0519a:187_7: ariyamaggadhammā heṭṭhimā ca tayo phaladhammā. Asekkhabhūmi aggaphaladhammā. Sāvakapaccekabuddhabuddhadhammā
atk-s0519a:187_8: sāvakādibhūmiyo. Jhānabhūmi jhānadhammā. Asamāhitabhūmi jhānavajjitā dhammā. Paṭipajjamānabhūmi
atk-s0519a:187_9: maggadhammā. Paṭipannabhūmi phaladhammā. Paṭhamādibhūmiyo saha phalena cattāro maggā
atk-s0519a:187_11: kāmāvacarādidhammā. Ye ca dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ hāranayānaṃ patiṭṭhānabhāvena suttesu
atk-s0519a:188_0: Upanisāti balavakāraṇaṃ, yo upanissayapaccayoti vuccati. Yañca sandhāya sutte “dukkhūpanisā
atk-s0519a:188_1: saddhā saddhūpanisaṃ ‘sīla’nti yāva vimuttūpanisaṃ vimuttiñāṇadassana”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:188_2: Api ca upanisāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye siddhante hadayabhūtaṃ abbhantaraṃ vuccati.
atk-s0519a:188_3: Idhāpi nettihadayaṃ, yaṃ sammā pariggaṇhantā dhammakathikā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte āgatadhammamukhena
atk-s0519a:188_4: sabbahāranayayojanāya samatthā honti. Kiṃ panetaṃ nettihadayaṃ? Yadidaṃ etasseva
atk-s0519a:189_0: Seyyathidaṃ – desanāhārassa assādādayo visayo, tassa assādādivibhāvanalakkhaṇattā.
atk-s0519a:189_1: Tassa assādo sukhaṃ somanassanti evamādivibhāgo, tassa nimittaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇādi, ayañca
atk-s0519a:189_2: attho desanāhāravicayahāraniddesavaṇṇanāyaṃ vitthārato pakāsito eva. Sutte āgatadhammassa
atk-s0519a:189_5: Padaṭṭhānaparikkhāresu āsannakāraṇaṃ upanissayakāraṇañca padaṭṭhānaṃ, hetu parikkhāroti ayametesaṃ viseso.
atk-s0519a:190_0: Sabhāgavisabhāgadhammā ca tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anukūlapaṭikūladhammā yathākkamaṃ
atk-s0519a:190_1: veditabbā. Yathā – sammādiṭṭhiyā sammāsaṅkappo sabhāgo, micchāsaṅkappo visabhāgoti
atk-s0519a:191: Lakkhaṇanti sabhāvo. So hāranayānaṃ niddese vibhāvito eva.
atk-s0519a:192_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ hetuādivisesavinimuttaṃ hāranayānaṃ yojanānibandhanaṃ, so nayo. Yathāha
atk-s0519a:192_1: – lakkhaṇahāre “evaṃ ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā kiccato ca lakkhaṇato ca sāmaññato cā”tiādi.
atk-s0519a:192_2: Tathā vicayena hārena vicinitvā yuttihārena yojetabbāti. Tathā sodhanahārādīsu suddho
atk-s0519a:192_3: ārambho hoti, so pañho vissajjito bhavatīti evamādi. Ekattādayopi nayā idha nayoti gahetabbā.
atk-s0519a:193_0: Evaṃ hetuphalādīni upadhāretvā nesaṃ vasena tattha tattha sutte labbhamānapadatthaniddhāraṇamukhena
atk-s0519a:193_1: yathālakkhaṇaṃ ete hārā nayā ca yojetabbā. Visesato pana padaṭṭhānaparikkhārā hetuvasena.
atk-s0519a:193_3: phalavasenevāti keci. Vibhatti hetubhūmivasena. Parivatto visabhāgavasena. Āvaṭṭo
atk-s0519a:193_4: sabhāgavisabhāgavasena. Lakkhaṇayuttiadhiṭṭhānā nayavasena yojetabbāti. Ettāvatā ca yaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a:195: Ettāvatā ca hetvādī, veditabbā hi viññunā”ti.
atk-s0519a:200_0: 5. Evaṃ hārādayo sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ gāthābandhavasena sarūpato niddisitvā idāni tesu
atk-s0519a:200_1: hāre tāva paṭiniddesavasena vibhajituṃ “tattha katamo desanāhāro”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:200_2: Tattha katamoti kathetukamyatāpucchā. Desanāhāroti pucchitabbadhammanidassanaṃ. Kiñcāpi
atk-s0519a:200_3: desanāhāro niddesavāre sarūpato dassito, paṭiniddesassa pana visayaṃ dassento “assādādīnavatā”ti
atk-s0519a:200_4: gāthaṃ ekadesena paccāmasati. Ayaṃ desanāhāro pubbāparāpekkho. Tattha pubbāpekkhatte
atk-s0519a:200_6: hoti. Parāpekkhatte pana “ayaṃ desanāhāro kiṃ desayatī”ti desanākiriyāya kattuniddeso
atk-s0519a:200_7: hoti. Tena desanāhārassa anvatthasaññataṃ dasseti. Desayatīti saṃvaṇṇeti, vitthāretīti attho.
atk-s0519a:201_0: Idāni anena desetabbadhamme sarūpato dassento “assāda”ntiādimāha, taṃ pubbe vuttanayattā
atk-s0519a:201_1: uttānameva. Tasmā ito parampi avuttameva vaṇṇayissāma. “Kattha pana āgate assādādike
atk-s0519a:201_2: ayaṃ hāro saṃvaṇṇetī”ti anuyogaṃ manasikatvā desanāhārena saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammaṃ dassento
atk-s0519a:202_1: bahūsu atthesu diṭṭhappayogo. Tathā hi “idha, bhikkhu, dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇātī”tiādīsu
atk-s0519a:202_3: bhagavanto ahesu”ntiādīsu samādhimhi. “Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo”ti evamādīsu paññāyaṃ.
atk-s0519a:202_4: “Jātidhammānaṃ, bhikkhave, sattāna”nti evamādīsu pakatiyaṃ. “Dhammo have rakkhati
atk-s0519a:202_5: dhammacāri”ntiādīsu puññe. “Cattāro pārājikā dhammā”ti evamādīsu āpattiyaṃ. “Kusalā
atk-s0519a:202_6: dhammā akusalādhammā”tiādīsu ñeyye. Idha pana pariyattiyaṃ daṭṭhabboti.
atk-s0519a:203_0: Voti pana ayaṃ vo-saddo “handa dāni, bhikkhave, pavāremi vo”ti ettha upayogatthe
atk-s0519a:203_1: āgato. “Sannipatitānaṃ vo, bhikkhave, dvayaṃ karaṇīya”ntiādīsu karaṇatthe. “Ye hi
atk-s0519a:203_2: vo ariyā parisuddhakāyakammantā”tiādīsu padapūraṇe. “Ārocayāmi vo, bhikkhave”tiādīsu
atk-s0519a:204_0: Bhikkhanasīlatādiguṇayogena bhikkhū, bhinnakilesatādiguṇayogena vā. Atha vā saṃsāre
atk-s0519a:204_1: bhayaṃ ikkhantīti bhikkhū. Bhikkhaveti tesaṃ ālapanaṃ. Tena te dhammassavane niyojento
atk-s0519a:204_2: attano mukhābhimukhaṃ karoti. Desessāmīti kathessāmi. Tena nāhaṃ dhammissaratāya
atk-s0519a:204_3: tumhe aññaṃ kiñci kāreyyāmi, anāvaraṇañāṇena sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ paccakkhakāritāya
atk-s0519a:204_4: pana dhammaṃ desessāmīti idāni pavattiyamānaṃ dhammadesanaṃ paṭijānāti. Ādikalyāṇantiādīsu
atk-s0519a:204_5: ādimhi kalyāṇaṃ ādikalyāṇaṃ, ādikalyāṇametassāti vā ādikalyāṇaṃ. Sesapadadvayepi
atk-s0519a:204_6: eseva nayo. Tattha sīlena ādikalyāṇaṃ. Samādhinā majjhekalyāṇaṃ. Paññāya pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:204_7: Buddhasubuddhatāya vā ādikalyāṇaṃ. Dhammasudhammatāya majjhekalyāṇaṃ. Saṅghasuppaṭipattiyā
atk-s0519a:204_8: pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ. Atha vā ugghaṭitaññuvinayanena ādikalyāṇaṃ. Vipañcitaññuvinayanena
atk-s0519a:205_1: vā sātthaṃ. Akkharādichabyañjanapadasamāyogato sabyañjanaṃ. Ayamevattho idhādhippeto.
atk-s0519a:205_2: Upanetabbābhāvato ekantena paripuṇṇanti kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ. Apanetabbābhāvato parisuddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:205_4: lokāmisanirapekkhatāya ca parisuddhaṃ. Brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ brahmūnaṃ vā seṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:205_5: ariyānaṃ cariyaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sāsanaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsayissāmi paridīpayissāmīti attho.
atk-s0519a:206_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā desito pakāsito ca sāsanadhammo yesaṃ assādādīnaṃ dassanavasena pavatto,
atk-s0519a:206_1: te assādādayo desanāhārassa visayabhūtā yattha yattha pāṭhe savisesaṃ vuttā, tato
atk-s0519a:206_2: tato niddhāretvā udāharaṇavasena idhānetvā dassetuṃ “tattha katamo assādo”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:206_3: Tattha kāmanti manāpiyarūpādiṃ tebhūmakadhammasaṅkhātaṃ vatthukāmaṃ. Kāmayamānassāti
atk-s0519a:206_4: icchantassa. Tassa cetaṃ samijjhatīti tassa kāmayamānassa sattassa taṃ kāmasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a:206_5: vatthu samijjhati ce, sace so taṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Addhā pītimano hotīti ekaṃsena
atk-s0519a:206_6: tuṭṭhacitto hoti. Laddhāti labhitvā. Maccoti satto. Yadicchatīti yaṃ icchati. Ayamettha
atk-s0519a:206_7: saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana niddese vuttanayena veditabbo. Ayaṃ assādoti yāyaṃ adhippāyasamijjhanā
atk-s0519a:206_8: icchitalābhe pītimanatā somanassaṃ, ayaṃ assādetabbato assādo.
atk-s0519a:207_0: Tassa ce kāmayānassāti tassa puggalassa kāme icchamānassa, kāmena vā yāyamānassa.
atk-s0519a:207_1: Chandajātassāti jātataṇhassa. Jantunoti sattassa. Te kāmā parihāyantīti te vatthukāmā
atk-s0519a:207_2: kenaci antarāyena vinassanti ce. Sallaviddhova ruppatīti atha ayomayādinā sallena
atk-s0519a:207_3: viddho viya pīḷiyatīti attho. Ayaṃ ādīnavoti yāyaṃ kāmānaṃ vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā
atk-s0519a:207_4: kāmayānassa sattassa ruppanā domanassuppatti, ayaṃ ādīnavo.
atk-s0519a:208_0: Yo kāme parivajjetīti yo bhikkhu yathāvutte kāme tattha chandarāgassa vikkhambhanena
atk-s0519a:208_1: vā samucchindanena vā sabbabhāgena vajjeti. Yathā kiṃ? Sappasseva padā siroti, yathā
atk-s0519a:208_2: koci puriso jīvitukāmo kaṇhasappaṃ paṭipathe passitvā attano pādena tassa siraṃ parivajjeti,
atk-s0519a:208_3: somaṃ…pe… samativattatīti so bhikkhu sabbaṃ lokaṃ visaritvā ṭhitattā loke visattikāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a:208_4: imaṃ taṇhaṃ satimā hutvā samatikkamatīti. Idaṃ nissaraṇanti yadidaṃ visattikāsaṅkhātāya
atk-s0519a:208_5: taṇhāya nibbānārammaṇena ariyamaggena samativattanaṃ, idaṃ nissaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:209_0: Khettanti kedārādikhettaṃ. Vatthunti gharavatthuādivatthuṃ. Hiraññaṃ vāti kahāpaṇasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a:209_1: suvaṇṇasaṅkhātañca hiraññaṃ. Vā-saddo vikappanattho, so sabbapadesu yojetabbo. Gavāssanti
atk-s0519a:209_2: gāvo ca asse cāti gavāssaṃ. Dāsaporisanti dāse ca porise cāti dāsaporisaṃ. Thiyoti
atk-s0519a:209_3: itthiyo. Bandhūti ñātibandhavo. Puthū kāmeti aññepi vā manāpiyarūpādike bahū kāmaguṇe.
atk-s0519a:209_4: Yo naro anugijjhatīti yo satto anu anu abhikaṅkhati patthetīti attho. Ayaṃ assādoti
atk-s0519a:209_5: yadidaṃ khettādīnaṃ anugijjhanaṃ, ayaṃ assādeti vatthukāme etenāti assādo.
atk-s0519a:210_0: Abalā naṃ balīyantīti khettādibhede kāme anugijjhantaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ kusalehi pahātabbattā
atk-s0519a:210_1: abalasaṅkhātā kilesā balīyanti abhibhavanti, saddhābalādivirahena vā abalaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0519a:210_2: abalā kilesā balīyanti, abalattā abhibhavantīti attho. Maddantenaṃ parissayāti enaṃ
atk-s0519a:210_3: kāmagiddhaṃ kāme pariyesantaṃ rakkhantañca sīhādayo ca pākaṭaparissayā kāyaduccaritādayo
atk-s0519a:210_4: ca apākaṭaparissayā maddanti. Tato naṃ…pe… dakanti tato tehi pākaṭāpākaṭaparissayehi
atk-s0519a:210_5: abhibhūtaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ jātiādidukkhaṃ samudde bhinnanāvaṃ udakaṃ viya anveti anugacchatīti
atk-s0519a:210_6: attho. Ayaṃ ādīnavoti yvāyaṃ taṇhāduccaritasaṃkilesahetuko jātiādidukkhānubandho, ayaṃ ādīnavo.
atk-s0519a:211_0: Tasmāti yasmā kāmagiddhassa vuttanayena dukkhānubandho vijjati, tasmā. Jantūti satto.
atk-s0519a:211_1: Sadā satoti pubbarattāpararattaṃ jāgariyānuyogena sato hutvā. Kāmāni parivajjayeti
atk-s0519a:211_2: vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena ca rūpādīsu vatthukāmesu sabbappakāraṃ kilesakāmaṃ
atk-s0519a:211_3: anuppādento kāmāni parivajjaye pajaheyya. Te pahāya tare oghanti evaṃ te kāme pahāya
atk-s0519a:211_4: tappahānakaraariyamaggeneva catubbidhampi oghaṃ tareyya, tarituṃ sakkuṇeyyāti attho.
atk-s0519a:211_5: Nāvaṃ sitvāva pāragūti yathā puriso udakaggahaṇena garubhāraṃ nāvaṃ udakaṃ bahi siñcitvā
atk-s0519a:211_6: lahukāya nāvāya appakasireneva pāragū bhaveyya, pāraṃ gaccheyya, evameva attabhāvanāvaṃ
atk-s0519a:211_7: kilesūdakagarukaṃ siñcitvā lahukena attabhāvena pāragū bhaveyya, pāraṃ nibbānaṃ arahattappattiyā
atk-s0519a:211_8: gaccheyya anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānenāti attho. Idaṃ nissaraṇanti yaṃ
atk-s0519a:211_9: kāmappahānamukhena caturoghaṃ taritvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā nibbānaṃ, idaṃ
atk-s0519a:212_0: Dhammoti dānādipuññadhammo. Haveti nipātamattaṃ. Rakkhati dhammacārinti yo taṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0519a:212_1: appamatto carati, taṃ dhammacāriṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikabhedena duvidhatopi anatthato
atk-s0519a:212_2: rakkhati pāleti. Chattaṃ mahantaṃ yatha vassakāleti vassakāle deve vassante yathā
atk-s0519a:212_3: mahantaṃ chattaṃ kusalena purisena dhāritaṃ taṃ vassatemanato rakkhati. Tattha yathā
atk-s0519a:212_4: taṃ chattaṃ appamatto hutvā attānaṃ rakkhantaṃ chādentañca vassādito rakkhati, evaṃ
atk-s0519a:212_5: dhammopi attasammāpaṇidhānena appamatto hutvā dhammacariyāya attānaṃ rakkhantaṃyeva
atk-s0519a:212_6: rakkhatīti adhippāyo. Esā…pe… cārīti etena vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti, taṃ
atk-s0519a:212_7: suviññeyyameva. Idaṃ phalanti diṭṭhadhammikehi samparāyikehi ca anatthehi yadidaṃ
atk-s0519a:212_8: dhammassa rakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ rakkhāvasānassa ca abbhudayassa nipphādanaṃ, idaṃ nissaraṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:213_0: Sabbe dhammāti sabbe saṅkhatā dhammā. Anattāti natthi etesaṃ attā kārakavedakasabhāvo,
atk-s0519a:213_1: sayaṃ vā na attāti anattāti. Itīti evaṃ. Yadā paññāya passatīti yasmiṃ kāle vipassanaṃ
atk-s0519a:213_2: ussukkāpento anattānupassanāsaṅkhātāya paññāya passati. Atha nibbindati dukkheti
atk-s0519a:213_3: atha anattānupassanāya pubbe eva aniccatādukkhatānaṃ suparidiṭṭhattā nibbidānupassanāvasena
atk-s0519a:213_4: vipassanāgocarabhūte pañcakkhandhadukkhe nibbindati nibbedaṃ āpajjati. Esa maggo
atk-s0519a:213_5: visuddhiyāti yā vuttalakkhaṇā nibbidānupassanā sabbakilesavisujjhanato visuddhisaṅkhātassa
atk-s0519a:213_6: ariyamaggassa accantavisuddhiyā vā amatadhātuyā maggo upāyo. Ayaṃ upāyoti yadidaṃ
atk-s0519a:213_7: anattānupassanāmukhena sabbasmiṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ nibbindanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ visuddhiyā adhigamahetubhāvato upāyo.
atk-s0519a:214_0: “Cakkhumā…pe… parivajjaye”ti imissā gāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yathā cakkhumā puriso
atk-s0519a:214_1: sarīre vahante visamāni bhūmippadesāni caṇḍatāya vā visame hatthiādayo parivajjeti,
