atk-s0519a:214_2: evaṃ loke sappañño puriso sappaññatāya hitāhitaṃ jānanto pāpāni lāmakāni duccaritāni
atk-s0519a:214_3: parivajjeyyāti. Ayaṃ āṇattīti yā ayaṃ “pāpāni parivajjetabbānī”ti dhammarājassa bhagavato āṇā, ayaṃ āṇattīti.
atk-s0519a:215: Evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ suttesu āgatā phalūpāyāṇattiyo udāharaṇabhāvena dassetvā idāni tā ekato āgatā dassetuṃ “suññato”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0519a:216_0: Tattha suññato lokaṃ avekkhassu, mogharājāti āṇattīti “mogharāja, sabbampi saṅkhāralokaṃ
atk-s0519a:216_1: avasavattitāsallakkhaṇavasena vā tucchabhāvasamanupassanavasena vā suññoti passā”ti
atk-s0519a:216_2: idaṃ dhammarājassa vacanaṃ vidhānabhāvato āṇatti. Sabbadā satikiriyāya taṃsuññatādassanaṃ
atk-s0519a:216_3: sampajjatīti “sadā satoti upāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhaccāti vīsativatthukaṃ
atk-s0519a:216_4: sakkāyadassanaṃ uddharitvā samucchinditvā. Evaṃ maccutaro siyāti. Idaṃ phalanti yaṃ
atk-s0519a:216_5: evaṃ vuttena vidhinā maccutaraṇaṃ maccuno visayātikkamanaṃ tassa yaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadāpaṭipajjanaṃ,
atk-s0519a:216_6: idaṃ desanāya phalanti attho. Yathā pana assādādayo sutte katthaci sarūpato katthaci
atk-s0519a:216_7: niddhāretabbatāya katthaci visuṃ visuṃ katthaci ekato dassitā, na evaṃ phalādayo.
atk-s0519a:216_8: Phalādayo pana sabbattha sutte gāthāsu vā ekato dassetabbāti imassa nayassa dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:216_9: visuṃ visuṃ udāharitvāpi puna “suññato loka”ntiādinā ekato udāharaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:217: 6. Evaṃ assādādayo udāharaṇavasena sarūpato dassetvā idāni tattha puggalavibhāgena desanāvibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:218_0: Tattha ugghaṭitaṃ ghaṭitamattaṃ uddiṭṭhamattaṃ yassa niddesapaṭiniddesā na katā,
atk-s0519a:218_1: taṃ jānātīti ugghaṭitaññū. Uddesamattena sappabhedaṃ savitthāramatthaṃ paṭivijjhatīti
atk-s0519a:218_2: attho, ugghaṭitaṃ vā uccalitaṃ uṭṭhapitanti attho, taṃ jānātīti ugghaṭitaññū. Dhammo
atk-s0519a:218_3: hi desiyamāno desakato desanābhājanaṃ saṅkamanto viya hoti, tamesa uccalitameva jānātīti
atk-s0519a:218_4: attho, calitameva vā ugghaṭitaṃ. Sassatādiākārassa hi veneyyānaṃ āsayassa buddhāveṇikā
atk-s0519a:218_5: dhammadesanā taṅkhaṇapatitā eva calanāya hoti, tato paramparānuvattiyā, tatthāyaṃ
atk-s0519a:218_6: ugghaṭite calitamatteyeva āsaye dhammaṃ jānāti avabujjhatīti ugghaṭitaññū, tassa
atk-s0519a:218_7: ugghaṭitaññussa nissaraṇaṃ desayati, tattakeneva tassa atthasiddhito. Vipañcitaṃ
atk-s0519a:218_8: vitthāritaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ jānātīti vipañcitaññū, vipañcitaṃ vā mandaṃ saṇikaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0519a:218_9: jānātīti vipañcitaññū, tassa vipañcitaññussa ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca desayati, nātisaṅkhepavitthārāya
atk-s0519a:218_10: desanāya tassa atthasiddhito. Netabbo dhammassa paṭiniddisena atthaṃ pāpetabboti
atk-s0519a:218_11: neyyo, mudindriyatāya vā paṭilomaggahaṇato netabbo anunetabboti neyyo, tassa neyyassa
atk-s0519a:218_12: assādaṃ ādīnavaṃ nissaraṇañca desayati, anavasesetvāva desanena tassa atthasiddhito. Tatthāyaṃ pāḷi –
atk-s0519a:219: “Katamo ca puggalo ugghaṭitaññū? Yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ugghaṭitaññū.
atk-s0519a:220: “Katamo ca puggalo vipañcitaññū? Yassa puggalassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo vipañcitaññū.
atk-s0519a:221_0: “Katamo ca puggalo neyyo? Yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yonisomanasikaroto
atk-s0519a:221_1: kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato evaṃ anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti. Ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:222_0: Padaparamo panettha nettiyaṃ paṭivedhassa abhājananti na gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha
atk-s0519a:222_1: ca assādo, ādīnavo, nissaraṇaṃ, assādo ca ādīnavo ca, assādo ca nissaraṇañca, ādīnavo
atk-s0519a:222_2: ca nissaraṇañca, assādo ca ādīnavo ca nissaraṇañcāti ete satta paṭṭhānanayā.
atk-s0519a:223_0: Tesu tatiyachaṭṭhasattamā veneyyattayavinayane samatthatāya gahitā, itare cattāro
atk-s0519a:223_1: na gahitā. Na hi kevalena assādena ādīnavena tadubhayena vā kathitena veneyyavinayanaṃ
atk-s0519a:223_2: sambhavati, kilesānaṃ pahānāvacanato. Pañcamopi ādīnavāvacanato nissaraṇassa anupāyo
atk-s0519a:223_3: eva. Na hi vimuttirasā bhagavato desanā vimuttiṃ tadupāyañca anāmasantī pavattati.
atk-s0519a:223_4: Tasmā ete cattāro nayā anuddhaṭā. Sace pana padaparamassa puggalassa vasena pavattaṃ
atk-s0519a:223_5: saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ tadubhayabhāge ṭhitaṃ desanaṃ suttekadesaṃ gāthaṃ
atk-s0519a:223_6: vā tādisaṃ etesaṃ nayānaṃ udāharaṇabhāvena uddharati, evaṃ sati sattannampi nayānaṃ
atk-s0519a:223_7: gahaṇaṃ bhaveyya. Veneyyavinayanaṃ pana tesaṃ santāne ariyamaggassa uppādanaṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0519a:223_8: yathāvuttehi eva nayeti, nāvasesehīti itare idha na vuttā. Yasmā pana peṭake –
atk-s0519a:225: Yāni karoti puriso, tāni attani passati;
atk-s0519a:227: Tattha yaṃ kalyāṇakārī kalyāṇaṃ paccanubhoti, ayaṃ assādo. Yaṃ pāpakārī pāpaṃ paccanubhoti, ayaṃ ādīnavo.
atk-s0519a:228: Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, lokadhammā. Katame aṭṭha? Lābhotiādi. Tattha lābho yaso sukhaṃ pasaṃsā, ayaṃ assādo. Alābho ayaso dukkhaṃ nindā, ayaṃ ādīnavo.
atk-s0519a:233_0: Dvattiṃsimāni, bhikkhave, mahāpurisassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni, yehi samannāgatassa
atk-s0519a:233_1: mahāpurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavanti anaññā…pe… vivaṭacchadoti sabbaṃ lakkhaṇasuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a:240: Tattha katamo assādo ca ādīnavo ca nissaraṇañca?
atk-s0519a:241: “Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ;
atk-s0519a:242: Tasmā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññameva seyyoti. ;
atk-s0519a:243_0: Ayaṃ assādo ca ādīnavo ca nissaraṇañcā”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā tepi nayā idha niddhāretvā
atk-s0519a:243_1: veditabbā. Phalādīsupi ayaṃ nayo labbhati eva. Yasmā peṭake “tattha katamaṃ phalañca
atk-s0519a:243_2: upāyo ca? Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”ti gāthā, idaṃ phalañca upāyo ca.
atk-s0519a:246: Mākattha pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvi vā yadi vā rahoti. ;
atk-s0519a:248: Tattha katamo upāyo ca āṇatti ca?
atk-s0519a:250: Yodhetha māraṃ paññāvudhena, jitañca rakkhe anivesano siyā”ti. ;
atk-s0519a:251_0: Ayaṃ upāyo ca āṇatti ca. Evaṃ phalādīnaṃ dukavasenapi udāharaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ettha
atk-s0519a:251_1: ca yo nissaraṇadesanāya vinetabbo, so ugghaṭitaññūtiādinā yathā desanāvibhāgena puggalavibhāgasiddhi
atk-s0519a:251_2: hoti, evaṃ ugghaṭitaññussa bhagavā nissaraṇaṃ desetītiādinā puggalavibhāgena desanāvibhāgo
atk-s0519a:252_0: Evaṃ yesaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena desanāvibhāgo dassito, te puggale paṭipadāvibhāgena
atk-s0519a:252_1: vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “catasso paṭipadā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha paṭipadābhiññākato vibhāgo
atk-s0519a:252_2: paṭipadākato hotīti āha – “catasso paṭipadā”ti. Tā panetā ca samathavipassanāpaṭipattivasena
atk-s0519a:252_3: duvidhā honti. Kathaṃ? Samathapakkhe tāva paṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa
atk-s0519a:252_4: tassa jhānassa upacāraṃ uppajjati, tāva pavattā samathabhāvanā “paṭipadā”ti vuccati.
atk-s0519a:252_5: Upacārato pana paṭṭhāya yāva appanā tāva pavattā paññā “abhiññā”ti vuccati.
atk-s0519a:253_0: Sā panāyaṃ paṭipadā ekaccassa dukkhā hoti nīvaraṇādipaccanīkadhammasamudācāragahaṇatāya
atk-s0519a:253_1: kicchā asukhasevanāti attho, ekaccassa tadabhāvena sukhā. Abhiññāpi ekaccassa dandhā
atk-s0519a:253_2: hoti mandā asīghappavatti, ekaccassa khippā amandā sīghappavatti. Tasmā yo ādito
atk-s0519a:253_3: kilese vikkhambhento dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto vikkhambheti, tassa
atk-s0519a:253_4: dukkhā paṭipadā hoti. Yo pana vikkhambhitakileso appanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena aṅgapātubhāvaṃ
atk-s0519a:253_5: pāpuṇāti, tassa dandhābhiññā nāma hoti. Yo khippaṃ aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti, tassa
atk-s0519a:253_6: khippābhiññā nāma hoti. Yo kilese vikkhambhento sukhena akilamanto vikkhambheti,
atk-s0519a:254_0: Vipassanāpakkhe pana yo rūpārūpamukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisanto cattāri mahābhūtāni
atk-s0519a:254_1: pariggahetvā upādārūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti arūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti, rūpārūpaṃ pana pariggaṇhanto
atk-s0519a:254_2: dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariggahetuṃ sakkoti, tassa dukkhā paṭipadā nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a:254_4: nāma hoti. Yopi rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapento dukkhena kasirena
atk-s0519a:254_5: kilamanto vavatthapeti, vavatthapite ca nāmarūpe vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena
atk-s0519a:254_6: maggaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkoti. Tassāpi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a:255_0: Aparo nāmarūpampi vavatthapetvā paccaye pariggaṇhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto
atk-s0519a:255_1: pariggaṇhāti, paccaye ca pariggahetvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti.
atk-s0519a:255_2: Evampi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a:256_0: Aparo paccayepi pariggahetvā lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto
atk-s0519a:256_1: paṭivijjhati, paṭividdhalakkhaṇo ca vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti.
atk-s0519a:256_2: Evampi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a:257_0: Aparo lakkhaṇānipi paṭivijjhitvā vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre suppasanne vahante uppannaṃ
atk-s0519a:257_1: vipassanānikantiṃ pariyādiyamāno dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariyādiyati, nikantiñca
atk-s0519a:257_2: pariyādiyitvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti. Evampi dukkhā paṭipadā
atk-s0519a:257_3: dandhābhiññā nāma hoti. Imināvupāyena itarāpi tisso paṭipadā veditabbā. Vipassanāpakkhikā
atk-s0519a:258: Cattāro puggalāti yathāvuttapaṭipadāvibhāgena cattāro paṭipannakapuggalā. Taṃ pana paṭipadāvibhāgaṃ saddhiṃ hetupāyaphalehi dassetuṃ “taṇhācarito”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:259_0: Tattha caritanti cariyā, vuttīti attho. Taṇhāya nibbattitaṃ caritaṃ etassāti taṇhācarito,
atk-s0519a:259_1: taṇhāya vā pavattito carito taṇhācarito, lobhajjhāsayoti attho. Diṭṭhicaritoti etthāpi
atk-s0519a:259_2: eseva nayo. Mandoti mandiyaṃ vuccati avijjā, tāya samannāgato mando, mohādhikoti attho.
atk-s0519a:260_0: Satindriyenāti satiyā ādhipaccaṃ kurumānāya. Satindriyameva hissa visadaṃ hoti. Yasmā
atk-s0519a:260_1: taṇhācaritatāya pubbabhāge kosajjābhibhavena na vīriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti, mohādhikatāya
atk-s0519a:260_2: na paññā balavatī. Tadubhayenāpi na samādhi balavā hoti, tasmā “satindriyameva hissa
atk-s0519a:260_3: visadaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha – “satipaṭṭhānehi nissayehī”ti. Taṇhācaritatāya
atk-s0519a:260_4: cassa kilesavikkhambhanaṃ na sukaranti dukkhā paṭipadā, avisadañāṇatāya dandhābhiññāti
atk-s0519a:260_5: pubbe vuttanayaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. Niyyātīti ariyamaggena vaṭṭadukkhato niggacchati.
atk-s0519a:261_0: Udatthoti udaattho, uḷārapaññoti attho. Paññāsahāyapaṭilābhena cassa samādhi tikkho
atk-s0519a:261_1: hoti sampayuttesu ādhipaccaṃ pavatteti. Tenevāha – “samādhindriyenā”ti. Visadañāṇattā
atk-s0519a:261_2: “khippābhiññāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Samādhipadhānattā jhānānaṃ jhānehi nissayehīti ayaṃ viseso.
atk-s0519a:261_3: Sesaṃ purimasadisameva. Diṭṭhicarito aniyyānikamaggampi niyyānikanti maññamāno tattha
atk-s0519a:261_4: ussāhabahulattā vīriyādhiko hoti. Vīriyādhikatāyeva cassa kilesavikkhambhanaṃ sukaranti
atk-s0519a:261_5: sukhā paṭipadā, avisadañāṇatāya pana dandhābhiññāti imamatthaṃ dasseti “diṭṭhicarito
atk-s0519a:262_0: Saccehīti ariyasaccehi. Ariyasaccāni hi lokiyāni pubbabhāgañāṇassa sammasanaṭṭhānatāya
atk-s0519a:262_1: lokuttarāni adhimuccanatāya maggañāṇassa abhisamayaṭṭhānatāya ca nissayāni hontīti.
atk-s0519a:262_2: Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Ettha ca diṭṭhicarito udattho ugghaṭitaññū. Taṇhācarito mando
atk-s0519a:262_3: neyyo. Itare dvepi vipañcitaññūti evaṃ yena veneyyattayena pubbe desanāvibhāgo dassito,
atk-s0519a:262_4: tadeva veneyyattayaṃ iminā paṭipadāvibhāgena dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:263_0: Idāni taṃ veneyyupuggalavibhāgaṃ atthanayayojanāya visayaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “ubho taṇhācaritā”tiādi
atk-s0519a:263_1: vuttaṃ. Taṇhāya samādhipaṭipakkhattā taṇhācarito visujjhamāno samādhimukhena visujjhatīti
atk-s0519a:263_3: pana sammādiṭṭhisahiteneva sammāsamādhinā niyyānaṃ, na sammāsamādhinā evāti āha –
atk-s0519a:263_5: saṅgahesu vuttaṃ. Idha pana anāgāmiphalasamādhīti vakkhati. So hi samādhismiṃ paripūrakārīti.
atk-s0519a:263_6: Tattha rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo. So virajjati etāyāti rāgavirāgā, tāya rāgavirāgāya, rāgappahāyikāyāti attho.
atk-s0519a:264_0: Cetovimuttiyāti cetoti cittaṃ, tadapadesena cettha samādhi vuccati “yathā cittaṃ
atk-s0519a:264_1: paññañca bhāvaya”nti. Paṭippassaddhivasena paṭipakkhato vimuccatīti vimutti, tena
atk-s0519a:264_2: vā vimutto, tato vimuccananti vā vimutti, samādhiyeva. Yathā hi lokiyakathāyaṃ saññā
atk-s0519a:264_3: cittañca desanāsīsaṃ. Yathāha – “nānattakāyā nānattasaññino”ti “kiṃ citto tvaṃ, bhikkhū”ti
atk-s0519a:264_4: ca, evaṃ lokuttarakathāyaṃ paññā samādhi ca. Yathāha – “pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhī”ti
atk-s0519a:264_5: ca “samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī”ti ca. Tesu idha rāgassa ujuvipaccanīkato
atk-s0519a:264_6: samathapubbaṅgamatāvacanato ca cetoggahaṇena samādhi vutto. Tathā vimuttivacanena.
atk-s0519a:264_7: Tena vuttaṃ “samādhiyevā”ti. Ceto ca taṃ vimutti cāti cetovimutti. Atha vā vuttappakārasseva
atk-s0519a:264_8: cetaso paṭipakkhato vimutti vimokkhoti cetovimutti, cetasi vā phalaviññāṇe vuttappakārāva
atk-s0519a:264_9: vimuttīti cetovimutti, cetaso vā phalaviññāṇassa paṭipakkhato vimutti vimokkho etasminti
atk-s0519a:264_10: cetovimutti, samādhiyeva. Paññāvimuttiyāti etthāpi ayaṃ nayo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo.
atk-s0519a:265_0: Diṭṭhiyā savisaye paññāsadisī pavattīti diṭṭhicarito visujjhamāno paññāmukhena visujjhatīti
atk-s0519a:265_1: āha – “ubho diṭṭhicaritā vipassanā”tiādi. Avijjāvirāgā paññāvimuttīti arahattaphalapaññā.
atk-s0519a:265_2: Samathaggahaṇena tappaṭipakkhato taṇhaṃ vipassanāggahaṇena avijjañca niddhāretvā
atk-s0519a:265_3: paṭhamanayassa bhūmiṃ sakkā sukhena dassetunti āha – “ye samatha…pe… hātabbā”ti.
atk-s0519a:266_0: Tattha samathapubbaṅgamā paṭipadāti purimā dve paṭipadā, itarā vipassanāpubbaṅgamāti
atk-s0519a:266_1: daṭṭhabbā. Hātabbāti gametabbā, netabbāti attho. Vipassanāya aniccadukkhaanattasaññābhāvato
atk-s0519a:266_2: dukkhasaññāparivārattā ca asubhasaññāya imā catasso saññā dassitā honti. Tappaṭipakkhena
atk-s0519a:266_3: ca cattāro vipallāsāti sakalassa sīhavikkīḷitanayassa bhūmiṃ sukhena sakkā dassetunti
atk-s0519a:267_0: 7. Evaṃ paṭipadāvibhāgena veneyyapuggalavibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ ñāṇavibhāgena
atk-s0519a:267_1: dassento yasmā bhagavato desanā yāvadeva veneyyavinayanatthā, vinayanañca nesaṃ sutamayādīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:267_2: tissannaṃ paññānaṃ anukkamena nibbattanaṃ, yathā bhagavato desanāya pavattibhāvavibhāvanañca
atk-s0519a:267_3: hāranayabyāpāro, tasmā imassa hārassa samuṭṭhitappakāraṃ tāva pucchitvā yena puggalavibhāgadassanena
atk-s0519a:267_4: desanābhājanaṃ vibhajitvā tattha desanāyaṃ desanāhāraṃ niyojetukāmo taṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:268_0: Tattha yassāti yo so aṭṭhahi akkhaṇehi vimutto sotāvadhānapariyosānāhi ca sampattīti
atk-s0519a:268_1: samannāgato yassa. Satthāti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ anusāsanato
atk-s0519a:268_2: satthā. Dhammanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo,
atk-s0519a:268_3: taṃ dhammaṃ. Desayatīti saṅkhepavitthāranayehi bhāsati katheti. Aññataroti bhagavato
atk-s0519a:268_4: sāvakesu aññataro. Garuṭṭhānīyoti sīlasutādiguṇavisesayogena garukaraṇīyo. Sabrahmacārīti
atk-s0519a:268_5: brahmaṃ vuccati seṭṭhaṭṭhena sakalaṃ satthusāsanaṃ. Samaṃ saha vā brahmaṃ carati
atk-s0519a:268_6: paṭipajjatīti sabrahmacārī. Saddhaṃ paṭilabhatīti “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā
atk-s0519a:268_7: yo evarūpassa dhammassa desetā”ti tathāgate, “svākkhāto vatāyaṃ dhammo yo evaṃ ekantaparipuṇṇo
atk-s0519a:268_8: ekantaparisuddho”tiādinā dhamme ca saddhaṃ labhati uppādetīti attho.
atk-s0519a:269_0: Tatthāti tasmiṃ yathāsute yathāpariyatte dhamme. Vīmaṃsāti pāḷiyā pāḷiatthassa ca
atk-s0519a:269_1: vīmaṃsanapaññā. Sesaṃ tassā eva vevacanaṃ. Sā hi yathāvuttavīmaṃsane saṅkocaṃ anāpajjitvā
atk-s0519a:269_2: ussahanavasena ussāhanā, tulanavasena tulanā, upaparikkhaṇavasena upaparikkhāti ca
atk-s0519a:269_3: vuttā. Atha vā vīmaṃsatīti vīmaṃsā, sā padapadatthavicāraṇā paññā. Ussāhanāti vīriyena
atk-s0519a:269_4: upatthambhitā dhammassa dhāraṇaparicayasādhikā paññā. Tulanāti padena padantaraṃ,
atk-s0519a:269_5: desanāya vā desanantaraṃ tulayitvā saṃsanditvā gahaṇapaññā. Upaparikkhāti mahāpadese
atk-s0519a:269_6: otāretvā pāḷiyā pāḷiatthassa ca upaparikkhaṇapaññā. Attahitaṃ parahitañca ākaṅkhantehi
atk-s0519a:269_7: suyyatīti sutaṃ, kālavacanicchāya abhāvato, yathā duddhanti. Kiṃ pana tanti? Adhikārato
atk-s0519a:269_8: sāmatthiyato vā pariyattidhammoti viññāyati. Atha vā savanaṃ sutaṃ, sotadvārānusārena
atk-s0519a:269_9: pariyattidhammassa upadhāraṇanti attho. Sutena hetunā nibbattā sutamayī. Pakārena
atk-s0519a:269_10: jānātīti paññā. Yā vīmaṃsā, ayaṃ sutamayī paññāti paccekampi yojetabbaṃ. Tathāti
atk-s0519a:269_11: yathā sutamayī paññā vīmaṃsādipariyāyavatī vīmaṃsādivibhāgavatī ca, tathā cintāmayī
atk-s0519a:269_12: cāti attho. Yathā vā sutamayī oramattikā anavaṭṭhitā ca, evaṃ cintāmayī cāti dasseti.
atk-s0519a:270_0: Sutena nissayenāti sutena pariyattidhammena pariyattidhammassavanena vā upanissayena
atk-s0519a:270_1: itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ sutaṃ upanissāyāti attho. Vīmaṃsātiādīsu
atk-s0519a:270_2: “idaṃ sīlaṃ, ayaṃ samādhi, ime rūpārūpadhammā, ime pañcakkhandhā”ti tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:270_3: sabhāvavīmaṃsanabhūtā paññā vīmaṃsā. Tesaṃyeva dhammānaṃ vacanatthaṃ muñcitvā sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇassa
atk-s0519a:270_4: tulayitvā viya gahaṇapaññā tulanā. Tesaṃyeva dhammānaṃ salakkhaṇaṃ avijahitvā aniccatādiruppanasappaccayādiākāre
atk-s0519a:270_5: ca takketvā vitakketvā ca upaparikkhaṇapaññā upaparikkhā, tathā upaparikkhite dhamme
atk-s0519a:270_6: saviggahe viya upaṭṭhahante evametehi nijjhānakkhame katvā cittena anu anu pekkhaṇā
atk-s0519a:270_7: manasānupekkhaṇā. Ettha ca yathā sutamayī paññā yathāsutassa dhammassa dhāraṇaparicayavasena
atk-s0519a:270_8: pavattanato ussāhajātā “ussāhanā”ti vattabbataṃ arahati, na evaṃ cintāmayīti idha
atk-s0519a:270_9: “ussāhanā”ti padaṃ na vuttaṃ. Cintanaṃ cintā, nijjhānanti attho. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0519a:271_0: Imāhi dvīhi paññāhīti yathāvuttāhi dvīhi paññāhi kāraṇabhūtāhi. Sutacintāmayañāṇesu
atk-s0519a:271_1: hi patiṭṭhito vipassanaṃ ārabhatīti. “Imāsu dvīsu paññāsū”tipi paṭhanti. “Tehi jātāsu
atk-s0519a:271_2: uppannāsū”ti vā vacanaseso yojetabbo. Manasikārasampayuttassāti rūpārūpapariggahādimanasikāre
atk-s0519a:271_3: yuttappayuttassa. Yaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjatīti vuttanayena manasikārappayogena diṭṭhivisuddhikaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhimaggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhipaṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:271_4: sampa ādanena vipassanaṃ ussukkantassa yaṃ ñāṇadassanavisuddhisaṅkhātaṃ ariyamaggañāṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:271_5: uppajjati, ayaṃ bhāvanāmayī paññāti sambandho. Taṃ pana dassanaṃ bhāvanāti duvidhanti
atk-s0519a:271_6: āha – “dassanabhūmiyaṃ vā bhāvanābhūmiyaṃ vā”ti. Yadi dassananti vuccati, kathaṃ
atk-s0519a:271_7: tattha paññā bhāvanāmayīti? Bhāvanāmayameva hi taṃ ñāṇaṃ, paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato
atk-s0519a:271_8: pana “dassana”nti vuttanti saphalo paṭhamamaggo dassanabhūmi. Sesā sekkhāsekkhadhammā bhāvanābhūmi.
atk-s0519a:272_0: 8. Idāni imā tisso paññā pariyāyantarena dassetuṃ “paratoghosā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0519a:272_1: paratoti na attato, aññato satthuto sāvakato vāti attho. Ghosāti tesaṃ desanāghosato,
atk-s0519a:272_2: desanāpaccayāti attho. Atha vā parato ghoso etissāti paratoghosā, yā paññā, sā sutamayīti
atk-s0519a:272_3: yojetabbaṃ. Paccattasamuṭṭhitāti paccattaṃ tassa tassa attani sambhūtā. Yonisomanasikārāti
atk-s0519a:272_4: tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvapariggaṇhanādinā yathāvuttena upāyena pavattamanasikārā.
atk-s0519a:272_5: Parato ca ghosenāti paratoghosena hetubhūtena. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0519a:273_0: Idāni yadatthaṃ imā paññā uddhaṭā, tameva veneyyapuggalavibhāgaṃ yojetvā dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:273_1: “yassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha imā dveti gaṇanavasena vatvā puna tā sutamayī cintāmayī
atk-s0519a:273_2: cāti sarūpato dasseti. Ayaṃ ugghaṭitaññūti ayaṃ sutamayacintāmayañāṇehi āsayapayogapabodhassa
atk-s0519a:273_3: nipphāditattā uddesamatteneva jānanato “ugghaṭitaññū”ti vuccati. Ayaṃ vipañcitaññūti
atk-s0519a:273_4: cintāmayañāṇena āsayassa aparikkhatattā uddesaniddesehi jānanato vipañcitaññū. Ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:273_5: neyyoti sutamayañāṇassāpi abhāvato niravasesaṃ vitthāradesanāya netabbato neyyo.
atk-s0519a:274_0: 9. Evaṃ desanāpaṭipadāñāṇavibhāgehi desanābhājanaṃ veneyyattayaṃ vibhajitvā idāni
atk-s0519a:274_1: tattha pavattitāya bhagavato dhammadesanāya desanāhāraṃ niddhāretvā yojetuṃ “sāyaṃ
atk-s0519a:275_0: Tattha sāyanti sā ayaṃ. Yā pubbe “dhammaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī”tiādinā paṭiniddesavārassa
atk-s0519a:275_1: ādito desanāhārassa visayabhāvena nikkhittā pāḷi, tamevettha desanāhāraṃ niyojetuṃ
atk-s0519a:275_2: “sāyaṃ dhammadesanā”ti paccāmasati. Kiṃ desayatīti kathetukamyatāvasena desanāya
atk-s0519a:275_3: piṇḍatthaṃ pucchitvā taṃ gaṇanāya paricchinditvā sāmaññato dasseti “cattāri saccānī”ti.
atk-s0519a:275_4: Saccavinimuttā hi bhagavato desanā natthīti. Tassā ca cattāri saccāni piṇḍattho.
atk-s0519a:275_6: saccānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tāni “dukkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ magga”nti sarūpato dasseti.
atk-s0519a:276_1: tucchattā ca dukkhaṃ. Avasesapaccayasamavāye dukkhassa uppattikāraṇattā samudayo.
atk-s0519a:276_2: Sabbagatisuññattā natthi ettha saṃsāracārakasaṅkhāto dukkharodho, etasmiṃ vā adhigate
atk-s0519a:276_4: vā. Mārento gacchati, nibbānatthikehi maggiyatīti vā maggo. Tattha samudayena assādo,
atk-s0519a:276_5: dukkhena ādīnavo, magganirodhehi nissaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ yasmiṃ sutte cattāri saccāni sarūpato
atk-s0519a:276_6: āgatāni, tattha yathārutavasena. Yattha pana sutte cattāri saccāni sarūpato na āgatāni,
atk-s0519a:276_7: tattha atthato cattāri saccāni uddharitvā tesaṃ vasena assādādayo niddhāretabbā.
atk-s0519a:276_8: Yattha ca assādādayo sarūpato āgatā, tattha vattabbameva natthi. Yattha pana na āgatā,
atk-s0519a:276_9: tattha atthato uddharitvā tesaṃ vasena cattāri saccāni niddhāretabbāni. Idha pana
atk-s0519a:276_10: assādādayo udāharaṇavasena sarūpato dassitāti tehi saccāni niddhāretuṃ “ādīnavo cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:277_0: Tattha “saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti vacanato taṇhāvajjā tebhūmakadhammā
atk-s0519a:277_1: dukkhasaccaṃ, te ca aniccādisabhāvattā ādīnavo, phalañca desanāya sādhetabbaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0519a:277_2: yaṃ lokiyaṃ, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “phalañca dukkha”nti. Assādoti taṇhāvipallāsānampi
atk-s0519a:277_3: icchitattā te sandhāya “assādo samudayo”ti vuttaṃ. Saha vipassanāya ariyamaggo desanā
atk-s0519a:277_4: ca desanāphalādhigamassa upāyoti katvā “upāyo āṇatti ca maggo”ti vuttaṃ. Nissaraṇapade
atk-s0519a:277_5: cāpi ariyamaggo niddhāretabbo, na cāyaṃ saccavibhāgo ākuloti daṭṭhabbo. Yathā hi
atk-s0519a:277_6: saccavibhaṅge “taṇhā avasiṭṭhā kilesā avasiṭṭhā akusalā dhammā sāsavāni kusalamūlāni
atk-s0519a:277_7: sāsavā ca kusalā dhammā samudayasaccabhāvena vibhattā”ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ naye taṃtaṃavasiṭṭhā
atk-s0519a:277_8: tebhūmakadhammā dukkhasaccabhāvena vibhattā, evamidhāpi daṭṭhabbanti. Imāni cattāri
atk-s0519a:277_9: saccānīti nigamanaṃ. Idaṃ dhammacakkanti yāyaṃ bhagavato catusaccavasena sāmukkaṃsikā
atk-s0519a:278_0: Idāni tassā dhammadesanāya dhammacakkabhāvaṃ saccavibhaṅgasuttavasena dassetuṃ “yathāha
atk-s0519a:278_1: bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha idaṃ dukkhanti idaṃ jātiādivibhāgaṃ saṅkhepato pañcupādānakkhandhasaṅgahaṃ
atk-s0519a:278_3: ca dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti attho. Meti bhagavā attānaṃ niddisati. Bārāṇasiyanti bārāṇasīnāmakassa
atk-s0519a:278_4: nagarassa avidūre. Paccekabuddhaisīnaṃ ākāsato otaraṇaṭṭhānatāya isipatanaṃ. Migānaṃ
atk-s0519a:278_5: tattha abhayassa dinnattā migadāyanti ca laddhanāme assame. Uttarati atikkamati,
atk-s0519a:278_6: abhibhavatīti vā uttaraṃ, natthi etassa uttaranti anuttaraṃ. Anatisayaṃ appaṭibhāgaṃ
atk-s0519a:278_7: vā. Kiñcāpi bhagavato dhammadesanā anekāsu devamanussaparisāsu anekasatakkhattuṃ
atk-s0519a:278_8: tesaṃ ariyasaccappaṭivedhasampādanavasena pavattitā, tathāpi sabbapaṭhamaṃ aññāsikoṇḍaññappamukhāya
atk-s0519a:279_0: Tattha satipaṭṭhānādidhammo eva pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ, cakkanti vā
atk-s0519a:279_1: āṇā. Dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṃ cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ. Dhammena ñāyena cakkantipi
atk-s0519a:279_2: dhammacakkaṃ. Yathāha – “dhammañca pavatteti cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, cakkañca pavatteti
atk-s0519a:279_3: dhammañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammena pavattetīti dhammacakka”ntiādi. Appaṭivattiyanti
atk-s0519a:279_4: dhammissarassa bhagavato sammāsambuddhabhāvato dhammacakkassa ca anuttarabhāvato
atk-s0519a:279_5: appaṭisedhanīyaṃ. Kena pana appaṭivattiyanti āha “samaṇena vā”tiādi. Tattha samaṇenāti
atk-s0519a:279_6: pabbajjaṃ upagatena. Brāhmaṇenāti jātibrāhmaṇena. Paramatthasamaṇabrāhmaṇānañhi paṭilomanacittaṃyeva
atk-s0519a:279_7: natthi. Devenāti kāmāvacaradevena. Kenacīti yena kenaci avasiṭṭhapārisajjena. Ettāvatā
atk-s0519a:279_8: aṭṭhannampi parisānaṃ anavasesapariyādānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Lokasminti sattaloke.
atk-s0519a:280_0: Tatthāti tissaṃ catusaccadhammadesanāyaṃ. Aparimāṇā padā, aparimāṇā akkharāti uppaṭipāṭivacanaṃ
atk-s0519a:280_1: yebhuyyena padasaṅgahitāni akkharānīti dassanatthaṃ. Padā akkharā byañjanāti liṅgavipallāso
atk-s0519a:280_2: katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atthassāti catusaccasaṅkhātassa atthassa. Saṅkāsanāti saṅkāsitabbākāro.
atk-s0519a:280_3: Esa nayo sesesupi. Atthassāti ca sambandhe sāmivacanaṃ. Itipidanti itīti pakārattho,
atk-s0519a:280_4: pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho, imināpi imināpi pakārena idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ veditabbanti
atk-s0519a:280_5: attho. Tena jātiādibhedena yathāvuttassa dukkhasaccassa anekabhedataṃ taṃdīpakānaṃ
atk-s0519a:281_0: Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti ayaṃ kāmataṇhādibhedā taṇhāvaṭṭassa mūlabhūtā yathāvuttassa
atk-s0519a:281_1: dukkhassa nibbattihetubhāvato dukkhasamudayo. Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti ayaṃ sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭā
atk-s0519a:281_2: asaṅkhatadhātu yathāvuttassa dukkhassa anuppādanirodhapaccayattā dukkhanirodho. Ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:281_4: nibbānaṃ gacchati ārammaṇavasena tadabhimukhībhūtattā paṭipadā ca hoti dukkhanirodhappattiyāti
atk-s0519a:281_5: dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā. Itipidanti padassa pana samudayasacce aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritehi,
atk-s0519a:282_0: Evaṃ “dvādasa padāni sutta”nti gāthāya sakalassa sāsanassa channaṃ atthapadānaṃ channañca
atk-s0519a:282_1: byañjanapadānaṃ vasena yā dvādasapadatā vuttā, tameva “dhammaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:282_2: desanāhārassa visayadassanavasena chachakkapariyāyaṃ ekadesena uddisitvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttena
atk-s0519a:282_3: tadatthassa saṅgahitabhāvadassanamukhena sabbassāpi bhagavato vacanassa catusaccadesanābhāvaṃ
atk-s0519a:282_4: tadatthassa ca catusaccabhāvaṃ vibhāvento “idaṃ dukkhanti me, bhikkhave, bārāṇasiya”ntiādinā
atk-s0519a:282_5: saccavibhaṅgasuttaṃ uddesato dassetvā “tattha aparimāṇā padā”tiādinā byañjanatthapadāni
atk-s0519a:282_6: vibhajanto dvādasapadabhāvaṃ dīpetvā idāni tesaṃ aññamaññavisayivisayabhāvena sambandhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0519a:283_0: Tattha padāvayavaggahaṇamukhena padaggahaṇaṃ, gahite ca pade padatthāvabodho gahitapubbasaṅketassa
atk-s0519a:283_1: hoti. Tattha ca padāvayavaggahaṇena viya padaggahaṇassa, padatthāvayavaggahaṇenāpi
atk-s0519a:283_2: padatthaggahaṇassa visesādhānaṃ jāyatīti āha – “akkharehi saṅkāsetī”ti. Yasmā pana
atk-s0519a:283_3: akkharehi saṃkhittena dīpiyamāno attho padapariyosāne vākyassa apariyositattā padeneva
atk-s0519a:283_4: pakāsito dīpito hoti, tasmā “padehi pakāsetī”ti vuttaṃ. Vākyapariyosāne pana so attho
atk-s0519a:283_5: vivarito vivaṭo kato hotīti vuttaṃ “byañjanehi vivaratī”ti. Yasmā ca pakārehi vākyabhede
atk-s0519a:283_6: kate tadattho vibhatto nāma hoti, tasmā “ākārehi vibhajatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā vākyāvayavānaṃ
atk-s0519a:283_7: paccekaṃ nibbacanavibhāge kate so attho pākaṭo hotīti vuttaṃ “niruttīhi uttānīkarotī”ti.
atk-s0519a:283_8: Katanibbacanehi vākyāvayavehi vitthāravasena niravasesato desitehi veneyyānaṃ cittaparitosanaṃ
atk-s0519a:283_9: buddhinisānañca kataṃ hotīti āha – “niddesehi paññapetī”ti. Ettha ca akkharehi eva
atk-s0519a:283_10: saṅkāsetīti avadhāraṇaṃ akatvā akkharehi saṅkāsetiyevāti evaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:283_11: Evañhi sati atthapadānaṃ nānāvākyavisayatāpi siddhā hoti. Tena ekānusandhike sutte
atk-s0519a:283_12: chaḷeva atthapadāni, nānānusandhike pana anusandhimhi anusandhimhi cha cha atthapadāni niddhāretabbāni.
atk-s0519a:284_0: “Akkharehi ca padehi ca ugghaṭetī”tiādinā byañjanapadānaṃ kiccasādhanaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a:284_1: Veneyyattayavinayameva hi tesaṃ byāpāro. Aṭṭhānabhāvato pana saccappaṭivedhassa padaparamo
atk-s0519a:284_2: na idha vutto. Neyyaggahaṇeneva vā tassāpi idha gahaṇaṃ sekkhaggahaṇena viya kalyāṇaputhujjanassāti
atk-s0519a:284_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Akkharehītiādīsu karaṇasādhane karaṇavacanaṃ, na hetumhi. Akkharādīni
atk-s0519a:284_4: hi ugghaṭanādiatthāni, na ugghaṭanādiakkharādiatthaṃ. Yadatthā ca kiriyā so hetu,
atk-s0519a:284_5: yathā “annenavasatī”ti. Ugghaṭetīti sotāvadhānaṃ katvā samāhitacittānaṃ veneyyānaṃ
atk-s0519a:284_6: saṅkāsanavasena akkharehi visesaṃ ādahanto yathā padapariyosāne āsayappaṭibodho hoti,
atk-s0519a:284_7: tathā yathādhippetaṃ atthaṃ saṅkhepena katheti uddisatīti attho. Vipañcayatīti yathāuddiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0519a:284_8: atthaṃ niddisati. Vitthāretīti vitthāraṃ karoti, vitthāraṃ katvā ācikkhati vā, paṭiniddisatīti
atk-s0519a:284_9: attho. Yasmā cettha ugghaṭetīti uddisanaṃ adhippetaṃ. Uddeso ca desanāya ādi, tasmā
atk-s0519a:284_10: vuttaṃ – “ugghaṭanā ādī”ti. Tathā vipañcanaṃ niddisanaṃ, vittharaṇaṃ paṭiniddisanaṃ,
atk-s0519a:284_11: niddesapaṭiniddesā ca desanāya majjhapariyosānāti. Tena vuttaṃ – “vipañcanā majjhe,
atk-s0519a:285_0: Evaṃ “akkharehi saṅkāsetī”tiādinā channaṃ byañjanapadānaṃ byāpāraṃ dassetvā idāni
atk-s0519a:285_1: atthapadānaṃ byāpāraṃ dassetuṃ “soyaṃ dhammavinayo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sīlādidhammo
atk-s0519a:285_2: eva pariyattiatthabhūto veneyyavinayanato dhammavinayo. Ugghaṭīyantoti uddisiyamāno.
atk-s0519a:285_3: Tenāti ugghaṭitaññūvinayanena. Vipañcīyantoti niddisiyamāno. Vitthārīyantoti paṭiniddisiyamāno.
atk-s0519a:286_0: 10. Ettāvatā “dhammaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī”ti uddiṭṭhāya pāḷiyā tividhakalyāṇataṃ
atk-s0519a:286_1: dassetvā idāni atthabyañjanasampattiṃ dassetuṃ “cha padāni attho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0519a:286_2: suviññeyyaṃ. “Tenāha bhagavā”tiādinā desanāhārassa visayabhāvena uddiṭṭhaṃ pāḷiṃ
atk-s0519a:286_4: atthavivaraṇaṃ. Tattha upaṭṭhitaṃ sabbavisesānanti sabbesaṃ uttarimanussadhammasaṅkhātānaṃ
atk-s0519a:286_5: visesānaṃ adhisīlasikkhādivisesānaṃ vā upatiṭṭhanaṭṭhānaṃ. “Idaṃ nesaṃ padakkanta”ntiādīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:286_6: viya etassa saddasiddhi veditabbā. “Idaṃ vuccati tathāgatapadaṃ itipī”tiādīsu idaṃ
atk-s0519a:286_8: kilesagahanaṃ ottharitvā gatamaggotipi. Tena gocarabhāvanāsevanāhi nisevitaṃ bhajitantipi.
atk-s0519a:286_10: vuccatīti attho. Ato cetanti yato tathāgatapadādibhāvena vuccati, ato aneneva kāraṇena
atk-s0519a:286_11: brahmuno sabbasattuttamassa bhagavato, brahmaṃ vā sabbaseṭṭhaṃ cariyanti paññāyati
atk-s0519a:286_12: yāvadeva manussehi suppakāsitattā yathāvuttappakārehi ñāyati. Tenāha bhagavāti yathāvuttatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:287_0: Anupādāparinibbānatthatāya bhagavato desanāya yāvadeva ariyamaggasampāpanattho desanāhāroti
atk-s0519a:287_1: dassetuṃ “kesaṃ ayaṃ dhammadesanā”ti pucchitvā “yogīna”nti āha. Catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya
atk-s0519a:287_2: yuttappayuttāti yogino. Te hi imaṃ desanāhāraṃ payojentīti. Idaṃ vacanaṃ desanāhāravibhaṅgassa
atk-s0519a:287_3: yathānusandhinā sammā ṭhapitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ pakaraṇaṃ saṅgāyantehi ṭhapitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:287_4: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “tenāha āyasmā mahākaccāyano”ti. Niyuttoti pāḷito assādādipadatthe
atk-s0519a:290_0: 11. Tattha katamo vicayo hārotiādi vicayahāravibhaṅgo. Tatthāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā
atk-s0519a:290_1: – kiṃ vicinatīti ettha “vicinatī”ti etena vicayasaddassa kattuniddesataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a:290_2: Kinti panatthassa hārassa visayo pucchitoti taṃ tassa visayaṃ dassetuṃ “padaṃ vicinatī”tiādi
atk-s0519a:290_3: vuttaṃ. Tattha padaṃ vicinatīti ādito paṭṭhāya yāva nigamanā suttassa sabbaṃ padaṃ
atk-s0519a:290_4: vicinati. Ayañca vicayo duvidho saddato atthato ca. Tesu “idaṃ nāmapadaṃ, idaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ,
atk-s0519a:290_5: idaṃ upasaggapadaṃ, idaṃ nipātapadaṃ, idaṃ itthiliṅgaṃ, idaṃ purisaliṅgaṃ, idaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ,
atk-s0519a:290_6: idaṃ atītakālaṃ, idaṃ anāgatakālaṃ, idaṃ vattamānakālaṃ, idaṃ kattusādhanaṃ, idaṃ
atk-s0519a:290_7: karaṇasādhanaṃ, idaṃ kammasādhanaṃ, idaṃ adhikaraṇasādhanaṃ, idaṃ paccattavacanaṃ,
atk-s0519a:290_8: idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, yāva idaṃ bhummavacanaṃ, idaṃ ekavacanaṃ, idaṃ anekavacana”nti
atk-s0519a:290_9: evamādivibhāgavacanaṃ, ayaṃ saddato padavicayo. So panāyaṃ padavicayo aviparītasabhāvaniruttisallakkhaṇeneva
atk-s0519a:290_10: sampajjatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atthato pana vicayo tena tena padena vattabbaatthasaṃvaṇṇanā.
atk-s0519a:290_11: Sace pana padaṃ pucchādivasena pavattaṃ, tassa tadatthassa ca pucchādibhāvo vicetabboti
atk-s0519a:291_0: Yasmā ca sabbo desanāhāro vicayahārassa visayo suttassa vicayoti katvā, tasmā vuttaṃ
atk-s0519a:291_1: – “assādaṃ vicinatī”tiādi. Yasmā pana anugītīti ettha anurūpā gīti anugītīti ayampi
atk-s0519a:291_2: attho icchito, tasmā viciyamānassa suttapadassa anurūpato suttantarapadānipi atthuddhāravasena
atk-s0519a:291_3: vā paduddhāravasena vā ānetvā vicetabbānīti dassento “sabbe nava suttante vicinatī”ti
atk-s0519a:291_4: āha. Nava suttanteti suttageyyādike nava sutte, yathāsambhavatoti adhippāyo. Ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:292_0: Evaṃ niddesavāre vicayahāro saṅkhepato niddiṭṭhoti taṃ vibhāgena niddisitvā paṭiniddesavasena
atk-s0519a:292_1: vibhajanto yasmā padavicayo suttassa anupadaṃ pavattetabbatāya atibhāriko na sukaro
atk-s0519a:292_2: cāti taṃ anāmasitvā pañhavissajjanavicaye tāva dassento “yathā kiṃ bhave”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:292_3: Tattha yathā kiṃ bhaveti yena pakārena so vicayo pavattetabbo, taṃ pakārajātaṃ kiṃ
atk-s0519a:292_4: bhave, kīdisaṃ bhaveyyāti attho. “Yathā kiṃ bhaveyyā”tipi pāṭho. Puna yathāti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0519a:292_5: Āyasmāti piyavacanaṃ ajitoti bāvarībrāhmaṇassa paricārakabhūtānaṃ soḷasannaṃ aññataro.
atk-s0519a:292_6: Pārāyaneti pāraṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ, tassa adhigamūpāyadesanattā kiñcāpi sabbaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0519a:292_7: vacanaṃ “pārāyana”nti vattabbataṃ arahati, saṅgītikārehi pana vatthugāthānugītigāthādīhi
atk-s0519a:292_8: saddhiṃ ajitasuttādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ suttānaṃ idaṃ nāmaṃ katanti tesaññeva pārāyanasamaññāti
atk-s0519a:292_9: āha “pārāyane”ti. Keci “pārāyaniko”ti paṭhanti. Te kira tāpasapabbajjūpagamanato
atk-s0519a:292_10: pubbe pārāyanaṃ adhīyantā vicariṃsu. Tasmā ayampi pārāyanaṃ vattetīti pārāyanikoti
atk-s0519a:292_11: vutto. Pucchatīti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu pucchānibbattattā atītāti? Saccametaṃ, pucchanākāraṃ
atk-s0519a:293_0: Pucchā ca nāmesā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā diṭṭhasaṃsandanā vimaticchedanā anumatipucchā
atk-s0519a:293_2: ṭhapanīyā dhammādhiṭṭhānā sattādhiṭṭhānāti anekavidhā. Tasmā “kimayaṃ pucchā adiṭṭhajotanā”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:293_3: yathāsambhavaṃ pucchā vicetabbā. Yathā cettha pucchāvibhāgo, evaṃ vissajjanavibhāgopi
atk-s0519a:293_4: vissajjanavicaye yathāsambhavaṃ vattabbo. Pucchāsabhāgena hi vissajjananti. Idha
atk-s0519a:293_5: pana vimaticchedanaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ pucchaṃ udāharitvā tattha vicayanākāraṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:294_0: Tattha kenāti kattari karaṇavacanaṃ. Sūti nipātamattaṃ, sūti vā saṃsaye nipāto, tenassa
atk-s0519a:294_1: pañhassa vimaticchedanapucchābhāvaṃ dasseti. Nivutoti paṭicchādito. Lokoti sattaloko.
atk-s0519a:294_2: Iccāyasmā ajitoti saṅgītikārakavacanaṃ. Nappakāsatīti na paññāyati. Kissābhilepanaṃ
atk-s0519a:294_3: brūsīti kiṃ assa lokassa abhilepanaṃ vadasi. “Kiṃ svābhilepana”ntipi pāṭho, tassa
atk-s0519a:295_0: Padānīti pajjati etehi atthoti padāni, vākyāni. Pucchitānīti pucchābhāvena vuttānīti
atk-s0519a:295_1: attho. Eko pañhoti yadipi cattāri padāni pucchanavasena vuttāni, ñātuṃ icchito pana
atk-s0519a:295_2: attho eko evāti “eko pañho”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha kāraṇamāha “ekavatthupariggahā”ti. Idaṃ
atk-s0519a:295_4: cattāro ete atthā, te panekaṃ lokaṃ patiguṇabhūtā, loko padhānabhāvena gahitoti tabbasena
atk-s0519a:295_5: ekovāyaṃ pañhoti. Tenevāha “lokādhiṭṭhāna”ntiādi. Ko pana so lokoti? Āha “loko tividho”tiādi.
atk-s0519a:296_2: indriyaloko. Atha vā kilissanaṃ kileso, vipākadukkhanti attho. Tasmā dukkhabahulatāya
atk-s0519a:296_3: apāyesu sattā kilesaloko. Tadaññe sattā sampattibhavabhāvato bhavaloko. Tattha ye
atk-s0519a:296_4: vimuttiparipācakehi indriyehi samannāgatā sattā, so indriyalokoti veditabbaṃ. Pariyāpannadhammavasena
atk-s0519a:297_0: Avijjāya nivuto lokoti caturaṅgasamannāgatena andhakārena viya rathaghaṭādidhammasabhāvappaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya
atk-s0519a:297_1: avijjāya nivuto paṭicchādito loko. Vivicchāti vicikicchāhetu. “Vivicchā macchariya”nti
atk-s0519a:297_2: saṅgahe vuttaṃ. Pamādāti pamādahetu. Jappābhilepananti jappā taṇhā assa lokassa makkaṭālepo
atk-s0519a:297_3: viya makkaṭassa abhilepanaṃ silesoti brūmi. Dukkhanti jātiādikaṃ vaṭṭadukkhanti ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:297_4: padattho. Sesaṃ pāḷiyā eva viññāyati. Imāni cattāri padāni pucchāgāthāyaṃ vuttāni
atk-s0519a:297_5: “imehī”ti vissajjanagāthāyaṃ vuttehi imehi catūhi padehi vissajjitāni. Kathanti āha
atk-s0519a:298_0: Idāni taṃ yathākkamaṃ pucchaṃ vissajjanañca sarūpato dassetuṃ gāthāya ca atthaṃ vivarituṃ
atk-s0519a:298_1: “kenassū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “nīvaraṇehī”ti padena vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā
atk-s0519a:298_2: dassetuṃ “avijjānīvaraṇā hi sabbe sattā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha ca “yathāhā”tiādinā suttantaradassanena
atk-s0519a:298_3: imasmiṃ pañhavissajjanavicaye anugītivicayaṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha pariyāyatoti
atk-s0519a:298_5: ca ekaṃyeva nīvaraṇaṃ vadāmi, na pana aññesaṃ nīvaraṇasabhāvānaṃ abhāvāti attho.
atk-s0519a:298_6: Yathā ca avijjāya sati nīvaraṇānaṃ bhāvo, evaṃ avijjāya asati na santi nīvaraṇānīti
atk-s0519a:299_0: Tenāti “avijjāya nivuto loko”ti padena. Paṭhamassa padassāti “kenassu nivuto loko”ti
atk-s0519a:299_1: padassa. Yuttāti yojitā, anurūpāti vā attho. Etena pucchānurūpatā vissajjanassa dassitāti
atk-s0519a:299_2: pubbāparavicayo vuttoti veditabbaṃ. “Yo puggalo nīvaraṇehi nivuto”tiādinā vivicchāpamādānaṃ
atk-s0519a:299_3: avijjāya paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti. Nivuto eva hi nappakāsati. Vivicchāti vicikicchā.
atk-s0519a:299_4: Tenevāha – “vivicchā nāma vuccati vicikicchā”ti. Tatrāyaṃ padasiddhi – yathā micchādiṭṭhisammādiṭṭhiyo
atk-s0519a:299_5: “niccaṃ anicca”ntiādinā ekaṃsaggāhabhāvena pavattanti, na evamayaṃ. Ayaṃ pana anekaṃsaggāhabhāvato
atk-s0519a:299_6: “niccaṃ nu kho aniccaṃ nu kho”tiādinā vividhaṃ viruddhaṃ vā icchati esatīti vivicchāti.
atk-s0519a:299_8: Sukke dhamme na uppādiyatīti na samādāya vattati. Nappakāsantīti te attano santāne
atk-s0519a:299_9: anuppādiyamānā kusalā dhammā taṃ puggalaṃ pakāsaṃ loke abhiññātaṃ na karontīti attho.
atk-s0519a:299_10: Abhilimpatīti makkaṭālepo viya makkaṭaṃ dārusilādīsu purisaṃ rūpādivisaye allīyāpetīti
atk-s0519a:299_11: attho. Āsattibahulassāti āsaṅgabahulassa. Evaṃ abhijappāti karitvāti evaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṭṭhāyinīti
atk-s0519a:299_12: iminā kāraṇena. Tatthāti tāya taṇhāya. Loko abhilitto silesena makkhito viya hotīti attho.
atk-s0519a:300_0: Bhāyati etasmāti bhayaṃ. Mahantaṃ bhayaṃ mahabbhayaṃ. Tenevāha – “dukkhamassa mahabbhaya”nti.
atk-s0519a:300_1: Dukkhaṃ domanassanti dukkhameva vibhattanti sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “tisso
atk-s0519a:300_2: dukkhatā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Odhasoti kadāci attūpakkamamūlāya kadāci parūpakkamamūlāyātiādinā
atk-s0519a:300_3: vibhāgena dukkhadukkhatāya muccanakā visesena rūpāvacarā. Tathāti odhaso kadāci karahacīti
atk-s0519a:300_4: evaṃ ākaḍḍhati. Vipariṇāmadukkhatāya muccanakā upekkhāsamāpattibahulā visesena arūpāvacarasattā.
atk-s0519a:300_5: Appābādhāti padaṃ dukkhadukkhatāya muccanassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Dīghāyukāti vipariṇāmadukkhatāya.
atk-s0519a:300_6: Arūpadevā hi loke visesato dīghāyukāti. Idañca muccanamaccantikaṃ. Yasmā ca dukkhā
atk-s0519a:300_7: vedanāpi saṅkhatattā aniccatādisaṅkhāradukkhasabhāvā eva, tasmā yato muccanamaccantikaṃ,
atk-s0519a:301_0: Tattha upādiyatīti upādi, vipākakkhandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. Upādissa sesaṃ upādisesaṃ,
atk-s0519a:301_1: taṃ natthi etissāti anupādisesā, nibbānadhātu, tāya anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā,
atk-s0519a:301_2: itthambhūtalakkhaṇe cāyaṃ karaṇaniddeso. Nibbānadhātūti ca nibbāyanamattaṃ. Tasmāti
atk-s0519a:301_3: yasmā sakalalokabyāpinī sabbasaṅgāhinī ca saṅkhāradukkhatā, tasmā. Lokassāti sambandhe
atk-s0519a:301_4: sāmivacanaṃ. Tena “dukkhamassā”ti padassa atthaṃ dasseti. Evamettha lokassa nīvaraṇādīni
atk-s0519a:301_5: ajānantena, samayantaraparicayena vā tattha saṃsayapakkhandena ekaṃseneva byākātabbattā
atk-s0519a:301_6: sattādhiṭṭhānā pucchā katā, sā ca ajānanassa, saṃsayassa vā nīvaraṇādivisayatāya
atk-s0519a:301_7: catubbidhā. Pāḷiyaṃ pana nīvaraṇādīnaṃ loko ādhārabhāvena gāthāyaṃ vuttoti eko pañhoti
atk-s0519a:301_8: dassitanti. Ayamettha pucchāvicayo. Vissajjanavicayopi adiṭṭhajotinī vissajjanā vimaticchedinī
atk-s0519a:302_0: Evaṃ ekādhāraṃ pucchaṃ dassetvā idāni anekādhāraṃ dassetuṃ “savanti sabbadhī”tiādi
atk-s0519a:302_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha savantīti sandanti. Sabbadhīti sabbesu rūpādīsu āyatanesu. Sotāti
atk-s0519a:302_2: taṇhādisotā. Kiṃ nivāraṇanti tesaṃ kiṃ āvaraṇaṃ kā rakkhā. Saṃvaraṃ brūhīti taṃ nesaṃ
atk-s0519a:302_3: nīvaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ saṃvaraṃ kathehi. Kena sotā pidhīyareti kena dhammena taṇhādisotā
atk-s0519a:302_4: pidhiyyanti pacchijjantīti ayamettha padattho. Sesaṃ pāḷivaseneva āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0519a:303_0: Te dve pañhāti yadipi imissā gāthāya pucchāvasena pavattāya cattāri padāni cattāri
atk-s0519a:303_1: vākyāni. Ñātuṃ icchitassa pana atthassa duvidhattā te dve pañhā. Kasmāti ce? “Imehi
atk-s0519a:303_2: bahvādhivacanena pucchitā”ti āha. Tatthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – ime etāya gāthāya gahitā
atk-s0519a:303_3: atthā yasmā bahūni adhikicca pavattavacanena pucchitā, tasmā te dve pañhāti. Ekato
atk-s0519a:303_4: upari bahūti hi sāsanavohāro, tameva pucchāya duvidhatthavisayataṃ vivarituṃ “eva”ntiādi
atk-s0519a:303_5: vuttaṃ. Tassattho – yāhi ñātibyasanādisaṅkhātāhi pāṇavadhādīhi eva vā duggatihetubhūtāhi
atk-s0519a:303_6: āpadāhi samaṃ saha, sabbathā vā ayaṃ loko āpanno ajjhotthaṭo. Taṃnimittehi dasahi
atk-s0519a:303_7: kilesavatthūhi saṃkiliṭṭho ca, tassa taṃ āpannākāraṃ saṃkiliṭṭhākārañca buddhiyaṃ
atk-s0519a:303_8: katvā āha – “evaṃ samāpannassa evaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhassā”ti. Vodāyati sujjhati etenāti
atk-s0519a:303_9: vodānaṃ, samathavipassanā. Vuṭṭhāti etena nimittato pavattato cāti vuṭṭhānaṃ, ariyamaggo.
atk-s0519a:304_0: Asamāhitassāti nānārammaṇesu vikkhittacittassa. Savantīti pavattanti. Abhijjhātiādi
atk-s0519a:304_2: idhāpi anugītivicayaṃ dasseti. Sotānaṃ savanaṃ yebhuyyena anurodhavasenevāti āha
atk-s0519a:304_3: – “savati manāpikesu rūpesū”ti. Ettha ca cakkhādayo sotānaṃ dvārabhāvena pavattamānā
atk-s0519a:304_4: upacāravasena sayaṃ savantā viya vuttā. Itīti evaṃ. Sabbāti sabbasmā. Sabbathāti
atk-s0519a:304_5: sabbappakārena. Idaṃ vodānanti idaṃ “pariyuṭṭhānavighāta”nti vuttaṃ pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ vodānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:305_0: Vissajjanagāthāya sati tesaṃ nivāraṇanti vipassanāsampayuttā sati kusalākusalānaṃ
atk-s0519a:305_1: dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamānā tesaṃ sotānaṃ nivāraṇanti. Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmīti
atk-s0519a:305_2: tameva satiṃ sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi. Paññāyete pidhīyareti rūpādīsu aniccatādipaṭivedhasādhikāya
atk-s0519a:305_3: maggapaññāya ete sotā sabbaso pidhiyyanti, uppajjituṃ appadānavasena samucchijjantīti attho.
atk-s0519a:306_0: Nāviñchatīti abhijjhādippavattidvārabhāvena cittasantānaṃ, puggalaṃ vā nākaḍḍhati.
atk-s0519a:306_1: Anusayappahānaṃ idha pidhānaṃ adhippetanti āha – “paññāya anusayā pahīyantī”ti. Yasmā
atk-s0519a:306_2: anusayanimittaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ anusayābhāve na hotīti āha “anusayesū”tiādi. Idāni
atk-s0519a:306_3: tamevatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvento “taṃ yathā khandhavantassā”tiādimāha. Etthāpi sotānaṃ
atk-s0519a:306_4: nivāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ saṃvaraṃ pidhānañca ajānantena tattha vā saṃsayitena ekaṃsikattā
atk-s0519a:306_5: dhammādhiṭṭhānā pucchā katāti idha pucchāvicayo vuttanayeneva vissajjanavicayo ca veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:307_0: Ettha ca yena adhippāyena “kenassu nivuto loko”ti gāthāya satipi nivāraṇādīnaṃ catunnaṃ
atk-s0519a:307_1: pucchitabbabhāve eko pañhoti vuttaṃ. Tena tāva sotānaṃyeva saṃvaro pidhānañca pucchitanti
atk-s0519a:307_2: sote ekatthavasena gahetvā pucchāya ekādhiṭṭhānabhāvato eko pañhoti vattabbaṃ siyā.
atk-s0519a:307_3: Sotānaṃ vā bahubhāvato bahūti yattakā sotā, tattakā pañhāti. Yena pana adhippāyena
atk-s0519a:307_4: “savanti sabbadhi sotā”ti gāthāyaṃ sote anāmasitvā saṃvarapidhānānaṃ vasena “dve
atk-s0519a:307_5: pañhā”ti vuttaṃ. Tena paṭhamagāthāyaṃ satipi nivāraṇādīnaṃ lokādhārabhāve lokaṃ anāmasitvā
atk-s0519a:307_6: nivāraṇādīnaṃ vibhāgena cattāro pañhātipi vattabbanti ayaṃ nayo dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:308_0: Idāni yasmā pucchanto na kevalaṃ pubbe attanā racitaniyāmeneva pucchati, atha kho
atk-s0519a:308_1: desanākāle vuttadhammassa anusandhiṃ gahetvāpi pucchati, tasmā tassa anusandhiṃ pucchāya
atk-s0519a:308_2: vicetabbākāraṃ dassento “yāni sotānī”ti gāthāya anantaraṃ “paññā ceva sati cā”ti
atk-s0519a:308_3: gāthamāha. Tassāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yāyaṃ bhagavatā vuttā paññā, yā ca sati yañca
atk-s0519a:308_4: tadavasesaṃ nāmarūpaṃ, etaṃ sabbampi kattha nirujjhati, etaṃ me puṭṭho pabrūhīti.
atk-s0519a:309_0: Vissajjanagāthāyaṃ panassa yasmā paññāsatiyo nāmeneva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti, tasmā tā
atk-s0519a:309_1: visuṃ na vuttā. Ayañcettha saṅkhepattho – yaṃ maṃ tvaṃ, ajita, etaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi
atk-s0519a:309_2: – “katthetaṃ uparujjhatī”ti anantaragāthāyaṃ, yattha taṃ asesaṃ uparujjhati, taṃ
atk-s0519a:309_3: te vadāmi. Tassa tassa hi viññāṇassa nirodhena saheva apubbaṃ acarimaṃ etthetaṃ uparujjhati,
atk-s0519a:309_4: ettheva viññāṇassa nirodhena nirujjhati, etaṃ viññāṇanirodhaṃ tassa nirodho nātivattatīti
atk-s0519a:309_5: vuttaṃ hotīti. Ayaṃ pañhe anusandhiṃ pucchatīti anantaragāthāyaṃ sotānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānānusayappahānakiccena
atk-s0519a:309_6: saddhiṃ sati paññā ca vuttā, taṃ sutvā tappahāne paññāsatīsu tiṭṭhantīsu tāsaṃ sannissayena
atk-s0519a:309_7: nāmarūpena bhavitabbaṃ, tathā ca sati vaṭṭati eva. Kattha nu kho imāsaṃ sanissayānaṃ
atk-s0519a:309_8: paññāsatīnaṃ asesanirodhoti iminā adhippāyena ayaṃ pucchā katāti āha – “ayaṃ pañhe…pe…
atk-s0519a:309_9: dhātu”nti. Tattha anusandhīyati desanā etāyāti anusandhi.
atk-s0519a:310_0: Yāya paṭipadāya anupādisesaṃ nibbānadhātuṃ adhigacchanti, taṃ catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a:310_1: paṭipadaṃ saha visayena dassetuṃ “tīṇi ca saccānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha saṅkhatānīti
atk-s0519a:310_2: samecca sambhūya paccayehi katānīti saṅkhatāni. Nirodhadhammānīti nirujjhanasabhāvāni.
atk-s0519a:310_3: Dukkhaṃ samudayo maggoti tesaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ. Nirodho pana kathanti āha “nirodho
atk-s0519a:310_4: asaṅkhato”ti. So hi kenaci paccayena na saṅkhatoti asaṅkhato. Saha visayena pahātabbapahāyakasabhāvesu
atk-s0519a:310_5: ariyasaccesu pahāyakavibhāgamukhena pahātabbavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha samudayo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:311_0: Tattha avijjāvasesāti dassanamaggena pahīnāvasesā avijjāti attho. Ayañca sesa-saddo
atk-s0519a:311_1: kāmacchando byāpādo māno uddhaccanti etthāpi yojetabbo. Yathā hi avijjā, evaṃ etepi
atk-s0519a:311_3: pāṭho, etthāpi yathāvuttesu kāmacchandādipadesupi niravasesa-saddo yojetabbo. Sāvasesañhi
atk-s0519a:311_4: purimamaggadvayena kāmacchandādayo pahīyanti, itarehi pana niravasesanti. Tedhātuke
atk-s0519a:311_5: imāni dasa saṃyojanānīti ettha tedhātuketi saṃyojanānaṃ visayadassanaṃ. Tattha hi
atk-s0519a:312_0: 12. Anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāyāti taṃ pahāyakaṃ patvā. Yaṃ panāti ettha
atk-s0519a:312_1: yanti hetuatthe nipāto. Idaṃ khaye ñāṇanti yena ñāṇena hetubhūtena “khīṇā me jātī”ti
atk-s0519a:312_2: attano jātiyā khīṇabhāvaṃ jānāti, idaṃ evaṃ paccavekkhaṇassa nimittabhūtaṃ arahattaphalañāṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:312_3: khaye ñāṇaṃ nāma. Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātīti etthāpi yanti ānetabbaṃ “yaṃ nāparaṃ
atk-s0519a:312_4: itthattāyāti pajānātī”ti. Idaṃ anuppāde ñāṇanti idhāpi pubbe vuttanayeneva arahattaphalañāṇavasena
atk-s0519a:312_5: attho yojetabbo. Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana “khaye ñāṇaṃ kilesakkhayakare ariyamagge ñāṇanti
atk-s0519a:312_6: vuttaṃ. Anuppāde ñāṇaṃ paṭisandhivasena anuppādabhūte taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesānaṃ
atk-s0519a:312_7: anuppādapariyosāne uppanne ariyaphale ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Idha pana ubhayampi arahattaphalañāṇavaseneva
atk-s0519a:312_8: vibhattaṃ. Tenevāha – “imāni dve ñāṇāni aññātāvindriya”nti, “ārammaṇasaṅketena dve
atk-s0519a:313_0: Aññindriyaṃ heṭṭhimesu tīsu phalesu, uparimesu ca tīsu maggesu uppattiyā punappunaṃ
atk-s0519a:313_3: pahātabbadhammā viya dassanabhāvanāhi aggaphaluppattiyā tadavasesaphaladhammāpi anuppādanirodhena
atk-s0519a:313_4: nirujjhanti. Ko pana vādo tebhūmakadhammānanti dasseti, ekā paññā aññātāvindriyattā.
atk-s0519a:313_5: Yadi ekā, kathaṃ dvidhā vuttāti āha “api cā”tiādi. Ārammaṇasaṅketenāti khaye anuppādeti
atk-s0519a:313_6: imāya ārammaṇasamaññāya. Sā pajānanaṭṭhena paññāti yā pubbe sotānaṃ pidhānakiccā
atk-s0519a:313_7: vuttā paññā, sā pajānanasabhāvena paññā. Itarā pana yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāgahitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:314_0: 13. Evaṃ “paññā ceva sati cā”ti padassa atthaṃ vivaritvā idāni “nāmarūpa”nti padassa
atk-s0519a:314_1: atthaṃ vivaranto “tattha ye pañcupādānakkhandhā, idaṃ nāmarūpa”nti āha. Nāmarūpañca
atk-s0519a:314_2: vibhāgena dassento sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ pākaṭanāmarūpameva vibhāvetuṃ “tattha ye”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:314_3: Taggahaṇeneva hi sahacaraṇādinā tadaññe cittacetasikā rūpadhammā ca gahitā hontīti.
atk-s0519a:314_5: vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana rūpaṃ sampayuttanti? Nayidaṃ sampayuttapaccayavasena vuttaṃ. Pacurajanassa
atk-s0519a:314_6: pana avibhāgena gahaṇīyasabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:315_0: Gāthāya anupādisesā nibbānadhātu pucchitāti taṃ caturiddhipādamukhena ariyamaggādhigamena
atk-s0519a:315_1: pattabbanti dassento iddhipādabhāvanāmūlabhūtāni indriyāni satipaññāhi niddhāretuṃ
atk-s0519a:315_2: “tattha sati ca paññā ca cattāri indriyānī”ti āha. Kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo
atk-s0519a:315_3: samanvesamānā sati sijjhantī ekantena samādhiṃ nipphādeti. Satiggahaṇena cettha pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ
atk-s0519a:315_4: idhādhippetanti āha – “sati dve indriyāni, satindriyañca samādhindriyañcā”ti. Tathā
atk-s0519a:315_5: anusayasamugghātavidhāyinī paññā sijjhamānā na vinā catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyaṃ
atk-s0519a:315_6: sijjhatīti vuttaṃ – “paññā dve indriyāni paññindriyañca vīriyindriyañcā”ti.
atk-s0519a:316_0: Yā imesu catūsu indriyesūti imesu satiādīsu catūsu indriyesu nissayapaccayatāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtesu
atk-s0519a:316_1: taṃsahajātā eva yā saddahanā. “Imehi catūhi indriyehī”tipi pāḷi, tassā imehi catūhi
atk-s0519a:316_2: indriyehi sampayuttāti vacanaseso, ārammaṇe abhippasādalakkhaṇā saddhā kattukāmatāsabhāvassa
atk-s0519a:316_3: chandassa visesapaccayo hotīti āha – “yā saddhādhipateyyā cittekaggatā, ayaṃ chandasamādhī”ti.
atk-s0519a:316_4: Samāhite citteti vipassanāsamādhinā samāhite citte. Idaṃ pahānanti vikkhambhanappahānasādhako
atk-s0519a:316_5: samādhi pahānanti vutto pajahati etenāti katvā. “Padhāna”ntipi pāṭho, aggoti attho.
atk-s0519a:317_1: gahitā. Te hi yāva bhāvanānipphatti tāva ekarasena saraṇato saṅkappetabbato ca sarasaṅkappā”ti
atk-s0519a:317_2: vuttā “evaṃ me bhāvanā hotū”ti yathā icchitā, tathā pavattiyā hetubhāvato. Tadubhayanti
atk-s0519a:317_3: chandasamādhisaṅkhātañca padhānasaṅkhārasaṅkhātañca vīriyanti taṃ ubhayaṃ. Ubhayameva
atk-s0519a:317_4: hi upacāravasena aññaṃ viya katvā “chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipāda”nti
atk-s0519a:317_5: vuttaṃ. Abhinnampi hi upacāravasena bhinnaṃ viya katvā voharanti, yathā “silāputtakassa sarīra”nti.
atk-s0519a:318_0: Tattha ijjhatīti iddhi, samijjhati nipphajjatīti attho. Ijjhanti vā tāya sattā iddhā
atk-s0519a:318_1: vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi, pajjati etenāti pādo, paṭhamena atthena iddhi eva
atk-s0519a:318_2: pādo iddhipādo, iddhikoṭṭhāsoti attho. Dutiyena atthena iddhiyā pādo patiṭṭhā adhigamūpāyoti
atk-s0519a:318_3: iddhipādo. Tena hi uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti. Vivekanissitanti
atk-s0519a:318_5: bhāvetīti attho. Tathā hi ayaṃ iddhipādabhāvanānuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato
atk-s0519a:318_6: tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṃ. Maggakkhaṇe pana kiccato
atk-s0519a:319_0: Vivekattā eva hi virāgādayo, kevalañcettha vossaggo duvidho pariccāgavossaggo ca
atk-s0519a:319_1: pakkhandanavossaggo cāti. Tattha pariccāgavossaggo vipassanākkhaṇe tadaṅgavasena,
atk-s0519a:319_4: imasmiṃ lokiyalokuttaramissake atthasaṃvaṇṇanānaye yujjati. Tathā hi ayaṃ paṭhamiddhipādo
atk-s0519a:319_5: yathāvuttena pakārena kilese pariccajati nibbānañca pakkhandati. Vossaggapariṇāminti
atk-s0519a:319_6: iminā pana vacanena vossaggatthaṃ pariṇamantaṃ pariṇatañca paripaccantaṃ paripakkañcāti
atk-s0519a:319_7: attho. Ayañhi iddhipādabhāvanānuyutto yogī yathā paṭhamo iddhipādo kilesapariccāgavossaggatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:319_8: nibbānapakkhandanavossaggatthañca paripaccati, yathā ca paripakko hoti, tathā naṃ
atk-s0519a:319_9: bhāvetīti. Sesiddhipādesupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – yathā chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0519a:319_10: katvā pavattito samādhi chandasamādhi. Evaṃ vīriyaṃ cittaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā
atk-s0519a:320_0: 14. Na kevalaṃ catutthaiddhipādo eva samādhiñāṇamūlako, atha kho sabbopīti dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:320_1: “sabbo samādhi ñāṇamūlako ñāṇapubbaṅgamo ñāṇānuparivattī”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā
atk-s0519a:320_2: so eva vīmaṃsāsamādhīti vuttoti? Vīmaṃsaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pavattitattāti vuttovāyamattho.
atk-s0519a:320_3: Tattha pubbabhāgapaññāya ñāṇamūlako. Adhigamapaññāya ñāṇapubbaṅgamo. Paccavekkhaṇapaññāya
atk-s0519a:320_4: ñāṇānuparivatti. Atha vā pubbabhāgapaññāya ñāṇamūlako. Upacārapaññāya ñāṇapubbaṅgamo.
atk-s0519a:320_5: Appanāpaññāya ñāṇānuparivatti. Upacārapaññāya vā ñāṇamūlako. Appanāpaññāya ñāṇapubbaṅgamo.
atk-s0519a:321_0: Yathā pureti yathā samādhissa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇānuparivattibhāvena pure pubbe
atk-s0519a:321_1: atītāsu jātīsu asaṅkhyeyyesupi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭesu attano paresañca khandhaṃ khandhūpanibaddhañca
atk-s0519a:321_2: duppaṭivijjhaṃ nāma natthi, tathā pacchā samādhissa anāgataṃsañāṇānuparivattibhāvena
atk-s0519a:321_3: anāgatāsu jātīsu asaṅkhyeyyesupi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭesu attano paresañca khandhaṃ khandhūpanibaddhañca
atk-s0519a:322_0: Yathā pacchāti yathā samādhissa cetopariyañāṇānuparivattibhāvena anāgatesu sattasu
atk-s0519a:322_1: divasesu parasattānaṃ cittaṃ duppaṭivijjhaṃ nāma natthi, tathā pure atītesu sattasu
atk-s0519a:322_2: divasesu parasattānaṃ cittaṃ duppaṭivijjhaṃ nāma natthīti attho. Yathā divāti yathā
atk-s0519a:322_3: divasabhāge sūriyālokena andhakārassa vidhamitattā cakkhumantānaṃ sattānaṃ āpāthagataṃ
atk-s0519a:322_4: cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ suviññeyyaṃ. Tathā rattinti tathā rattibhāge caturaṅgasamannāgatepi
atk-s0519a:322_5: andhakāre vattamāne samādhissa dibbacakkhuñāṇānuparivattitāya duppaṭivijjhaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ natthi.
atk-s0519a:323_0: Yathā rattiṃ tathā divāti yathā ca rattiyaṃ tathā divāpi atisukhumaṃ kenaci tirohitaṃ
atk-s0519a:323_1: yañca atidūre, taṃ sabbarūpaṃ duppaṭivijjhaṃ nāma natthi. Yathā ca rūpāyatane vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a:323_2: tathā samādhissa dibbasotañāṇānuparivattitāya saddāyatane ca netabbaṃ. Tenevāha “iti
atk-s0519a:323_3: vivaṭena cetasā”tiādi. Tattha apariyonaddhenāti abhiññāñāṇassa pāribandhakakilesehi
atk-s0519a:323_4: anajjhotthaṭena, apariyonaddhattā eva sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ. Eteneva samādhissa iddhividhañāṇānuparivattitāpi
atk-s0519a:323_5: vuttā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pañcindriyānīti iddhipādasampayuttāni sekkhassa pañcindriyāni
atk-s0519a:323_6: adhippetānīti āha “kusalānī”ti. Cittasahabhūnītiādi tesaṃ viññāṇanirodhena nirodhadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:323_7: āraddhaṃ. Tathā “nāmarūpañcā”tiādi. Tenetaṃ dasseti “na kevalaṃ pañcindriyāni eva,
atk-s0519a:323_8: atha kho nāmarūpañca viññāṇahetukaṃ viññāṇassa nirodhā nirujjhatī”ti.
atk-s0519a:324_0: Tassāti viññāṇassa. Hetūti taṇhāavijjādiko. Anāhāranti padassa atthavivaraṇaṃ. Anabhinanditanti
atk-s0519a:324_1: abhinandanabhūtāya taṇhāya pahīnattā eva apatthitaṃ. Tato eva appaṭisandhikaṃ viññāṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:324_2: taṃ nirujjhati. Yathā ca viññāṇaṃ, evaṃ nāmarūpampi viññāṇasaṅkhātassa hetuno paccayassa
atk-s0519a:324_3: ca abhāvā tappaccayānaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ abhāvā ahetu appaccayaṃ. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva.
atk-s0519a:325_0: Evaṃ anusandhipucchampi dassetvā heṭṭhā sattādhiṭṭhānā dhammādhiṭṭhānā ca pucchā
atk-s0519a:325_1: visuṃ visuṃ dassitāti idāni tā saha dassetuṃ “ye ca saṅkhātadhammāse”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:325_2: Tatthāyaṃ padattho – saṅkhātadhammāti aniccādivasena parivīmaṃsitadhammā, arahataṃ
atk-s0519a:325_3: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sekkhāti sīlādīni sikkhamānā avasesā ariyapuggalā. Puthūti bahū
atk-s0519a:325_4: sattajanā. Tesaṃ me nipako iriyaṃ, puṭṭho pabrūhīti tesaṃ sekhāsekhānaṃ nipako paṇḍito
atk-s0519a:325_5: tvaṃ bhagavā paṭipattiṃ puṭṭho me brūhīti. Sesaṃ pāḷivaseneva viññāyati.
atk-s0519a:326: 15. Kissāti kissa hetu, kena kāraṇenāti attho. Sekhāsekhavipassanā pubbaṅgamappahānayogenāti sekhe asekhe vipassanāpubbaṅgamappahāne ca pucchanayogena, pucchāvidhināti attho.
atk-s0519a:327_0: Vissajjanagāthāyaṃ kāmesu nābhigijjheyyāti vatthukāmesu kilesakāmena na abhigijjheyya.
atk-s0519a:327_1: Manasānāvilo siyāti byāpādavitakkādayo kāyaduccaritādayo ca manaso āvilabhāvakare
atk-s0519a:327_2: dhamme pajahanto cittena anāvilo bhaveyya. Yasmā pana asekkho aniccatādivasena sabbadhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:327_3: paritulitattā kusalo sabbadhammesu kāyānupassanāsatiādīhi ca sato sabbakilesānaṃ
atk-s0519a:327_4: bhinnattā uttamabhikkhubhāvaṃ patto ca hutvā sabbairiyāpathesu pavattati, tasmā “kusalo…pe…
atk-s0519a:328_0: Tattha yaṃ pucchāgāthāyaṃ “nipako”ti padaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ bhagavantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a:328_1: bhagavato ca nepakkaṃ ukkaṃsapāramippattaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇadassanena dīpetabbanti anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:328_2: tāva kammadvārabhedehi vibhajitvā sekhāsekhapaṭipadaṃ dassetuṃ “bhagavato sabbaṃ
atk-s0519a:328_3: kāyakamma”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tena sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇadassanena tathāgatassa sekhāsekhapaṭipattidesanākosallameva
atk-s0519a:328_4: vibhāveti. Tattha ko cāti kva ca, kasmiṃ visayeti attho. Taṃ visayaṃ dasseti “yaṃ
atk-s0519a:328_5: anicce dukkhe anattani cā”ti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ñāṇadassanaṃ nāma uppajjamānaṃ “sabbaṃ
atk-s0519a:328_6: saṅkhataṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ sabbe dhammā anattā”ti uppajjati, tassa pana tasmiṃ visaye
atk-s0519a:328_7: yena appavatti, so paṭighātoti, etena lakkhaṇattayappaṭivedhassa durabhisambhavataṃ
atk-s0519a:328_8: anaññasādhāraṇatañca dasseti. Lakkhaṇattayavibhāvanena hi bhagavato catusaccappaṭivedhaṃ
atk-s0519a:329_0: Aññāṇaṃ adassananti taṃ paṭighātaṃ sarūpato dasseti. Chaḷārammaṇasabhāvappaṭicchādako
atk-s0519a:329_1: hi sammoho ñāṇadassanassa paṭighātoti. Yasmiṃ visaye ñāṇadassanaṃ uppattirahaṃ, tattheva
atk-s0519a:329_2: tassa paṭighātena bhavitabbanti āha – “yaṃ anicce dukkhe anattani cā”ti. Yathā idha
atk-s0519a:329_3: purisotiādi upamādassanaṃ. Tatridaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – puriso viya sabbo loko, tārakarūpāni
atk-s0519a:329_4: viya cha ārammaṇāni, tassa purisassa tārakarūpānaṃ dassanaṃ viya lokassa cakkhuviññāṇādīhi
atk-s0519a:329_5: yathārahaṃ chaḷārammaṇajānanaṃ, tassa purisassa tārakarūpāni passantassāpi “ettakāni
atk-s0519a:329_6: satāni, ettakāni sahassānī”tiādinā gaṇanasaṅketena ajānanaṃ viya lokassa rūpādiārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:330_0: Idāni yehi padehi bhagavatā āyasmato ajitassa sekhāsekhapaṭipadā vuttā, tesaṃ padānaṃ
atk-s0519a:330_1: atthaṃ vibhajituṃ “tattha sekhenā”tiādimāha. Tattha tatthāti nipātamattaṃ, tasmiṃ
atk-s0519a:330_2: vā vissajjane. Sekhenāti sikkhā etassa sīlanti sekho, tena sekhena. Dvīsu dhammesūti
atk-s0519a:330_3: duvidhesu dhammesūti adhippāyo. Pariyuṭṭhānīyesūti dosena pariyuṭṭhitena yattha parivattitabbaṃ,
atk-s0519a:331_0: Ettha ca gedhapaṭisedhacodanāyaṃ gedhanimitto doso gedhe sati hotīti tatopi cittassa
atk-s0519a:331_1: rakkhitabbatā niddhāretvā vuttā. Yasmā pana bhagavatā “kāmesu nābhigijjheyyā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a:331_2: tasmā “tattha yā icchā”tiādinā gedhavasena niddeso kato. Atha vā dosato cittassa
atk-s0519a:331_3: rakkhitabbatā gāthāya dutiyapādena vuttāyevāti daṭṭhabbā. Dutiyapādena hi sesakilesavodānadhammā
atk-s0519a:331_4: dassitā. Tathā hi uppannānuppannabhedato sammāvāyāmassa visayabhāvena sabbe saṃkilesavodānadhamme
atk-s0519a:331_5: catudhā vibhajitvā sammappadhānamukhena sekhapaṭipadaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:331_6: “sekho abhigijjhanto”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha anāvilasaṅkappoti āvilānaṃ kāmasaṅkappādīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:331_7: abhāvena anāvilasaṅkappo. Tato eva ca anabhigijjhanto vāyamati, vīriyaṃ pavatteti.
atk-s0519a:332_0: Tattha soti uttarivisesatthāya paṭipajjamāno sekkho. Anuppannānanti anibbattānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:332_1: Pāpakānanti lāmakānaṃ. Akusalānaṃ dhammānanti akosallasambhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ. Anuppādāyāti
atk-s0519a:332_2: na uppādanatthāya. Chandaṃ janetīti kattukamyatāsaṅkhātaṃ kusalacchandaṃ uppādeti.
atk-s0519a:332_3: Vāyamatīti payogaparakkamaṃ karoti. Vīriyaṃ ārabhatīti kāyikacetasikavīriyaṃ karoti.
atk-s0519a:332_4: Cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti teneva sahajātavīriyena cittaṃ ukkhipati. Padahatīti padhānavīriyaṃ
atk-s0519a:332_5: karoti. Vāyamatītiādīni pana cattāri padāni āsevanābhāvanābahulīkammasātaccakiriyāhi
atk-s0519a:332_6: yojetabbāni. Uppannānaṃ pāpakānanti anuppannāti avattabbataṃ āpannānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:332_7: Pahānāyāti pajahanatthāya. Anuppannānaṃ kusalānanti anibbattānaṃ kosallasambhūtānaṃ
atk-s0519a:332_8: dhammānaṃ. Uppādāyāti uppādanatthāya. Uppannānanti nibbattānaṃ. Ṭhitiyāti ṭhitatthaṃ.
atk-s0519a:332_9: Asammosāyāti anassanatthaṃ. Bhiyyobhāvāyāti punappunaṃ bhāvāya. Vepullāyāti vipulabhāvāya.
atk-s0519a:332_10: Bhāvanāyāti vaḍḍhiyā. Pāripūriyāti paripūraṇatthāyāti ayaṃ tāva padattho.
atk-s0519a:333_0: 16. “Katame anuppannā”tiādi akusaladhammā kusaladhammā ca yādisā anuppannā yādisā
atk-s0519a:333_1: ca uppannā, te dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ. Tattha ime anuppannāti ime kāmavitakkādayo asamudācāravasena
atk-s0519a:333_2: vā ananubhūtārammaṇavasena vā anuppannā nāma. Aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannā
atk-s0519a:333_3: nāma akusalā dhammā natthi. Vitakkattayaggahaṇañcettha nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:333_4: Akusalamūlānīti anusayā eva sabbesaṃ akusalānaṃ mūlabhāvato evaṃ vuttā, na lobhādayo
atk-s0519a:333_6: nāmavasena uppannā nāma, na vattamānabhāvenāti attho. Ime anuppannā kusalā dhammāti
atk-s0519a:333_7: ime sotāpannassa saddhādayo sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa anuppannā kusalā
atk-s0519a:333_8: dhammā nāma, ko pana vādo puthujjanānanti dasseti. Kusalasaddo cettha bāhitikasutte
atk-s0519a:333_9: viya anavajjapariyāyo daṭṭhabbo. Ime uppannā kusalā dhammāti ime paṭhamamagge saddhādayo
atk-s0519a:333_10: sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa uppannā kusalā dhammā nāma.
atk-s0519a:334_0: Satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya suniggahito kāmavitakkoti āha – “yena kāmavitakkaṃ vāreti,
atk-s0519a:334_1: idaṃ satindriya”nti. Anavajjasukhapadaṭṭhānena avikkhepena cetodukkhasannissayo vikkhepapaccayo
atk-s0519a:334_2: byāpādavitakko suniggahitoti vuttaṃ – “yena byāpādavitakkaṃ vāreti, idaṃ samādhindriya”nti.
atk-s0519a:334_3: Kusalesu dhammesu āraddhavīriyo parāparādhaṃ sukhena sahatīti vīriyena vihiṃsāvitakko
atk-s0519a:334_4: suniggahitoti āha – “yena vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vāreti, idaṃ vīriyindriya”nti. Samādhiādīnampi
atk-s0519a:334_5: yathāsakaṃpaṭipakkhappahānaṃ paññavantasseva ijjhatīti imamatthaṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0519a:335_0: Etesaṃ yathāniddhāritānaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ savisaye jeṭṭhakabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “saddhindriyaṃ
atk-s0519a:335_1: kattha daṭṭhabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ suviññeyyameva. Imesañca saddhādīnaṃ sekhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:335_2: indriyānaṃ nibbattiyā sabbepi sekhā dhammā matthakappattā hontīti dassento “evaṃ
atk-s0519a:336_0: 17. Evaṃ sekhapaṭipadaṃ vibhajitvā idāni asekhapaṭipadaṃ vibhajituṃ “kusalo sabbadhammāna”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:336_1: Tattha sabbadhammānanti iminā padena vuttadhamme tāva vibhajitvā tattha asekkhassa
atk-s0519a:336_2: kosallaṃ dassetuṃ “loko nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ vuttatthameva. Kilesalokena bhavaloko
atk-s0519a:336_3: samudāgacchatīti kāmāvacaradhammaṃ nissāya rūpārūpāvacaradhamme samudāgametīti attho.
atk-s0519a:336_4: Soti so mahaggatadhammesu, parittamahaggatadhammesu vā ṭhito. Indriyāni nibbattetīti
atk-s0519a:336_5: sīlasamādhayo nibbedhabhāgiye katvā vimuttiparipācanīyāni saddhādīni indriyāni uppādeti.
atk-s0519a:337_0: Dassanapariññāti ñātapariññā. Bhāvanāpariññāti tīraṇapariññā pahānapariññā ca. “Sā
atk-s0519a:337_1: duvidhenā”tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ “yadā hi sekho”tiādinā vivarati. Tattha
atk-s0519a:337_2: “nibbidāsahagatehi saññāmanasikārehī”ti iminā balavavipassanaṃ dasseti. Yadā hi sekhoti
atk-s0519a:337_3: cettha sikkhanasīlatāya kalyāṇaputhujjanopi sekhapadena saṅgahitoti katvā “dve dhammā
atk-s0519a:337_4: kosallaṃ gacchanti dassanakosallañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayamettha adhippāyo – yadā kalyāṇaputhujjano
atk-s0519a:337_5: pubbabhāgasikkhaṃ sikkhanto nibbidāsahagatehi saññāmanasikārehi ñeyyaṃ parijānāti,
atk-s0519a:337_6: tadā tassa te vipassanādhammā dassanakosallaṃ paṭhamamaggañāṇaṃ gacchanti sampāpuṇanti
atk-s0519a:337_7: tena saddhiṃ ghaṭenti. Yadā pana sotāpannādisekho vuttanayena neyyaṃ parijānāti,
atk-s0519a:337_8: tadā tassa te vipassanādhammā bhāvanākosallaṃ gacchantīti.
atk-s0519a:338_0: Taṃ ñāṇanti yā pubbe neyyassa pariññā vuttā, taṃ neyyaparijānanañāṇaṃ. Pañcavidhena
atk-s0519a:338_1: veditabbanti visayabhedena tassa bhedaṃ dasseti. Dhammānaṃ salakkhaṇe ñāṇanti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:338_2: kakkhaḷaphusanādisalakkhaṇe ñāṇaṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā sabbaṃ neyyaṃ hetuhetuphalabhedato
atk-s0519a:338_3: duvidhameva hoti, tasmā “dhammapaṭisambhidā ca atthapaṭisambhidā cā”ti niddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:339_0: Pariññāti tīraṇapariññā adhippetā. Yasmā panassa rūpārūpadhamme salakkhaṇato paccayato
atk-s0519a:339_1: ca abhijānitvā kusalādivibhāgehi te pariggahetvā aniccādivasena jānanā hoti, tasmā
atk-s0519a:339_2: “evaṃ abhijānitvā yā parijānanā, idaṃ kusala”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha evaṃgahitāti evaṃ
atk-s0519a:339_3: aniccādito kalāpasammasanādivasena gahitā sammasitā. Idaṃ phalaṃ nibbattentīti idaṃ
atk-s0519a:339_4: udayabbayañāṇādikaṃ phalaṃ paṭipāṭiyā uppādenti, nimittassa kattubhāvena upacaraṇato
atk-s0519a:339_5: yathā ariyabhāvakarāni saccāni ariyasaccānīti. Tesanti udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ. Evaṃgahitānanti
atk-s0519a:339_6: evaṃpavattitānaṃ. Ayaṃ atthoti ayaṃ saccānaṃ anubodhapaṭivedho attho. Yathā hi pariññāpaññā
atk-s0519a:339_7: sammasitabbadhamme sammasanadhamme tattha sammasanākāraṃ parijānāti, evaṃ sammasanaphalampi
atk-s0519a:340_0: Ye akusalāti samudayasaccamāha. Sabbe hi akusalā samudayapakkhiyāti. Ye kusalāti
atk-s0519a:340_1: maggadhammā sammādiṭṭhiādayo. Yadipi phaladhammāpi sacchikātabbā, catusaccappaṭivedhassa
atk-s0519a:340_2: pana adhippetattā “katame dhammā sacchikātabbā, yaṃ asaṅkhata”nti vuttaṃ. Atthakusaloti
atk-s0519a:340_3: paccayuppannesu atthesu kusalo. Dhammakusaloti paccayadhammesu kusalo. Pāḷiatthapāḷidhammā
atk-s0519a:340_4: vā atthadhammā. Kalyāṇatākusaloti yuttatākusalo, catunayakovidoti attho, desanāyuttikusalo
atk-s0519a:340_5: vā. Phalatākusaloti khīṇāsavaphalakusalo. “Āyakusalo”tiādīsu āyoti vaḍḍhi. Sā anatthahānito
atk-s0519a:340_6: aṭṭhuppattito ca duvidhā. Apāyāti avaḍḍhi. Sāpi atthahānito anaṭṭhuppattito ca duvidhā.
atk-s0519a:340_7: Upāyoti sattānaṃ accāyike kicce vā bhaye vā uppanne tassa tikicchanasamatthaṃ ṭhānuppattikāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a:340_8: tattha kusaloti attho. Khīṇāsavo hi sabbaso avijjāya pahīnattā paññāvepullappatto
atk-s0519a:340_9: etesu āyādīsu kusaloti. Evaṃ asekhassa kosallaṃ ekadesena vibhāvetvā puna anavasesato
atk-s0519a:341_0: Pariniṭṭhitasikkhassa asekhassa satokāritāya aññaṃ payojanaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ “diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārattha”nti.
atk-s0519a:341_1: Idāni yathāniddiṭṭhaṃ sekhāsekhapaṭipadaṃ nigamento “imā dve cariyā”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0519a:341_2: bojjhanti bujjhitabbaṃ. Taṃ catubbidhanti taṃ bojjhaṃ catubbidhaṃ, catusaccabhāvato.
atk-s0519a:341_3: Evaṃ jānātīti evaṃ pariññābhisamayādivasena yo jānāti. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ asekho
atk-s0519a:341_4: sativepullappatto nippariyāyena “sato abhikkamatī”tiādinā vuccatīti. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0519a:342_0: Ettāvatā ca mahāthero vicayahāraṃ vibhajanto ajitasuttavasena pucchāvicayaṃ vissajjanavicayañca
atk-s0519a:342_1: dassetvā idāni suttantaresupi pucchāvissajjanavicayānaṃ nayaṃ dassento “evaṃ pucchitabbaṃ,
atk-s0519a:342_2: evaṃ vissajjitabba”nti āha. Tattha evanti iminā nayena. Pucchitabbanti pucchā kātabbā,
atk-s0519a:342_3: ācikkhitabbā vā, vivecetabbāti attho. Evaṃ vissajjitanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Suttassa
atk-s0519a:342_4: cātiādi anugītivicayanidassanaṃ. Anugīti atthato ca byañjanato ca samānetabbāti suttantaradesanāsaṅkhātā
atk-s0519a:342_5: anugīti atthato byañjanato ca saṃvaṇṇiyamānena suttena samānā sadisī kātabbā, tasmiṃ
atk-s0519a:342_6: vā sutte sammā ānetabbā. Atthāpagatanti atthato apetaṃ, asambandhatthaṃ vā dasadāḷimādivacanaṃ
atk-s0519a:342_7: viya. Tenevāha “samphappalāpaṃ bhavatī”ti. Etena atthassa samānetabbatāya kāraṇamāha.
atk-s0519a:342_8: Dunnikkhittassāti asammāvuttassa. Dunnayoti dukkhena netabbo, netuṃ vā asakkuṇeyyo.
atk-s0519a:343_0: Evaṃ anugītivicayaṃ dassetvā niddesavāre “suttassa yo pavicayo”ti saṃkhittena vuttamatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:343_1: vibhajituṃ “suttañca pavicinitabba”nti vatvā tassa vicinanākāraṃ dassento “kiṃ idaṃ
atk-s0519a:343_2: suttaṃ āhaccavacana”ntiādimāha. Tattha āhaccavacananti bhagavato ṭhānakaraṇāni āhacca
atk-s0519a:343_3: abhihantvā pavattavacanaṃ, sammāsambuddhena sāmaṃ desitasuttanti attho. Anusandhivacananti
atk-s0519a:343_4: sāvakabhāsitaṃ. Tañhi bhagavato vacanaṃ anusandhetvā pavattanato “anusandhivacana”nti
atk-s0519a:343_5: vuttanti. Nītatthanti yathārutavasena ñātabbatthaṃ. Neyyatthanti niddhāretvā gahetabbatthaṃ.
atk-s0519a:343_6: Saṃkilesabhāgiyantiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho paṭṭhānavāravaṇṇanāyaṃ āvi bhavissati. Yasmā
atk-s0519a:343_7: pana bhagavato desanā soḷasavidhe sāsanapaṭṭhāne ekaṃ bhāgaṃ abhajantī nāma natthi,
atk-s0519a:343_8: tasmā sopi nayo vicetabbabhāvena idha nikkhitto.
atk-s0519a:344_0: Kuhiṃ imassa suttassāti imassa suttassa kasmiṃ padese ādimajjhapariyosānesu. Sabbāni
atk-s0519a:344_1: saccāni passitabbānīti dukkhasaccaṃ suttassa “kuhiṃ kasmiṃ padese kasmiṃ vā pade
atk-s0519a:344_2: passitabbaṃ niddhāretvā vicetuṃ, samudayasaccaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ maggasaccaṃ kuhiṃ passitabbaṃ
atk-s0519a:344_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ niddhāretvā vicetu”nti evaṃ sabbāni saccāni uddharitvā vicetabbānīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a:344_4: Ādimajjhapariyosāneti evaṃ suttaṃ pavicetabbanti ādito majjhato pariyosānato ca evaṃ
atk-s0519a:344_5: iminā pucchāvicayādinayena suttaṃ pavicitabbanti attho. Ettha ca pucchāvissajjanapubbāparānugītivicayā
atk-s0519a:344_6: pāḷiyaṃ sarūpeneva dassitā. Assādādivicayo pana saccaniddhāraṇamukhena nayato dassito,
atk-s0519a:344_7: so niddesavāre vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Tabbicayeneva ca padavicayo siddhoti.
atk-s0519a:347_0: 18. Tattha katamo yuttihārotiādi yuttihāravibhaṅgo. Tattha kiṃ yojayatīti yuttihārassa
atk-s0519a:347_1: visayaṃ pucchati. Ko panetassa visayo? Atathākārena gayhamānā suttatthā visayo, te
atk-s0519a:347_2: hi tena sātisayaṃ yāthāvato yuttiniddhāraṇena yojetabbā. Itaresupi ayaṃ hāro icchito
atk-s0519a:347_3: eva. Taṃ pana bhūtakathanamattaṃ hoti. Yasmā panāyaṃ yuttigavesanā nāma na mahāpadesena
atk-s0519a:347_4: vinā, tasmā yuttihāraṃ vibhajanto tassa lakkhaṇaṃ tāva upadisituṃ “cattāro mahāpadesā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:348_0: Tattha mahāpadesāti mahāapadesā, buddhādayo mahante apadisitvā vuttāni mahākāraṇānīti
atk-s0519a:348_1: attho. Atha vā mahāpadesāti mahāokāsā, mahantāni dhammassa patiṭṭhānānīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0519a:348_2: hoti. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – apadissatīti apadeso, buddho apadeso etassāti buddhāpadeso.
atk-s0519a:348_3: Esa nayo sesesupi. “Sammukhā metaṃ bhagavato suta”ntiādinā kenaci ābhatassa ganthassa
atk-s0519a:348_4: dhammoti vā adhammoti vā vinicchayane kāraṇaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti? Tassa tathā ābhatassa
atk-s0519a:348_5: suttotaraṇādi eva. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ cattāroti? Apadisitappabhedato. Dhammassa hi
atk-s0519a:348_6: dve sampadāyo bhagavā sāvakā ca. Tesu sāvakā saṅghagaṇapuggalavasena tividhā. “Evamamumhā
atk-s0519a:348_7: mayāyaṃ dhammo paṭiggahito”ti apadisitabbānaṃ bhedena cattāro. Tenāha – “buddhāpadeso…pe…
atk-s0519a:348_8: ekattherāpadeso”ti. Tāni padabyañjanānīti kenaci ābhatasuttassa padāni byañjanāni
atk-s0519a:348_9: ca, atthapadāni ceva byañjanapadāni cāti attho. Saṃvaṇṇakena vā saṃvaṇṇanāvasena
atk-s0519a:348_10: āhariyamānāni padabyañjanāni. Sutte otārayitabbānīti sutte anuppavesitabbāni. Sandassayitabbānīti
atk-s0519a:349_0: Suttādīni dassetuṃ “katamasmi”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yasmā bhagavato vacanaṃ ekagāthāmattampi
atk-s0519a:349_1: saccavinimuttaṃ natthi, tasmā sutteti padassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ “catūsu ariyasaccesū”ti
atk-s0519a:349_2: vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tīṇi piṭakāni suttanti vuttaṃ, taṃ iminā nettivacanena
atk-s0519a:349_3: aññadatthu saṃsandati ceva sameti cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yāvadeva anupādāparinibbānatthā
atk-s0519a:349_4: bhagavato desanā, sā ekantena rāgādikilesavūpasamaṃ vadatīti vinayetipadassa atthaṃ
atk-s0519a:349_5: dassento “rāgavinaye”tiādimāha. Vinayoti hi kāraṇaṃ rāgādivūpasamanimittaṃ idhādhippetaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0519a:350_0: “Ye kho tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi, ime dhammā sarāgāya saṃvattanti no virāgāya,
atk-s0519a:350_1: saññogāya saṃvattanti no visaññogāya, ācayāya saṃvattanti no apacayāya, mahicchatāya
atk-s0519a:350_2: saṃvattanti no appicchatāya, asantuṭṭhiyā saṃvattanti no santuṭṭhiyā, saṅgaṇikāya
atk-s0519a:350_3: saṃvattanti no pavivekāya, kosajjāya saṃvattanti no vīriyārambhāya, dubbharatāya
atk-s0519a:350_4: saṃvattanti no subharatāya, ekaṃsena gotami dhāreyyāsi ‘neso dhammo, neso vinayo,
atk-s0519a:350_5: netaṃ satthusāsana’nti. Ye ca kho tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi ime dhammā virāgāya
atk-s0519a:350_6: saṃvattanti no sarāgāya, visaññogāya saṃvattanti no saññogāya, apacayāya saṃvattanti
atk-s0519a:350_7: no ācayāya, appicchatāya saṃvattanti no mahicchatāya, santuṭṭhiyā saṃvattanti no
atk-s0519a:350_8: asantuṭṭhiyā pavivekāya saṃvattanti no saṅgaṇikāya, vīriyārambhāya saṃvattanti no
atk-s0519a:350_9: kosajjāya, subharatāya saṃvattanti no dubbharatāya, ekaṃsena gotami dhāreyyāsi ‘eso
atk-s0519a:351_1: hi ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatāti vutto. “Dhammatāyaṃ upanikkhipitabbānī”ti
atk-s0519a:351_2: idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ natthi, atthadassanavasena pana idha vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca pavattiṃ
atk-s0519a:351_3: nivattiṃ tadupāyañca bādhakādibhāve niyataṃ paridīpento sutte otarati nāma. Ekantena
atk-s0519a:351_4: rāgādikilesavinayaṃ vadanto vinaye sandissati nāma. Tathā sassataṃ ucchedañca vajjetvā
atk-s0519a:351_5: ekattanayādiparidīpanena sabhāvadhammānaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhāvaṃ vibhāvento dhammataṃ na vilometi nāma.
atk-s0519a:352_0: Evaṃvidho ca kāmāsavādikaṃ āsavaṃ na uppādetīti imamatthaṃ dassento “yadi catūsu
atk-s0519a:352_1: ariyasaccesū”tiādimāha. Nanu ca anulomato paṭiccasamuppādo pavatti, paṭilomato nivattīti
atk-s0519a:352_2: so cattāri ariyasaccāni anupaviṭṭho kasmā idha visuṃ gahitoti? Saccametaṃ. Idha pana
atk-s0519a:352_3: visuṃ gahaṇaṃ dhammānaṃ paccayāyattavuttidassanena aniccapaccayalakkhaṇaṃ asamatthapaccayalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:352_4: nirīhapaccayalakkhaṇañca vibhāvetvā tesaṃ udayavantatā tato eva vayavantatā tadubhayena
atk-s0519a:352_6: sabbadiṭṭhigatakumatividdhaṃsanī anaññasādhāraṇā sāsanasampatti pakāsitā hotīti dassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0519a:353_0: Ettha ca suttaṃ suttānulomaṃ ācariyavādo attanomatīti idaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-s0519a:353_1: tattha suttaṃ nāma tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhāni tīṇi piṭakāni. Suttānulomaṃ nāma mahāpadesā,
atk-s0519a:353_2: yaṃ “anulomakappiya”nti vuccati. Ācariyavādo nāma aṭṭhakathā. Attanomati nāma nayaggāhena
atk-s0519a:353_3: anubuddhiyā attano paṭibhānaṃ. Tattha suttaṃ appaṭibāhiyaṃ, taṃ paṭibāhantena satthāva
atk-s0519a:353_4: paṭibāhito hoti. Anulomakappiyaṃ pana suttena samentameva gahetabbaṃ, na itaraṃ.
atk-s0519a:353_5: Ācariyavādopi suttena samento eva gahetabbo, na itaro. Tathā attanomati, sā pana sabbadubbalāti.
atk-s0519a:354_0: Idāni yadatthaṃ idha cattāro mahāpadesā ābhatā, taṃ dassetuṃ “catūhi mahāpadesehī”tiādi
atk-s0519a:354_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha yaṃ yanti yaṃ yaṃ atthajātañca dhammajātañca. Yujjatīti yathāvuttehi
atk-s0519a:354_2: catūhi mahāpadesehi yujjati. Yena yenāti yena yena kāraṇena. Yathā yathāti yena yena
atk-s0519a:354_3: pakārena. Taṃ taṃ gahetabbanti saṃvaṇṇiyamāne sutte ābhatena kāraṇena pasaṅgena pakārena
atk-s0519a:354_4: ca suttato uddharitvā saṃvaṇṇanāvasena gahetabbanti attho. Tena catumahāpadesāviruddhāya
atk-s0519a:354_5: yuttiyā suttato atthe niddhāretvā yuttihārayojanā kātabbāti dasseti.
atk-s0519a:355_0: 19. Idāni taṃ yuttiniddhāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “pañhaṃ pucchitenā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0519a:355_1: kati padānīti kittakāni padāni. Pariyogāhitabbanti padassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ “vicetabba”nti
atk-s0519a:355_2: vuttaṃ. Yattakāni padāni yathādhippetaṃ atthaṃ abhivadanti, tattakāni padāni tadatthassekassa
atk-s0519a:355_3: ñātuṃ icchitattā “eko pañho”ti vuccati, tāni pana ekagāthāyaṃ yadi vā sabbāni padāni
atk-s0519a:355_4: yāva yadi vā ekaṃ padaṃ ekaṃ atthaṃ abhivadati, ekoyeva so pañhoti imamatthaṃ dasseti
atk-s0519a:355_5: “yadi sabbānī”tiādinā. Tanti taṃ pañhaṃ. Aññātabbanti ājānitabbaṃ. Kiṃ ime dhammātiādi
atk-s0519a:355_6: ājānanākāradassanaṃ. Tattha dhammāti pariyattidhammā. Nānatthāti nānā atthā.
atk-s0519a:356_0: Pucchāgāthāyaṃ ayaṃ padattho – kenassubbhāhato lokoti ayaṃ sattaloko coro viya coraghātakena
atk-s0519a:356_1: kena abhihato vadhīyatīti attho. Kenassu parivāritoti māluvalatāya viya nissitarukkho
atk-s0519a:356_2: kena loko ajjhotthaṭo. Kena sallena otiṇṇoti kena visapītakhurappena viya sarīrabbhantaranimuggena
atk-s0519a:356_3: sallena anupaviṭṭho. Kissa dhūpāyitoti kissa kena kāraṇena dhūpāyito santāpito loko.
atk-s0519a:356_4: Sadāti padaṃ sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. Teti cattāri padāni. Pañhasaddāpekkhāya pulliṅganiddeso.
atk-s0519a:356_5: “Vissajjetī”ti etena vissajjanato tayo pañhāti ñāyatīti dasseti.
atk-s0519a:357_0: 20. Tatthāti vissajjanagāthāyaṃ dutiyapāde vuttā jarā ca paṭhamapāde vuttaṃ maraṇañcāti
atk-s0519a:357_1: imāni dve saṅkhatassa pañcakkhandhassa “saṅkhato”ti lakkhīyati etehīti saṅkhatalakkhaṇāni.
atk-s0519a:357_2: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, saṅkhatassa saṅkhatalakkhaṇāni. Katamāni
atk-s0519a:357_3: tīṇi? Uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0519a:357_4: – “jarāyaṃ ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ, maraṇaṃ vayo”ti. Ettha ca “ṭhitassa aññathatta”nti
atk-s0519a:357_5: etena khandhappabandhassa pubbāparaviseso idha jarā, na khaṇaṭṭhitīti dasseti. “Maraṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:357_6: vayo”ti iminā ca “tisso mato, phusso mato”ti evaṃ loke vuttaṃ sammutimaraṇaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0519a:358_0: Idāni “te tayo pañhā”ti vuttamatthaṃ yuttivasena dassetuṃ “jarāya cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:358_1: Tattha yebhuyyena jiṇṇassa maraṇadassanato jarāmaraṇānaṃ nānattaṃ asampaṭicchamānaṃ
atk-s0519a:358_2: pati tesaṃ nānattadassanatthaṃ “gabbhagatāpi hi mīyantī”ti vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
atk-s0519a:358_3: – yathādhippetajarāvirahitassa maraṇassa dassanato aññā jarā aññaṃ maraṇanti. Tenevāha
atk-s0519a:358_4: – “na ca te jiṇṇā bhavantī”ti. Kiñca bhiyyo? Kevalassa maraṇassa diṭṭhattā aññāva
atk-s0519a:358_5: jarā aññaṃ maraṇaṃ, yathā taṃ devānanti imamatthaṃ dasseti “atthi ca devāna”ntiādinā.
atk-s0519a:358_6: Anuttarimanussadhammena ca tikicchanena sakkā jarāya paṭikāraṃ kātuṃ, na tathā maraṇassāti
atk-s0519a:358_7: evampi jarāmaraṇānaṃ atthato nānattaṃ sampaṭicchitabbanti dassetuṃ “sakkatevā”tiādi
atk-s0519a:358_8: vuttaṃ. Tattha sakkateti sakyate, sakkāti attho. Paṭikammanti paṭikaraṇaṃ. Nanu ca
atk-s0519a:358_9: maraṇassāpi paṭikāraṃ kātuṃ sakkā iddhipādabhāvanāya vasibhāve satīti codanaṃ manasi
atk-s0519a:358_10: katvā āha – “aññatreva iddhimantānaṃ iddhivisayā”ti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0519a:359: “Yassa kassaci, ānanda, cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā, so ākaṅkhamāno kappaṃ vā tiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṃ vā”ti.
atk-s0519a:360_0: Ko panettha kappo, ko vā kappāvasesoti? Kappoti āyukappo, yasmiṃ tasmiñhi kāle yaṃ
atk-s0519a:360_1: manussānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ karonto kappaṃ tiṭṭhati nāma. “Appaṃ vā bhiyyo”ti
atk-s0519a:360_2: vuttaṃ pana vassasatādito atirekaṃ tiṭṭhanto kappāvasesaṃ tiṭṭhati nāma. Yadi evaṃ
