atk-s0519a:360_3: kasmā iddhimanto cetovasippattā khīṇāsavā lokahitatthaṃ tathā na tiṭṭhantīti? Khandhasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0519a:360_4: dukkhabhārassa pariññātattā anussukkatāya ca. Paṭippassaddhasabbussukkā hi te uttamapurisāti.
atk-s0519a:363: Yathā jarāmaraṇānaṃ aññamaññaṃ atthato nānattaṃ, evaṃ tehi taṇhāya ca nānatte dassite “tayo pañhā”ti idaṃ sijjhatīti taṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:364_0: Tattha yasmā taṇhāya abhāvepi sati jarāmaraṇaṃ labbhati khīṇāsavasantāne, tasmā aññaṃ
atk-s0519a:364_1: jarāmaraṇaṃ aññā taṇhāti imamatthamāha “dissanti vītarāgā jīrantāpi mīyantāpī”ti.
atk-s0519a:364_2: Nanu ca taṇhāpi jīraṇabhijjanasabhāvāti? Saccaṃ, na idaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ idhādhippetanti
atk-s0519a:364_3: vuttovāyamattho. “Yadi cā”tiādinā jarāmaraṇato taṇhāya anaññatte dosaṃ dasseti. Yobbanaṭṭhāpi
atk-s0519a:364_4: vigatataṇhā siyuṃ, na idaṃ yuttanti adhippāyo. Jarāmaraṇampi siyā dukkhassa samudayo
atk-s0519a:364_5: taṇhāya anaññatte satīti adhippāyo. Na ca siyā taṇhā dukkhassa samudayo jarāmaraṇato
atk-s0519a:364_6: anaññatte satīti bhāvo. Na hi jarāmaraṇaṃ dukkhassa samudayo, taṇhā dukkhassa samudayo,
atk-s0519a:364_7: tasmā veditabbaṃ etesamatthato nānattanti adhippāyo. Yathā ca taṇhā maggavajjhā,
atk-s0519a:364_8: evaṃ jarāmaraṇampi siyā maggavajjhaṃ taṇhāya anaññatte sati. Yathā ca jarāmaraṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:364_9: na maggavajjhaṃ, tathā taṇhāpi siyāti ayampi nayo vutto evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imāya yuttiyāti
atk-s0519a:364_10: imāya yathāvuttāya upapattiyā. Aññamaññehīti aññāhi aññāhi kāraṇūpapattīhi atthato
atk-s0519a:364_11: ce aññattaṃ, tadaññampi byañjanato gavesitabbanti attho.
atk-s0519a:365_0: Imesaṃ dhammānaṃ atthato ekattanti imamevatthaṃ “na hi yujjatī”tiādinā vivarati.
atk-s0519a:365_1: Taṇhāya adhippāye aparipūramāneti icchitālābhamāha. Tena icchātaṇhānaṃ atthato ekattaṃ
atk-s0519a:365_2: vuttaṃ hotīti. Etena na hi yujjati icchāya ca taṇhāya ca atthato aññattanti. Yathā
atk-s0519a:365_3: idaṃ vacanaṃ samatthanaṃ hoti, evaṃ icchāvipariyāye āghātavatthūsu kodho ca upanāho
atk-s0519a:365_4: ca uppajjatīti idampi samatthanaṃ hoti, na tathā jarāmaraṇavipariyāyeti jarāmaraṇataṇhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:365_5: atthato aññattampi samatthitaṃ hotīti etamatthaṃ dasseti “imāya yuttiyā”tiādinā.
atk-s0519a:366_0: Yadi icchātaṇhānaṃ atthato anaññattaṃ, atha kasmā bhagavatā imissā gāthāya dvidhā
atk-s0519a:366_1: vuttāti? Tattha parihāramāha “yaṃ panida”ntiādinā. Tattha yanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:366_2: Abhilapitanti vuttaṃ yaṃ idaṃ abhilapanaṃ, idaṃ bāhirānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ ārammaṇavasena,
atk-s0519a:366_3: ārammaṇakaraṇavasena vā yojetabbaṃ. Dvīhi dhammehīti dvīhi pakatīhi. Kā pana tā pakatiyoti?
atk-s0519a:366_4: Appattassa visayassa esanavasena icchā, pattassa appattassa vā pātukāmatāvasena taṇhā,
atk-s0519a:366_5: ayametāsaṃ viseso. Yadipi evaṃ, tathāpi sabbā taṇhā rūpādivisayaṃ gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0519a:366_6: gahaṇena ekasabhāvā evāti dassento “sabbā hi taṇhā ajjhosānalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇā”ti
atk-s0519a:366_7: āha. Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya pakāsento “sabbo aggī”tiādimāha, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0519a:367: Ayaṃ pana na kevalaṃ taṇhā ārammaṇe pavattivisesena dvīhi eva nāmehi vuttā, atha kho anekehipi pariyāyehīti dassanatthaṃ “icchāitipī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:368_0: Tattha icchanti tāya ārammaṇānīti icchā. Taṇhāyanaṭṭhena taṇhā. Pīḷājananato duruddhāraṇato
atk-s0519a:368_1: ca visapītaṃ sallaṃ viyāti sallaṃ. Santāpanaṭṭhena dhūpāyanā. Ākaḍḍhanaṭṭhena sīghasotā
atk-s0519a:368_2: saritā viyāti saritā, allaṭṭhena vā saritā, “saritāni sinehitāni ca, somanassāni
atk-s0519a:368_3: bhavanti jantuno”ti hi vuttaṃ. Allāni ceva siniddhāni cāti ayamettha attho. Visattikāti
atk-s0519a:368_4: visatāti visattikā. Visaṭāti visattikā. Visamāti visattikā. Visālāti visattikā. Visakkatīti
atk-s0519a:368_5: visattikā. Visaṃvādikāti visattikā. Visaṃharatīti visattikā. Visamūlāti visattikā.
atk-s0519a:368_6: Visaphalāti visattikā. Visaparibhogāti visattikā. Visatā vā pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde
atk-s0519a:368_7: gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kule gaṇe visatā vitthatāti visattikā.
atk-s0519a:369_0: Sinehanavasena sineho. Nānāgatīsu kilamathuppādanena kilamatho. Paliveṭhanaṭṭhena
atk-s0519a:369_1: latā viyāti latā. “Latā uppajja tiṭṭhatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Mamanti maññanavasena maññanā.
atk-s0519a:369_2: Dūragatampi ākaḍḍhitvā bandhanaṭṭhena bandho. Āsīsanaṭṭhena āsā. Ārammaṇarasaṃ pātukāmatāvasena
atk-s0519a:369_3: pipāsā. Abhinandanaṭṭhena abhinandanā. Itīti evaṃ ārammaṇe pavattivisesena anekehi
atk-s0519a:369_4: nāmehi gayhamānāpi sabbā taṇhā ajjhosānalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇāti yathāvuttamatthaṃ nigameti.
atk-s0519a:370_0: Puna taṇhāya anekehi nāmehi gahitabhāvameva “yathā cā”tiādinā upacayena dasseti.
atk-s0519a:370_1: Tattha vevacaneti vevacanahāravibhaṅge. “Āsā ca pihā”ti gāthāya atthaṃ tattheva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0519a:370_2: Avigatarāgassātiādīsu rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo, chandanaṭṭhena chando, piyāyanaṭṭhena pemaṃ,
atk-s0519a:370_3: paridahanaṭṭhena paridāhoti taṇhāva vuttā. Tenevāha – “taṇhāyetaṃ vevacana”nti. Evaṃ
atk-s0519a:370_4: yujjatīti evaṃ icchātaṇhānaṃ atthato anaññattā “tayo pañhā”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ yujjati
atk-s0519a:371_0: 21. Evaṃ “kenassubbhāhato loko”ti gāthāya “tayo pañhā”ti pañhattayabhāve yuttiṃ dassetvā
atk-s0519a:371_1: idāni aññehi pakārehi yuttigavesanaṃ dassento “sabbo dukkhūpacāro”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0519a:371_3: yujjatīti adhippāyo. Nibbidūpacāroti nibbidāpavatti kāmānaṃ vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā
atk-s0519a:371_4: uppajjamānā anabhirati ñāṇanibbidā ca. Kāmataṇhāparikkhāramūlakoti kāmataṇhāya parikkhārabhūtavatthukāmahetuko.
atk-s0519a:371_5: Tattha anabhiratisaṅkhātā nibbidā kāmataṇhāparikkhāramūlikā, na ñāṇanibbidāti sabbo
atk-s0519a:371_6: nibbidūpacāro kāmataṇhāparikkhāramūlakoti na pana yujjatīti vuttaṃ. Imāya yuttiyāti
atk-s0519a:371_7: nayaṃ dasseti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā pañhattayabhāve yutti vuttā, yathā ca dukkhūpacāranibbidūpacāresu,
atk-s0519a:371_8: evaṃ imāya yuttiyā iminā yogena nayena aññamaññehi kāraṇehi taṃtaṃpāḷippadese anurūpehi
atk-s0519a:372_0: Idāni taṃ nayadassanaṃ saṃkhittanti vitthārato vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “yathā hi bhagavā”tiādi
atk-s0519a:372_1: āraddhaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – rāgadosamohacaritānaṃ yathākkamaṃ asubhamettāpaccayākārakathā
atk-s0519a:372_2: rāgādivinayanato sappāyāti ayaṃ sāsanayutti. Evamavaṭṭhite yadi rāgacaritassa mettācetovimuttiṃ
atk-s0519a:372_3: deseyya, sā desanā na yujjati asappāyabhāvato. Tathā sukhāpaṭipadādayoti. Nanu ca
atk-s0519a:372_4: sukhāpaṭipadādayo paṭipattiyā sambhavanti, na desanāyāti? Saccametaṃ, idha pana rāgacaritoti
atk-s0519a:372_5: tibbakileso rāgacaritoti adhippeto. Tassa dukkhāya paṭipadāya bhāvanā samijjhati.
atk-s0519a:372_6: Yassa ca dukkhāya paṭipadāya bhāvanā samijjhati, tassa garutarā asubhadesanā sappāyā,
atk-s0519a:372_7: yassa garutarā asubhadesanā sappāyā, na tassa mandakilesassa viya lahukatarāti imamatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:372_8: dassento āha – “sukhaṃ vā paṭipadaṃ…pe… deseyya na yujjati desanā”ti. Iminā nayena
atk-s0519a:372_9: sesapadesupi yathāsambhavaṃ attho vattabbo. Ettha ca ayuttaparihārena yuttisamadhigamoti
atk-s0519a:372_10: yuttivicāraṇāya ayuttipi gavesitabbāti vuttaṃ – “yadi hi…pe… na yujjati desanā”ti.
atk-s0519a:372_11: Sesesupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ yaṃ kiñcītiādi yuttihārayojanāya nayadassanameva.
atk-s0519a:373_0: Tattha evanti iminā nayena. Yaṃ kiñcīti aññampi yaṃ kiñci. Anulomappahānanti pahānassa
atk-s0519a:373_1: anurūpaṃ, pahānasamatthanti attho. Sutte anavasesānaṃ padatthānaṃ anupadavicāraṇā
atk-s0519a:373_2: vicayo hāro, vicayahārasaṃvaṇṇanāya niddhāritesu atthesu yuttigavesanaṃ sukaranti
atk-s0519a:373_3: āha – “sabbaṃ taṃ vicayena hārena vicinitvā yuttihārena yojetabba”nti. Yāvatikā ñāṇassa
atk-s0519a:373_4: bhūmīti saṃvaṇṇentassa ācariyassa yaṃ ñāṇaṃ yaṃ paṭibhānaṃ, tassa yattako visayo,
atk-s0519a:373_5: tattako yuttihāravicāroti attho. Taṃ kissa hetu? Anantanayo samantabhaddako vimaddakkhamo
atk-s0519a:374_1: vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “mettāvihārissa sato”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha mettāvihārissāti
atk-s0519a:374_2: mettāvihāralābhino. Satoti samānassa, tathābhūtassāti attho. Byāpādoti padoso. Cittaṃ
atk-s0519a:374_3: pariyādāya ṭhassatīti cittaṃ abhibhavissati. Yasmā pana kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:374_4: apubbaṃ acarimaṃ pavatti nāma natthi, tasmā samāpattito vuṭṭhānassa aparabhāgeti
atk-s0519a:374_5: dassanatthaṃ “ṭhassatī”ti vuttaṃ. Na yujjati desanāti byāpādapaṭipakkhattā mettāya
atk-s0519a:374_6: tādisī kathā na yuttāti attho. Byāpādo pahānaṃ abbhatthaṃ gacchatīti yujjati desanāti
atk-s0519a:374_7: yathāvuttakāraṇato eva ayaṃ kathā yuttāti. Sesavāresupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:375_1: saṅkhāranimittānusārī. Tena tenevāti niccādīsu yaṃ yaṃ pahīnaṃ, tena teneva nimittena.
atk-s0519a:375_2: Asmīti vigatanti pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu diṭṭhimānavasena yaṃ asmīti maññitaṃ,
atk-s0519a:375_3: taṃ vigataṃ. Tamevatthaṃ vivarati “ayamahamasmīti na samanupassāmī”ti. Vicikicchākathaṃkathāsallanti
atk-s0519a:375_4: vinayakukkuccassāpi kathaṃ kathanti pavattisabbhāvato vicikicchāpadena visesitaṃ.
atk-s0519a:375_5: Na yujjati desanāti vicikicchāya pahānekaṭṭhabhāvato na yuttāyaṃ kathā.
atk-s0519a:376_0: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassāti paṭhamajjhānasamaṅgino. Kāmarāgabyāpādā visesāya saṃvattantīti
atk-s0519a:376_1: na yujjatīti yasmā nīvaraṇesu appahīnesu paṭhamajjhānassa upacārampi na sampajjati,
atk-s0519a:376_2: pageva jhānaṃ, tasmā kāmarāgabyāpādā visesāya dutiyajjhānāya saṃvattantīti na yuttāyaṃ
atk-s0519a:376_3: kathā. Yathāladdhassa pana paṭhamajjhānassa kāmarāgabyāpādā pariyuṭṭhānappattā hānāya
atk-s0519a:376_4: saṃvattantīti yujjati desanā yuttā kathāti, evaṃ sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. Avitakkasahagatā
atk-s0519a:376_5: saññāmanasikārā nāma saha upacārena dutiyajjhānadhammā, ārammaṇakaraṇattho hettha
atk-s0519a:376_6: sahagata-saddo. Hānāyāti paṭhamajjhānato parihānāya. Visesāyāti dutiyajjhānāya. Iminā
atk-s0519a:376_7: nayena tattha tattha hānanti, visesoti ca vuttadhammā veditabbā. Vitakkavicārasahagatāti
atk-s0519a:376_8: paṭhamajjhānadhammā, kāmāvacaradhammā eva vā. Upekkhāsukhasahagatāti upacārena saddhiṃ
atk-s0519a:376_9: dutiyajjhānadhammā, tatramajjhattupekkhā hi idha upekkhāti adhippetā. Pītisukhasahagatāti
atk-s0519a:377_0: Saññūpacārāti paṭusaññākiccaṃ karontā eva ye keci cittuppādā, “ākiñcaññāyatanadhammā”tipi
atk-s0519a:377_2: tassa parikammavasena pavattadhammā. Te pana yasmā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyaṃ
atk-s0519a:377_3: ṭhiteneva sakkā saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ, na tato parihīnena,
atk-s0519a:377_4: tasmā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā hānāya saṃvattantīti na yuttā kathā. Visesāya
atk-s0519a:377_5: saṃvattantīti pana yuttā kathāti āha – “hānāya…pe… desanā”ti. Kallatāparicitanti
atk-s0519a:377_6: samatthabhāvena paricitaṃ, yathāvuttasamāpattīsu vasibhāvena paricitanti attho. Tenevāha
atk-s0519a:378_0: Api cettha appaṭikkūlasaññāmukhena kāmacchando vañcetīti yujjati. Paṭikkūlasaññāpatirūpatāya
atk-s0519a:378_1: byāpādo vañcetīti yujjati. Samādhimukhena thinamiddhaṃ vañcetīti yujjati. Vīriyārambhamukhena
atk-s0519a:378_2: uddhaccaṃ vañcetīti yujjati. Sikkhākāmatāmukhena kukkuccaṃ vañcetīti yujjati. Ubhayapakkhasantīraṇamukhena
atk-s0519a:378_3: vicikicchā vañcetīti yujjati. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhasamupekkhanamukhena sammoho vañcetīti yujjati.
atk-s0519a:378_4: Attaññutāmukhena attani aparibhavane māno vañcetīti yujjati. Vīmaṃsāmukhena hetupatirūpakapariggahena
atk-s0519a:378_5: micchādiṭṭhi vañcetīti yujjati. Virattatāpatirūpakena sattesu adayāpannatā vañcetīti
atk-s0519a:378_6: yujjati. Anuññātapaṭisevanapatirūpatāya kāmasukhallikānuyogo vañcetīti yujjati. Ājīvapārisuddhipatirūpatāya
atk-s0519a:378_7: asaṃvibhāgasīlatā vañcetīti yujjati. Saṃvibhāgasīlatāpatirūpatāya micchājīvo vañcetīti
atk-s0519a:378_8: yujjati. Asaṃsaggavihāritāpatirūpatāya asaṅgahasīlatā vañcetīti yujjati. Saṅgahasīlatāpatirūpatāya
atk-s0519a:378_9: ananulomikasaṃsaggo vañcetīti yujjati. Saccavāditāpatirūpatāya pisuṇavācā vañcetīti
atk-s0519a:378_10: yujjati. Apisuṇavāditāpatirūpatāya anatthakāmatā vañcetīti yujjati. Piyavāditāpatirūpatāya
atk-s0519a:378_11: cāṭukamyatā vañcetīti yujjati. Mitabhāṇitāpatirūpatāya asammodanasīlatā vañcetīti
atk-s0519a:378_12: yujjati. Sammodanasīlatāpatirūpatāya māyā sāṭheyyañca vañcetīti yujjati. Niggayhavāditāpatirūpatāya
atk-s0519a:378_13: pharusavācatā vañcetīti yujjati. Pāpagarahitāpatirūpatāya paravajjānupassitā vañcetīti
atk-s0519a:378_14: yujjati. Kulānuddhayatāpatirūpatāya kulamacchariyaṃ vañcetīti yujjati. Āvāsaciraṭṭhitikāmatāmukhena
atk-s0519a:378_16: vañcetīti yujjati. Dhammadesanābhiratimukhena bhassārāmatā vañcetīti yujjati. Apharusavācatāgaṇānuggahakaraṇamukhena
atk-s0519a:378_17: saṅgaṇikārāmatā vañcetīti yujjati. Puññakāmatāpatirūpatāya kammārāmatā vañcetīti
atk-s0519a:378_18: yujjati. Saṃvegapatirūpena cittasantāpo vañcetīti yujjati. Saddhālutāpatirūpatāya
atk-s0519a:378_19: aparikkhatā vañcetīti yujjati. Vīmaṃsanāpatirūpena assaddhiyaṃ vañcetīti yujjati.
atk-s0519a:378_20: Attādhipateyyapatirūpena garūnaṃ anusāsaniyā appadakkhiṇaggāhitā vañcetīti yujjati.
atk-s0519a:378_21: Dhammādhipateyyapatirūpena sabrahmacārīsu agāravaṃ vañcetīti yujjati. Lokādhipateyyapatirūpena
atk-s0519a:378_22: attani dhamme ca paribhavo vañcetīti yujjati. Mettāyanāmukhena rāgo vañcetīti yujjati.
atk-s0519a:378_23: Karuṇāyanāpatirūpena soko vañcetīti yujjati. Muditāvihārapatirūpena pahāso vañcetīti
atk-s0519a:378_24: yujjati. Upekkhāvihārapatirūpena kusalesu dhammesu nikkhittachandatā vañcetīti yujjati.
atk-s0519a:378_25: Evaṃ āgamapatirūpakaadhigamapatirūpakādīnampi tathā tathā vañcanasabhāvo yuttito
atk-s0519a:381_0: 22. Tattha katamo padaṭṭhāno hārotiādi padaṭṭhānahāravibhaṅgo. Tattha yasmā “idaṃ
atk-s0519a:381_1: imassa padaṭṭhānaṃ, idaṃ imassa padaṭṭhāna”nti tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānabhūtadhammavibhāvanalakkhaṇo
atk-s0519a:381_2: padaṭṭhāno hāro, tasmā pavattiyā mūlabhūtaṃ avijjaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabhāvadhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:381_4: avijjā”ti. Tassattho – sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvo na sampaṭivijjhīyati etenāti
atk-s0519a:381_5: sabbadhammayāthāvaasampaṭivedho. So lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sā tathā vuttā. Etena dhammasabhāvappaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā
atk-s0519a:381_6: avijjāti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā sammā paṭivedho sampaṭivedho. Tassa paṭipakkho asampaṭivedho.
atk-s0519a:381_7: Kattha pana so sampaṭivedhassa paṭipakkhoti āha – “sabba…pe… lakkhaṇā”ti. Yasmā pana
atk-s0519a:381_8: asubhe subhantiādivipallāse sati tattha sammoho uparūpari jāyatiyeva na hāyati, tasmā
atk-s0519a:382_0: Piyarūpaṃ sātarūpanti piyāyitabbajātiyaṃ iṭṭhajātiyañca padaṭṭhānaṃ. “Yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ
atk-s0519a:382_1: sātarūpaṃ etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Adinnādānanti adinnādānacetanā.
atk-s0519a:382_2: Sā hi ekavāraṃ uppannāpi anādīnavadassitāya lobhassa uppattikāraṇaṃ hotīti tassa
atk-s0519a:382_3: padaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Dosassa pāṇātipāto padaṭṭhānaṃ, mohassa micchāpaṭipadā padaṭṭhānanti
atk-s0519a:382_4: etthāpi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānabyañjanaggahaṇalakkhaṇāti nimittānubyañjanaggahaṇalakkhaṇā.
atk-s0519a:382_5: Sukhasaññāya phassassa upagamanalakkhaṇatā phassapaccayatāva vuttā. “Phuṭṭho sañjānātī”ti
atk-s0519a:382_6: hi vuttaṃ. Assādoti taṇhā. Saṅkhatalakkhaṇāni uppādavayaññathattāni. Yebhuyyena niccaggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:382_7: viññāṇādhīnanti niccasaññāya viññāṇapadaṭṭhānatā vuttā. Tathā hi so bhikkhu taṃyeva
atk-s0519a:382_8: viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsaratīti viññāṇavisayameva attano niccaggāhaṃ pavedesi. Pañcannaṃ
atk-s0519a:382_9: khandhānaṃ yadi aniccatā dukkhatā ca sudiṭṭhā, attasaññā sukhasaññā anavakāsāti āha
atk-s0519a:383_0: Yebhuyyena attābhiniveso arūpadhammesūti āha – “tassā nāmakāyo padaṭṭhāna”nti. Sabbaṃ
atk-s0519a:383_1: neyyanti cattāri saccāni catusaccavinimuttassa ñeyyassa abhāvato. Cittavikkhepapaṭisaṃharaṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:383_2: uddhaccavikkhambhanaṃ. Asubhāti asubhānupassanā, paṭibhāganimittabhūtā asubhā eva
atk-s0519a:383_3: vā, taṇhāpaṭipakkhattā samathassa asubhā padaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ. Abhijjhāya tanukaraṇato
atk-s0519a:383_4: adinnādānāveramaṇī alobhassa padaṭṭhānanti vuttā. Tathā byāpādassa tanukaraṇato pāṇātipātāveramaṇī
atk-s0519a:383_5: adosassa padaṭṭhānanti vuttā. Vatthuavippaṭipatti visayasabhāvapaṭivedho, sammāpaṭipatti
atk-s0519a:383_6: sīlasamādhisampadānaṃ nibbidāñāṇena anabhiratiñāṇameva vā tathā pavattaṃ. Sabbāpi
atk-s0519a:383_7: vedanā dukkhadukkhatādibhāvato dukkhanti katvā vuttaṃ – “dukkhasaññāya vedanā padaṭṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0519a:384_0: Sattānaṃ kāye avītarāgatā pañcannaṃ ajjhattikāyatanānaṃ vasena hotīti āha – “pañcindriyāni
atk-s0519a:384_1: rūpīni rūparāgassa padaṭṭhāna”nti. Kāyo hi idha rūpanti adhippeto. Visesato jhānanissayabhūte
atk-s0519a:384_2: manāyatane ca nikanti hotīti āha – “chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ bhavarāgassa padaṭṭhāna”nti. Edisaṃ
atk-s0519a:384_3: mā rūpaṃ nibbattatu, mā edisī vedanāti evaṃ pavattā rūpādiabhinandanā nibbattabhavānupassitā.
atk-s0519a:384_5: kammassakataññāṇassa kāraṇaṃ hoti, na ayoniso ummujjantassa. Imassa ca atthassa vibhāvanatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:384_7: saddhāpasādānaṃ visesaṃ dasseti. So pana saddhāyayeva avatthāviseso daṭṭhabbo. Tattha
atk-s0519a:384_8: okappanaṃ saddahanavasena ārammaṇassa ogāhaṇaṃ nicchayo. Anāvilatā assaddhiyāpagamena
atk-s0519a:384_9: cittassa akālussiyatā. Abhipatthiyanā saddahanameva. Aveccapasādo paññāsahito āyatanagato
atk-s0519a:384_10: abhippasādo. Apilāpanaṃ asammoso nimujjitvā viya ārammaṇassa ogāhaṇaṃ vā, ettha ca
atk-s0519a:384_12: vadantena avatthāvisesavasena padaṭṭhānabhāvo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Satisamādhīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:384_13: vā kāyādayo satipaṭṭhānāti. Vitakkādayo ca jhānānīti padaṭṭhānabhāvena vuttā.
atk-s0519a:385_0: Assādamanasikāro saṃyojanīyesu dhammesu assādānupassitā. Punabbhavavirohaṇāti punabbhavāya
atk-s0519a:385_3: samūhiyabhāvaṃ. Indriyavavatthānanti cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ indriyānaṃ vavatthitabhāvo.
atk-s0519a:385_4: Opapaccayikanti upapattikkhandhanibbattakaṃ. Upadhīti attabhāvo. Attano piyassa maraṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:385_5: cintentassa bālassa yebhuyyena soko uppajjatīti maraṇaṃ sokassa padaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:385_6: Ussukkaṃ cetaso santāpo. Odahananti avadahanaṃ. Attano nissayassa santapanameva bhavassāti
atk-s0519a:385_7: vuttaṃ bhavaṃ dassetuṃ “imānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha bhavassa aṅgāni bhavasaṅkhātāni
atk-s0519a:385_8: ca aṅgāni bhavaṅgāni. Tesu kilesā bhavassa aṅgāni. Kammavipākavaṭṭaṃ bhavasaṅkhātāni
atk-s0519a:385_9: aṅgāni. Samaggānīti sabbāni. Khandhāyatanādīnaṃ aparāparuppattisaṃsaraṇaṃ saṃsāro.
atk-s0519a:385_10: Tassa purimapurimajātinipphannaṃ kilesādivaṭṭaṃ kāraṇanti āha – “bhavo saṃsārassa
atk-s0519a:385_11: padaṭṭhāna”nti. Sampāpakahetubhāvaṃ sandhāya “maggo nirodhassa padaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:386_0: Kammaṭṭhānogāhakassa otaraṇaṭṭhānatāya bahussuto titthaṃ nāma, tassa sammāpayirupāsanā
atk-s0519a:386_1: titthaññutā. Dhammūpasañhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ pītaṃ nāma, sappāyadhammassavanena taṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0519a:386_2: kammaṭṭhānassa brūhanā pītaññutā, bhāvanāya thokampi layāpattiyā uddhaṃpattiyā ca
atk-s0519a:386_3: jānanā pattaññutā. Attano pañcahi padhāniyaṅgehi samannāgatassa jānanā attaññutā,
atk-s0519a:386_4: tesu purimānaṃ purimānaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa padaṭṭhānabhāvo suviññeyyo eva.
atk-s0519a:386_5: Katapuññasseva patirūpadesavāso sambhavati, na itarassāti “pubbekatapuññatā patirūpadesavāsassa
atk-s0519a:386_6: padaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ. Yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ saha adhiṭṭhānena taruṇavipassanā.
atk-s0519a:386_7: Nibbidāti balavavipassanā. Virāgoti maggo. Vimuttīti phalaṃ. Evanti yadidaṃ “tassā
atk-s0519a:386_8: vipallāsā padaṭṭhāna”ntiādinā avijjādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ, iminā nayena athāpi
atk-s0519a:386_9: yo koci upanissayo balavapaccayoti yo koci avasesapaccayo, sabbo so padaṭṭhānaṃ kāraṇanti
atk-s0519a:386_10: veditabbaṃ. “Evaṃ yā kāci upanisā yogato ca paccayato cā”tipi paṭhanti. Tattha upanisāti
atk-s0519a:386_11: kāraṇaṃ, yogatoti yuttito, paccayatoti paccayabhāvamattatoti attho veditabbo. Yaṃ
atk-s0519a:386_12: panettha atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0519a:389_0: 23. Tattha katamo lakkhaṇo hārotiādi lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅgo. Tattha kiṃ lakkhayatīti
atk-s0519a:389_1: lakkhaṇahārassa visayaṃ pucchati. “Ye dhammā”tiādinā lakkhaṇahāraṃ saṅkhepato dassetvā
atk-s0519a:389_2: taṃ udāharaṇehi vibhajituṃ “cakkhu”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha “vadhakaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇānī”ti
atk-s0519a:389_3: iminā anavaṭṭhitabhāvādināpi ekalakkhaṇatā vuttā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:390_0: Evaṃ āyatanavasena ekalakkhaṇataṃ dassetvā idāni khandhādivasena dassetuṃ “atīte,
atk-s0519a:390_1: rādha, rūpe anapekkho hotī”tiādi suttaṃ ābhataṃ. Yamakovādasutte vadhakaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇā
atk-s0519a:390_2: vuttāti tasmiṃ sutte “vadhakaṃ rūpaṃ vadhakaṃ rūpanti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:390_3: āgatattā vuttaṃ. Itīti evaṃ, imissaṃ gāthāyaṃ kāyagatāya satiyā vuttāya sati vedanāgatā
atk-s0519a:390_4: sati cittagatā sati dhammagatā ca sati vuttā bhavati satipaṭṭhānabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattāti
atk-s0519a:391_0: Kāye kāyānupassī viharāhīti ettha kāyeti rūpakāye. Rūpakāyo hi idha aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ
atk-s0519a:391_1: kesādīnañca samūhaṭṭhena kāyoti adhippeto. Yathā ca samūhaṭṭhena, evaṃ kucchitānaṃ
atk-s0519a:391_2: āyaṭṭhena. Kucchitānañhi paramajegucchānaṃ so āyotipi kāyo, āyoti uppattideso. Tatrāyaṃ
atk-s0519a:391_3: vacanattho – āyanti tatoti āyo. Ke āyanti? Kucchitā kesādayo, iti kucchitānaṃ āyoti kāyo.
atk-s0519a:392_0: Kāyānupassīti kāyaṃ anupassanasīlo, kāyaṃ vā anupassamāno. “Kāye”ti ca vatvā puna
atk-s0519a:392_2: Tena na kāye vedanānupassī cittadhammānupassī vā, atha kho kāyānupassī evāti kāyasaṅkhāte
atk-s0519a:392_3: vatthusmiṃ kāyānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a:392_4: Tathā na kāye aṅgapaccaṅgavinimuttaekadhammānupassī, nāpi kesalomādivinimuttaitthipurisānupassī.
atk-s0519a:393_0: Yopi cettha kesalomādiko bhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhāto kāyo, tatthapi na bhūtupādāyavinimuttaekadhammānupassī,
atk-s0519a:393_1: atha kho rathasambhārānupassako viya aṅgapaccaṅgasamūhānupassī, nagarāvayavānupassako
atk-s0519a:393_3: viya ca bhūtupādāyasamūhānupassī evāti nānappakārato samūhavaseneva kāyasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0519a:393_4: vatthuno dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dassito hoti. Na hettha yathāvuttasamūhavinimutto
atk-s0519a:393_5: kāyo vā añño vā koci dhammo dissati, yathāvuttadhammasamūhamatte eva pana tathā tathā
atk-s0519a:394: “Yaṃ passati na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ na passati;
atk-s0519a:395: Apassaṃ bajjhate mūḷho, bajjhamāno na muccatī”ti. ;
atk-s0519a:396: Ghanavinibbhogādidassanatthanti ādisaddena ayamattho veditabbo. Ayañhi etasmiṃ kāye kāyānupassīyeva, na aññadhammānupassī.
atk-s0519a:397_0: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā anudakabhūtāyapi marīciyā udakānupassino honti, na evaṃ
atk-s0519a:397_1: aniccadukkhānattaasubhabhūte eva imasmiṃ kāye niccasukhaattasubhabhāvānupassī, atha
atk-s0519a:397_2: kho kāyānupassī aniccadukkhaanattaasubhākārasamūhānupassīti attho. Atha vā yvāyaṃ
atk-s0519a:397_4: pathavīkāyaṃ aniccato anupassati, āpokāyaṃ tejokāyaṃ vāyokāyaṃ kesakāyaṃ…pe… aṭṭhimiñjakāya”nti
atk-s0519a:397_5: paṭisambhidāyaṃ kāyo vutto, tassa sabbassa imasmiṃyeva kāye anupassanato kāye kāyānupassīti
atk-s0519a:398_0: Atha vā kāye ahanti vā mamanti vā gahetabbassa kassaci ananupassanato, tassa pana
atk-s0519a:398_2: kāyānupassīti attho daṭṭhabbo. Api ca “imasmiṃ kāye aniccato anupassati no niccato”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:398_3: anukkamena paṭisambhidāyaṃ āgatanayassa sabbasseva aniccalakkhaṇādikassa ākārasamūhasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0519a:399_0: Viharāhīti vattāhi. Ātāpīti tīsu bhavesu kilese ātāpetīti ātāpo, so assa atthīti
atk-s0519a:399_1: ātāpī. Sampajānoti sampajaññasaṅkhātena ñāṇena samannāgato. Satimāti kāyapariggāhikāya
atk-s0519a:399_2: satiyā samannāgato. Ayaṃ pana yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā paññāya anupassati,
atk-s0519a:399_3: na hi sativirahitā anupassanā atthi, tenevāha – “satiñca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ
atk-s0519a:399_4: vadāmī”ti. Anātāpino ca anto saṅkoco antarāyakaro hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sampajjati.
atk-s0519a:399_5: Tasmā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ānubhāvena taṃ sampajjati, taṃ dassanatthaṃ “ātāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:400_0: Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā vinayitvā. Loketi tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0519a:400_1: kāye. Kāyo hi idha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti adhippeto. Abhijjhāggahaṇena cettha
atk-s0519a:400_2: kāmacchando, domanassaggahaṇena byāpādo gahitoti nīvaraṇesu balavadhammadvayappahānadassanena
atk-s0519a:400_4: pana sampayogaṅgaṃ dassitanti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ātāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha abhijjhādomanassānaṃ
atk-s0519a:400_5: samatho ujupaṭipakkhoti abhijjhādomanassavinayo vuccamāno samādhindriyaṃ dīpetīti
atk-s0519a:400_6: āha – “vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti samādhindriya”nti. Ekalakkhaṇattā catunnaṃ
atk-s0519a:400_9: imesaṃ indriyānaṃ sabhāvabhedābhāvato samānalakkhaṇattā itarāni satipaṭṭhānānipi
atk-s0519a:401_0: 24. Idāni satipaṭṭhānesu gahitesu sabbesaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ gahitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:401_1: “catūsu satipaṭṭhānesū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha bodhaṅgamāti bodhaṃ ariyamaggañāṇaṃ gacchantīti
atk-s0519a:401_2: bodhaṅgamā. Yathāvuttassa bodhassa pakkhe bhavāti bodhipakkhiyā. Neyyānikalakkhaṇenāti
atk-s0519a:401_3: ettha nimittato pavattato ca vuṭṭhānaṃ niyyānaṃ, niyyāne niyuttāti neyyānikā, yathā
atk-s0519a:401_4: dovārikoti. Niyyānasaṅkhātaṃ vā phalaṃ arahantīti neyyānikā. Niyyānaṃ payojanaṃ etesanti
atk-s0519a:401_5: vā neyyānikā. “Niyyānikā”tipi pāṭho, tattha niyyānaṃ etesaṃ atthīti niyyānikāti attho.
atk-s0519a:401_6: “Niyyāniyā”tipi pāṭho, tassa niyyantīti niyyāniyāti attho daṭṭhabbo. Niyyānikalakkhaṇenāti niyyānikasabhāvena.
atk-s0519a:402_0: Evaṃ akusalāpi dhammāti yathā kusalā dhammā ekalakkhaṇabhāvena niddhāritā, evaṃ akusalāpi
atk-s0519a:402_1: dhammā ekalakkhaṇaṭṭhena niddhāretabbā. Kathaṃ? Pahānekaṭṭhatāvasenāti dassento “pahānaṃ
atk-s0519a:402_2: abbhatthaṃ gacchantī”ti āha. Idāni taṃ pahānaṃ dassetuṃ “catūsu satipaṭṭhānesū”tiādi
atk-s0519a:402_3: vuttaṃ. Tattha kāyānupassanādīsu catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu asubhe subhantiādayo
atk-s0519a:402_4: cattāro vipallāsā pahīyanti, kabaḷīkārāhārādayo cattāro āhārā cassa pariññaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0519a:402_5: tesaṃ parijānanassa paribandhino kāmarāgādayo byantīkatā hontīti attho, kasmā? Tehi
atk-s0519a:402_6: pahātabbabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattāti. Evaṃ sabbattha attho yojetabbo. Tenevāha – “evaṃ
atk-s0519a:402_7: akusalāpi dhammā ekalakkhaṇattā pahānaṃ abbhatthaṃ gacchantī”ti.
atk-s0519a:403_0: Idāni aññenapi pariyāyena lakkhaṇahārassa udāharaṇāni dassetuṃ “yattha vā panā”tiādi
atk-s0519a:403_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha yatthāti yassaṃ desanāyaṃ. Vā-saddo vikappattho. Panāti padapūraṇo.
atk-s0519a:403_2: Rūpindriyanti ruppanasabhāvaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ indriyaṃ. Tatthāti tassaṃ desanāyaṃ. Rūpadhātūti
atk-s0519a:403_3: ruppanasabhāvā dasa dhātuyo. Rūpāyatananti ruppanasabhāvaṃ dasāyatanaṃ, rūpīni dasāyatanānīti
atk-s0519a:403_4: attho. Ruppanalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā imāni desitānīti adhippāyo. Desitaṃ tattha
atk-s0519a:404_0: Dukkhasamudayo ca ariyasaccanti idaṃ akusalassa somanassassa vasena vuttaṃ, sāsavakusalassāpi
atk-s0519a:404_1: vasena yujjati eva. Sabbo ca paṭiccasamuppādo desitoti sambandho. Avijjānusayitattā
atk-s0519a:404_3: anusetī”ti. Tathā ca vuttaṃ “adukkhamasukhāya hi vedanāya avijjā anusetī”ti. Etena
atk-s0519a:404_4: adukkhamasukhāvedanāggahaṇena avijjā gahitāti dasseti. Sati ca avijjāggahaṇe sabbo
atk-s0519a:404_5: paṭiccasamuppādo desitoti dassetuṃ “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādi vuttaṃ. So cāti
atk-s0519a:404_6: ettha ca-saddo byatirekattho, tena so paṭiccasamuppādo anulomapaṭilomavasena duvidhoti
atk-s0519a:404_7: imaṃ vakkhamānavisesaṃ joteti. Tesu anulomato paṭiccasamuppādo yathādassito sarāgasadosasamohasaṃkilesapakkhena
atk-s0519a:404_8: hātabboti vutto, paṭilomato pana paṭiccasamuppādo yo “avijjāyatveva asesavirāganirodhā”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:404_9: pāḷiyaṃ vutto, taṃ sandhāya “vītarāgavītadosavītamohaariyadhammehi hātabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:405_0: Idāni ekalakkhaṇatāvibhāvanena lakkhaṇahārayojanāya nayaṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ ye dhammā”tiādi
atk-s0519a:405_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha kiccatoti pathavīādīnaṃ phassādīnañca rūpārūpadhammānaṃ sandhāraṇasaṅghaṭṭanādikiccato,
atk-s0519a:405_2: tesaṃ tesaṃ vā paccayadhammānaṃ taṃtaṃpaccayuppannadhammassa paccayabhāvasaṅkhātakiccato.
atk-s0519a:405_4: khandhāyatanādito ca. Cutūpapātatoti saṅkhatadhammānaṃ bhaṅgato uppādato ca, samānanirodhato
atk-s0519a:405_5: samānuppādato cāti attho. Ettha ca sahacaraṇaṃ samānahetutā samānaphalatā samānabhūmitā
atk-s0519a:405_6: samānavisayatā samānārammaṇatāti evamādayopi ca-saddena saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0519a:408_0: 25. Tattha katamo catubyūho hāroti catubyūhahāravibhaṅgo. Tattha byañjanena suttassa
atk-s0519a:408_1: neruttañca adhippāyo ca nidānañca pubbāparasandhi ca gavesitabboti saṅkhepena tāva
atk-s0519a:408_2: catubyūhaṃ dasseti. “Byañjanenā”ti iminā hārānaṃ suttassa byañjanavicayabhāvato byañjanamukheneva
atk-s0519a:408_3: ete catubyūhahārapadatthā niddhāretabbāti dasseti. Neruttanti niruttaṃ nibbacananti
atk-s0519a:408_4: attho. Niruttameva neruttaṃ. Tenevāha – “yā niruttipadasaṃhitā”ti. Tassattho – yā
atk-s0519a:408_5: nirutti, idaṃ neruttaṃ. Kā pana sā nirutti? Padasaṃhitāti padesu saṃhitā yuttā, liṅgavacanakālasādhanapurisādivisesayogena
atk-s0519a:408_6: yo yo attho yathā yathā vattabbo, tathā tathā pavattasabhāvaniruttīti attho. Tathā
atk-s0519a:409_0: Tattha yanti hetuatthe nipāto, yāya kāraṇabhūtāyāti attho. Dhammānanti ñeyyadhammānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:409_1: Nāmasoti pathavī phasso khandhā dhātu tisso phussoti evamādināmavisesena ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0519a:409_2: ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti nāma. Pathavīti hi evamādikaṃ saddaṃ gahetvā tato paraṃ saṅketadvārena
atk-s0519a:409_3: tadatthapaṭipatti taṃtaṃaniyatanāmapaññattiggahaṇavaseneva hotīti. Atha vā padasaṃhitāti
atk-s0519a:409_4: padena saṃhitā. Padato hi padatthāvabodho. So panassa atthe pavattinimittabhūtāya
atk-s0519a:409_5: paññattiyā gahitāya eva hotīti sā pana paññatti niruttisaṅkhātapadena saṃhitā padatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:409_6: bodhetīti padasaṃhitāti vuttā. “Yadā hi bhikkhū”tiādinā “dhammānaṃ nāmaso ñāṇa”nti
atk-s0519a:410_0: Tattha atthassāti saddābhidheyyassa atthassa. Nāmaṃ jānātīti nāmapaññattivasena ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:410_1: nāmāti nāmaṃ jānāti. Dhammassāti sabhāvadhammassa. Tathā tathā naṃ abhiniropetīti
atk-s0519a:410_2: yo yo attho dhammo ca yathā yathā ca voharitabbo, tathā tathā naṃ nāmaṃ vohāraṃ abhiniropeti
atk-s0519a:410_3: desetīti attho. Ettāvatā ca ayaṃ bhikkhu atthakusalo yāva anekādhivacanakusaloti
atk-s0519a:411_0: Tattha atthakusaloti pāḷiatthe kusalo. Dhammakusaloti pāḷiyaṃ kusalo. Byañjanakusaloti
atk-s0519a:411_1: akkharesu ca vākyesu ca kusalo. Niruttikusaloti nibbacane kusalo. Pubbāparakusaloti
atk-s0519a:411_2: desanāya pubbāparakusalo. Desanākusaloti dhammassa desanāya kusalo. Atītādhivacanakusaloti
atk-s0519a:411_3: atītapaññattikusalo. Esa nayo sesesupi. Evaṃ sabbāni kātabbāni, janapadaniruttānīti
atk-s0519a:411_4: yattakāni sattavohārapadāni, tāni sabbāni yathāsambhavaṃ sutte nibbacanavasena kātabbāni
atk-s0519a:411_5: vattabbānīti attho. Sabbā ca janapadaniruttiyoti sabbā ca lokasamaññāyo yathārahaṃ
atk-s0519a:411_6: kātabbā. “Samaññaṃ nātidhāveyyā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Tathā hi sammutisaccamukheneva paramatthasaccādhigamo hotīti.
atk-s0519a:413: 27. Nidānakaṇḍe iminā vatthunāti iminā puttagavādikittanasaṅkhātena kāraṇena. Kāraṇañhettha vatthu nidānanti ca vuttaṃ. Iminā nayena sabbattha nidānaniddhāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:414_0: Kāmandhāti kilesakāmena andhā. Jālasañchannāti taṇhājālapaliguṇṭhitā. Taṇhāchadanachāditāti
atk-s0519a:414_1: taṇhāsaṅkhātena andhakārena pihitā. Bandhanābaddhāti kāmaguṇasaṅkhātena bandhanena
atk-s0519a:414_2: baddhā. “Pamattabandhanā”tipi pāṭho, pamādenāti attho. Pubbāparenāti pubbena vā aparena
atk-s0519a:414_3: vā desanantarenāti adhippāyo. Yujjatīti yogaṃ upeti, sametīti attho. Imehi padehi
atk-s0519a:414_4: pariyuṭṭhānehīti imehi yathāvuttehi gāthāpadehi taṇhāpariyuṭṭhānadīpakehi. Sāyeva
atk-s0519a:414_5: taṇhāti yā purimagāthāya vuttā, sāyeva taṇhā. “Yañcāhā”tiādinā dvinnampi gāthānaṃ
atk-s0519a:414_6: atthasaṃsandanena pubbāparaṃ vibhāveti. Payogenāti samudācārena. Tasmāti yattha sayaṃ
atk-s0519a:414_7: uppannā, taṃ santānaṃ nissarituṃ adentī nānārammaṇehi palobhayamānā kilesehi cittaṃ
atk-s0519a:414_8: pariyādāya tiṭṭhati. Tasmā kilesavasena ca pariyuṭṭhānavasena ca taṇhābandhanaṃ vuttā.
atk-s0519a:415_0: Papañcenti saṃsāre ciraṃ ṭhapentīti papañcā. Tiṭṭhanti etāhīti ṭhitī. Bandhanaṭṭhena
atk-s0519a:415_1: sandānaṃ viyāti sandānaṃ. Nibbānanagarappavesassa paṭisedhanato palighaṃ viyāti palighaṃ.
atk-s0519a:415_3: munīti evaṃ gāthāya padattho veditabbo. Papañcādiatthā pana pāḷiyaṃ vibhattā evāti.
atk-s0519a:415_4: Tattha yassete papañcādayo abbhatthaṃ gatā, tassa taṇhāya lesopi na bhavati. Tena
atk-s0519a:415_5: vuttaṃ – “yo etaṃ sabbaṃ samatikkanto, ayaṃ vuccati nittaṇho”ti.
atk-s0519a:416_1: “tadabhisaṅkhatā saṅkhārā”ti vuttā taṇhādiṭṭhimānahetukā saṅkhārā. Te pana yasmā
atk-s0519a:416_2: sattasu javanacetanāsu paṭhamacetanā sati paccayasamavāye imasmiṃyeva attabhāve phalaṃ
atk-s0519a:416_3: deti. Pacchimacetanā anantare attabhāve. Ubhinnaṃ vemajjhacetanā yattha katthaci
atk-s0519a:416_4: phalaṃ deti, tasmā vipaccanokāsavasena vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā
atk-s0519a:416_5: vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana taṃtaṃcetanāsampayuttā taṇhāpi cetanā viya diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādivasena
atk-s0519a:416_6: tidhā hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ – “evaṃ taṇhā tividhaṃ phalaṃ detī”ti. Pubbāparena yujjatīti
atk-s0519a:416_7: yaṃ pubbaṃ purimaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyatādivacanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ iminā
atk-s0519a:416_8: aparena kammassa diṭṭhadhammavedanīyatādivacanena yujjati gaṅgodakaṃ viya yamunodakena
atk-s0519a:417_0: Saṅkhārā dassanabalenāti catūsu diṭṭhigatasampayuttesu vicikicchāsampayutte cāti
atk-s0519a:417_1: pañcasu cittuppādesu saṅkhārā paṭhamamaggapaññābalena. Chattiṃsa taṇhāvicaritāni
atk-s0519a:417_2: bhāvanābalenāti paṭhamamaggena pahīnāvasesavasena vuttaṃ, na sabbesaṃ vasena.
atk-s0519a:418_0: Anubandhoti taṇhādīnaṃ anuppabandhena pavatti. Yo cāpi papañcotiādinā “papañcetī”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:418_1: vuttaṃ rādhasuttañcasaṃsandati. Tenevāha – “idaṃ ekattha”nti. Yadipi atthato ekaṃ,
atk-s0519a:418_2: desanāya pana viseso vijjatīti dassetuṃ “api cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evanti iminā vuttappakārena.
atk-s0519a:418_3: Suttenāti saṃvaṇṇiyamānena suttena. Suttanti suttantaraṃ. Saṃsandayitvāti vimissitvā
atk-s0519a:418_4: atthato abhinnaṃ katvā. Pubbāparena saddhiṃ yojayitvāti pubbena vā aparena vā suttena
atk-s0519a:418_5: saddhiṃ atthato sambandhaṃ yojetvā. Vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti tena suttassa attho
atk-s0519a:419_0: Na kevalaṃ suttantarasaṃsandanameva pubbāparasandhi, atha kho aññopi atthīti dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:419_1: “so cāya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha atthasandhīti kiriyākārakādivasena atthassa sambandho.
atk-s0519a:419_2: So pana yasmā saṅkāsanādīnaṃ channaṃ atthapadānaṃyeva hoti, sabbassāpi padatthassa tadavarodhato.
atk-s0519a:420_0: Sambandho ca nāma na koci attho. Tasmā “atthasandhi chappadānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Byañjanasandhīti
atk-s0519a:420_1: padassa padantarena sambandho. Yasmā pana sabbampi nāmādipadaṃ chahi byañjanapadehi
atk-s0519a:420_2: asaṅgahitaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā “byañjanasandhi chappadānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:421_0: Desanāsandhīti yathāvuttadesanantarena desanāya saṃsandanaṃ. Na ca pathaviṃ nissāyāti
atk-s0519a:421_1: pathaviṃ visayasaṅkhātaṃ nissayaṃ katvā, pathaviṃ ālambitvāti attho. Jhāyīti phalasamāpattijhānena
atk-s0519a:421_2: jhāyī. So hi sabbasaṅkhāranissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ ālambitvā samāpajjanavasena jhāyati,
atk-s0519a:421_3: na pathaviṃ nissāya jhāyatīti vutto. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Ettha ca catūhi mahābhūtehi
atk-s0519a:421_4: rūpappaṭibaddhavuttitāya sabbo kāmabhavo rūpabhavo ca gahitā. Arūpabhavo pana sarūpeneva
atk-s0519a:421_5: gahitoti sabbaṃ lokaṃ pariyādiyitvā puna aññenapi pariyāyena taṃ dassetuṃ “na ca
atk-s0519a:421_6: imaṃ loka”ntiādimāha. Sabbo hi loko idhaloko paraloko cāti dveva koṭṭhāsā honti.
atk-s0519a:421_7: Yasmā pana “idhaloko”ti visesato diṭṭhadhammabhūto sattasantāno vuccati. “Paraloko”ti
atk-s0519a:422_0: Ye pana “ubhayamantarenā”ti vacanaṃ gahetvā antarābhavaṃ icchanti, tesaṃ taṃ micchā.
atk-s0519a:422_1: Antarābhavo hi abhidhamme paṭikkhittoti. Diṭṭhanti rūpāyatanaṃ. Sutanti saddāyatanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:422_2: Mutanti patvā gahetabbato gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca. Viññātanti
atk-s0519a:422_3: avasiṭṭhaṃ dhammārammaṇapariyāpannarūpaṃ. Pattanti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā
atk-s0519a:422_4: pattaṃ. Pariyesitanti pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ. Vitakkitaṃ vicāritanti vitakkanavasena
atk-s0519a:422_5: anumajjanavasena ca ālambitaṃ. Manasānucintitanti cittena anu anu cintitaṃ. Ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:422_6: sadevake…pe… anissitena cittena na ñāyati jhāyantoti ayaṃ khīṇāsavo phalasamāpattijhānena
atk-s0519a:422_7: jhāyanto pubbeva taṇhādiṭṭhinissayānaṃ suṭṭhu pahīnattā sadevake loke…pe… manussāya
atk-s0519a:422_8: yattha katthacipi anissitena cittena jhāyati nāma. Tato eva loke kenacipi na ñāyati
atk-s0519a:424: Yassa te nābhijānāma, kiṃ tvaṃ nissāya jhāyasī”ti. ;
atk-s0519a:425_0: Idāni khīṇāsavacittassa katthacipi anissitabhāvaṃ godhikasuttena vakkalisuttena ca
atk-s0519a:425_1: vibhāvetuṃ “yathā māro”tiādi vuttaṃ. Viññāṇaṃ samanvesantoti parinibbānato uddhaṃ
atk-s0519a:425_3: na ñāyanti jhāyamānāti na kevalaṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā khīṇāsavassa cittagatiṃ
atk-s0519a:425_4: mārādayo na jānanti, api ca kho saupādisesāyapi nibbānadhātuyā tassa taṃ na jānantīti
atk-s0519a:425_5: attho. Ayaṃ desanāsandhīti godhikasuttavakkalisuttānaṃ viya suttantānaṃ aññamaññaatthasaṃsandanā desanāsandhi nāma.
atk-s0519a:426_0: Niddesasandhīti niddesassa sandhi niddesasandhi, niddesena vā sandhi niddesasandhi.
atk-s0519a:426_1: Purimena suttassa niddesena tasseva pacchimassa niddesassa, pacchimena vā purimassa
atk-s0519a:426_2: sambandhananti attho. Taṃ dassetuṃ yasmā bhagavā yebhuyyena paṭhamaṃ vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0519a:426_3: pacchā vivaṭṭaṃ dasseti, tasmā “nissitacittā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha nissitaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0519a:426_4: etesanti nissitacittā, puggalā, niddisitabbā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a:426_5: Dhammādhiṭṭhānāya pana nissitaṃ cittaṃ etthāti nissitacittā, nissitacittavanto taṇhādiṭṭhinissayavasena
atk-s0519a:429_0: 29. Tattha katamo āvaṭṭo hāroti āvaṭṭahāravibhaṅgo. Tattha ārambhathāti ārambhadhātusaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a:429_1: vīriyaṃ karotha. Nikkamathāti kosajjapakkhato nikkhantattā nikkamadhātusaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a:429_2: taduttarivīriyaṃ karotha. Yuñjatha buddhasāsaneti yasmā sīlasaṃvaro indriyesu guttadvāratā
atk-s0519a:429_3: bhojane mattaññutā satisampajaññanti imesu dhammesu patiṭṭhitānaṃ jāgariyānuyogavasena
atk-s0519a:429_5: sāsane yuttappayuttā hotha. Dhunātha maccuno senaṃ, naḷāgāraṃva kuñjaroti evaṃ paṭipajjantā
atk-s0519a:429_6: ca tedhātuissarassa maccurājassa vasaṃ satte netīti tassa senāsaṅkhātaṃ abalaṃ dubbalaṃ
atk-s0519a:429_7: yathā nāma balūpapanno kuñjaro naḷehi kataṃ agāraṃ khaṇeneva viddhaṃseti, evameva
atk-s0519a:430_0: Idāni yadatthaṃ ayaṃ gāthā nikkhittā, taṃ yojetvā dassetuṃ “ārambhatha nikkamathāti
atk-s0519a:430_1: vīriyassa padaṭṭhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ārambhatha nikkamathāti idaṃ vacanaṃ vīriyassa
atk-s0519a:430_2: padaṭṭhānaṃ vīriyapayogassa kāraṇaṃ vīriyārambhe niyojanato, “yogā ve jāyatī bhūrī”ti
atk-s0519a:430_3: vacanato yogo bhāvanā. Tattha vipassanābhāvanāya vakkhamānattā samādhibhāvanā idhādhippetāti
atk-s0519a:430_4: vuttaṃ – “yuñjatha buddhasāsaneti samādhissa padaṭṭhāna”nti. “Maccuno sena”nti vuttāya
atk-s0519a:430_5: kilesasenāya sammā dhunanaṃ ñāṇeneva hotīti āha – “dhunātha…pe… padaṭṭhāna”nti. Puna
atk-s0519a:430_7: vaṭṭamūlaṃ chinditvā vivaṭṭaṃ pāpenti cāti dassanatthaṃ “ārambhatha nikkamathāti
atk-s0519a:430_8: vīriyindriyassa padaṭṭhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Imāni padaṭṭhānāni desanāti “yānimāni vīriyassa
atk-s0519a:430_9: padaṭṭhāna”ntiādinā vīriyādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānāni vuttāni, sā ārambhatha nikkamathāti
atk-s0519a:430_10: ādidesanā, na vīriyārambhavatthuādīnīti attho. Tathā ceva saṃvaṇṇitaṃ.
atk-s0519a:431_0: Evaṃ yathānikkhittāya desanāya padaṭṭhānavasena atthaṃ niddhāretvā idāni taṃ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammavasena
atk-s0519a:431_1: āvaṭṭetukāmo tassa bhūmiṃ dassetuṃ “ayuñjantānaṃ vā sattānaṃ yoge yuñjantānaṃ vā
atk-s0519a:431_2: ārambho”tiādimāha. Tassattho – yoge bhāvanāyaṃ taṃ ayuñjantānaṃ vā sattānaṃ aparipakkañāṇānaṃ
atk-s0519a:431_3: vāsanābhāgena āyatiṃ vijānanatthaṃ ayaṃ desanārambho yuñjantānaṃ vā paripakkañāṇānanti.
atk-s0519a:432_0: So pamādo duvidhoti yena pamādena bhāvanaṃ nānuyuñjanti, so pamādo attano kāraṇabhedena
atk-s0519a:432_2: sammohena. Nivutoti chādito. Ñeyyaṭṭhānanti ñeyyañca taṃ “iti rūpaṃ, iti rūpassa
atk-s0519a:432_3: samudayo”tiādinā ñāṇassa pavattanaṭṭhānañcāti ñeyyaṭṭhānaṃ. Anekabhedattā pāpadhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:432_4: tabbasena anekabhedopi pamādo mūlabhūtāya avijjāya vasena eko evāti āha – “ekavidho
atk-s0519a:432_6: Chandarāgajjhosānā taṇhā evāti taṇhāmūlakepi dhamme ettheva pakkhipitvā “tividho taṇhāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:433_0: Rūpīsu bhavesūti rūpadhammesu. Ajjhosānanti taṇhābhiniveso. Etena “taṇhāya rūpakāyo
atk-s0519a:433_1: padaṭṭhāna”nti padassa atthaṃ vivarati. Anādimati hi saṃsāre itthipurisā aññamaññarūpābhirāmā,
atk-s0519a:433_2: ayañcattho cittapariyādānasuttena dīpetabbo. Arūpīsu sammohoti phassādīnaṃ atisukhumasabhāvattā
atk-s0519a:433_4: sattānaṃ patiṭṭhitoti vacanaseso. Evaṃ niddhārite rūpakāyanāmakāyasaṅkhāte upādānakkhandhapañcake
atk-s0519a:433_5: ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattaṃ taṇhañca avijjañca avisesena vuttaṃ catupādānānaṃ vasena
atk-s0519a:433_6: vibhajitvā tesaṃ khandhānaṃ upādānānañca dukkhasamudayabhāvena sahapariññeyyapahātabbabhāvaṃ
atk-s0519a:434_0: 30. Evaṃ pamādamukhena purimasaccadvayaṃ niddhāretvā pamādamukheneva aparampi saccadvayaṃ
atk-s0519a:434_1: niddhāretuṃ “tattha yo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tassāti tassa pamādassa. Sampaṭivedhenāti
atk-s0519a:434_2: sammā parijānanena assādādīnaṃ jānanena. Rakkhaṇā paṭisaṃharaṇāti attano cittassa
atk-s0519a:434_3: rakkhaṇasaṅkhātā pamādassa paṭisaṃharaṇā, tappaṭipakkhena saṅkocanā appamādānuyogena
atk-s0519a:434_4: yā khepanā. Ayaṃ samathoti kiccena samādhiṃ dasseti. Ayaṃ vodānapakkhavisabhāgadhammavasena
atk-s0519a:434_5: āvaṭṭanā. “Yadā jānāti kāmānaṃ…pe… ānisaṃsa”nti iminā samathādhigamassa upāyaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a:435_0: Tattha kāmānanti vatthukāmānañca kilesakāmānañca. Assādañca assādatoti kāme paṭicca
atk-s0519a:435_1: uppajjamānaṃ sukhasomanassasaṅkhātaṃ assādaṃ assādatāya assādamattato. Ādīnavanti
atk-s0519a:435_2: “appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā”tiādinā vuttaṃ ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ. Nissaraṇanti paṭhamajjhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:435_3: Vuttañhetaṃ – “kāmānametaṃ nissaraṇaṃ yadidaṃ nekkhamma”nti. Okāranti lāmakabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0519a:435_4: Saṃkilesanti saṃkilissanaṃ. Kāmahetu hi sattā saṃkilissanti. Vodānanti visujjhanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:435_5: Nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsanti nīvaraṇappahānādiguṇavisesayogaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ yathāvutte
atk-s0519a:435_6: samathe sati. Yā vīmaṃsāti yā paññā. “Samāhito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti
atk-s0519a:435_7: hi vuttaṃ. Yathā taṇhāsahitāva avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo, evaṃ avijjāsahitāva taṇhā
atk-s0519a:435_8: upādānānaṃ paccayo. Tāsu niruddhāsu upādānādīnaṃ abhāvo evāti taṇhāavijjāpahānena
atk-s0519a:435_9: sakalavaṭṭadukkhanirodhaṃ dassento “imesu dvīsu dhammesu pahīnesū”tiādimāha. Imāni
atk-s0519a:436_0: Evaṃ vodānapakkhaṃ nikkhipitvā tassa visabhāgadhammavasena sabhāgadhammavasena ca
atk-s0519a:436_1: āvaṭṭanaṃ dassetvā idāni saṃkilesapakkhaṃ nikkhipitvā tassa visabhāgadhammavasena
atk-s0519a:436_2: sabhāgadhammavasena ca āvaṭṭanaṃ dassetuṃ “yathāpi mūle”ti gāthamāha. Tassattho –
atk-s0519a:436_3: yathā nāma patiṭṭhāhetubhāvena mūlanti laddhavohāre bhūmigate rukkhassa avayave pharasuchedādiantarāyābhāvena
atk-s0519a:436_4: anupaddave tato eva daḷhe thire sati khandhe chinnepi assatthādirukkho ruhati, evameva
atk-s0519a:436_5: taṇhānusayasaṅkhāte attabhāvarukkhassa mūle maggañāṇapharasunā anupacchinne tayidaṃ
atk-s0519a:436_6: dukkhaṃ punappunaṃ aparāparabhāvena nibbattati na nirujjhatīti. Kāmataṇhādinivattanatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:436_7: “bhavataṇhāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Etassa dhammassa paccayoti etassa bhavataṇhāsaṅkhātassa
atk-s0519a:436_8: dhammassa bhavesu ādīnavappaṭicchādanādivasena assādaggahaṇassa paccayo. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0519a:436_9: – “saṃyojanīyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti. Tenevāha
atk-s0519a:436_10: – “avijjāpaccayā hi bhavataṇhā”ti. Idha samatho vipassanā ca maggasamādhi maggapaññā
atk-s0519a:436_11: ca adhippetāti āha – “yena taṇhānusayaṃ samūhanatī”tiādi. Imāni cattāri saccānīti
atk-s0519a:437_0: Idāni na kevalaṃ niddhāriteheva visabhāgasabhāgadhammehi āvaṭṭanaṃ, atha kho pāḷiāgatehipi
atk-s0519a:437_1: tehi āvaṭṭanaṃ āvaṭṭahāroti dassanatthaṃ “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”nti gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0519a:437_2: sabbapāpassāti sabbākusalassa. Akaraṇanti anuppādanaṃ. Kusalassāti catubhūmakakusalassa.
atk-s0519a:437_3: Upasampadāti paṭilābho. Sacittapariyodāpananti attano cittavodānaṃ, taṃ pana arahattena
atk-s0519a:437_4: hoti. Iti sīlasaṃvarena sabbapāpaṃ pahāya samathavipassanāhi kusalaṃ sampādetvā arahattaphalena
atk-s0519a:437_5: cittaṃ pariyodapetabbanti etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhīti ayaṃ saṅkhepattho,
atk-s0519a:437_6: vitthārato pana attho pāḷito eva viññāyati.
atk-s0519a:438_0: Tattha “sabbapāpaṃ nāmā”tiādīsu dosasamuṭṭhānanti doso samuṭṭhānameva etassāti dosasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a:438_1: na doso eva samuṭṭhānanti. Lobhasamuṭṭhānāyapi pisuṇavācāya sambhavato. Kāyaduccaritanti
atk-s0519a:438_3: etthāpi eseva nayo. Samphappalāpo uddhaccacittena pavattayatīti adhippāyena tassa
atk-s0519a:439_2: Tattha akusalamūlaṃ payogaṃ gacchantanti lobhādiakusalāni kāyavacīpayogaṃ gacchantāni,
atk-s0519a:439_3: kāyavacīpayogaṃ samuṭṭhāpentānīti attho. Chandāti chandahetu. Yaṃ chandā agatiṃ gacchati,
atk-s0519a:439_4: idaṃ lobhasamuṭṭhānanti chandā agatiṃ gacchatīti yadetaṃ agatigamanaṃ, idaṃ lobhasamuṭṭhānanti.
atk-s0519a:439_5: Evaṃ sesesupi attho daṭṭhabbo. Ettāvatā “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”nti ettha pāpaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0519a:439_6: idāni tassa akaraṇaṃ dassento “lobho…pe… paññāyā”ti tīhi kusalamūlehi tiṇṇaṃ akusalamūlānaṃ
atk-s0519a:439_7: pahānavasena sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ anuppādanamāha. Tathā lobho upekkhāyātiādinā brahmavihārehi.
atk-s0519a:439_8: Tattha aratiṃ vūpasamentī muditā tassā mūlabhūtaṃ mohaṃ pajahatīti katvā vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a:440_0: 31. Idāni aññenapi pariyāyena pāpaṃ tassa akaraṇañca dassetvā sesapadānañca atthavibhāvanamukhena
atk-s0519a:440_2: vuttaṃ. Akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhācāroti tīhipi padehi micchattānaṃ anuppādanameva
atk-s0519a:440_3: vadati. Tathā kiriyā karaṇaṃ ajjhācāroti tīhipi padehi uppādanameva vadati. Ajjhācāroti
atk-s0519a:440_4: adhiṭṭhahitvā ācaraṇaṃ. Atītassāti cirakālappavattivasena purāṇassa. Maggassāti ariyamaggassa.
atk-s0519a:440_5: Vuttañhetaṃ – “purāṇamaggaṃ purāṇaṃ añjasanti kho ariyassetaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa
atk-s0519a:440_6: adhivacana”nti. Atītena vā vipassinā bhagavatā yathādhigataṃ desitabhāvaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0519a:440_7: “atītassa maggassā”ti vuttaṃ. Vipassino hi ayaṃ bhagavato sammāsambuddhassa pātimokkhuddesagāthāti.
atk-s0519a:441_0: Yaṃ paṭivedhenāti yassa pariññābhisamayena. Yaṃ pariyodāpitaṃ, ayaṃ nirodhoti yadipi
atk-s0519a:441_1: asaṅkhatā dhātu kenaci saṃkilesena na saṃkilissati, adhigacchantassa pana puggalassa
atk-s0519a:441_2: vasena evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tassa hi yāva saṃkilesā na vigacchanti, tāva asaṅkhatā dhātu
atk-s0519a:441_3: apariyodapitāti vuccati. Yathā nibbānādhigamena ye khandhā vūpasametabbā, tesaṃ sesabhāvena
atk-s0519a:441_4: asesabhāvena ca “saupādisesā”ti ca, “anupādisesā”ti ca vuccati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:442_1: saccāni punapi pāḷiāgatadhammānaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammāvaṭṭanena āvaṭṭahāraṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:442_2: “dhammo have rakkhatī”ti gāthamāha. Tassā padattho pubbe vutto eva. Dhammoti puññadhammo
atk-s0519a:442_3: idhādhippeto. Taṃ vibhajitvā dassento “dhammo nāma duvidho indriyasaṃvaro maggo cā”ti
atk-s0519a:442_4: āha. Indriyasaṃvarasīsena cettha sabbampi sīlaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sabbā upapattiyo
atk-s0519a:442_5: duggati dukkhadukkhatādiyogena dukkhā gatiyoti katvā. Yathāvutte duvidhe dhamme paṭhamo
atk-s0519a:442_6: dhammo yathā suciṇṇo hoti, yato ca so rakkhati, yattha ca patiṭṭhāpeti, taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0519a:442_7: dassetuṃ “tattha yā saṃvarasīle akhaṇḍakāritā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idāni tassa dhammassa
atk-s0519a:442_8: apāyato rakkhaṇe ekantikabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ gāmaṇisaṃyutte asibandhakaputtasuttaṃ ābhataṃ.
atk-s0519a:443_0: Tattha evanti pakārena. Ca-saddo sampiṇḍane, imināpi pakārena ayamattho veditabboti
atk-s0519a:443_1: adhippāyo. Asibandhakaputtoti asibandhakassa nāma putto. Gāme jeṭṭhakatāya gāmaṇī.
atk-s0519a:443_2: Pacchābhūmakāti pacchābhūmivāsino. Kāmaṇḍalukāti sakamaṇḍaluno. Sevālamālikāti pātova
atk-s0519a:443_3: udakato sevālañceva uppalādīni ca gahetvā udakasuddhibhāvajānanatthaṃ mālaṃ katvā
atk-s0519a:443_4: piḷandhanakā. Udakorohakāti sāyaṃ pātaṃ udakaṃ orohaṇakā. Uyyāpentīti upariyāpenti.
atk-s0519a:443_5: Saññāpentīti sammā yāpenti. Saggaṃ nāma okkāmentīti parivāretvā ṭhitāva “gaccha,
atk-s0519a:443_6: bho, brahmalokaṃ, gaccha, bho, brahmaloka”nti vadantā saggaṃ pavesenti.
atk-s0519a:444_0: Anuparisakkeyyāti anuparigaccheyya. Ummujjāti uṭṭhaha. Uplavāti jalassa upariplava.
atk-s0519a:444_1: Thalamuplavāti thalaṃ abhiruha. Tatra yāssāti tatra yaṃ assa, yaṃ bhaveyya. Sakkharakaṭhalanti
atk-s0519a:444_2: sakkharā vā kaṭhalā vā. Sā adhogāmī assāti sā adho gaccheyya, heṭṭhāgāmī bhaveyya.
atk-s0519a:444_3: Adho gaccheyyāti heṭṭhā gaccheyya. Maggassāti ariyamaggassa. Tikkhatāti tikhiṇatā.
atk-s0519a:444_4: Sā ca kho na satthakassa viya nisitakaraṇatā, atha kho indriyānaṃ paṭubhāvoti dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:444_5: “adhimattatā”ti āha. Nanu ca ariyamaggo attanā pahātabbakilese anavasesaṃ samucchindatīti
atk-s0519a:444_6: atikhiṇo nāma natthīti? Saccametaṃ, tathāpi no ca kho “yathā diṭṭhippattassā”ti vacanato
atk-s0519a:444_7: saddhāvimuttadiṭṭhippattānaṃ kilesappahānaṃ pati atthi kāci visesamattāti sakkā vattuṃ.
atk-s0519a:444_8: Ayaṃ pana viseso na idhādhippeto, sabbupapattisamatikkamanassa adhippetattā. Yasmā
atk-s0519a:444_9: pana ariyamaggena odhiso kilesā pahīyanti, tañca nesaṃ tathāpahānaṃ maggadhammesu
atk-s0519a:444_10: indriyānaṃ apāṭavapāṭavatarapāṭavatamabhāvena hotīti yo vajirūpamadhammesu matthakappattānaṃ
atk-s0519a:444_11: aggamaggadhammānaṃ paṭutamabhāvo. Ayaṃ idha maggassa tikkhatāti adhippetā. Tenevāha
atk-s0519a:444_12: – “ayaṃ dhammo suciṇṇo sabbāhi upapattīhi rakkhatī”ti. “Tasmā rakkhitacittassā”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:445_0: 32. Idāni yathāvuttassa dhammassa visabhāgadhammānaṃ taṇhāvijjādīnaṃ sabhāgadhammānañca
atk-s0519a:445_1: samathavipassanādīnaṃ niddhāraṇavasena āvaṭṭahāraṃ yojetvā dassetuṃ “tattha duggatīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:445_2: hetu taṇhā ca avijjā cā”tiādimāha. Taṃ pubbe vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva. Idaṃ vuccati
atk-s0519a:445_3: brahmacariyanti idaṃ ariyaṃ samathavipassanāsaṅkhātaṃ maggabrahmacariyanti vuccati.
atk-s0519a:445_4: Yaṃ rakkhatīti sabbāhi duggatīhi rakkhantassa ariyamaggassa ārammaṇabhūto nirodho
atk-s0519a:445_5: rakkhanto viya vutto, nimittassa kattubhāvena upacaritattā. Imāni cattāri saccāni
atk-s0519a:448_1: tividhā vibhatti. Tāsu yasmā dhammesu vibhāgato niddiṭṭhesu tattha labbhamāno bhūmivibhāgo
atk-s0519a:448_2: padaṭṭhānavibhāgo ca niddisiyamāno suviññeyyo hoti, tasmā dhammavibhattiṃ tāva niddisanto
atk-s0519a:448_3: soḷasavidhe paṭṭhāne yesaṃ suttānaṃ vasena visesato vibhajitabbā, tāni suttāni dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:448_4: “dve suttāni vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañcā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha vāsanā puññabhāvanā,
atk-s0519a:448_5: tassā bhāgo koṭṭhāso vāsanābhāgo, tassa hitanti vāsanābhāgiyaṃ, suttaṃ. Nibbijjhanaṃ
atk-s0519a:448_6: lobhakkhandhādīnaṃ padālanaṃ nibbedho, tassa bhāgoti sesaṃ purimasadisameva. Yasmiṃ
atk-s0519a:448_7: sutte tīṇi puññakiriyavatthūni desitāni, taṃ suttaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ. Yasmiṃ pana sekkhāsekkhā
atk-s0519a:448_8: desitā, taṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ. Ayañca attho pāḷiyaṃyeva āgamissati.
atk-s0519a:449_0: Puññabhāgiyāti puññabhāge bhavā. Tathā phalabhāgiyā veditabbā. Phalanti pana sāmaññaphalaṃ.
atk-s0519a:449_1: Saṃvarasīlanti pātimokkhasaṃvaro, satisaṃvaro, ñāṇasaṃvaro, khantisaṃvaro, vīriyasaṃvaroti
atk-s0519a:449_2: pañca saṃvarā saṃvarasīlaṃ. Pahānasīlanti tadaṅgappahānaṃ, vikkhambhanappahānaṃ,
atk-s0519a:449_4: nissaraṇappahānavajjānaṃ pahānānaṃ vasena pahānasīlaṃ veditabbaṃ. Soti yo vāsanābhāgiyasuttasampaṭiggāhako,
atk-s0519a:449_5: so. Tena brahmacariyenāti tena saṃvarasīlasaṅkhātena seṭṭhacariyena kāraṇabhūtena
atk-s0519a:449_6: brahmacārī bhavati. Ettha ca aṭṭhasamāpattibrahmacariyassa na paṭikkhepo, keci pana
atk-s0519a:449_7: “teneva brahmacariyenā”ti paṭhanti, tesaṃ matena siyā tassa paṭikkhepo.
atk-s0519a:450_0: Pahānasīle ṭhitoti samucchedapaṭippassaddhippahānānaṃ vasena pahānasīle ṭhito. Tena
atk-s0519a:450_1: brahmacariyenāti tena pahānasīlena visesabhūtena maggabrahmacariyena. Ye pana “teneva
atk-s0519a:450_2: brahmacariyenā”ti paṭhanti, tesaṃ ayaṃ pāṭho “vāsanābhāgiyaṃ nāma suttaṃ dānakathā,
atk-s0519a:450_3: sīlakathā, saggakathā, puññavipākakathā”ti. Ye pana “tena brahmacariyenā”ti paṭhanti,
atk-s0519a:450_4: tesaṃ ayaṃ pāṭho – “vāsanābhāgiyaṃ nāma suttaṃ dānakathā, sīlakathā, saggakathā kāmānaṃ
atk-s0519a:450_5: ādīnavo nekkhamme ānisaṃso”ti. Tattha katamo pāṭho yuttataroti? Pacchimo pāṭhoti
atk-s0519a:450_6: niṭṭhaṃ gantabbaṃ. Yasmā “nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ nāma suttaṃ yā catusaccappakāsanā”ti vakkhati,
atk-s0519a:450_7: na hi mahāthero sāvasesaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desesīti.
atk-s0519a:451_0: “Natthi pajānanā”tiādinā ubhinnaṃ suttānaṃ sātisayaṃ asaṅkarakāraṇaṃ dasseti. Tattha
atk-s0519a:451_1: pajānanāti ariyamaggassa padaṭṭhānabhūtā vuṭṭhānagāminī vipassanāpaññā. Imāni cattāri
atk-s0519a:451_2: suttānīti imesaṃ suttānaṃ vāsanābhāgiyanibbedhabhāgiyānaṃ vakkhamānānañca saṃkilesabhāgiyaasekkhabhāgiyānaṃ
atk-s0519a:451_3: vasena cattāri suttāni. Desanāyāti desanānayena. Sabbato vicayena hārena vicinitvāti
atk-s0519a:451_4: sabbatobhāgena ekādasasu ṭhānesu pakkhipitvā vicayena hārena vicinitvā. “Yuttihārena
atk-s0519a:451_5: yojetabbānī”ti etena vicayahārayuttihārā vibhattihārassa parikammaṭṭhānanti dasseti.
atk-s0519a:451_6: “Yāvatikā ñāṇassa bhūmī”ti iminā vibhattihārassa mahāvisayataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a:452_0: 34. Evaṃ vāsanābhāgiyanibbedhabhāgiyabhāvehi dhamme ekadesena vibhajitvā idāni tesaṃ
atk-s0519a:452_2: dhammā sādhāraṇā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha katame dhammāti katame sabhāvadhammā. Sādhāraṇāti
atk-s0519a:452_3: avisiṭṭhā, samānāti attho. Dve dhammāti duve pakatiyo. Pakatiattho hi ayaṃ dhamma-saddo
atk-s0519a:452_4: “jātidhammānaṃ sattāna”ntiādīsu viya. Nāmasādhāraṇāti nāmena sādhāraṇā, kusalākusalāti
atk-s0519a:452_5: samānanāmāti attho. Vatthusādhāraṇāti vatthunā nissayena sādhāraṇā, ekasantatipatitatāya
atk-s0519a:452_6: samānavatthukāti attho. Visesato saṃkilesapakkhe pahānekaṭṭhā nāmasādhāraṇā, sahajekaṭṭhā
atk-s0519a:452_7: vatthusādhāraṇā. Aññampi evaṃ jātiyanti kiccapaccayapaṭipakkhādīhi samānaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
atk-s0519a:452_8: Micchattaniyatānaṃ aniyatānanti idaṃ puthujjanānaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ. Tasmā sassatavādā
atk-s0519a:452_9: ucchedavādāti ādiko sabbo puthujjanabhedo āharitvā vattabbo. Dasanappahātabbā kilesā
atk-s0519a:452_10: sādhāraṇā micchattaniyatānaṃ aniyatānaṃ eva ca sambhavato sammattaniyatānaṃ asambhavato
atk-s0519a:452_11: ca. Iminā nayena sesapadesupi attho veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:453_0: Ariyasāvakoti sekkhaṃ sandhāya vadati. Sabbā sā avītarāgehi sādhāraṇāti lokiyasamāpatti
atk-s0519a:453_1: rūpāvacarā arūpāvacarā dibbavihāro brahmavihāro paṭhamajjhānasamāpattīti evamādīhi
atk-s0519a:453_2: pariyāyehi sādhāraṇā. Kusalasamāpatti pana iminā pariyāyena siyā asādhāraṇā, imaṃ
atk-s0519a:453_3: pana dosaṃ passantā keci “yaṃ kiñci…pe… sabbā sā avītarāgehi sādhāraṇā”ti paṭhanti.
atk-s0519a:453_4: Kathaṃ te odhiso gahitā, atha odhiso gahetabbā, kathaṃ sādhāraṇāti? Anuyogaṃ manasikatvā
atk-s0519a:453_5: taṃ visodhento āha – “sādhāraṇā hi dhammā evaṃ aññamañña”ntiādi. Tassattho – yathā
atk-s0519a:453_6: micchattaniyatānaṃ aniyatānañca sādhāraṇāti vuttaṃ, evaṃ sādhāraṇā dhammā na sabbasattānaṃ
atk-s0519a:453_7: sādhāraṇatāya sādhāraṇā, kasmā? Yasmā aññamaññaṃ paraṃ paraṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ visayaṃ
atk-s0519a:453_8: nātivattanti. Paṭiniyatañhi tesaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ, itarathā tathā vohāro eva na siyāti
atk-s0519a:453_9: adhippāyo. Yasmā ca ete eva dhammā evaṃ niyatā visayā, tasmā “yopi imehi dhammehi
atk-s0519a:453_10: samannāgato na so taṃ dhammaṃ upātivattatī”ti āha. Na hi micchattaniyatānaṃ aniyatānañca
atk-s0519a:453_11: dassanena pahātabbā kilesā na santi, aññesaṃ vā santīti evaṃ sesepi vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:454_0: Asādhāraṇo nāma dhammo tassa tassa puggalassa paccattaniyato ariyesu sekkhāsekkhadhammavasena
atk-s0519a:454_1: anariyesu sabbābhabbapahātabbavasena gavesitabbo, itarassa tathā niddisitabbabhāvābhāvato.
atk-s0519a:454_2: So ca kho sādhāraṇāvidhuratāya taṃ taṃ upādāya tathāvuttadesanānusārenāti imamatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:454_3: dasseti “katame dhammā asādhāraṇā yāva desanaṃ upādāya gavesitabbā sekkhāsekkhā bhabbābhabbā”ti
atk-s0519a:454_4: iminā. Aṭṭhamakassāti sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa. Dhammatāti dhammasabhāvo
atk-s0519a:454_5: paṭhamassa maggaṭṭhatā dutiyassa phalaṭṭhatā. Paṭhamassa vā pahīyamānakilesatā. Dutiyassa
atk-s0519a:454_6: pahīnakilesatā. Puna aṭṭhamakassāti anāgāmimaggaṭṭhassa. Nāmanti sekkhāti nāmaṃ.
atk-s0519a:454_7: Dhammatāti taṃtaṃmaggaṭṭhatā heṭṭhimaphalaṭṭhatā ca. Paṭipannakānanti maggasamaṅgīnaṃ.
atk-s0519a:454_8: Nāmanti paṭipannakāti nāmaṃ. Evaṃ “aṭṭhamakassā”tiādinā ariyapuggalesu asādhāraṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0519a:454_9: dassetvā itaresu nayadassanatthaṃ “evaṃ visesānupassinā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Lokiyadhammesu
atk-s0519a:454_10: eva hi hīnādibhāvo. Tattha visesānupassināti asādhāraṇadhammānupassinā. Micchattaniyatānaṃ
atk-s0519a:454_11: aniyatā dhammā sādhāraṇā micchattaniyatā dhammā asādhāraṇā. Micchattaniyatesupi niyatamicchādiṭṭhikānaṃ
atk-s0519a:454_12: aniyatā dhammā sādhāraṇā. Niyatamicchādiṭṭhi asādhāraṇāti iminā nayena visesānupassinā veditabbā.
atk-s0519a:455_0: Evaṃ nānānayehi dhammavibhattiṃ dassetvā idāni bhūmivibhattiṃ padaṭṭhānavibhattiñca
atk-s0519a:455_2: Yasmā pana paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe ariyasāvako sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamanto nāma hoti, tato
atk-s0519a:455_3: paraṃ okkanto, tasmā “dassanabhūmi niyāmāvakkantiyā padaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi
atk-s0519a:455_4: heṭṭhimo heṭṭhimo maggo upariuparimaggādhigamassa kāraṇaṃ hoti, sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīni
atk-s0519a:455_5: appahāya kāmarāgabyāpādādippahānassa asakkuṇeyyattā. Tathāpi ariyamaggo attano phalassa
atk-s0519a:455_6: visesakāraṇaṃ āsannakāraṇañcāti dassetuṃ “bhāvanābhūmi uttarikānaṃ phalānaṃ pattiyā
atk-s0519a:455_7: padaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ. Sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā ñāṇuttarassa tathāvidhapaccayasamāyoge
atk-s0519a:455_8: ca hotīti sā vipassanāya padaṭṭhānanti vuttā. Itarā pana tissopi paṭipadā samathaṃ
atk-s0519a:455_9: āvahanti eva. Tāsu sabbamudutāya dassitāya sesāpi dassitā evāti āha – “dukkhā paṭipadā
atk-s0519a:456_0: Dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthūti dānameva dānamayaṃ, pujjaphalanibbattanaṭṭhena puññaṃ,
atk-s0519a:456_1: tadeva kattabbato kiriyā, payogasampattiyādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato vatthu cāti dānamayapuññakiriyavatthu.
atk-s0519a:456_2: Paratoghosassāti dhammassavanassa. Sādhāraṇanti na bījaṃ viya aṅkurassa, dassanabhūmiādayo
atk-s0519a:456_3: viya vā niyāmāvakkantiādīnaṃ āveṇikaṃ, atha kho sādhāraṇaṃ, tadaññakāraṇehipi paratoghosassa
atk-s0519a:456_4: pavattanatoti adhippāyo. Tattha keci dāyakassa dānānumodanaṃ āciṇṇanti dānaṃ paratoghosassa
atk-s0519a:456_5: kāraṇanti vadanti. Dāyako pana dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṃ ākaṅkhanto dānasīlādiguṇavisesānaṃ
atk-s0519a:456_6: savane yuttappayutto hotīti dānaṃ dhammassavanassa kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:457_0: Sīlasampanno vippaṭisārābhāvena samāhito dhammacintāsamattho hotīti sīlaṃ cintāmayañāṇassa
atk-s0519a:457_1: kāraṇanti āha “sīlamaya”ntiādi. Bhāvanāmayanti samathasaṅkhātaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ. Bhāvanāmayiyāti
atk-s0519a:457_2: uparijhānasaṅkhātāya vipassanāsaṅkhātāya ca bhāvanāmayiyā. Purimaṃ purimañhi pacchimassa
atk-s0519a:457_3: pacchimassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Idāni yasmā dānaṃ sīlaṃ lokiyabhāvanā ca na kevalaṃ yathāvuttaparatoghosādīnaṃyeva,
atk-s0519a:457_5: honti, tasmā tampi nayaṃ dassetuṃ puna “dānamaya”ntiādinā desanaṃ vaḍḍhesi. Tathā
atk-s0519a:457_6: patirūpadesavāsādayo kāyavivekacittavivekādīnaṃ kāraṇaṃ hotīti imaṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:457_8: iminā pahānapariññā vuttāti. Samādhindriyassāti maggasamādhindriyassa. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0519a:460_0: 35. Tattha katamo parivattano hāroti parivattanahāravibhaṅgo. Tattha yasmā saṃvaṇṇiyamāne
atk-s0519a:460_3: purisapuggalassa micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā bhavatī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha sammā pasatthā,
atk-s0519a:460_4: sundarā diṭṭhi etassāti sammādiṭṭhi, tassa. Sā panassa sammādiṭṭhitā pubbabhāgasammādiṭṭhiyā
atk-s0519a:460_5: vā lokuttarasammādiṭṭhiyā vā veditabbā. Micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā bhavatīti purimanaye
atk-s0519a:460_6: vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiyā pahīnā hoti, vikkhambhitāti attho. Pacchimanaye paṭhamamaggasammādiṭṭhiyā
atk-s0519a:461_0: Ye cassa micchādiṭṭhipaccayāti micchābhinivesahetu ye ariyānaṃ adassanakāmatādayo
atk-s0519a:461_1: lobhādayo pāṇātipātādayo ca aneke lāmakaṭṭhena pāpakā akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalā
atk-s0519a:461_2: dhammā uppajjeyyuṃ. Imassa āraddhavipassakassa ariyassa ca. Dhammāti samathavipassanādhammā,
atk-s0519a:461_3: sattattiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammā vā anuppannā vā sambhavanti uppannā, bhāvanāpāripūriṃ
atk-s0519a:461_4: gacchanti. Sammāsaṅkappassātiādīnampi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso
atk-s0519a:461_5: – sammāvimuttiādīnaṃ micchāvimutti avimuttāva samānā “vimuttā maya”nti evaṃsaññino
atk-s0519a:461_6: avimuttiyaṃ vā vimuttisaññino. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – micchā pāpikā vimutti vimokkho
atk-s0519a:461_7: etassāti micchāvimutti. Aṭṭhaṅgā ca micchāvimutti yathāvuttenākārena micchābhinivesavasena
atk-s0519a:461_8: ca pavattā antadvayalakkhaṇā. Sammāvimutti pana phaladhammā, micchādiṭṭhike samāsevato
atk-s0519a:461_9: micchāvimokkho vā micchāvimutti. Micchāvimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ pana micchāvimokkhe micchādiṭṭhiyā
atk-s0519a:461_10: ca sāranti gahaṇavasena pavatto akusalacittuppādo antamaso pāpaṃ katvā “sukataṃ mayā”ti
atk-s0519a:461_11: paccavekkhato uppannamoho ca. Sammāvimuttiñāṇadassanassāti ettha sekkhānaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:462_0: 36. Evaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādimukhena micchādiṭṭhiādiṃ dassetvā puna pāṇātipātaadinnādānakāmesumicchācārādito
atk-s0519a:462_1: veramaṇiyādīhi pāṇātipātādīnaṃ parivattanaṃ dassetuṃ “yassā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0519a:462_2: kālavādissāti lakkhaṇavacanaṃ. Kālena sāpadesaṃ pariyantavatiṃ atthasañhitanti so
atk-s0519a:463_0: Puna “ye ca kho kecī”tiādinā sammādiṭṭhiādimukheneva micchādiṭṭhiādīhi eva parivattanaṃ
atk-s0519a:463_1: pakārantarena dasseti. Tattha sandiṭṭhikāti paccakkhā. Sahadhammikāti sakāraṇā. Gārayhāti
atk-s0519a:463_2: garahitabbayuttā. Vādānuvādāti vādā ceva anuvādā ca. “Vādānupātā”tipi pāṭho, vādānupavattiyoti
atk-s0519a:464_0: Puna “ye ca kho kecī”tiādinā majjhimāya paṭipattiyā antadvayaparivattanaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a:464_1: Tattha bhuñjitabbātiādīni cattāri padāni vatthukāmavasena yojetabbāni. Bhāvayitabbā
atk-s0519a:464_2: bahulīkātabbāti padadvayaṃ kilesakāmavasena. Tesaṃ adhammoti bhāvetabbo nāma dhammo
atk-s0519a:464_3: siyā, kāmā ca tesaṃ bhāvetabbā icchitā, kāmehi ca veramaṇī kāmānaṃ paṭipakkho, iti
atk-s0519a:465_0: Niyyāniko dhammoti saha vipassanāya ariyamaggo. Dukkhoti pāpaṃ nijjarāpessāmāti pavattitaṃ
atk-s0519a:465_1: sarīratāpanaṃ vadati. Sukhoti anavajjapaccayaparibhogasukhaṃ. Etesupi vāresu vuttanayeneva
atk-s0519a:465_2: adhammabhāvāpatti vattabbā. Idāni asubhasaññādimukhena subhasaññādiparivattanaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:465_3: “yathā vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āraddhavipassakassa kilesāsucipaggharaṇavasena tebhūmakasaṅkhārā
atk-s0519a:465_4: asubhato upaṭṭhahantīti katvā vuttaṃ “sabbasaṅkhāresu asubhānupassino viharato”ti.
atk-s0519a:465_5: “Yaṃ yaṃ vā panā”tiādinā paṭipakkhassa lakkhaṇaṃ vibhāveti. Tattha ajjhāpannoti adhiāpanno,
atk-s0519a:468_0: 37. Tattha katamo vevacano hāroti vevacanahāravibhaṅgo. Tattha yathā vevacananiddeso
atk-s0519a:468_1: hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “ekaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ aññamaññehi vevacanehi niddisatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:468_2: Vevacanehīti pariyāyasaddehīti attho. Padattho pubbe vutto eva. Kasmā pana bhagavā
atk-s0519a:468_3: ekaṃ dhammaṃ anekapariyāyehi niddisatīti? Vuccate – desanākāle āyatiñca kassaci kathañci
atk-s0519a:468_4: tadatthapaṭibodho siyāti pariyāyavacanaṃ, tasmiṃ khaṇe vikkhittacittānaṃ aññavihitānaṃ
atk-s0519a:468_5: aññena pariyāyena tadatthāvabodhanatthaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ. Teneva padena puna vacane
atk-s0519a:468_6: tadaññesaṃ tattha adhigatatā siyāti mandabuddhīnaṃ punappunaṃ tadatthasallakkhaṇe
atk-s0519a:468_7: asammosanatthaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ. Anekepi atthā samānabyañjanā hontīti yā atthantaraparikappanā
atk-s0519a:468_8: siyā, tassā parivajjanatthampi pariyāyavacanaṃ anaññassa vacane anekāhi tāhi tāhi
atk-s0519a:468_9: saññāhi tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ ñāpanatthampi pariyāyavacanaṃ seyyathāpi nighaṇṭusatthe.
atk-s0519a:468_11: Attano dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāppattiyā vibhāvanatthaṃ, veneyyānaṃ tattha bījāvāpanatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:469_0: Kiṃ bahunā yassā dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā sammāsambuddhā yathā sabbasmiṃ atthe
atk-s0519a:469_1: appaṭihatañāṇācārā, tathā sabbasmiṃ saddavohāreti ekampi atthaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi
atk-s0519a:469_2: bodheti, na tattha dandhāyitattaṃ vitthāyitattaṃ atthassa. Nāpi dhammadesanāhāni,
atk-s0519a:469_3: āveṇikovāyaṃ buddhadhammoti pariyāyadesanaṃ dassento “āsā”tiādimāha. Tattha atthaṃ
atk-s0519a:469_4: dassento “āsā nāma vuccati yā bhavissassa atthassā”tiādimāha. Tattha bhavissassa
atk-s0519a:469_5: atthassāti anāgatassa icchitabbassa atthassa. “Avassaṃ āgamissatī”tiādinā tassā pavattiyākāraṃ
atk-s0519a:469_6: dasseti. Anāgatatthavisayā taṇhā āsā. Anāgatapaccuppannatthavisayā taṇhā pihāti ayametāsaṃ viseso.
atk-s0519a:470_0: Atthanipphattipaṭipālanāti yāya icchitassa atthassa nipphattiṃ paṭipāleti āgameti,
atk-s0519a:470_1: yāya vā nipphannaṃ atthaṃ paṭipāleti rakkhati. Ayaṃ abhinandanā nāma, yathāladdhassa
atk-s0519a:470_2: atthassa kelāyanā nāmāti attho. Taṃ atthanipphattiṃ sattasaṅkhāravasena vibhajitvā
atk-s0519a:470_3: dassento “piyaṃ vā ñāti”ntiādimāha. Tattha dhammanti rūpādiārammaṇadhammaṃ, atiiṭṭhārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:470_4: abhinandati, aniṭṭhārammaṇehipi taṃ dassetuṃ “appaṭikkūlato vā abhinandatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:470_5: Paṭikkūlepi hi vipallāsavasena sattaṃ, saṅkhāraṃ vā appaṭikkūlato abhinandati.
atk-s0519a:471_0: Yāsu anekadhātūsu pavattiyā taṇhā “anekadhātūsu sarā”ti vuttā, tā dhātuyo vibhāgena
atk-s0519a:471_1: dassetuṃ “cakkhudhātū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi dhātuvibhaṅgādīsu kāmadhātuādayo aññāpi
atk-s0519a:471_2: anekadhātuyo āgatā, tāsampi ettheva samavarodhoti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭhārasevettha dassitā.
atk-s0519a:471_3: Keci rūpādhimuttātiādi tāsu dhātūsu taṇhāya pavattidassanaṃ. Tattha yasmā pañca ajjhattikā
atk-s0519a:471_4: dhātuyo satta ca viññāṇadhātuyo dhammadhātu ca dhammārammaṇeneva saṅgahitā, tasmā
atk-s0519a:471_5: aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo uddisitvā chaḷeva taṇhāya pavattiṭṭhānāni vibhattānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:471_6: Taṇhāpakkhā nekkhammassitāpi domanassupavicārā tassa anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ
atk-s0519a:471_7: upaṭṭhāpayato uppajjati “pihapaccayā domanassa”nti vacanato, ko pana vādo gehassitesu
atk-s0519a:471_8: domanassupavicāresūti imāni catuvīsati padāni “taṇhāpakkho”ti vuttaṃ. Gehassitā pana
atk-s0519a:471_9: upekkhā aññāṇupekkhatāya yathābhinivesassa paccayo hotīti “yā cha upekkhā gehassitā,
atk-s0519a:472_0: 38. Idāni tesaṃ upavicārānaṃ taṇhāpariyāyaṃ dassento “sāyeva patthanākārena dhammanandī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:472_1: Puna cittaṃ paññā bhagavā dhammo saṅgho sīlaṃ cāgoti imesaṃ pariyāyavacananiddhāraṇena
atk-s0519a:472_2: vevacanahāraṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “cittaṃ mano viññāṇa”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha “aññampi
atk-s0519a:472_3: evaṃ jātiya”nti iminā paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā
atk-s0519a:472_4: paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṃ kosallaṃ nepuññaṃ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā
atk-s0519a:472_5: pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṃ patodo paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ paññāsatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:472_6: paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṃ amohoti evamādīnampi
atk-s0519a:473_0: Pañcindriyāni lokuttarānīti khaye ñāṇantiādīni pañcindriyāni lokuttarāni, lokuttarapaññāya
atk-s0519a:473_1: vevacanānīti attho. Sabbā paññāti itarehi vevacanehi vuttā sabbā paññā lokiyalokuttaramissikāti
atk-s0519a:473_2: attho. “Api cā”tiādinā imināpi pariyāyena vevacanaṃ vattabbanti dasseti. Ādhipateyyaṭṭhenāti
atk-s0519a:473_3: adhimokkhalakkhaṇe ādhipateyyaṭṭhena. Yathā ca buddhānussatiyaṃ vuttanti yathā buddhānussatiniddese
atk-s0519a:473_4: “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā pāḷiyā so bhagavā itipi arahaṃ…pe… itipi bhagavāti anekehi
atk-s0519a:473_5: vevacanehi bhagavā anussaritabboti vuttaṃ. Imināva nayena balanipphattigato vesārajjappatto
atk-s0519a:473_6: yāva dhammobhāsapajjotakaroti, etehi pariyāyehi buddhassa bhagavato vevacanaṃ buddhānussatiyaṃ
atk-s0519a:473_7: vattabbanti padaṃ āharitvā sambandho veditabbo. Etānipi katipayāni eva bhagavato
atk-s0519a:473_8: vevacanāni. Asaṅkhyeyyā hi buddhaguṇā guṇanemittakāni ca bhagavato nāmāni. Vuttañhetaṃ dhammasenāpatinā –
atk-s0519a:476_0: Dhammānussatiyaṃ “asaṅkhata”ntiādīsu na kenaci paccayena saṅkhatanti asaṅkhataṃ.
atk-s0519a:476_1: Natthi etassa anto vināsoti anantaṃ. Āsavānaṃ anārammaṇato anāsavaṃ. Aviparītasabhāvattā
atk-s0519a:476_2: saccaṃ. Saṃsārassa paratīrabhāvato pāraṃ. Nipuṇañāṇavisayattā sukhumasabhāvattā ca
atk-s0519a:476_3: nipuṇa. Anupacitañāṇasambhārehi daṭṭhuṃ na sakkāti sududdasaṃ. Uppādajarāhi anabbhāhatattā
atk-s0519a:476_4: ajajjaraṃ. Thirabhāvena dhuvaṃ. Jarāmaraṇehi apalujjanato apalokitaṃ. Maṃsacakkhunā
atk-s0519a:476_5: dibbacakkhunā ca apassitabbattā anidassanaṃ. Rāgādipapañcābhāvena nippapañcaṃ. Kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ
atk-s0519a:477_0: Amatahetutāya bhaṅgābhāvato ca amataṃ. Uttamaṭṭhena atappakaṭṭhena ca paṇītaṃ. Asivānaṃ
atk-s0519a:477_1: kammakilesavipākavaṭṭānaṃ abhāvena sivaṃ. Catūhi yogehi anupaddavabhāvena khemaṃ.
atk-s0519a:477_2: Taṇhā khīyati etthāti taṇhakkhayo. Katapuññehipi kadācideva passitabbattā acchariyaṃ.
atk-s0519a:477_3: Abhūtapubbattā abbhutaṃ. Anantarāyattā anītikaṃ. Anantarāyabhāvahetuto anītikadhammaṃ.
atk-s0519a:478_0: Anibbattisabhāvattā ajātaṃ. Tato eva abhūtaṃ. Ubhayenāpi uppādarahitanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a:478_1: Kenaci anupaddutattā anupaddavaṃ. Na kenaci paccayena katanti akataṃ. Natthi ettha
atk-s0519a:478_2: sokoti asokaṃ. Sokahetuvigamena visokaṃ. Kenaci anupasajjitabbattā anupasaggaṃ. Anupasaggabhāvahetuto anupasaggadhammaṃ.
atk-s0519a:479_0: Gambhīrañāṇagocarato gambhīraṃ. Sammāpaṭipattiṃ vinā passituṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā
atk-s0519a:479_1: duppassaṃ. Sabbalokaṃ uttaritvā ṭhitanti uttaraṃ. Natthi etassa uttaranti anuttaraṃ.
atk-s0519a:479_2: Samassa sadisassa abhāvena asamaṃ. Paṭibhāgābhāvena appaṭisamaṃ. Uttamaṭṭhena jeṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0519a:479_3: pāsaṃsatamattā vā jeṭṭhaṃ. Saṃsāradukkhaṭṭitehi letabbato leṇaṃ. Tato rakkhaṇato
atk-s0519a:479_4: tāṇaṃ. Raṇābhāvena araṇaṃ. Aṅgaṇābhāvena anaṅgaṇaṃ. Niddosatāya akācaṃ. Rāgādimalāpagamena
atk-s0519a:479_5: vimalaṃ. Catūhi oghehi anajjhottharaṇīyato dīpo. Saṃsāravūpasamasukhatāya sukhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:479_6: Pamāṇakaradhammābhāvato appamāṇaṃ, gaṇetuṃ etassa na sakkāti ca appamāṇaṃ. Saṃsārasamudde
atk-s0519a:479_7: anosīdanaṭṭhānatāya patiṭṭhā. Rāgādikiñcanābhāvena pariggahābhāvena ca akiñcananti
atk-s0519a:480_0: Saṅghānussatiyaṃ sattānaṃ sāroti sīlasārādisāraguṇayogato sattesu sārabhūto. Sattānaṃ
atk-s0519a:480_1: maṇḍoti gorasesu sappimaṇḍo viya sattesu maṇḍabhūto. Sāraguṇavaseneva sattesu uddharitabbato
atk-s0519a:480_2: sattānaṃ uddhāro. Niccalaguṇatāya sattānaṃ esikā. Guṇasobhāsurabhibhāvena sattānaṃ
atk-s0519a:481_0: Guṇesu uttamaṅgaṃ paññā tassā upasobhāhetutāya sīlaṃ uttamaṅgopasobhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:481_1: Sīlesu paripūrakārino anijjhantā nāma guṇā natthīti “nidhānañca sīlaṃ sabbadobhaggasamatikkamanaṭṭhenā”ti
atk-s0519a:481_2: vuttaṃ. Ayañca attho ākaṅkheyyasuttena dīpetabbo. Aparampi vuttaṃ – “ijjhati, bhikkhave,
atk-s0519a:481_3: sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā”ti. Sippanti dhanusippaṃ. Dhaññanti dhanāyitabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:481_5: sattabhūmakādipāsāde viya sīle ṭhatvā abhiññācakkhunā lokassa voloketuṃ sakkāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:481_6: Sabbabhūmānuparivatti ca sīlaṃ catubhūmakakusalassāpi tadanuvattanato. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
atk-s0519a:484_0: 39. Tattha katamo paññattihāroti paññattihāravibhaṅgo. Tattha kā panāyaṃ paññattīti?
atk-s0519a:484_1: Āha “yā pakatikathāya desanā”ti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yā desanāhārādayo viya assādādipadatthavisesaniddhāraṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:484_2: akatvā bhagavato sābhāvikadhammakathāya desanā. Yā tassā paññāpanā, ayaṃ paññattihāro.
atk-s0519a:484_3: Yasmā pana sā bhagavato tathā tathā veneyyasantāne yathādhippetamatthaṃ nikkhipatīti
atk-s0519a:484_4: nikkhepo. Tassa cāyaṃ hāro dukkhādisaṅkhāte bhāge pakārehi ñāpeti, asaṅkarato vā
atk-s0519a:484_5: ṭhapeti, tasmā “nikkhepapaññattī”ti vutto. Iti pakatikathāya desanāti saṅkhepena
atk-s0519a:484_6: vuttamatthaṃ vitthārena vibhajituṃ “kā ca pakatikathāya desanā”ti pucchitvā “cattāri saccānī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:485_0: Tattha idaṃ dukkhanti ayaṃ paññattīti kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāve rūpārūpadhamme atītādivasena
atk-s0519a:485_2: ekajjhaṃ gahaṇassa kāraṇabhūtā paññatti, kā pana sāti? Nāmapaññattinibandhanā tajjāpaññatti.
atk-s0519a:485_3: “Viññattivikārasahito saddo evā”ti apare. Iminā nayena tattha tattha paññattiattho
atk-s0519a:485_4: veditabbo. “Pañcannaṃ khandhāna”ntiādinā tassā paññattiyā upādānaṃ dasseti. Dasannaṃ
atk-s0519a:485_5: indriyānanti aṭṭha rūpindriyāni manindriyaṃ vedanindriyanti evaṃ dasannaṃ. Anubhavanasāmaññena
atk-s0519a:485_6: hi vedanā ekamindriyaṃ katā, tathā saddhādayo ca maggapakkhiyāti.
atk-s0519a:486_0: Kabaḷaṃ karīyatīti kabaḷīkāroti vatthuvasena ayaṃ niddeso. Yāya ojāya sattā yāpenti,
atk-s0519a:486_1: tassāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sā hi ojaṭṭhamakassa rūpassa āharaṇato āhāro. Atthīti maggena
atk-s0519a:486_2: asamucchinnatāya vijjati. Rāgoti rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo. Nandanaṭṭhena nandī. Taṇhāyanaṭṭhena
atk-s0519a:486_3: taṇhā. Sabbānetāni lobhasseva nāmāni. Patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ viruḷhanti kammaṃ
atk-s0519a:486_4: javāpetvā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanasamatthatāya patiṭṭhitañceva viññāṇaṃ viruḷhañca. Yatthāti
atk-s0519a:486_5: tebhūmakavaṭṭe bhummaṃ, sabbattha vā purimapurimapade etaṃ bhummaṃ. Atthi tattha
atk-s0519a:486_6: saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhīti ye imasmiṃ vipākavaṭṭe ṭhitassa āyatiṃ vaḍḍhanahetukā saṅkhārā,
atk-s0519a:486_7: te sandhāya vuttaṃ – “yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattī”ti yasmiṃ ṭhāne āyatiṃ
atk-s0519a:486_8: punabbhavābhinibbatti atthi. Atthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇanti yattha paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a:486_9: tattha khandhānaṃ abhinibbattilakkhaṇā jāti, paripākalakkhaṇā jarā, bhedanalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:486_10: maraṇañca atthi. Ayaṃ pabhāvapaññatti dukkhassa ca samudayassa cāti ayaṃ yathāvuttā
atk-s0519a:486_11: desanā dukkhasaccassa samudayasaccassa ca samuṭṭhānapaññatti, vipākavaṭṭassa saṅkhārānañca
atk-s0519a:487_0: Natthi rāgoti aggamaggabhāvanāya samucchinnattā natthi ce rāgo. Appatiṭṭhitaṃ tattha
atk-s0519a:487_1: viññāṇaṃ aviruḷhanti kammaṃ javāpetvā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanasamatthatāyābhāvena appatiṭṭhitañceva
atk-s0519a:488_1: pavattatīti dasseti. Ayaṃ bhāvanāpaññattīti ayaṃ dvārārammaṇehi chadvārappavattanadhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:488_2: aniccānupassanā maggassa bhāvanāpaññatti. Nirodhapaññatti nirodhassāti rodhasaṅkhātāya
atk-s0519a:488_3: taṇhāya maggena anavasesanirodhapaññatti. Uppādapaññattīti uppannassa paññāpanā.
atk-s0519a:488_4: Okāsapaññattīti ṭhānassa paññāpanā. Āhaṭanāpaññattīti nīharaṇapaññatti. Āsāṭikānanti
atk-s0519a:488_5: gunnaṃ vaṇesu nīlamakkhikāhi ṭhapitaaṇḍakā āsāṭikā nāma. Ettha yassa uppannā, tassa
atk-s0519a:488_6: sattassa anayabyasanahetutāya āsāṭikā viyāti āsāṭikā, kilesā, tesaṃ āsāṭikānaṃ. Abhinighātapaññattīti samugghātapaññatti.
atk-s0519a:489_1: dassetvā idāni teparivaṭṭavasena dassetuṃ “idaṃ ‘dukkha’nti me, bhikkhave”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:489_2: Tattha dassanaṭṭhena cakkhu. Yathāsabhāvato jānanaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ. Paṭivijjhanaṭṭhena
atk-s0519a:489_3: paññā. Viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vijjā. Obhāsanaṭṭhena āloko. Sabbaṃ paññāvevacanameva.
atk-s0519a:490_0: Tulamatulañcāti gāthāya pacurajanānaṃ paccakkhabhāvato tulitaṃ paricchinnanti tulaṃ,
atk-s0519a:490_1: kāmāvacaraṃ. Na tulanti atulaṃ, tulaṃ vā sadisamassa aññaṃ lokiyakammaṃ natthīti
atk-s0519a:490_2: atulaṃ, mahaggatakammaṃ. Kāmāvacararūpāvacarakammaṃ vā tulaṃ, arūpāvacaraṃ atulaṃ,
atk-s0519a:490_3: appavipākaṃ vā tulaṃ. Bahuvipākaṃ atulaṃ. Sambhavati etenāti sambhavaṃ, sambhavahetubhūtaṃ.
atk-s0519a:490_4: Bhavasaṅkhāraṃ punabbhavasaṅkharaṇakaṃ. Avassajīti vissajjesi. Munīti buddhamuni.
atk-s0519a:490_6: Abhindi kavacamivāti kavacaṃ viya bhindi. Attasambhavanti attani sañjātaṃ kilesaṃ.
atk-s0519a:490_7: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – savipākaṭṭhena sambhavaṃ bhavābhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena bhavasaṅkhāranti
atk-s0519a:490_8: ca laddhanāmaṃ tulātulasaṅkhātaṃ lokiyakammañca ossaji, saṅgāmasīse mahāyodho kavacaṃ
atk-s0519a:490_9: viya attasambhavaṃ kilesañca ajjhattarato samāhito hutvā abhindīti.
atk-s0519a:491_0: Atha vā tulanti tulayanto tīrento. Atulañca sambhavanti nibbānañceva sambhavañca.
atk-s0519a:491_1: Bhavasaṅkhāranti bhavagāmikammaṃ. Avassaji munīti “pañcakkhandhā aniccā, tesaṃ nirodho
atk-s0519a:491_2: nibbānaṃ nicca”ntiādinā nayena tulayanto buddhamuni bhave ādīnavaṃ nibbāne ānisaṃsañca
atk-s0519a:491_3: disvā taṃ khandhānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ bhavasaṅkhāraṃ kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena avassaji.
atk-s0519a:491_4: Kathaṃ? Ajjhattarato. So hi vipassanāvasena ajjhattarato samathavasena samāhito kavacamiva
atk-s0519a:491_5: attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ attani sambhavattā “attasambhava”nti laddhanāmaṃ
atk-s0519a:491_6: sabbaṃ kilesajātaṃ abhindi, kilesābhāve kammaṃ appaṭisandhikattā avassaṭṭhaṃ nāma
atk-s0519a:492_1: Tena dhammapaṭisambhidā vuttā hotīti āha – “nikkhepapaññatti dhammapaṭisambhidāyā”ti.
atk-s0519a:492_4: kāyagatāya satiyā”ti vuttaṃ. Ajjhattaratatāvisiṭṭhassa pana samādhānassa vasena “ṭhitipaññatti
atk-s0519a:492_5: cittekaggatāyā”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Abhinibbidāpaññatti cittassāti āyusaṅkhārossajjanavasena
atk-s0519a:492_6: cittassa abhinīharaṇapaññatti. Upādānapaññattīti gahaṇapaññatti. Sabbaññutāyāti sammāsambuddhabhāvassa.
atk-s0519a:492_7: Etena asammāsambuddhassa āyusaṅkhārossajjanaṃ natthīti dasseti. Kilesābhāvena bhagavā
atk-s0519a:493_0: Yo dukkhamaddakkhi yatonidānanti yo āraddhavipassako sabbaṃ tebhūmakaṃ dukkhaṃ adakkhi
atk-s0519a:493_1: passi, tañca yatonidānaṃ yaṃ hetukaṃ, tampissa kāraṇabhāvena taṇhaṃ passi. Kāmesu
atk-s0519a:493_2: so jantu kathaṃ nameyyāti so evaṃ paṭipanno puriso savatthukāmesu kilesakāmesu yena
atk-s0519a:493_3: pakārena nameyya abhinameyya, so pakāro natthi. Kasmā? Kāmā hi loke saṅgoti ñatvā.
atk-s0519a:493_4: Yasmā imasmiṃ loke kāmasadisaṃ bandhanaṃ natthi. Vuttañcetaṃ bhagavatā “na taṃ daḷhaṃ
atk-s0519a:493_5: bandhanamāhu dhīrā”tiādi, tasmā saṅkhāre āsajjanaṭṭhena saṅgoti viditvā. Tesaṃ satīmā
atk-s0519a:493_6: vinayāya sikkheti kāyagatāsatiyogena satimā tesaṃ kāmānaṃ vūpasamāya tīsupi sikkhāsu
atk-s0519a:494_0: Vevacanapaññattīti khandhādīnaṃ vevacanapaññatti. Adakkhīti pana padena sambandhattā
atk-s0519a:494_1: vuttaṃ – “dukkhassa pariññāpaññatti cā”ti. Paccatthikato dassanapaññattīti anatthajananato
atk-s0519a:495_0: Mohasambandhano lokoti ayaṃ loko avijjāhetukehi saṃyojanehi bandho. Bhabbarūpova
atk-s0519a:495_1: dissatīti vipannajjhāsayopi māyāya sāṭheyyena ca paṭicchāditasabhāvo bhabbajātikaṃ
atk-s0519a:495_2: viya attānaṃ dasseti. Upadhibandhano bālo, tamasā parivāritoti tassa pana bālassa
atk-s0519a:495_3: tathā dassane sammohatamasā parivāritattā kāmaguṇesu anādīnavadassitāya kilesābhisaṅkhārehi
atk-s0519a:495_4: bandhattā. Tathā bhūto cāyaṃ bālo paṇḍitānaṃ assirī viya khāyati alakkhiko eva hutvā
atk-s0519a:495_5: upaṭṭhāti. Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ bālassa sato rāgādikiñcanato. Paṇḍitassa pana paññācakkhunā
atk-s0519a:495_6: passato natthi kiñcananti ayaṃ saṅkhepattho. Mohasīsena vipallāsā gahitāti āha –
