atk-s0519a:496_0: Atthi nibbānanti samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vācāvatthumattameva. Natthi nibbānanti paramatthato
atk-s0519a:496_1: alabbhamānasabhāvattāti vippaṭipannānaṃ micchāvādaṃ bhañjituṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a:496_2: “atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti. Tattha hetuṃ dassetuṃ “no
atk-s0519a:496_3: cetaṃ, bhikkhave”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho – bhikkhave, yadi asaṅkhatā dhātu na abhavissa,
atk-s0519a:496_4: na idha sabbassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ siyā. Nibbānañhi ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānā
atk-s0519a:496_5: sammādiṭṭhiādayo maggadhammā anavasesakilese samucchindanti, tato tividhassapi vaṭṭassa appavattīti.
atk-s0519a:497_0: Tatthāyamadhippāyo – yathā pariññeyyatāya sauttarānaṃ kāmānaṃ rūpānañca paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ
atk-s0519a:497_1: tabbidhurasabhāvaṃ nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati, evaṃ taṃsabhāvānaṃ saṅkhabhadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtena
atk-s0519a:497_2: tabbidhuratāsabhāvena nissaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ, yañca taṃ nissaraṇaṃ. Sā asaṅkhatā
atk-s0519a:497_3: dhātu. Kiñca bhiyyo? Saṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Api ca anulomañāṇaṃ kilese
atk-s0519a:497_4: na samucchedavasena pajahituṃ sakkoti. Sammutisaccārammaṇampi paṭhamajjhānādīsu ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:497_5: vikkhambhanamattameva karoti, kilesānaṃ na samucchedaṃ, samucchedappahānakarañca
atk-s0519a:497_7: sā asaṅkhatā dhātu. Tathā nibbāna-saddo katthaci visaye aviparītattho veditabbo,
atk-s0519a:498_0: Atha vā “atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti vacanaṃ aviparītatthaṃ,
atk-s0519a:498_1: bhagavatā bhāsitattā. Yañhi bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, taṃ aviparītatthaṃ. Yathā taṃ “sabbe
atk-s0519a:498_2: saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā, sabbe dhammā anattā”ti, evampi yuttivasena
atk-s0519a:498_3: asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato sabbhāvo veditabbo. Kiṃ vā etāya yutticintāya? Yasmā
atk-s0519a:498_4: bhagavatā “atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhatanti, appaccayā dhammā
atk-s0519a:498_5: asaṅkhatā dhammāti ca, asaṅkhatañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi asaṅkhatagāminiñca
atk-s0519a:498_6: paṭipada”ntiādinā ca anekehi suttapadehi nibbānadhātuyā paramatthato sabbhāvo desitoti.
atk-s0519a:498_7: Tattha upanayanapaññattīti paṭipakkhato hetuupanayanassa paññāpanā. Jotanāpaññattīti
atk-s0519a:498_8: paṭiññātassa atthassa siddhiyā pakāsanāpaññatti. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0519a:501_0: 42. Tattha katamo otaraṇo hāroti otaraṇahāravibhaṅgo. Tattha asekkhā vimuttīti ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:501_1: tedhātuke vītarāgatā asekkhā phalavimutti. Tāniyevāti tāni asekkhāyaṃ vimuttiyaṃ
atk-s0519a:501_2: saddhādīni. Ayaṃ indriyehi otaraṇāti asekkhāya vimuttiyā niddhāritehi saddhādīhi
atk-s0519a:502_0: Pañcindriyāni vijjāti sammāsaṅkappo viya sammādiṭṭhiyā upakārakattā paññākkhandhe
atk-s0519a:502_1: saddhādīni cattāri indriyāni vijjāya upakārakattā saṅgaṇhanavasena vuttāni. Saṅkhārapariyāpannānīti
atk-s0519a:502_2: pañcasu khandhesu saṅkhārakkhandhe antogadhāni. Ye saṅkhārā anāsavāti taṃ saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ
atk-s0519a:502_3: viseseti, aggaphalassa adhippetattā. Tato eva ca no bhavaṅgā. Dhammadhātusaṅgahitāti
atk-s0519a:502_4: aṭṭhārasadhātūsu dhammadhātusaṅgahitā. Yadipi pubbe vītarāgatā asekkhā vimutti dassitā,
atk-s0519a:502_5: tassā pana paṭipattidassanatthaṃ “ayaṃ ahamasmīti anānupassī”ti dassanamaggo idha
atk-s0519a:502_6: vuttoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ayaṃ ahamasmīti anānupassī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sabbaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0519a:503_0: 43. Nissitassa calitanti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena kammaṃ anavaṭṭhānaṃ. Cutūpapātoti aparāparaṃ
atk-s0519a:503_1: cavanaṃ upapatanañca. Nissitapade labbhamānaṃ nissayanaṃ uddharanto āha – “nissayo
atk-s0519a:503_2: nāmā”ti. Taṇhānissayoti taṇhābhiniveso. So hi taṇhācaritassa patiṭṭhābhāvena tathā
atk-s0519a:503_3: vutto. Evaṃ diṭṭhinissayopi daṭṭhabbo. Rattassa cetanāti cetanāpadhānattā saṅkhārakkhandhadhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:503_4: cetanāsīsena taṇhaṃ eva vadati. Tenevāha – “ayaṃ taṇhānissayo”ti. Yasmā pana viparītābhiniveso
atk-s0519a:503_5: mohassa balavabhāve eva hoti, tasmā “yā mūḷhassa cetanā, ayaṃ diṭṭhinissayo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:504_0: Evaṃ cetanāsīsena taṇhādiṭṭhiyo vatvā idāni tattha nippariyāyena cetanaṃyeva gaṇhanto
atk-s0519a:504_1: “cetanā pana saṅkhārā”ti āha. Yā rattassa vedanā, ayaṃ sukhā vedanāti sukhāya vedanāya
atk-s0519a:504_2: rāgo anusetīti katvā vuttaṃ. Tathā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya avijjā anusetīti āha
atk-s0519a:504_3: – “yā sammūḷhassa vedanā, ayaṃ adukkhamasukhā vedanā”ti. Idha vedanāsīsena cetanā
atk-s0519a:504_4: vuttā. Taṇhāyāti taṇhaṃ. Diṭṭhiyāti diṭṭhiṃ. Yathā vā sesadhammānaṃ taṇhāya nissayabhāve
atk-s0519a:504_5: puggalo taṇhāya nissitoti vuccati. Evaṃ taṇhāya sesadhammānaṃ paccayabhāve puggalo
atk-s0519a:505_0: Passaddhīti darathapaṭippassambhanā. Kāyikāti karajakāyasannissitā. Cetasikāti cittasannissitā.
atk-s0519a:505_1: Yasmā pana sā darathapaṭippassaddhi kāyacittānaṃ sukhe sati pākaṭā hoti, tasmā “yaṃ
atk-s0519a:505_2: kāyikaṃ sukha”ntiādinā phalūpacārena vuttāya passaddhiyā natiabhāvassa kāraṇabhāvaṃ
atk-s0519a:505_3: dassetuṃ “passaddhakāyo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Soti evaṃ vimuttacitto khīṇāsavo. Rūpasaṅkhaye
atk-s0519a:505_4: vimuttoti rūpānaṃ saṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne vimutto. Atthītipi na upetīti sassato
atk-s0519a:505_5: attā ca loko cātipi taṇhādiṭṭhiupayena na upeti na gaṇhāti. Natthīti asassatoti.
atk-s0519a:505_6: Atthi natthīti ekaccaṃ sassataṃ ekaccaṃ asassatanti. Nevatthi no natthīti amarāvikkhepavasena.
atk-s0519a:505_7: Gambhīroti uttānabhāvahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvena gambhīro. Nibbutoti atthītiādinā
atk-s0519a:506_0: Idhāgatīti paralokato idha āgati. Gatīti idhalokato paralokagamanaṃ. Taṃ pana punabbhavoti
atk-s0519a:506_2: padena dvārappavattadhamme dassento “phassasamuditesu dhammesū”ti āha. Tassattho
atk-s0519a:506_3: – phassena saddhiṃ phassena kāraṇabhūtena ca samuditesu sambhūtesu viññāṇavedanāsaññācetanāvitakkavicārādidhammesu.
atk-s0519a:506_4: Attānaṃ na passatīti tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anattabhāveneva tattha attānaṃ na passati. Virajjati
atk-s0519a:506_5: virāgā vimuccatīti padehi lokuttaradhammānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādabhāvaṃ dassento tadatthatāya
atk-s0519a:507: 44. Nāmasampayuttoti nāmena missito. Saupādisesā nibbānadhātūti arahattaphalaṃ adhippetaṃ. Tañca paññāpadhānanti āha – “saupādisesā nibbānadhātu vijjāti. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0519a:510_0: 45. Tattha katamo sodhano hāroti sodhanahāravibhaṅgo. Tattha bhagavā padaṃ sodhetīti
atk-s0519a:510_1: “avijjāya nivuto loko”ti vadanto bhagavā – “kenassu nivuto loko”ti āyasmatā ajitena
atk-s0519a:510_2: pucchāvasena vuttaṃ padaṃ sodheti nāma, tadatthassa vissajjanato. No ca ārambhanti
atk-s0519a:510_3: na tāva ārambhaṃ sodheti, ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa apariyositattā. Suddho ārambhoti
atk-s0519a:510_4: ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa pabodhitattā sodhito ārambhoti attho. Aññāṇapakkhandānaṃ
atk-s0519a:510_5: dveḷhakajātānaṃ vā pucchanakāle pucchitānaṃ pucchāvisayo avijaṭaṃ mahāgahanaṃ viya
atk-s0519a:510_6: mahāduggaṃ viya ca andhakāraṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti. Yadā ca bhagavatā paṇḍitehi vā bhagavato
atk-s0519a:510_7: sāvakehi apade padaṃ dassentehi nijjaṭaṃ nigumbaṃ katvā pañhe vissajjite mahatā gandhahatthinā
atk-s0519a:510_8: abhibhavitvā obhaggapadālito gahanappadeso viya vigatandhakāro vibhūto upaṭṭhahamāno
atk-s0519a:513_0: 46. Tattha katamo adhiṭṭhāno hāroti adhiṭṭhānahāravibhaṅgo. Tattha tathā dhārayitabbāti
atk-s0519a:513_1: ekattavemattatāsaṅkhātasāmaññavisesamattato dhārayitabbā, na pana tattha kiñci vikappetabbāti
atk-s0519a:513_2: adhippāyo. Avikappetabbatāya kāraṇaṃ niddesavāravaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva. Taṃ taṃ phalaṃ
atk-s0519a:513_3: maggati gavesatīti maggo, tadatthikehi maggīyati gavesīyatīti vā maggo. Niratiyaṭṭhena
atk-s0519a:513_4: nirassādaṭṭhena ca nirayo. Uddhaṃ anugantvā tiriyaṃ añcitāti tiracchānā. Tiracchānāva
atk-s0519a:513_5: tiracchānayoni. Petatāya petti, ito pecca gatabhāvoti attho. Petti eva pettivisayo.
atk-s0519a:513_6: Na suranti na bhāsanti na dibbantīti asurā. Asurā eva asurayoni. Dibbehi rūpādīhi
atk-s0519a:513_7: suṭṭhu aggāti saggā. Manassa ussannatāya manussā. Vānaṃ vuccati taṇhā, taṃ tattha
atk-s0519a:513_8: natthīti nibbānaṃ. Nirayaṃ gacchatīti nirayagāmī. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Asurayoniyoti
atk-s0519a:513_9: asurayoniyā hito, asurajātinibbattanakoti attho. Saggaṃ gametīti saggagāmiyo. Manussagāmīti
atk-s0519a:513_10: manussalokagāmī. Paṭisaṅkhānirodhoti paṭisaṅkhāya paṭipakkhabhāvanāya nirodho, paṭipakkhe
atk-s0519a:513_11: vā tathā appavatte uppajjanārahassa paṭipakkhavuttiyā anuppādo. Appaṭisaṅkhānirodhoti
atk-s0519a:514_0: 47. Rūpanti ekattatā. Bhūtānaṃ upādāyāti vemattatā. Upādārūpanti ekattatā. Cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe…
atk-s0519a:514_1: kabaḷīkāro āhāroti vemattatā. Tathā bhūtarūpanti ekattatā. Pathavīdhātu …pe… vāyodhātūti
atk-s0519a:514_2: vemattatā. Pathavīdhātūti ekattatā. Vīsati ākārā vemattatā. Āpodhātūti ekattatā.
atk-s0519a:514_3: Dvādasa ākārā vemattatā. Tejodhātūti ekattatā. Cattāro ākārā vemattatā. Vāyodhātūti
atk-s0519a:514_4: ekattatā. Cha ākārā vemattatāti imamatthaṃ dassento “dvīhi ākārehi dhātuyo pariggaṇhātī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:515_0: Tattha kesāti kesā nāma upādinnakasarīraṭṭhakā kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko
atk-s0519a:515_1: pathavīdhātukoṭṭhāso. Lomā nāma…pe… matthaluṅgaṃ nāma sarīraṭṭhakaṃ kakkhaḷalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:515_2: imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāsoti ayaṃ vemattatā. Āpodhātūtiādikoṭṭhāsesu pittādīsu
atk-s0519a:515_3: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – yena cāti yena tejodhātunā kupitena. Santappatīti
atk-s0519a:515_4: ayaṃ kāyo santappati ekāhikajarādibhāvena usumajāto hoti. Yena ca jīrīyatīti yena
atk-s0519a:515_5: ayaṃ kāyo jarīyati. Indriyavekallataṃ balakkhayaṃ valittacapalitādiñca pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0519a:515_6: Yena ca pariḍayhatīti yena kupitena ayaṃ kāyo ḍayhati, so ca puggalo “ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmī”ti
atk-s0519a:515_8: ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchatīti asitaṃ vā odanādi, pītaṃ vā
atk-s0519a:515_9: pānakādi, khāyitaṃ vā piṭṭhakhajjakādi, sāyitaṃ vā ambapakkamadhuphāṇitādi sammā
atk-s0519a:515_10: paripākaṃ gacchati, rasādibhāvena vivekaṃ gacchatīti attho. Ettha ca purimā tayo
atk-s0519a:516_0: Uddhaṅgamā vātāti uggārahikkārādipavattakā uddhaṃ ārohanavātā. Adhogamā vātāti uccārapassāvādinīharaṇakā
atk-s0519a:516_1: adho orohanavātā. Kucchisayā vātāti antānaṃ bahivātā. Koṭṭhāsayā vātāti antānaṃ antovātā.
atk-s0519a:516_2: Aṅgamaṅgānusārino vātāti dhamanijālānusārena sakalasarīre aṅgamaṅgāni anusaṭā samiñjanapasāraṇādinibbattakā
atk-s0519a:516_3: vātā. Assāsoti antopavisananāsikavāto. Passāsoti bahinikkhamananāsikavāto. Ettha
atk-s0519a:516_4: ca purimā sabbe catusamuṭṭhānā. Assāsapassāsā cittasamuṭṭhānā eva. Evaṃ vemattatādassanavasena
atk-s0519a:516_5: vibhāgena udāhaṭā catasso dhātuyo paṭikkūlamanasikāravasena upasaṃharanto “imehi
atk-s0519a:516_6: dvācattālīsāya ākārehī”tiādimāha. Tattha na gayhūpaganti na gahaṇayoggaṃ. Sabhāvabhāvatoti sabhāvalakkhaṇato.
atk-s0519a:517: Evaṃ paṭikkūlamanasikāraṃ dassetvā puna tattha sammasanacāraṃ pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ “tenāha bhagavā yā ceva kho panā”tiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ suviññeyyaṃ.
atk-s0519a:518_0: 48. Evaṃ saccamaggarūpadhammavasena adhiṭṭhānahāraṃ dassetvā idāni avijjāvijjādīnampi
atk-s0519a:518_1: vasena taṃ dassetuṃ “avijjāti ekattatā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādīsu
atk-s0519a:518_2: yasmā avijjā dukkhasaccassa yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na deti
atk-s0519a:518_3: chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhati, tasmā “dukkhe aññāṇa”nti vuccati. Tathā yasmā
atk-s0519a:518_5: jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na deti chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhati, tasmā “dukkhanirodhagāminiyā
atk-s0519a:518_6: paṭipadāya aññāṇa”nti vuccati. Pubbanto atītaddhabhūtā khandhāyatanadhātuyo. Aparanto
atk-s0519a:518_7: anāgataddhabhūtā. Pubbantāparanto tadubhayaṃ. Idappaccayatā saṅkhārādīnaṃ kāraṇāni
atk-s0519a:518_8: avijjādīni. Paṭiccasamuppannā dhammā avijjādīhi nibbattā saṅkhārādidhammā.
atk-s0519a:519_0: Tatthāyaṃ avijjā yasmā atītānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ yāva paṭiccasamuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:519_1: yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na deti chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0519a:519_2: tasmā “pubbante aññāṇaṃ yāva paṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇa”nti vuccati, evāyaṃ
atk-s0519a:519_3: avijjā kiccato jātitopi kathitā. Ayañhi imāni aṭṭha ṭhānāni jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
atk-s0519a:519_4: na detīti kiccato kathitā. Uppajjamānāpi imesu aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu uppajjatīti jātito
atk-s0519a:519_5: kathitā. Evaṃ kiccato jātito ca kathitāpi lakkhaṇato kathite eva sukathitā hotīti
atk-s0519a:520_0: Tattha ñāṇaṃ atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti.
atk-s0519a:520_1: Ayaṃ pana avijjā uppajjitvā taṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ na detīti ñāṇapaccanīkato aññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:520_2: Dassanantipi paññā, sā hi taṃ ākāraṃ passati. Avijjā pana uppajjitvā passituṃ na
atk-s0519a:520_3: detīti adassanaṃ. Abhisamayotipi paññā, sā taṃ ākāraṃ abhisameti. Avijjā pana uppajjitvā
atk-s0519a:520_4: taṃ abhisametuṃ na detīti anabhisamayo. Anubodho sambodho paṭivedhotipi paññā, sā
atk-s0519a:520_5: taṃ ākāraṃ anubujjhati sambujjhati paṭivijjhati. Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ anubujjhituṃ
atk-s0519a:520_6: sambujjhituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na detīti ananubodho asambodho appaṭivedho. Tathā sallakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:520_7: upalakkhaṇaṃ paccupalakkhaṇaṃ samapekkhaṇantipi paññā, sā taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhati
atk-s0519a:520_8: upalakkhati paccupalakkhati samaṃ sammā ca apekkhati. Avijjā pana uppajjitvā tassa
atk-s0519a:520_9: tathā kātuṃ na detīti asallakkhaṇaṃ anupalakkhaṇaṃ apaccupalakkhaṇaṃ asamapekkhaṇanti ca vuccati.
atk-s0519a:521_0: Nāssa kiñci paccakkhakammaṃ atthi, sayañca appaccavekkhitvā katakammanti appaccakkhakammaṃ.
atk-s0519a:521_1: Dummedhānaṃ bhāvo dummejjhaṃ. Bālānaṃ bhāvo bālyaṃ. Sampajaññanti paññā, sā atthānatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:521_2: kāraṇākāraṇaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ sampajānāti. Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ pajānituṃ
atk-s0519a:521_3: na detīti asampajaññaṃ. Mohanavasena moho. Pamohanavasena pamoho. Sammohanavasena
atk-s0519a:521_4: sammoho. Avindiyaṃ vindati, vindiyaṃ na vindatīti avijjā. Vaṭṭasmiṃ ohanati otaratīti
atk-s0519a:521_5: avijjogho. Vaṭṭasmiṃ yojetīti avijjāyogo. Appahīnaṭṭhena ceva punappunaṃ uppajjanato
atk-s0519a:521_6: ca avijjānusayo. Magge pariyuṭṭhitacorā viya addhike kusalacittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti viluppatīti
atk-s0519a:521_7: avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ. Yathā nagaradvāre palighasaṅkhātāya laṅgiyā patitāya manussānaṃ
atk-s0519a:521_8: nagarappaveso pacchijjati, evameva yassa sakkāyanagare ayaṃ patitā, tassa nibbānasampāpakaṃ
atk-s0519a:521_9: ñāṇagamanaṃ pacchijjatīti avijjālaṅgī nāma hoti. Akusalañca taṃ mūlañca, akusalānaṃ
atk-s0519a:521_10: vā mūlanti akusalamūlaṃ. Taṃ pana na aññaṃ, idhādhippeto mohoti moho akusalamūlanti
atk-s0519a:521_11: ayaṃ ekapadiko avijjāya atthuddhāro. Ayaṃ vemattatāti ayaṃ avijjāya vemattatā.
atk-s0519a:522_0: Vijjāti vindiyaṃ vindatīti vijjā, vijjhanaṭṭhena vijjā, viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vijjā.
atk-s0519a:522_1: “Dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīsu dukkhasaccassa yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ jānāti passati paṭivijjhatīti
atk-s0519a:522_2: dukkhe ariyasacce visayabhūte ñāṇaṃ “dukkhe ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Paññāti
atk-s0519a:522_3: tassa tassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇasaṅkhātena paññāpanaṭṭhena paññā, tena tena vā aniccādinā
atk-s0519a:522_4: pakārena dhamme jānātīti paññā. Pajānanākāro pajānanā. Aniccādīni vicinatīti vicayo.
atk-s0519a:522_5: Pakārehi vicinatīti pavicayo. Catusaccadhamme vicinatīti dhammavicayo. Aniccādīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:522_6: sallakkhaṇavasena sallakkhaṇā. Tesaṃyeva pati pati upalakkhaṇavasena paccupalakkhaṇā.
atk-s0519a:522_7: Paṇḍitabhāvo paṇḍiccaṃ. Kusalabhāvo kosallaṃ. Nipuṇabhāvo nepuññaṃ. Aniccādīnaṃ vibhāvanavasena
atk-s0519a:522_8: vebhabyā. Tesaṃyeva cintanavasena cintā. Aniccādīni upaparikkhatīti upaparikkhā.
atk-s0519a:522_9: Bhūrīti pathaviyā nāmaṃ, ayampi saṇhaṭṭhena vitthataṭṭhena ca bhūrī viyāti bhūrī.
atk-s0519a:522_10: Tena vuttaṃ – “bhūrī vuccati pathavī, tāya pathavisamāya vitthatāya paññāya samannāgatoti
atk-s0519a:522_11: bhūripañño”ti. Api ca bhūrīti paññāyevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Bhūte atthe ramatīti bhūrī.
atk-s0519a:523_0: Kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā, khippaṃ gahaṇadhāraṇaṭṭhena vā medhā. Yassuppajjati,
atk-s0519a:523_1: taṃ sattaṃ hitapaṭipattiyaṃ sampayuttaṃ vā yāthāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhe pariṇetīti pariṇāyikā.
atk-s0519a:523_2: Aniccādivasena dhamme vipassatīti vipassanā. Sammā pakārehi aniccādīni jānātīti sampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0519a:523_3: Uppathapaṭipanne sindhave vīthiāropanatthaṃ patodo viya uppathe dhāvanakūṭacittaṃ
atk-s0519a:523_4: vīthiāropanatthaṃ vijjhatīti patodo viyāti patodo. Dassanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti
atk-s0519a:523_5: indriyaṃ, paññāsaṅkhātaṃ indriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ. Avijjāya na kampatīti paññābalaṃ.
atk-s0519a:523_6: Kilesacchedanaṭṭhena paññāva satthaṃ paññāsatthaṃ. Accuggataṭṭhena paññāva pāsādo
atk-s0519a:524_0: Obhāsanaṭṭhena paññāva obhāso paññāobhāso. Pajjotanaṭṭhena paññāva pajjoto paññāpajjoto.
atk-s0519a:524_2: atulaṭṭhena anomasattaparibhogaṭṭhena ca paññāva ratanaṃ paññāratanaṃ. Na tena sattā
atk-s0519a:524_3: muyhanti, sayaṃ vā ārammaṇe na muyhatīti amoho. Dhammavicayapadaṃ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0519a:524_4: Kasmā panetaṃ puna vuttanti? Amohassa mohapaṭipakkhabhāvadīpanatthaṃ. Tenetaṃ dīpeti
atk-s0519a:524_5: – yvāyaṃ amoho, so na kevalaṃ mohato añño dhammo, mohassa paṭipakkho dhammavicayasaṅkhāto
atk-s0519a:524_7: pasattho sundaro vā bojjhaṅgoti dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo. Maggaṅganti ariyamaggassa
atk-s0519a:524_8: aṅgaṃ kāraṇanti maggaṅgaṃ. Ariyamaggassa antogadhattā maggapariyāpannanti.
atk-s0519a:525_1: Anuppanne hi buddhe ekacce titthāyatane pabbajitvā vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā catutthajjhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:525_2: nibbattetvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya saññāya dosaṃ passanti, saññāya sati hatthacchedādidukkhañceva
atk-s0519a:525_3: sabbabhayāni ca honti, “alaṃ imāya saññāya, saññābhāvo santo”ti evaṃ saññāya dosaṃ
atk-s0519a:525_4: passitvā saññāvirāgavasena catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhānā kālaṃ katvā
atk-s0519a:525_5: asaññīsu nibbattanti. Cittaṃ nesaṃ cuticittanirodheneva idha nivattati, rūpakkhandhamattameva tattha nibbattati.
atk-s0519a:526_0: Te yathā nāma jiyāvegukkhitto saro yattako jiyāvego, tattakameva ākāse gacchati,
atk-s0519a:526_1: evamevaṃ jhānavegukkhittā upapajjitvā yattako jhānavego, tattakameva kālaṃ tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0519a:526_2: Jhānavege pana parikkhīṇe tattha rūpakkhandho antaradhāyati, idha paṭisandhisaññā
atk-s0519a:526_4: viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpatti. Sā hi paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa paṭhamāruppasaññāyapi vibhāvanato
atk-s0519a:526_5: “vibhūtasaññā”ti vuccati. Keci “vibhūtarūpasaññā”ti paṭhanti, tesaṃ matena vibhūtarūpasamāpatti
atk-s0519a:527_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho jhāyīti jhānalābhī puthujjano. Ājāniyo jhāyīti arahā, sabbepi
atk-s0519a:527_1: vā ariyapuggalā. Assakhaluṅko jhāyīti khaluṅkassasadiso jhāyī. Tathā hi khaluṅko
atk-s0519a:527_2: asso damathaṃ na upeti ito cito ca yathāruci dhāvati, evamevaṃ yo puthujjano abhiññālābhī,
atk-s0519a:527_3: so abhiññā assādetvā “alamettāvatā, katamettāvatā”ti uttaridamathāya aparisakkanto
atk-s0519a:527_4: abhiññācittavasena ito cito ca dhāvati pavattati, so “assakhaluṅko jhāyī”ti vutto.
atk-s0519a:527_5: Diṭṭhuttaro jhāyīti jhānalābhī diṭṭhigatiko. Paññuttaro jhāyīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena
atk-s0519a:527_6: jhāyī, sabbo eva vā paññādhiko jhāyī.
atk-s0519a:528_0: Saraṇo samādhīti akusalacittekaggatā, sabbopi vā sāsavo samādhi. Araṇo samādhīti
atk-s0519a:528_1: sabbo kusalābyākato samādhi, lokuttaro eva vā. Savero samādhīti paṭighacittesu ekaggatā.
atk-s0519a:528_2: Avero samādhīti mettācetovimutti. Anantaradukepi eseva nayo. Sāmiso samādhīti lokiyasamādhi.
atk-s0519a:528_3: So hi anatikkantavaṭṭāmisalokāmisatāya sāmiso. Nirāmiso samādhīti lokuttaro samādhi.
atk-s0519a:528_4: Sasaṅkhāro samādhīti dukkhāpaṭipado dandhābhiñño sukhāpaṭipado ca dandhābhiñño. So
atk-s0519a:528_5: hi sasaṅkhārena sappayogena cittena paccanīkadhamme kicchena kasirena niggahetvā
atk-s0519a:528_6: adhigantabbo. Itaro asaṅkhāro samādhi. Ekaṃsabhāvito samādhīti sukkhavipassakassa
atk-s0519a:528_7: samādhi. Ubhayaṃsabhāvito samādhīti samathayānikassa samādhi. Ubhayato bhāvitabhāvano
atk-s0519a:528_8: samādhīti kāyasakkhino ubhatobhāgavimuttassa ca samādhi. So hi ubhayato bhāgehi ubhayato bhāvitabhāvano.
atk-s0519a:529_0: Āgāḷhapaṭipadāti kāmānaṃ orohanapaṭipatti, kāmasukhānuyogoti attho. Nijjhāmapaṭipadāti
atk-s0519a:529_1: kāmassa nijjhāpanavasena khedanavasena pavattā paṭipatti, attakilamathānuyogoti attho.
atk-s0519a:529_2: Akkhamā paṭipadātiādīsu padhānakaraṇakāle sītādīni asahantassa paṭipadā, tāni nakkhamatīti
atk-s0519a:529_3: akkhamā. Sahantassa pana tāni khamatīti khamā. “Uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:529_4: nayena micchāvitakke sametīti samā. Manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni dametīti damā paṭipadā.
atk-s0519a:530_0: Evanti iminā vuttanayena. Yo dhammoti yo koci jātiādidhammo. Yassa dhammassāti tato
atk-s0519a:530_1: aññassa jarādidhammassa. Samānabhāvoti dukkhādibhāvena samānabhāvo. Ekattatāyāti
atk-s0519a:530_2: samānatāya dukkhādibhāvānaṃ ekībhāvena. Ekī bhavatīti anekopi “dukkha”ntiādinā ekasaddābhidheyyatāya
atk-s0519a:530_3: ekī bhavati. Etena ekattatāya lakkhaṇamāha. Yena yena vā pana vilakkhaṇoti yo dhammo
atk-s0519a:530_4: yassa dhammassa yena yena bhāvena visadiso. Tena tena vemattaṃ gacchatīti tena tena
atk-s0519a:530_5: bhāvena so dhammo tassa dhammassa vemattataṃ visadisattaṃ gacchati, dukkhabhāvena
atk-s0519a:530_6: samānopi jātiādiko abhinibbattiādibhāvena jarādikassa visiṭṭhataṃ gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0519a:531_0: Idāni tāva ekattavemattatāvisaye niyojetvā dassetuṃ “sutte vā veyyākaraṇe vā”tiādi
atk-s0519a:531_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha pucchitanti pucchāvasena desitasuttavasena vuttaṃ, na pana adhiṭṭhānahārassa
atk-s0519a:534_0: 49. Tattha katamo parikkhāro hāroti parikkhārahāravibhaṅgo. Tattha yo dhammo yaṃ
atk-s0519a:534_1: dhammaṃ janayati, tassa so parikkhāroti saṅkhepato parikkhāralakkhaṇaṃ vatvā taṃ
atk-s0519a:534_2: vibhāgena dassetuṃ “kiṃlakkhaṇo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha hinoti attano phalaṃ paṭikāraṇabhāvaṃ
atk-s0519a:534_3: gacchatīti hetu. Paṭicca etasmā phalaṃ etīti paccayo. Kiñcāpi hetupaccayasaddehi
atk-s0519a:534_4: kāraṇameva vuccati, tathāpi tattha visesaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “asādhāraṇalakkhaṇo”tiādi
atk-s0519a:534_5: vuttaṃ. Sabhāvo hetūti samānabhāvo bījaṃ hetu. Nanu ca bījaṃ aṅkurādisadisaṃ na hotīti?
atk-s0519a:534_6: No na hoti, aññato hi tādisassa anuppajjanato.
atk-s0519a:535_0: “Yathā vā panā”tiādināpi udāharaṇantaradassanena hetupaccayānaṃ visesameva vibhāveti.
atk-s0519a:535_1: Tattha duddhanti khīraṃ. Dadhi bhavatīti ekattanayena abhedopacārena vā vuttaṃ, na
atk-s0519a:535_2: aññathā. Na hi khīraṃ dadhi hoti. Tenevāha – “na catthi ekakālasamavadhānaṃ duddhassa
atk-s0519a:535_3: ca dadhissa cā”ti. Atha vā ghaṭe duddhaṃ pakkhittaṃ dadhi bhavati, dadhi tattha kālantare
atk-s0519a:535_4: jāyati paccayantarasamāyogena, tasmā na catthi ekakālasamavadhānaṃ duddhassa ca dadhissa
atk-s0519a:535_5: ca rasakhīravipākādīhi bhinnasabhāvattā. Evamevanti yathā hetubhūtassa khīrassa phalabhūtena
atk-s0519a:535_6: dadhinā na ekakālasamavadhānaṃ, evamaññassāpi hetussa phalena na ekakālasamavadhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a:535_7: na tathā paccayassa, na hi paccayo ekantena phalena bhinnakālo evāti. Evampi hetupaccayānaṃ
atk-s0519a:536_0: Evaṃ bāhiraṃ hetupaccayavibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni ajjhattikaṃ dassetuṃ “ayañhi saṃsāro”tiādi
atk-s0519a:536_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha “avijjā avijjāya hetū”ti vutte kiṃ ekasmiṃ cittuppāde anekā avijjā
atk-s0519a:536_2: vijjantīti? Āha “purimikā avijjā pacchimikāya avijjāya hetū”ti. Tena ekasmiṃ kāle
atk-s0519a:536_3: hetuphalānaṃ samavadhānaṃ natthīti etamevatthaṃ samattheti. Tattha “purimikā avijjā”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:536_4: hetuphalabhūtānaṃ avijjānaṃ vibhāgaṃ dasseti. “Bījaṅkuro viyā”tiādinā imamatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:536_5: dasseti – yathā bījaṃ aṅkurassa hetu hontaṃ samanantarahetutāya hetu hoti. Yaṃ pana
atk-s0519a:536_6: bījato phalaṃ nibbattati, tassa bījaṃ paramparahetutāya hetu hoti. Evaṃ avijjāyapi
atk-s0519a:537_0: Puna “yathā vā panā”tiādināpi hetupaccayavibhāgameva dasseti. Tattha thālakanti dīpakapallikā.
atk-s0519a:537_1: Anaggikanti aggiṃ vinā. Dīpetunti jāletuṃ. Iti sabhāvo hetūti evaṃ padīpujjālanādīsu
atk-s0519a:537_2: aggiādipadīpasadisaṃ kāraṇaṃ sabhāvo hetu. Parabhāvo paccayoti tattheva kapallikāvaṭṭitelādisadiso
atk-s0519a:537_3: aggito añño sabhāvo paccayo. Ajjhattikoti niyakajjhattiko niyakajjhatte bhavo. Bāhiroti
atk-s0519a:537_4: tato bahibhūto. Janakoti nibbattako. Pariggāhakoti upatthambhako. Asādhāraṇoti āveṇiko.
atk-s0519a:538_0: Idāni yasmā kāraṇaṃ “parikkhāro”ti vuttaṃ, kāraṇabhāvo ca phalāpekkhāya, tasmā kāraṇassa
atk-s0519a:538_1: yo kāraṇabhāvo yathā ca so hoti, yañca phalaṃ yo ca tassa viseso, yo ca kāraṇaphalānaṃ
atk-s0519a:538_2: sambandho, taṃ sabbaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “avupacchedattho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kāraṇaphalabhāvena
atk-s0519a:538_3: sambandhatā santati. Ko ca tattha sambandho, ko kāraṇaphalabhāvo ca? So eva avupacchedattho.
atk-s0519a:538_4: Yo phalabhūto aññassa akāraṇaṃ hutvā nirujjhati, so vupacchinno nāma hoti, yathā
atk-s0519a:538_5: taṃ arahato cuticittaṃ. Yo pana attano anurūpassa phalassa hetu hutvā nirujjhati,
atk-s0519a:538_6: so anupacchinno eva nāma hoti, hetuphalasambandhassa vijjamānattāti āha – “avupacchedattho santatiattho”ti.
atk-s0519a:539_0: Yasmā ca kāraṇato nibbattaṃ phalaṃ nāma, na anibbattaṃ, tasmā “nibbattiattho phalattho”ti
atk-s0519a:539_1: vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana purimabhavena anantarabhavapaṭisandhānavasena pavattā upapattikkhandhā
atk-s0519a:539_2: punabbhavo, tasmā vuttaṃ – “paṭisandhiattho punabbhavattho”ti. Tathā yassa puggalassa
atk-s0519a:539_3: kilesā uppajjanti, taṃ palibundhenti sammā paṭipajjituṃ na denti. Yāva ca maggena
atk-s0519a:539_4: asamugghātitā, tāva anusenti nāma, tena vuttaṃ – “palibodhattho pariyuṭṭhānattho,
atk-s0519a:539_5: asamugghātattho anusayattho”ti. Pariññābhisamayavasena pariññāte na kadāci taṃ nāmarūpaṅkurassa
atk-s0519a:539_6: kāraṇaṃ hessatīti āha – “apariññātattho viññāṇassa bījattho”ti. Yattha avupacchedo
atk-s0519a:539_7: tattha santatīti yattha rūpārūpappavattiyaṃ yathāvutto avupacchedo, tattha santativohāro.
atk-s0519a:539_8: Yattha santati tattha nibbattītiādi paccayaparamparadassanaṃ hetuphalasambandhavibhāvanameva.
atk-s0519a:540_0: “Yathā vā pana cakkhuñca paṭiccā”tiādinā “sabhāvo hetū”ti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāgena
atk-s0519a:540_1: dasseti. Tattha sannissayatāyāti upanissayapaccayatāya. Manasikāroti kiriyāmanodhātu.
atk-s0519a:540_2: Sā hi cakkhuviññāṇassa viññāṇabhāvena samānajātitāya sabhāvo hetu. Saṅkhārā viññāṇassa
atk-s0519a:540_3: paccayo sabhāvo hetūti puññādiabhisaṅkhārā paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paccayo, tattha yo
atk-s0519a:540_4: sabhāvo, so hetūti. Saṅkhārāti cettha sabbo lokiyo kusalākusalacittuppādo adhippeto.
atk-s0519a:540_5: Iminā nayena sesapadesupi attho veditabbo. Evaṃ yo koci upanissayo sabbo so parikkhāroti
atk-s0519a:540_6: yathāvuttappabhedo yo koci paccayo, so sabbo attano phalassa parikkharaṇato abhisaṅkharaṇato
atk-s0519a:540_7: parikkhāro. Tassa niddhāretvā kathanaṃ parikkhāro hāroti.
atk-s0519a:543_0: 50. Tattha katamo samāropano hāroti samāropanahāravibhaṅgo. Tattha ekasmiṃ padaṭṭhāneti
atk-s0519a:543_1: yasmiṃ kismiñci ekasmiṃ kāraṇabhūte dhamme suttena gahite. Yattakāni padaṭṭhānāni
atk-s0519a:543_2: otarantīti yattakāni aññesaṃ kāraṇabhūtāni tasmiṃ dhamme samosaranti. Sabbāni tāni
atk-s0519a:543_3: samāropayitabbānīti sabbāni tāni padaṭṭhānāni padaṭṭhānabhūtā dhammā sammā niddhāraṇavasena
atk-s0519a:543_4: ānetvā desanāya āropetabbā, desanāruḷhe viya katvā kathetabbāti attho. Yathā āvaṭṭe
atk-s0519a:543_5: hāre “ekamhi padaṭṭhāne, pariyesati sesakaṃ padaṭṭhāna”nti vacanato anekesaṃ padaṭṭhānānaṃ
atk-s0519a:543_6: pariyesanā vuttā, evamidhāpi bahūnaṃ padaṭṭhānānaṃ samāropanā kātabbāti dassento
atk-s0519a:543_7: “yathā āvaṭṭe hāre”ti āha. Na kevalaṃ padaṭṭhānavaseneva samāropanā, atha kho vevacanabhāvanāpahānavasenapi
atk-s0519a:544_0: Kasmā panettha padaṭṭhānavevacanāni gahitāni, nanu padaṭṭhānavevacanahāre eva ayamattho
atk-s0519a:544_1: vibhāvitoti? Saccametaṃ, idha pana padaṭṭhānavevacanaggahaṇaṃ bhāvanāpahānānaṃ adhiṭṭhānavisayadassanatthañceva
atk-s0519a:544_2: tesaṃ adhivacanavibhāgadassanatthañca. Evañhi bhāvanāpahānāni suviññeyyāni honti
atk-s0519a:544_3: sukarāni ca paññāpetuṃ. Idaṃ padaṭṭhānanti idaṃ tividhaṃ sucaritaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanassa
atk-s0519a:544_4: ovādassa visayādhiṭṭhānabhāvato padaṭṭhānaṃ. Tattha “kāyika”ntiādinā tīhi sucaritehi
atk-s0519a:544_5: sīlādayo tayo khandhe samathavipassanā tatiyacatutthaphalāni ca niddhāretvā dasseti,
atk-s0519a:544_6: taṃ suviññeyyameva. Vanīyatīti vanaṃ, vanati, vanute iti vā vanaṃ. Tattha yasmā pañca
atk-s0519a:544_7: kāmaguṇā kāmataṇhāya, nimittaggāho anubyañjanaggāhassa, ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni
atk-s0519a:544_8: tappaṭibandhachandarāgādīnaṃ, anusayā ca pariyuṭṭhānānaṃ kāraṇāni honti, tasmā tamatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:545_0: 51. Ayaṃ vevacanena samāropanāti yo “rāgavirāgā cetovimutti sekkhaphalaṃ, anāgāmiphalaṃ,
atk-s0519a:545_1: kāmadhātusamatikkamana”nti etehi pariyāyavacanehi tatiyaphalassa niddeso, tathā yo
atk-s0519a:545_3: etehi pariyāyavacanehi catutthaphalassa niddeso, yo ca “paññindriya”ntiādīhi pariyāyavacanehi
atk-s0519a:545_4: paññāya niddeso, ayaṃ vevacanehi ca samāropanā.
atk-s0519a:546_0: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, bhikkhu, kāye kāyānupassī viharāhītiādi lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-s0519a:546_1: vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Kevalaṃ tattha ekalakkhaṇattā avuttānampi vuttabhāvadassanavaseneva
atk-s0519a:546_2: āgataṃ, idha bhāvanāsamāropanavasenāti ayameva viseso. Kāyānupassanā visesato asubhānupassanā
atk-s0519a:546_4: paribandhakilesā kāmupādānaṃ kāmayogo abhijjhākāyagantho kāmāsavo kāmogho rāgasallaṃ
atk-s0519a:546_5: rūpadhammapariññāya paṭipakkhakilesā rūpadhammesu rāgo chandāgatigamananti etesaṃ
atk-s0519a:546_6: pāpadhammānaṃ pahānāya saṃvattatīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “kāye kāyānupassī viharanto”tiādinā.
atk-s0519a:550_0: Ādivacanato sabbaṃ vedanaṃ “dukkha”nti passantī sukhasaññāya vedanāhetupariññāya
atk-s0519a:550_1: paribandhakilesānaṃ gosīlādīhi bhavasuddhi hotīti vedanāssādena pavattassa bhavupādānasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0519a:550_4: bhavarāgassa bhavapariññāya paribandhakakilesānaṃ vedanāvisayassa rāgassa dosāgatigamanassa
atk-s0519a:550_5: ca pahānāya saṃvattatīti etamatthaṃ dasseti “vedanāsu vedanānupassī”tiādinā.
atk-s0519a:551_0: Tathā cittānupassanā visesato aniccānupassanāti, sā cittaṃ “anicca”nti passantī tattha
atk-s0519a:551_1: yebhuyyena sattā niccasaññinoti niccasaññāya viññāṇāhārapariññāya paribandhakilesānaṃ
atk-s0519a:551_4: paṭipakkhakilesānaṃ saññāya rāgassa diṭṭhābhinivesassa appahīnattā uppajjanakassa
atk-s0519a:551_5: bhayāgatigamanassa ca pahānāya saṃvattatīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “citte cittānupassī”tiādinā.
atk-s0519a:552_0: Tathā dhammānupassanā visesato anattasaññāti, sā saṅkhāresu attasaññāya manosañcetanāhārapariññāya
atk-s0519a:552_3: saṅkhārapariññāya paribandhakilesānaṃ saṅkhāresu rāgassa mohāgatigamanassa ca pahānāya
atk-s0519a:552_4: saṃvattatīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “dhammesu dhammānupassī viharanto”tiādinā. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0519a:556_0: Evaṃ suparikammakatāya bhūmiyā nānāvaṇṇāni muttapupphāni pakiranto viya susikkhitasippācariyavicāritesu
atk-s0519a:556_2: viya mahāpathaviṃ parivattetvā pappaṭakojaṃ khādāpento viya yojanikamadhugaṇḍaṃ pīḷetvā
atk-s0519a:556_3: sumadhurasaṃ pāyento viya ca āyasmā mahākaccāno nānāsuttapadese udāharanto soḷasa
atk-s0519a:556_4: hāre vibhajitvā idāni te ekasmiṃyeva sutte yojetvā dassento hārasampātavāraṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0519a:559: Saṅkhipiya aṅkusena hi, nayehi tīhi niddise sutta”nti. –
atk-s0519a:560_0: Gāthā vuttā. Yasmā taṃ hāravibhaṅgavāro nappayojeti, vippakiṇṇavisayattā, nayavicārassa
atk-s0519a:560_1: ca antaritattā. Anekehi suttapadesehi hārānaṃ vibhāgadassanameva hi hāravibhaṅgavāro.
atk-s0519a:560_2: Hārasampātavāro pana taṃ payojeti, ekasmiṃyeva suttapadese soḷasa hāre yojetvāva
atk-s0519a:560_3: tadanantaraṃ nayasamuṭṭhānassa kathitattā. Tasmā “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”nti gāthaṃ
atk-s0519a:560_4: paccāmasitvā “tassā niddeso kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbo, hārasampāte”ti āha. Tassattho – “tassā
atk-s0519a:560_5: gāthāya niddeso kattha daṭṭhabbo”ti. Etena suttesu hārānaṃ yojanānayadassanaṃ hārasampātavāroti
atk-s0519a:561_0: Arakkhitena cittenāti cakkhudvārādīsu satiārakkhābhāvena aguttena cittena. Micchādiṭṭhihatenāti
atk-s0519a:561_1: sassatādimicchābhinivesadūsitena. Thinamiddhābhibhūtenāti cittassa kāyassa ca akalyatālakkhaṇehi
atk-s0519a:561_2: thinamiddhehi ajjhotthaṭena. Vasaṃ mārassa gacchatīti kilesamārādīnaṃ yathākāmaṃ
atk-s0519a:561_3: karaṇīyo hotīti ayaṃ tāva gāthāya padattho.
atk-s0519a:562_0: Pamādanti “arakkhitena cittenā”ti idaṃ padaṃ chasu dvāresu sativosaggalakkhaṇaṃ pamādaṃ
atk-s0519a:562_1: katheti. Taṃ maccuno padanti taṃ pamajjanaṃ guṇamāraṇato maccusaṅkhātassa mārassa
atk-s0519a:562_2: vasavattanaṭṭhānaṃ, tena “arakkhitena cittena, vasaṃ mārassa gacchatī”ti paṭhamapādaṃ
atk-s0519a:562_3: catutthapādena sambandhitvā dasseti. So vipallāsoti yaṃ aniccassa khandhapañcakassa
atk-s0519a:562_5: vipallāso”ti. Sabbaṃ vipallāsasāmaññena gahetvā tassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ pucchati “kiṃ vipallāsayatī”ti.
atk-s0519a:562_6: Sāmaññassa ca viseso adhiṭṭhānabhāvena voharīyatīti āha – “saññaṃ cittaṃ diṭṭhimitī”ti.
atk-s0519a:562_7: Taṃ “vipallāsayatī”ti padena sambandhitabbaṃ. Tesu saññāvipallāso sabbamuduko, aniccādikassa
atk-s0519a:562_8: visayassa micchāvasena upaṭṭhitākāraggahaṇamattaṃ migapotakānaṃ tiṇapurisakesu purisoti
atk-s0519a:562_9: uppannasaññā viya. Cittavipallāso tato balavataro, amaṇiādike visaye maṇiādiākārena
atk-s0519a:562_10: upaṭṭhahante tathā sanniṭṭhānaṃ viya niccādito sanniṭṭhānamattaṃ. Diṭṭhivipallāso
atk-s0519a:562_11: pana sabbabalavataro yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yathā yathā upaṭṭhāti, tathā tathā naṃ sassatādivasena
atk-s0519a:562_12: “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti abhinivisanto pavattati. Tattha saññāvipallāso cittavipallāsassa
atk-s0519a:563_0: Idāni vipallāsānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ visayaṃ dassetuṃ “so kuhiṃ vipallāsayati, catūsu
atk-s0519a:563_1: attabhāvavatthūsū”ti āha. Tattha attabhāvavatthūsūti pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu. Te
atk-s0519a:563_2: hi āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti attā, “attā”ti bhavati ettha buddhi vohāro cāti attabhāvo,
atk-s0519a:563_3: so eva subhādīnaṃ vipallāsassa ca adhiṭṭhānabhāvato vatthu cāti “attabhāvavatthū”ti
atk-s0519a:563_4: vuccati. “Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādinā tesaṃ sabbavipallāsamūlabhūtāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā
atk-s0519a:563_5: pavattiṭṭhānabhāvena attabhāvavatthutaṃ dassetvā puna vipallāsānaṃ pavattiākārena
atk-s0519a:563_6: saddhiṃ visayaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ paṭhamaṃ vipallāsavatthu asubhe subha”nti
atk-s0519a:563_7: vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ suviññeyyaṃ. Puna mūlakāraṇavasena vipallāse vibhajitvā dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:563_8: “dve dhammā cittassa saṃkilesā”tiādimāha. Tattha kiñcāpi avijjārahitā taṇhā natthi,
atk-s0519a:563_9: avijjā ca subhasukhasaññānampi paccayo eva, tathāpi taṇhā etāsaṃ sātisayaṃ paccayoti
atk-s0519a:563_10: dassetuṃ “taṇhānivutaṃ…pe… dukkhe sukha”nti vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhinivutanti diṭṭhisīsena
atk-s0519a:563_11: avijjā vuttāti avijjānivutanti attho. Kāmañcettha taṇhārahitā diṭṭhi natthi, taṇhāpi
atk-s0519a:563_12: diṭṭhiyā paccayo eva. Taṇhāpi “niccaṃ attā”ti ayoniso ummujjantānaṃ tathāpavattamicchābhinivesassa
atk-s0519a:564_0: Yo diṭṭhivipallāsoti “anicce niccaṃ, anattani attā”ti pavattampi vipallāsadvayaṃ
atk-s0519a:564_1: sandhāyāha – “so atītaṃ rūpaṃ…pe… atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti. Etena
atk-s0519a:564_2: aṭṭhārasavidhopi pubbantānukappikavādo pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ vipallāsānaṃ vasena hotīti
atk-s0519a:564_3: dasseti. Taṇhāvipallāsoti taṇhāmūlako vipallāso. “Asubhe subhaṃ, dukkhe sukha”nti
atk-s0519a:564_4: etaṃ vipallāsadvayaṃ sandhāya vadati. Anāgataṃ rūpaṃ abhinandatīti anāgataṃ rūpaṃ
atk-s0519a:564_5: diṭṭhābhinandanavasena abhinandati. Anāgataṃ vedanaṃ, saññaṃ, saṅkhāre, viññāṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:564_6: abhinandatīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Etena catucattālīsavidhopi aparantānukappikavādo
atk-s0519a:564_7: yebhuyyena purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ vipallāsānaṃ vasena hotīti dasseti. Dve dhammā cittassa
atk-s0519a:564_8: upakkilesāti evaṃ paramasāvajjassa vipallāsassa mūlakāraṇanti visesato dve dhammā
atk-s0519a:564_9: cittassa upakkilesā taṇhā ca avijjā cāti te sarūpato dasseti. Tāhi visujjhantaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0519a:564_10: visujjhatīti paṭipakkhavasenapi tāsaṃ upakkilesabhāvaṃyeva vibhāveti, na hi taṇhāavijjāsu
atk-s0519a:564_11: pahīnāsu koci saṃkilesadhammo na pahīyatīti. Yathā ca vipallāsānaṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ taṇhāvijjā,
atk-s0519a:564_12: evaṃ sakalassāpi vaṭṭassa mūlakāraṇanti yathānusandhināva gāthaṃ niṭṭhapetuṃ “tesa”ntiādi
atk-s0519a:564_13: vuttaṃ. Tattha tesanti yesaṃ arakkhitaṃ cittaṃ micchādiṭṭhihatañca, tesaṃ. “Avijjānīvaraṇāna”ntiādinā
atk-s0519a:565_0: Thinamiddhābhibhūtenāti ettha “thinaṃ nāmā”tiādinā thinamiddhānaṃ sarūpaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a:565_1: Tehi cittassa abhibhūtatā suviññeyyāvāti taṃ anāmasitvā kilesamāraggahaṇeneva taṃnimittā
atk-s0519a:565_3: cā”ti ca-saddena vā tesampi gahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. So hi nivuto saṃsārābhimukhoti
atk-s0519a:565_4: so māravasaṃ gato, tato eva nivuto kilesehi yāva na mārabandhanaṃ chijjati, tāva
atk-s0519a:565_5: saṃsārābhimukhova hoti, na visaṅkhārābhimukhoti adhippāyo. Imāni bhagavatā dve saccāni
atk-s0519a:566_0: Tattha duvidhā kathā abhidhammanissitā ca suttantanissitā ca. Tāsu abhidhammanissitā
atk-s0519a:566_1: nāma arakkhitena cittenāti rattampi cittaṃ arakkhitaṃ, duṭṭhampi cittaṃ arakkhitaṃ,
atk-s0519a:566_2: mūḷhampi cittaṃ arakkhitaṃ. Tattha rattaṃ cittaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ lobhasahagatacittuppādānaṃ
atk-s0519a:566_3: vasena veditabbaṃ, duṭṭhaṃ cittaṃ dvinnaṃ paṭighacittuppādānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0519a:566_4: mūḷhaṃ cittaṃ dvinnaṃ momūhacittuppādānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ. Yāva imesaṃ cittuppādānaṃ
atk-s0519a:566_5: vasena indriyānaṃ agutti agopāyanā apālanā anārakkhā sativosaggo pamādo cittassa
atk-s0519a:566_6: asaṃvaro, evaṃ arakkhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Micchādiṭṭhihataṃ nāma cittaṃ catunnaṃ diṭṭhisampayuttacittuppādānaṃ
atk-s0519a:566_7: vasena veditabbaṃ, thinamiddhābhibhūtaṃ nāma cittaṃ pañcannaṃ sasaṅkhārikākusalacittuppādānaṃ
atk-s0519a:566_8: vasena veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ sabbepi aggahitaggahaṇena dvādasa akusalacittuppādā honti.
atk-s0519a:566_9: Te “katame dhammā akusalā? Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādinā cittuppādakaṇḍe
atk-s0519a:566_10: akusalacittuppādadesanāvasena vitthārato vattabbā. Mārassāti ettha pañca mārā. Tesu
atk-s0519a:566_11: kilesamārassa catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ catunnaṃ oghānaṃ catunnaṃ yogānaṃ catunnaṃ ganthānaṃ
atk-s0519a:566_12: catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ dasannaṃ kilesavatthūnaṃ vasena āsavagocchakādīsu
atk-s0519a:566_14: āgatānaṃ sattannaṃ kilesānañca vasena vibhāgo vattabbo. Ayaṃ tāvettha abhidhammanissitā kathā.
atk-s0519a:567_0: Suttantanissitā pana arakkhitena cittenāti cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hoti
atk-s0519a:567_1: anubyañjanaggāhī, yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā
atk-s0519a:567_2: pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya na paṭipajjati, na rakkhati
atk-s0519a:567_3: cakkhundriyaṃ, cakkhundriye na saṃvaraṃ āpajjati. Sotena …pe… ghānena… jivhāya… kāyena…
atk-s0519a:567_4: manasā…pe… manindriyena saṃvaraṃ āpajjati. Evaṃ arakkhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Micchādiṭṭhihatena
atk-s0519a:567_5: cāti micchādiṭṭhihataṃ nāma cittaṃ pubbantakappanavasena vā aparantakappanavasena
atk-s0519a:567_6: vā pubbantāparantakappanavasena vā micchābhinivisantassa ayoniso ummujjantassa “sassato
atk-s0519a:567_7: lokoti vā…pe… neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā yā diṭṭhi, tāya hataṃ
atk-s0519a:567_8: upahataṃ. Yā ca kho “imā cattāro sassatavādā…pe… pañca paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā”ti
atk-s0519a:567_9: brahmajāle pañcattaye ca āgatā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo, tāsaṃ vasena cittassa micchādiṭṭhihatabhāvo kathetabbo.
atk-s0519a:568_0: Thinamiddhābhibhūtenāti thinaṃ nāma cittassa akammaññatā. Middhaṃ nāma vedanādikkhandhattayassa
atk-s0519a:568_1: akammaññatā. Tathā thinaṃ anussāhasaṃhananaṃ. Middhaṃ asattivighāto. Iti thinena
atk-s0519a:568_2: middhena ca cittaṃ abhibhūtaṃ ajjhotthaṭaṃ upaddutaṃ saṅkocanappattaṃ layāpannaṃ.
atk-s0519a:568_3: Vasaṃ mārassa gacchatīti vaso nāma icchā lobho adhippāyo ruci ākaṅkhā āṇā āṇatti.
atk-s0519a:568_4: Māroti pañca mārā – khandhamāro abhisaṅkhāramāro maccumāro devaputtamāro kilesamāroti.
atk-s0519a:568_5: Gacchatīti tesaṃ vasaṃ icchaṃ…pe… āṇattiṃ gacchati upagacchati upeti vattati anuvattati
atk-s0519a:569_0: Tattha yathāvuttā akusalā dhammā, taṇhāvijjā eva vā samudayasaccaṃ. Yo so “vasaṃ
atk-s0519a:569_1: mārassa gacchatī”ti vutto, so ye pañcupādānakkhandhe upādāya paññatto, te pañcakkhandhā
atk-s0519a:569_2: dukkhasaccaṃ. Evaṃ bhagavatā idha dve saccāni desitāni. Tenevāha – “dukkhaṃ samudayo
atk-s0519a:569_3: cā”ti. Tesaṃ bhagavā pariññāya ca pahānāya ca dhammaṃ desetīti vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ
atk-s0519a:569_4: kātuṃ “dukkhassa pariññāya samudayassa pahānāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ desetīti ce –
atk-s0519a:573_0: Gāthāya. Tassattho – yasmā arakkhitena cittena vasaṃ mārassa gacchati, tasmā satisaṃvarena
atk-s0519a:573_1: manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ rakkhaṇena rakkhitacitto assa. Sammāsaṅkappagocaroti yasmā
atk-s0519a:573_2: kāmasaṅkappādimicchāsaṅkappagocaro tathā tathā ayoniso vikappetvā nānāvidhāni micchādassanāni
atk-s0519a:573_3: gaṇhāti. Tato eva ca micchādiṭṭhihatena cittena vasaṃ mārassa gacchati, tasmā yonisomanasikārena
atk-s0519a:573_4: kammaṃ karonto nekkhammasaṅkappādisammāsaṅkappagocaro assa. Sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvāti
atk-s0519a:573_6: sammādiṭṭhiṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā sīlasamādhīsu yuttappayutto. Tato eva ca ñatvāna udayabbayaṃ
atk-s0519a:573_7: pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu samapaññāsāya ākārehi uppādaṃ nirodhañca ñatvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0519a:573_8: ussukkāpetvā anukkamena ariyamagge gaṇhanto aggamaggena thinamiddhābhibhū bhikkhu
atk-s0519a:573_9: sabbā duggatiyo jaheti evaṃ sabbaso bhinnakilesattā bhikkhu khīṇāsavo yathāsambhavaṃ
atk-s0519a:573_10: tividhadukkhatāyogena duggatisaṅkhātā sabbāpi gatiyo jaheyya, tāsaṃ parabhāge nibbāne tiṭṭheyyāti attho.
atk-s0519a:574_0: Yaṃ taṇhāya avijjāya ca pahānaṃ, ayaṃ nirodhoti pahānassa nirodhassa paccayabhāvato
atk-s0519a:574_1: asaṅkhatadhātu pahānaṃ nirodhoti ca vuttā. Imāni cattāri saccānīti purimagāthāya
atk-s0519a:574_2: purimāni dve, pacchimagāthāya pacchimāni dveti dvīhi gāthāhi bhāsitāni imāni cattāri
atk-s0519a:574_3: ariyasaccāni. Tesu samudayena assādo, dukkhena ādīnavo, magganirodhehi nissaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a:574_5: rakkhitacittatādīsu niyojanaṃ bhagavato āṇattīti. Evaṃ desanāhārapadatthā assādādayo
atk-s0519a:577_0: 53. Evaṃ desanāhārasampātaṃ dassetvā idāni vicayahārasampātaṃ dassento yasmā desanāhārapadatthavicayo
atk-s0519a:577_1: vicayahāro, tasmā desanāhāre vipallāsahetubhāvena niddhāritāya taṇhāya kusalādivibhāgapavicayamukhena
atk-s0519a:577_2: vicayahārasampātaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha taṇhā duvidhā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha kusalāti
atk-s0519a:577_3: kusaladhammārammaṇā. Kusala-saddo cettha bāhitikasutte viya anavajjatthe daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0519a:577_4: Kasmā panettha taṇhā kusalapariyāyena uddhaṭā? Heṭṭhā desanāhāre vipallāsahetubhāvena
atk-s0519a:577_5: taṇhaṃ uddharitvā tassā vasena saṃkilesapakkho dassito. Vicittapaṭibhānatāya pana
atk-s0519a:577_6: idhāpi taṇhāmukheneva vodānapakkhaṃ dassetuṃ kusalapariyāyena taṇhā uddhaṭā. Tattha
atk-s0519a:577_7: saṃsāraṃ gametīti saṃsāragāminī, saṃsāranāyikāti attho. Apacayaṃ nibbānaṃ gametīti
atk-s0519a:577_8: apacayagāminī. Kathaṃ pana taṇhā apacayagāminīti? Āha “pahānataṇhā”ti. Tadaṅgādippahānassa
atk-s0519a:577_9: hetubhūtā taṇhā. Kathaṃ pana ekantasāvajjāya taṇhāya kusalabhāvoti? Sevitabbabhāvato.
atk-s0519a:577_10: Yathā taṇhā, evaṃ mānopi duvidho kusalopi akusalopi, na taṇhā evāti taṇhāya nidassanabhāvena māno vutto.
atk-s0519a:578_0: Tattha mānassa yathādhippetaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ mānaṃ nissāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:578_1: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “mānamahaṃ, devānaminda, duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi asevitabbampī”tiādi.
atk-s0519a:578_2: Yaṃ nekkhammassitaṃ domanassantiādi “kusalā”ti vuttataṇhāya sarūpadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:579_0: “Tattha katamāni cha nekkhammassitāni domanassāni? Rūpānaṃtveva aniccataṃ viditvā
atk-s0519a:579_1: vipariṇāmavirāganirodhaṃ ‘pubbe ceva rūpā etarahi ca, sabbete rūpā aniccā dukkhā
atk-s0519a:579_2: vipariṇāmadhammā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya disvā anuttaresu vimokkhesu
atk-s0519a:579_3: pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti ‘kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharissāmi, yadariyā
atk-s0519a:579_4: etarahi āyatanaṃ upasampajja viharantī’ti. Iti anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato
atk-s0519a:579_5: uppajjati pihā, pihāpaccayā domanassaṃ. Yaṃ evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ, idaṃ vuccati nekkhammassitaṃ domanassa”nti –
atk-s0519a:580_1: pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā tadadhigamāya aniccādivasena vipassanaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā ussukkāpetuṃ
atk-s0519a:580_2: asakkontassa “imampi pakkhaṃ imampi māsaṃ, imampi saṃvaccharaṃ, vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā
atk-s0519a:580_3: ariyabhūmiṃ sampāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhi”nti anusocato uppannaṃ domanassaṃ nekkhammavasena
atk-s0519a:580_4: vipassanāvasena anussativasena paṭhamajjhānādivasena paṭipattiyā hetubhāvena uppajjanato
atk-s0519a:580_5: nekkhammassitaṃ domanassaṃ nāma. Ayaṃ taṇhā kusalāti ayaṃ “pihā”ti vuttā taṇhā kusalā.
atk-s0519a:580_6: Kathaṃ? Rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, tadārammaṇā kusalāti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – rāgavirāgā
atk-s0519a:580_7: cetovimutti, na sabhāvena kusalā, anavajjaṭṭhena kusalā. Taṃ uddissa pavattiyā tadārammaṇā
atk-s0519a:580_8: pana taṇhā kusalārammaṇatāya kusalāti. Avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti anavajjaṭṭhena kusalā.
atk-s0519a:580_9: Tassāti paññāvimuttiyā. Yāya vasena “tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti gāthāyaṃ “sabbā duggatiyo jahe”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:581_0: Iti cirataraṃ vipassanāparivāsaṃ parivasitvā dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiññāya adhigatāya
atk-s0519a:581_1: paññāvimuttiyā vasena vicayahārasampātaṃ dassetuṃ “tassā ko pavicayo”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:581_2: Tattha yasmā paññāvimutti ariyamaggamūlikā, tasmā catutthajjhānapādake ariyamaggadhamme
atk-s0519a:581_3: uddisitvā tesaṃ āgamanapaṭipadaṃ dassetuṃ “kattha daṭṭhabbo, catutthe jhāne”tiādi
atk-s0519a:581_4: vuttaṃ. Tattha pāramitāyāti ukkaṃsagatāya catutthajjhānabhāvanāya. Yehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi
atk-s0519a:581_5: samannāgataṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ vuttaṃ, tāni aṅgāni dassetuṃ “parisuddha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:582_0: Tattha upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvena parisuddhaṃ. Parisuddhattā eva pariyodātaṃ, pabhassaranti
atk-s0519a:582_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Sukhādīnaṃ paccayaghātena vītarāgādiaṅgaṇattā anaṅgaṇaṃ. Anaṅgaṇattā
atk-s0519a:582_2: eva vigatūpakkilesaṃ, aṅgaṇena hi cittaṃ upakkilissati, subhāvitattā mudubhūtaṃ vasibhāvappattanti
atk-s0519a:582_3: attho. Vase vattamānañhi cittaṃ “mudū”ti vuccati. Muduttā eva ca kammaniyaṃ, kammakkhamaṃ
atk-s0519a:582_4: kammayogganti attho. Muduñhi cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti, evaṃ bhāvitaṃ muduñca hoti kammaniyañca,
atk-s0519a:582_5: yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, citta”nti. Etesu parisuddhabhāvādīsu ṭhitattā ṭhitaṃ. Ṭhitattāyeva
atk-s0519a:582_6: āneñjappattaṃ, acalaṃ niriñjananti attho. Mudukammaññabhāvena vā attano vase ṭhitattā
atk-s0519a:582_7: ṭhitaṃ. Saddhādīhi pariggahitattā āneñjappattaṃ. Saddhāpariggahitañhi cittaṃ assaddhiyena
atk-s0519a:582_8: na iñjati, vīriyapariggahitaṃ kosajjena na iñjati, satipariggahitaṃ pamādena na iñjati,
atk-s0519a:582_9: samādhipariggahitaṃ uddhaccena na iñjati, paññāpariggahitaṃ avijjāya na iñjati, obhāsagataṃ
atk-s0519a:582_10: kilesandhakārena na iñjati. Imehi chahi dhammehi pariggahitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a:582_11: Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ cittaṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hoti. Abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ
atk-s0519a:583_0: Aparo nayo – catutthajjhānasamādhinā samāhitaṃ cittaṃ nīvaraṇadūrībhāvena parisuddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:583_2: abhāvena anaṅgaṇaṃ. Icchāvacarānanti icchāya avacarānaṃ icchāvasena otiṇṇānaṃ pavattānaṃ
atk-s0519a:583_3: nānappakārānaṃ kopaapaccayānanti attho. Abhijjhādīnaṃ cittupakkilesānaṃ vigamena
atk-s0519a:583_4: vigatūpakkilesaṃ. Ubhayampi cetaṃ anaṅgaṇasuttavatthasuttānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:583_5: Vasippattiyā mudubhūtaṃ. Iddhipādabhāvūpagamena kammaniyaṃ. Bhāvanāpāripūriyā paṇītabhāvūpagamena
atk-s0519a:583_6: ṭhitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ. Yathā āneñjabhāvappattaṃ āneñjappattaṃ hoti, evaṃ ṭhitanti
atk-s0519a:583_7: attho. Evampi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ cittaṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hoti. Abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ
atk-s0519a:583_8: dhammānaṃ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya pādakaṃ padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. Tenevāha – “so tattha aṭṭhavidhaṃ
atk-s0519a:583_9: adhigacchati cha abhiññā dve ca visese”ti.
atk-s0519a:584_0: Tattha soti adhigatacatutthajjhāno yogī. Tatthāti tasmiṃ catutthajjhāne adhiṭṭhānabhūte.
atk-s0519a:584_1: Aṭṭhavidhaṃ adhigacchatīti aṭṭhavidhaṃ guṇaṃ adhigacchati. Ko pana so aṭṭhavidho
atk-s0519a:584_2: guṇoti? Āha “cha abhiññā dve ca visese”ti. Manomayiddhi vipassanāñāṇañca. Taṃ cittanti
atk-s0519a:584_3: catutthajjhānacittaṃ. “Yato parisuddhaṃ, tato pariyodāta”ntiādinā purimaṃ purimaṃ
atk-s0519a:584_4: pacchimassa pacchimassa kāraṇavacananti dasseti. Tadubhayanti yesaṃ rāgādiaṅgaṇānaṃ
atk-s0519a:584_5: abhijjhādiupakkilesānañca abhāvena “anaṅgaṇaṃ vigatūpakkilesa”nti ca vuttaṃ. Tāni
atk-s0519a:584_6: aṅgaṇāni upakkilesā cāti taṃ ubhayaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ taṇhāsabhāvattā taṇhāya anulomanato
atk-s0519a:584_7: ca taṇhāpakkho. Yā ca iñjanāti yā ca cittassa asamādānena phandanā. Aṭṭhitīti anavaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:584_8: Ayaṃ diṭṭhipakkhoti yā iñjanā aṭṭhiti ca, ayaṃ micchābhinivesahetutāya diṭṭhipakkho.
atk-s0519a:585_0: “Cattāri indriyānī”tiādinā vedanātopi catutthajjhānaṃ vibhāveti. Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ
atk-s0519a:585_1: catutthajjhānacittaṃ upari abhiññādhigamāya abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hoti. Sā ca abhinīhārakkhamatā
atk-s0519a:585_2: cuddasahi ākārehi ciṇṇavasibhāvasseva hoti. So ca vasibhāvo aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino,
atk-s0519a:585_4: uparimaṃ samāpattiṃ santato manasikarotī”tiādimāha. Tattha uparimaṃ samāpattinti
atk-s0519a:585_6: “santā”ti manasikaroti. Yato yato hi āruppasamāpattiṃ santato manasikaroti, tato
atk-s0519a:585_7: tato rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ avūpasantaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Tenevāha – “tassa uparimaṃ…pe…
atk-s0519a:585_8: saṇṭhahatī”ti. Ukkaṇṭhā ca paṭighasaññāti paṭighasaññāsaṅkhātāsu pañcaviññāṇasaññāsu
atk-s0519a:585_9: anabhirati saṇṭhahati. “So sabbaso”tiādinā ekadesena āruppasamāpattiṃ dasseti. Abhiññābhinīhāro
atk-s0519a:585_10: rūpasaññāti rūpāvacarasaññā nāmetā yāvadeva abhiññatthābhinīhāramattaṃ, na pana arūpāvacarasamāpattiyo
atk-s0519a:585_11: viya santāti adhippāyo. Vokāro nānattasaññāti nānattasaññā nāmetā nānārammaṇesu vokāro,
atk-s0519a:585_12: tattha cittassa ākulappavattīti attho. Samatikkamatīti evaṃ tattha ādīnavadassī hutvā
atk-s0519a:585_13: tā samatikkamati. Paṭighasaññā cassa abbhatthaṃ gacchatīti assa ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0519a:585_14: adhigacchantassa yogino dasapi paṭighasaññā vigacchanti. Iminā paṭhamāruppasamāpattimāha.
atk-s0519a:586_0: Evaṃ samāhitassāti evaṃ iminā vuttanayena rūpāvacarajjhāne cittekaggatāyapi samatikkamena
atk-s0519a:586_1: samāhitassa. Samāhitassāti āruppasamādhinā santavuttinā samāhitassa. Obhāsoti yo
atk-s0519a:586_2: pure rūpāvacarajjhānobhāso. Antaradhāyatīti so rūpāvacarajjhānobhāso arūpāvacarajjhānasamāpajjanakāle
atk-s0519a:586_3: vigacchati. Dassanañcāti rūpāvacarajjhānacakkhunā dassanañca antaradhāyati. So samādhīti
atk-s0519a:586_5: chahi aṅgehi samannāgato. Paccavekkhitabboti pati avekkhitabbo, punappunaṃ cintetabboti
atk-s0519a:586_6: attho. Paccavekkhaṇākāraṃ saha visayena dassetuṃ “anabhijjhāsahagata”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:586_7: Tattha sabbaloketi sabbasmiṃ piyarūpe sātarūpe sattaloke saṅkhāraloke ca. Tena kāmacchandassa
atk-s0519a:586_9: pahānaṃ. Puna tāni cha aṅgāni samathavipassanāvasena vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “yañca anabhijjhāsahagata”ntiādi
atk-s0519a:587_1: dassetvā idāni arahattaphalasamādhiṃ dassetuṃ “so samādhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha so
atk-s0519a:587_2: samādhīti yo so sammāsamādhi. Pubbe vuttassa ariyamaggasamādhissa phalabhūto samādhi
atk-s0519a:587_3: pañcavidhena veditabbo idāni vuccamānehi pañcahi paccavekkhaṇañāṇehi attano paccavekkhitabbākārasaṅkhātena
atk-s0519a:587_5: appitappitakkhaṇe sukhattā paccuppannasukho. Purimo purimo pacchimassa pacchimassa
atk-s0519a:587_6: samādhisukhassa paccayattā āyatiṃ sukhavipāko. Kilesehi ārakattā ariyo. Kāmāmisavaṭṭāmisalokāmisānaṃ
atk-s0519a:587_7: abhāvā nirāmiso. Buddhādīhi mahāpurisehi sevitattā akāpurisasevito. Aṅgasantatāya
atk-s0519a:587_8: sabbakilesadarathasantatāya ca santo. Atittikaraṭṭhena paṇīto. Kilesapaṭippassaddhiyā
atk-s0519a:587_9: laddhattā, kilesapaṭippassaddhibhāvena vā laddhattā paṭippassaddhiladdho. Passaddhaṃ
atk-s0519a:587_10: passaddhīti hi idaṃ atthato ekaṃ. Paṭippassaddhikilesena vā arahatā laddhattāpi paṭippassaddhiladdho.
atk-s0519a:587_11: Ekodibhāvena adhigatattā, ekodibhāvameva vā adhigatattā ekodibhāvādhigato. Appaguṇasāsavasamādhi
atk-s0519a:587_12: viya sasaṅkhārena sappayogena paccanīkadhamme niggayha kilese vāretvā anadhigatattā
atk-s0519a:588_0: Yato yato bhāgato tañca samādhiṃ samāpajjanto, tato vā vuṭṭhahanto sativepullappatto
atk-s0519a:588_1: satova samāpajjati satova vuṭṭhahati, yathāparicchinnakālavasena vā sato samāpajjati
atk-s0519a:588_2: sato vuṭṭhahati. Tasmā yadettha “ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko”ti
atk-s0519a:588_3: evaṃ paccavekkhantassa paccattameva aparappaccayañāṇaṃ uppajjati, ayameko ākāro.
atk-s0519a:588_4: Esa nayo sesesupi. Evametesaṃ pañcannaṃ paccavekkhitabbākārānaṃ vasena samādhi pañcavidhena veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:589_0: Puna “yo ca samādhī”tiādinā arahattaphale samathavipassanāvibhāgaṃ dasseti. Tattha
atk-s0519a:589_1: samādhisukhassa “sukha”nti adhippetattā “yo ca samādhi paccuppannasukho, yo ca samādhi
atk-s0519a:589_2: āyatiṃ sukhavipāko, ayaṃ samatho”ti vuttaṃ. Ariyanirāmisādibhāvo pana paññānubhāvena
atk-s0519a:589_3: nipphajjatīti āha – “yo ca samādhi ariyo…pe… ayaṃ vipassanā”ti.
atk-s0519a:590_0: Evaṃ arahattaphalasamādhiṃ vibhāgena dassetvā idāni tassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ samādhivibhāgena
atk-s0519a:590_1: dassetuṃ “so samādhī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha so samādhīti yo so arahattaphalasamādhissa
atk-s0519a:590_2: pubbabhāgapaṭipadāyaṃ vutto rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānasamādhi, so samādhi. Pañcavidhenāti
atk-s0519a:590_3: vakkhamānena pañcappakārena veditabbo. “Pītipharaṇatā”tiādīsu pītiṃ pharamānā uppajjatīti
atk-s0519a:590_4: dvīsu jhānesu paññā pītipharaṇatā nāma. Sukhaṃ pharamānā uppajjatīti tīsu jhānesu
atk-s0519a:590_5: paññā sukhapharaṇatā nāma. Paresaṃ ceto pharamānā uppajjatīti cetopariyapaññā cetopharaṇatā
atk-s0519a:590_6: nāma. Ālokapharaṇe uppajjatīti dibbacakkhupaññā ālokapharaṇatā nāma. Paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:590_7: paccavekkhaṇānimittaṃ nāma. Vuttampi cetaṃ “dvīsu jhānesu paññā pītipharaṇatā, tīsu
atk-s0519a:590_8: jhānesu paññā sukhapharaṇatā, paracitte ñāṇaṃ cetopharaṇatā, dibbacakkhu ālokapharaṇatā,
atk-s0519a:590_9: tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhitassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇanimitta”nti.
atk-s0519a:591_0: Idha samathavipassanāvibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “yo ca pītipharaṇo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha ca
atk-s0519a:591_1: paññāsīsena desanā katāti paññāvasena saṃvaṇṇanā katā. Paññā pītipharaṇatātiādīsu
atk-s0519a:591_2: samādhisahagatā evāti tattha samādhivasena samatho uddhaṭo. Tasmā pītisukhacetopharaṇatā
atk-s0519a:591_3: visesato samādhivipphāravasena ijjhantīti tā “samatho”ti vuttā. Itarāni ñāṇavipphāravasenāti
atk-s0519a:592_0: 55. Idāni taṃ samādhiṃ ārammaṇavasena vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “dasa kasiṇāyatanānī”tiādi
atk-s0519a:592_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha kasiṇajjhānasaṅkhātāni kasiṇāni ca tāni yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato,
atk-s0519a:592_2: manāyatanadhammāyatanabhāvato ca āyatanāni cāti kasiṇāyatanāni. Pathavīkasiṇanti
atk-s0519a:592_3: kataparikammaṃ pathavīmaṇḍalampi, tattha pavattaṃ uggahapaṭibhāganimittampi, tasmiṃ
atk-s0519a:592_4: nimitte uppannajjhānampi vuccati. Tesu jhānaṃ idhādhippetaṃ. Ākāsakasiṇanti kasiṇugghāṭimākāse
atk-s0519a:592_6: Pathavīkasiṇādike suddhasamathabhāvanāvasena pavattite sandhāya “imāni aṭṭha kasiṇāni
atk-s0519a:592_7: samatho”ti vuttaṃ. Sesakasiṇadvayaṃ vipassanādhiṭṭhānabhāvena pavattaṃ “vipassanā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:593_0: Evanti iminā nayena. Sabbo ariyamaggoti sammādiṭṭhiādibhāvena abhinnopi ariyamaggo
atk-s0519a:593_2: yena ākārenāti anabhijjhādīsu, paccuppannasukhatādīsu ca ākāresu yena yena ākārena
atk-s0519a:593_3: vutto. Tena tenāti tesu tesu ākāresu ye ye samathavasena, ye ca ye ca vipassanāvasena
atk-s0519a:593_4: yojetuṃ sambhavanti, tena tena ākārena samathavipassanāhi ariyamaggo vicinitvā yojetabbo.
atk-s0519a:593_5: Teti samathādhiṭṭhānavipassanādhammā. Tīhi dhammehi saṅgahitāti tīhi anupassanādhammehi
atk-s0519a:593_6: saṅgahitā, gaṇanaṃ gatāti attho. Katamehi tīhīti? Āha “aniccatāya dukkhatāya anattatāyā”ti.
atk-s0519a:593_7: Aniccatāya sahacaraṇato vipassanā “aniccatā”ti vuttā. Esa nayo sesesupi.
atk-s0519a:594_0: So samathavipassanaṃ bhāvayamāno tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni bhāvayatīti so ariyamaggādhigamāya
atk-s0519a:594_1: yuttappayutto yogī kālena samathaṃ samāpajjanavasena kālena vipassanaṃ sammasanavasena
atk-s0519a:594_2: vaḍḍhayamāno animittavimokkhamukhādisaṅkhātā tisso anupassanā brūheti. Tayo khandhe
atk-s0519a:594_3: bhāvayatīti tisso anupassanā uparūparivisesaṃ pāpento sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho
atk-s0519a:594_4: paññākkhandhoti ete tayo khandhe vaḍḍheti. Yasmā pana tīhi khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
atk-s0519a:594_5: maggo saṅgahito, tasmā “tayo khandhe bhāvayanto ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvayatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:595_0: Idāni yesaṃ puggalānaṃ yattha sikkhantānaṃ visesato niyyānamukhāni yesañca kilesānaṃ
atk-s0519a:595_1: paṭipakkhabhūtāni tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni, tehi saddhiṃ tāni dassetuṃ “rāgacarito”tiādi
atk-s0519a:595_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha animittena vimokkhamukhenāti aniccānupassanāya. Sā hi niccanimittādisamugghāṭanena
atk-s0519a:595_3: animitto, rāgādīnaṃ samucchedavimuttiyā vimokkhoti laddhanāmassa ariyamaggassa mukhabhāvato
atk-s0519a:595_5: Sukhavedanīyaṃ phassaṃ anupagacchantoti sukhavedanāya hitaṃ sukhavedanākāraṇato phassaṃ
atk-s0519a:595_6: taṇhāya anupagacchanto. Sukhaṃ vedanaṃ parijānantoti “ayaṃ sukhā vedanā vipariṇāmādinā
atk-s0519a:595_7: dukkhā”ti parijānanto, savisayaṃ rāgaṃ samatikkanto. “Rāgamalaṃ pavāhento”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:595_8: tehi pariyāyehi rāgasseva pahānamāha. “Dosacarito puggalo”tiādīsupi vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:596_1: pākaṭā hotīti visesato anattānupassanā paññāpadhānāti āha – “suññatavimokkhamukhaṃ
atk-s0519a:596_2: paññākkhandho”ti. Tathā saṅkhārānaṃ sarasapabhaṅgutāya ittarakhaṇattā uppannānaṃ
atk-s0519a:596_3: tattha tattheva bhijjanaṃ sammā samāhitasseva pākaṭaṃ hotīti visesato aniccānupassanā
atk-s0519a:596_5: paripūrakārino khantibahulassa uppannaṃ dukkhaṃ aratiñca abhibhuyya viharato saṅkhārānaṃ
atk-s0519a:596_6: dukkhatā vibhūtā hotīti dukkhānupassanā sīlappadhānāti āha – “appaṇihitavimokkhamukhaṃ
atk-s0519a:596_7: sīlakkhandho”ti. Iti tīhi vimokkhamukhehi tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ saṅgahitattā vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a:596_8: “so tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni bhāvayanto tayo khandhe bhāvayatī”ti. Yasmā ca tīhi ca khandhehi
atk-s0519a:596_9: ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa saṅgahitattā tayo khandhe bhāvayanto “ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ
atk-s0519a:596_10: maggaṃ bhāvayatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā tehi tassa saṅgahaṃ dassento “yā ca sammāvācā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:597_0: Puna tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ samathavipassanābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “sīlakkhandho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:597_1: Tattha sīlakkhandhassa khantipadhānattā, samādhissa bahūpakārattā ca samathapakkhabhajanaṃ
atk-s0519a:597_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bhavaṅgānīti upapattibhavassa aṅgāni. Dve padānīti dve pādā. Yebhuyyena
atk-s0519a:597_3: hi pañcadasa caraṇadhammā sīlasamādhisaṅgahitāti. Bhāvitakāyoti ābhisamācārikasīlassa
atk-s0519a:597_4: pāripūriyā bhāvitakāyo. Ādibrahmacariyakasīlassa pāripūriyā bhāvitasīlo. Atha vā
atk-s0519a:597_6: bhāvitasīlo. Sammā kāyabhāvanāya sati accantaṃ kāyaduccaritappahānaṃ anavajjañca
atk-s0519a:597_7: uṭṭhānaṃ sampajjati. Tathā anuttare sīle sijjhamāne anavasesato micchāvācāya micchājīvassa
atk-s0519a:597_8: ca pahānaṃ sampajjati. Cittapaññāsu ca bhāvitāsu sammāsatisammāsamādhisammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappā
atk-s0519a:597_9: bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gatā eva honti taṃsabhāvattā tadubhayakāraṇattā cāti imamatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:598_0: Pañcavidhaṃ adhigamaṃ gacchatīti ariyamaggādhigamameva avatthāvisesavasena pañcadhā
atk-s0519a:598_1: vibhajitvā dasseti. Ariyamaggo hi khippaṃ sakiṃ ekacittakkhaṇeneva catūsu saccesu
atk-s0519a:598_2: attanā adhigantabbaṃ adhigacchatīti na tassa lokiyasamāpattiyā viya vasibhāvanākiccaṃ
atk-s0519a:598_3: atthīti khippādhigamo ca hoti. Pajahitabbānaṃ accantavimuttivasena pajahanato vimuttādhigamo
atk-s0519a:598_4: ca. Lokiyehi mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ adhigamanabhāvato mahādhigamo ca. Tesaṃyeva
atk-s0519a:598_5: vipulaphalānaṃ adhigamanato vipulādhigamo ca. Attanā kattabbassa kassaci anavasesato
atk-s0519a:598_6: anavasesādhigamo ca hotīti. Ke panete adhigamā? Keci samathānubhāvena, keci vipassanānubhāvenāti
atk-s0519a:599_0: 56. Iti mahāthero “tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti gāthāya vasena arahattaphalavimuttimukhena
atk-s0519a:599_1: vicayahārasampātaṃ niddisanto desanākusalatāya anekehi suttappadesehi tassā pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya
atk-s0519a:599_2: bhāvanāvisesānaṃ bhāvanānisaṃsānañca vibhajanavasena nānappakārato vicayahāraṃ dassetvā
atk-s0519a:599_3: idāni dasannaṃ tathāgatabalānampi vasena taṃ dassetuṃ “tattha yo desayatī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:599_4: Ovādena sāvake na visaṃvādayatīti attano anusiṭṭhiyā dhammassa savanato “sāvakā”ti
atk-s0519a:599_5: laddhanāme veneyye na vippalambheti na vañceti, visaṃvādanahetūnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:599_6: ariyamaggena bodhimūle eva suppahīnattā. Tividhanti tippakāraṃ, tīhi ākārehīti attho.
atk-s0519a:599_7: Idaṃ karothāti imaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ sīlādiñca upasampajja viharatha. Iminā upāyena
atk-s0519a:599_8: karothāti anenapi vidhinā saraṇāni sodhentā sīlādīni paripūrentā sampādetha. Idaṃ
atk-s0519a:599_9: vo kurumānānanti idaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ sīlādiñca tumhākaṃ anutiṭṭhantānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasamparāyanibbānānaṃ
atk-s0519a:599_10: vasena hitāya sukhāya ca bhavissati, tāni sampādethāti attho.
atk-s0519a:600_0: Evaṃ ovadanākāraṃ dassetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ – “ovādena sāvake na visaṃvādayatī”ti, taṃ
atk-s0519a:600_1: tathāgatabalehi vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “so tathā ovadito”tiādimāha. Tattha tathāti tena
atk-s0519a:600_2: pakārena “idaṃ karotha, iminā upāyena karothā”tiādinā vuttappakārena. Ovaditoti dhammadesanāya
atk-s0519a:600_3: sāsito. Anusiṭṭhoti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Tathā karontoti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ tathā karonto.
atk-s0519a:600_4: Taṃ bhūminti yassā bhūmiyā adhigamatthāya ovadito, taṃ dassanabhūmiñca bhāvanābhūmiñca.
atk-s0519a:600_5: Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ na vijjati. Kāraṇañhi tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti
atk-s0519a:600_6: “ṭhāna”nti vuccati. Dutiyavāre bhūminti sīlakkhandhena pattabbaṃ sampattibhavasaṅkhātaṃ bhūmiṃ.
atk-s0519a:601_0: Idāni yasmā bhagavato catuvesārajjānipi aviparītasabhāvatāya paṭhamaphalañāṇassa
atk-s0519a:601_1: visayaviseso hoti, tasmā tānipi tassa visayabhāvena dassetuṃ “sammāsambuddhassa te
atk-s0519a:601_2: sato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sammāsambuddhassa te satoti ahaṃ sammāsambuddho, mayā sabbe
atk-s0519a:601_3: dhammā abhisambuddhāti paṭijānanena sammāsambuddhassa te sato. Ime dhammā anabhisambuddhāti
atk-s0519a:601_4: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti “ime nāma tayā dhammā anabhisambuddhā”ti koci sahadhammena
atk-s0519a:601_5: sahetunā sakāraṇena vacanena, sunakkhatto viya vippalapantā pana appamāṇaṃ. Tasmā
atk-s0519a:601_6: sahadhammena paṭicodessatīti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ na vijjati. Esa nayo sesapadesupi. Yassa
atk-s0519a:601_7: te atthāya dhammo desitoti rāgādīsu yassa yassa pahānatthāya asubhabhāvanādidhammo
atk-s0519a:601_8: kathito. Takkarassāti tathā paṭipannassa. Visesādhigamanti abhiññāpaṭisambhidādivisesādhigamaṃ.
atk-s0519a:602_0: Antarāyikāti antarāyakaraṇaṃ antarāyo, so sīlaṃ etesanti antarāyikā. Antarāye niyuttā,
atk-s0519a:602_1: antarāyaṃ vā phalaṃ arahanti, antarāyappayojanāti vā antarāyikā. Te pana kammakilesādibhedena
atk-s0519a:603_0: Diṭṭhisampannoti maggadiṭṭhiyā sampanno sotāpanno ariyasāvako. Suhatanti ativadhitaṃ.
atk-s0519a:603_1: Idampi ekadesakathanameva. Matakapetādidānampi so na karoti eva. Puthujjanoti puthūnaṃ
atk-s0519a:606_0: “Mātara”ntiādīsu janikā mātā. Janako ca pitā. Manussabhūto khīṇāsavo arahāti adhippeto.
atk-s0519a:606_1: Kiṃ pana ariyasāvako aññe jīvitā voropeyyāti? Etampi aṭṭhānaṃ. Sacepi bhavantaragataṃ
atk-s0519a:606_2: ariyasāvakaṃ attano ariyasāvakabhāvaṃ ajānantampi koci evaṃ vadeyya “idaṃ kunthakipillikaṃ
atk-s0519a:606_3: jīvitā voropetvā sakalacakkavāḷagabbhe cakkavattirajjaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti, neva so naṃ
atk-s0519a:606_4: jīvitā voropeyya. Athāpi evaṃ vadeyyuṃ – “sace imaṃ na ghātessasi, sīsaṃ te chindissāmā”ti,
atk-s0519a:606_5: sīsamevassa chindeyyuṃ, neva so taṃ ghāteyya. Puthujjanabhāvassa pana mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:606_6: ariyabhāvassa ca baladīpanatthaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – sāvajjo vata
atk-s0519a:606_7: puthujjanabhāvo. Yatra hi nāma mātughākādīnipi ānantariyāni karissati, mahābalova
atk-s0519a:606_8: ca ariyabhāvo, yo etāni kammāni na karotīti.
atk-s0519a:607_0: Saṅghaṃ bhindeyyāti samānasaṃvāsakaṃ samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitaṃ pañcahi kāraṇehi saṅghaṃ
atk-s0519a:607_1: bhindeyya. Vuttañhetaṃ – “pañcahupāli, ākārehi saṅgho bhijjati kammena uddesena voharanto
atk-s0519a:608_0: Tattha kammenāti apalokanādīsu catūsu kammesu aññatarakammena. Uddesenāti pañcasu
atk-s0519a:608_1: pātimokkhuddesesu aññatarena uddesena. Voharantoti kathayanto, tāhi tāhi upapattīhi
atk-s0519a:608_3: tumhe jānātha mayhaṃ uccakulā pabbajitabhāvaṃ bahussutabhāvañca, mādiso nāma uddhammaṃ
atk-s0519a:608_4: ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ gāheyyāti kiṃ tumhākaṃ cittampi uppādetuṃ yuttaṃ, kimahaṃ
atk-s0519a:608_5: apāyato na bhāyāmī”tiādinā nayena kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ katvā anussāvanena. Salākaggāhenāti
atk-s0519a:608_6: evaṃ anussāvetvā tesaṃ cittaṃ upatthambhetvā anivattidhammaṃ katvā “gaṇhatha imaṃ
atk-s0519a:609_0: Ettha ca kammameva uddeso vā pamāṇaṃ, vohārānussāvanasalākaggāhāpanaṃ pana pubbabhāgo.
atk-s0519a:609_1: Aṭṭhārasavatthudīpanavasena hi voharantena tattha rucijananatthaṃ anussāvetvā salākāya
atk-s0519a:609_2: gāhitāyapi abhinno eva hoti saṅgho. Yadā pana evaṃ cattāro vā atirekā vā salākaṃ
atk-s0519a:609_3: gāhetvā āveṇikaṃ kammaṃ vā uddesaṃ vā karonti, tadā saṅgho bhinno nāma hoti. Evaṃ
atk-s0519a:609_4: diṭṭhisampanno puggalo saṅghaṃ bhindeyya saṅgharājiṃ vā janeyyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti.
atk-s0519a:610_0: Duṭṭhacittoti vadhakacittena paduṭṭhacitto. Lohitaṃ uppādeyyāti jīvamānakasarīre
atk-s0519a:610_1: khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ uppādeyya. Ettāvatā hi mātughātādīni pañcānantariyakammāni
atk-s0519a:610_2: dassitāni honti. Yāni puthujjano karoti, na ariyasāvako. Duṭṭhacittoti vināsacittena
atk-s0519a:611_0: Aññaṃ satthāranti “ayaṃ me satthā satthu kiccaṃ kātuṃ samattho”ti bhavantarepi aññaṃ
atk-s0519a:611_1: titthakaraṃ. Apadiseyyāti “ayaṃ me satthā”ti evaṃ gaṇheyyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
atk-s0519a:611_2: Ito bahiddhā aññaṃ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyeseyyāti sāsanato bahiddhā aññaṃ bāhirakaṃ samaṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:611_3: vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā “ayaṃ dakkhiṇāraho, imasmiṃ katā kārā mahapphalā bhavissantī”ti adhippāyena
atk-s0519a:611_4: tasmiṃ paṭipajjeyyāti attho. Kutūhalamaṅgalena suddhiṃ pacceyyāti “iminā idaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0519a:611_5: evaṃ pavattattā kutūhalasaṅkhātena diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalena attano suddhiṃ vodānaṃ saddaheyya.
atk-s0519a:612_0: 57. Itthī rājā cakkavattī siyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti yasmā itthiyā kosohitavatthaguyhādīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:612_1: abhāvena lakkhaṇāni na paripūranti, itthiratanābhāvena ca sattaratanasamaṅgitā na
atk-s0519a:612_2: sampajjati. Sabbamanussānampi ca na adhiko attabhāvo hoti, tasmā “itthī…pe… vijjatī”ti
atk-s0519a:612_3: vuttaṃ. Yasmā sakkattādīni tīṇi ṭhānāni uttamāni, itthiliṅgañca hīnaṃ, tasmā tassā
atk-s0519a:612_4: sakkattādīnipi paṭisiddhānīti. Nanu ca yathā itthiliṅgaṃ, evaṃ purisaliṅgampi brahmaloke
atk-s0519a:612_5: natthi, tasmā puriso mahābrahmā siyāti na vattabbanti? No na vattabbaṃ. Kasmā? Idha
atk-s0519a:612_6: purisassa tattha nibbattanato. Itthiyo hi idha jhānaṃ bhāvetvā kālaṃ katvā brahmapārisajjānaṃ
atk-s0519a:612_7: sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, na mahābrahmānaṃ. Puriso pana katthaci na uppajjatīti na
atk-s0519a:612_8: vattabbo. Samānepi tattha ubhayaliṅgābhāve purisasaṇṭhānāva tattha brahmāno, na itthisaṇṭhānā,
atk-s0519a:612_9: tasmā suvuttametaṃ. Itthī tathāgatoti ettha tiṭṭhatu tāva sabbaññuguṇe nibbattetvā
atk-s0519a:612_10: lokānaṃ tāraṇasamattho buddhabhāvo, paṇidhānamattampi itthiyā na sampajjati.
atk-s0519a:616_0: Imāni hi paṇidhānasampattikāraṇāni. Iti paṇidhānamattampi sampādetuṃ asamatthāya
atk-s0519a:616_1: itthiyā kuto buddhabhāvoti “itthī tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho siyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:616_2: vijjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbākāraparipūro puññussayo sabbākāraparipūrameva attabhāvaṃ
atk-s0519a:617_0: Ekissā lokadhātuyāti dasasahassilokadhātuyā, yā jātikhettanti vuccati. Sā hi tathāgatassa
atk-s0519a:617_1: gabbhokkantikālādīsu kampati. Āṇākhettaṃ pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ. Yā ekato
atk-s0519a:617_2: saṃvaṭṭati ca vivaṭṭati ca, yattha ca āṭānāṭiyaparittādīnaṃ āṇā pavattati. Visayakhettassa
atk-s0519a:617_3: parimāṇaṃ natthi. Buddhānañhi “yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ tāvatakaṃ neyyaṃ, yāvatakaṃ neyyaṃ
atk-s0519a:617_4: tāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, neyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ neyya”nti vacanato avisayo
atk-s0519a:617_5: nāma natthi. Iti imesu tīsu khettesu tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhe tepiṭake buddhavacane
atk-s0519a:617_6: “ṭhapetvā imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā uppajjantī”ti suttaṃ natthi,
atk-s0519a:618_0: Apubbaṃ acarimanti apure apacchā ekato na uppajjanti, pure vā pacchā vā uppajjantīti
atk-s0519a:618_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha gabbhokkantito pubbe pureti veditabbaṃ. Tato paṭṭhāya hi dasasahassicakkavāḷakampanena
atk-s0519a:618_2: khettapariggaho kato nāma hoti, aññassa buddhassa uppatti natthi. Dhātuparinibbānato
atk-s0519a:618_3: paraṃ pana pacchā, tato heṭṭhāpi aññassa buddhassa uppatti natthi, uddhaṃ na vāritā.
atk-s0519a:619_0: Kasmā pana apubbaṃ acarimaṃ na uppajjantīti? Anacchariyattā. Acchariyamanussā hi
atk-s0519a:619_1: buddhā bhagavanto. Yathāha – “ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso”tiādi.
atk-s0519a:619_2: Yadi ca aneke buddhā ekato uppajjeyyuṃ, anacchariyā bhaveyyuṃ. Desanāya ca visesābhāvato.
atk-s0519a:619_3: Yañhi satipaṭṭhānādibhedaṃ dhammaṃ eko deseti, aññenapi so eva desetabbo siyā, vivādabhāvato
atk-s0519a:619_4: ca. Bahūsu hi buddhesu ekato uppannesu bahūnaṃ ācariyānaṃ antevāsikā viya “amhākaṃ
atk-s0519a:619_5: buddho pāsādiko”tiādinā tesaṃ sāvakā vivadeyyuṃ. Kiṃ vā etena kāraṇagavesanena, dhammatāvesā
atk-s0519a:619_6: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve tathāgatā ekato na uppajjantīti.
atk-s0519a:620_0: Yathā nimbabījakosātakibījādīni madhuraṃ phalaṃ na nibbattenti, asātaṃ amadhurameva
atk-s0519a:620_1: phalaṃ nibbattenti, evaṃ kāyaduccaritādīni madhuravipākaṃ na nibbattenti amadhurameva
atk-s0519a:620_2: nibbattenti. Yathā ca ucchubījasālibījādīni madhuraṃ sādurasameva phalaṃ nibbattenti
atk-s0519a:620_3: na asātaṃ kaṭukaṃ. Evaṃ kāyasucaritādīni madhurameva vipākaṃ nibbattenti na amadhuraṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0519a:624_0: Aññataro samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vāti yo koci pabbajjāmattena samaṇo vā jātimattena brāhmaṇo
atk-s0519a:624_1: vā. Pāpiccho sambhāvanādhippāyena vimhāpanato kuhako. Paccayasannissitāya payuttavācāya
atk-s0519a:624_3: pubbaṅgamaṃ katvāti kuhanādibhāvameva purakkhatvā santindriyo santamānaso viya caranto.
atk-s0519a:624_4: Pañca nīvaraṇeti kāmacchandādike pañca nīvaraṇe. Appahāya asamucchinditvā, cetaso
atk-s0519a:624_5: upakkileseti nīvaraṇe. Nīvaraṇā hi cittaṃ upakkilesenti kiliṭṭhaṃ karonti vibādhenti
atk-s0519a:624_6: upatāpenti ca. Tasmā “cetaso upakkilesā”ti vuccanti. Paññāya dubbalīkaraṇeti nīvaraṇe.
atk-s0519a:624_7: Nīvaraṇā hi uppajjamānā anuppannāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na denti. Tasmā “paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā”ti
atk-s0519a:624_8: vuccanti. Anupaṭṭhitassatīti catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu na upaṭṭhitassati. Abhāvayitvāti
atk-s0519a:625_0: Pacchimavāre aññataro samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vāti sabbaññubodhisattaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0519a:625_1: Tattha sabbadosāpagatoti sabbehi pāramitāpaṭipakkhabhūtehi dosehi apagato. Etena
atk-s0519a:625_2: paripūritapāramibhāvaṃ dasseti. Satipaṭṭhānāni vipassanā, bojjhaṅgo maggo, anuttarā
atk-s0519a:625_3: sammāsambodhi arahattaṃ. Satipaṭṭhānāni vā vipassanā, bojjhaṅgā missakā, sammāsambodhi
atk-s0519a:625_4: arahattameva. Sesaṃ anantaravāre vuttapaṭipakkhato veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ ettha ñāṇanti
atk-s0519a:625_5: yaṃ etasmiṃ yathāvutte ṭhāne ca ṭhānaṃ, aṭṭhāne ca aṭṭhānanti pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Hetusoti
atk-s0519a:625_6: tassa ṭhānassa aṭṭhānassa ca hetuto. Ṭhānasoti taṅkhaṇe eva āvajjanasamanantaraṃ.
atk-s0519a:626_0: Iti ṭhānāṭṭhānagatātiādīsu evaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānabhāvaṃ gatā. Sabbeti khayavayavirajjananirujjhanasabhāvā
atk-s0519a:626_1: saṅkhatadhammā, te eva ca sattapaññattiyā upādānabhūtā keci saggūpagā ye dhammacārino,
atk-s0519a:626_2: keci apāyūpagā ye adhammacārino, keci nibbānūpagā ye kammakkhayakaraṃ ariyamaggaṃ paṭipannā.
atk-s0519a:627_0: 58. Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “sabbe sattā marissantī”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0519a:627_1: Tassa atthaṃ “sabbe sattāti ariyā ca anariyā cā”tiādinā sayameva niddisati. Tattha
atk-s0519a:627_2: jīvitapariyanto maraṇapariyantoti jīvitassa pariyanto nāma maraṇasaṅkhāto anto. Yathākammaṃ
atk-s0519a:627_3: gamissantīti ettha yadetaṃ sattānaṃ yathākammaṃ gamanaṃ, ayaṃ kammassakatāti attho.
atk-s0519a:627_4: Kammānaṃ phaladassāvitā ca avippavāso cāti “puññapāpaphalūpagā”ti iminā vacanena
atk-s0519a:627_5: kammānaṃ phalassa paccakkhakāritā, katūpacitānaṃ kammānaṃ attano phalassa appadānābhāvo ca dassitoti attho.
atk-s0519a:628_0: Kammameva kammantaṃ, pāpaṃ kammantaṃ etesanti pāpakammantā, tassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:628_1: “apuññasaṅkhārā”ti vuttaṃ. Apuñño saṅkhāro etesanti apuññasaṅkhārā. Pāpakammantāti
atk-s0519a:628_2: vā nissakkavacanaṃ, pāpakammantahetūti attho. Tathā puññasaṅkhārātiādīsupi. Puna
atk-s0519a:628_3: “nirayaṃ pāpakammantā”tiādinā antadvayena saddhiṃ majjhimapaṭipadaṃ dasseti. Tathā
atk-s0519a:628_5: ca gāthāyaṃ tayo atthavikappā dassitā. Puna “nirayaṃ pāpakammantāti ayaṃ saṃkileso”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:629_0: 59. Tena tenāti tena tena ajjhositavatthunā rūpabhavaarūpabhavādinā. Chattiṃsāti
atk-s0519a:629_1: kāmataṇhā tāva rūpādivisayabhedena cha, tathā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhā cāti aṭṭhārasa.
atk-s0519a:629_2: Tā eva ajjhattikesu rūpādīsu aṭṭhārasa, bāhiresu rūpādīsu aṭṭhārasāti evaṃ chattiṃsa.
atk-s0519a:630_0: Vodānaṃ tividhaṃ khandhattayavasenāti taṃ dassetuṃ “taṇhāsaṃkileso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:630_1: Puna “sabbe sattā marissantī”tiādi paṭipadāvibhāgena gāthānamatthaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:630_2: Tattha tattha gāminīti tattha tattheva nibbāne gāminī, nibbānassa gamanasīlāti attho.
atk-s0519a:631_0: Puna tatthatatthagāminīsabbatthagāminīnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tayo rāsī”tiādi
atk-s0519a:631_1: vuttaṃ. Yanti yaṃ nirayādi. Taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ yathārahaṃ gametīti sabbatthagāminī. Paṭipadāsaṅkhāte
atk-s0519a:631_2: apuññakamme puññakamme ca kammakkhayakaraṇakamme ca vibhāgaso bhagavato pavattanañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:631_3: Idaṃ sabbatthagāminī paṭipadāñāṇaṃ nāma tathāgatabalaṃ. Iminā hi ñāṇena bhagavā sabbampi
atk-s0519a:632_0: Kathaṃ? Sakalagāmavāsikesupi ekaṃ sūkaraṃ vā migaṃ vā mārentesu sabbesaṃ cetanā parassa
atk-s0519a:632_1: jīvitindriyārammaṇāva hoti, taṃ pana kammaṃ tesaṃ āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva nānā hoti. Tesu
atk-s0519a:632_2: hi eko ādarena karoti, eko “tvampi karohī”ti parehi nippīḷito karoti, eko samānacchando
atk-s0519a:632_3: viya hutvā appaṭibāhamāno vicarati. Tesu eko teneva kammena niraye nibbattati, eko
atk-s0519a:632_4: tiracchānayoniyaṃ, eko pettivisaye, taṃ tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇe eva “iminā nīhārena
atk-s0519a:632_5: āyūhitattā esa niraye nibbattissati, esa tiracchānayoniyaṃ, esa pettivisaye”ti jānāti.
atk-s0519a:632_6: Niraye nibbattanakampi “esa aṭṭhasu mahānirayesu nibbattissati, esa soḷasasu ussadesū”ti
atk-s0519a:632_7: jānāti. Tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattanakampi “esa apādako bhavissati, esa dvipādako,
atk-s0519a:632_8: esa catuppādako, esa bahuppādako”ti jānāti. Pettivisaye nibbattanakampi “esa nijjhāmataṇhiko
atk-s0519a:632_9: bhavissati, esa khuppipāsiko, esa paradattūpajīvī”ti jānāti.
atk-s0519a:633_0: “Tesu ca kammesu idaṃ kammaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhissati, idaṃ nākaḍḍhissati dubbalaṃ
atk-s0519a:633_1: dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkamattaṃ bhavissatī”ti jānāti. Tathā sakalagāmavāsikesu
atk-s0519a:633_2: ekato dānaṃ dadamānesu sabbesampi cetanā deyyadhammārammaṇāva hoti, taṃ pana kammaṃ
atk-s0519a:633_3: tesaṃ āyūhanakkhaṇe eva nānaṃ hoti. Tesu hi keci devaloke nibbattanti, keci manussaloke,
atk-s0519a:633_4: taṃ tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇe eva “iminā nīhārena āyūhitattā esa manussaloke nibbattissati,
atk-s0519a:633_5: esa devaloke”ti jānāti. Tatthapi “esa paranimmitavasavattīsu nibbattissati, esa bhummadevesu
atk-s0519a:633_6: nibbattissati, esa jeṭṭhakadevarājā hutvā, esa tassa dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ vā ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0519a:634_0: “Tesu ca kammesu idaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ sakkhissati, idaṃ na sakkhissati dubbalaṃ
atk-s0519a:634_1: dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkamattaṃ bhavissatī”ti jānāti. Tathā “vipassanaṃ
atk-s0519a:634_2: paṭṭhapentesu ca esa iminā nīhārena vipassanāya āraddhattā arahā bhavissati, esa
atk-s0519a:634_3: anāgāmī, esa sakadāgāmī, esa sotāpanno, ekabījī kolaṃkolo sattakkhattuparamo, esa
atk-s0519a:634_4: maggaṃ pattuṃ na sakkhissati lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāyameva ṭhassati, esa paccayapariggahe,
atk-s0519a:634_5: esa nāmarūpapariggahe, arūpapariggahe ca ṭhassati, esa mahābhūtamattameva vavatthapessati,
atk-s0519a:634_6: esa kiñci sallakkhetuṃ na sakkhissatī”ti jānāti. “Kasiṇaparikammaṃ karontesupi esa
atk-s0519a:634_7: parikammamatte eva ṭhassati, esa nimittaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkhissati, na appanaṃ. Esa
atk-s0519a:634_8: appanampi uppādessati, esa jhānaṃ adhigamissati, na uparivisesaṃ. Esa uparivisesampi
atk-s0519a:635_0: Anekadhātūti anekā cakkhādayo pathavādayo ca dhātuyo etassāti anekadhātu, bahudhātūti
atk-s0519a:635_1: attho. Lokoti khandhāyatanādiloko. Cakkhudhātūtiādi yāhi dhātūhi “anekadhātū”ti loko
atk-s0519a:635_2: vutto, tāsaṃ sarūpato dassanaṃ. Tattha sabhāvaṭṭhena nissattaṭṭhena ca dhātu. Cakkhu
atk-s0519a:635_3: eva dhātu cakkhudhātu. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Kāmadhātūti ettha dve kāmā kilesakāmo
atk-s0519a:635_4: ca vatthukāmo ca. Kilesakāmapakkhe kāmapaṭisaṃyutto dhātu kāmadhātu, kāmavitakkassetaṃ
atk-s0519a:635_5: nāmaṃ. Vatthukāmapakkhe pana kāmāvacaradhammā kāmo uttarapadalopena, kāmo ca so dhātu
atk-s0519a:635_6: cāti kāmadhātu. Byāpādapaṭisaṃyutto dhātu byāpādadhātu, byāpādavitakkassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0519a:635_7: Byāpādova dhātu byāpādadhātu, dasaāghātavatthuvisayassa paṭighassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto
atk-s0519a:635_8: dhātu vihiṃsādhātu, vihiṃsāvitakko. Vihiṃsā eva vā dhātu vihiṃsādhātu, parasattavihesanassetaṃ
atk-s0519a:635_10: cāti veditabbaṃ. Rūpadhātūti rūpabhavo, sabbe vā rūpadhammā. Arūpadhātūti arūpabhavo,
atk-s0519a:635_11: arūpadhammā vā. Nirodhadhātūti nirodhataṇhā. Saṅkhāradhātūti sabbe saṅkhatadhammā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyaṃ.
atk-s0519a:636_0: Aññamaññavilakkhaṇattā nānappakārā dhātuyo etasminti nānādhātu, loko. Tenevāha –
atk-s0519a:636_1: “aññā cakkhudhātu yāva aññā nibbānadhātū”ti, yathā ca idaṃ ñāṇaṃ cakkhudhātuādibhedena
atk-s0519a:636_2: upādinnakasaṅkhāralokassa vasena anekadhātunānādhātulokaṃ pajānāti, evaṃ anupādinnakasaṅkhāralokassapi
atk-s0519a:636_3: vasena taṃ pajānāti. Paccekabuddhā hi dve ca aggasāvakā upādinnakasaṅkhāralokasseva
atk-s0519a:636_4: nānattaṃ jānanti, tampi ekadeseneva, na nippadesato. Anupādinnakasaṅkhāralokassa
atk-s0519a:636_5: pana nānattaṃ na jānanti. Bhagavā pana “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannāya imassa rukkhassa
atk-s0519a:636_6: khandho seto hoti, imassa kāḷo, imassa maṭṭho, imassa pharuso, imassa bahalo, imassa
atk-s0519a:636_7: tanuttaco. Imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannāya imassa rukkhassa pattaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena
atk-s0519a:636_8: evarūpaṃ nāma hoti, imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ
atk-s0519a:636_9: hoti pītakaṃ lohitakaṃ odātaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ, imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannāya
atk-s0519a:636_10: phalaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ dīghaṃ vaṭṭaṃ susaṇṭhānaṃ dussaṇṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ pharusaṃ
atk-s0519a:636_11: sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ tittaṃ madhuraṃ kaṭukaṃ ambilaṃ kasāvaṃ hoti, imāya nāma dhātuyā
