atk-s0519a:636_12: ussannāya imassa rukkhassa kaṇṭako tikhiṇo hoti, atikhiṇo ujuko kuṭilo kaṇho nīlo
atk-s0519a:636_13: odāto hotī”ti evaṃ anupādinnasaṅkhāralokassāpi vasena anekadhātunānādhātubhāvaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0519a:636_14: Sabbaññubuddhānaṃ eva hi etaṃ balaṃ, na aññesaṃ.
atk-s0519a:637_0: 60. Yaṃ yadeva dhātunti yaṃ kiñci hīnādisabhāvaṃ. Yasmā adhimutti nāma ajjhāsayadhātu,
atk-s0519a:637_1: tasmā adhimuccanaṃ ajjhāsayassa hīnādisabhāvena pavattanaṃ. Taṃ pana tassa taṃ taṃ
atk-s0519a:637_2: adhiṭṭhahanaṃ abhinivisanañca hotīti āha – “adhimuccanti, taṃ tadeva adhiṭṭhahanti
atk-s0519a:637_3: abhinivisantī”ti. Adhimuccanassa visayaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “keci rūpādhimuttā”tiādi
atk-s0519a:637_4: vuttaṃ. Taṃ suviññeyyameva. Nānādhimuttikatāñāṇanti hīnādivasena nānādhimuttikatāya ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:638_0: Te yathādhimuttā ca bhavantīti te hīnādhimuttikā paṇītādhimuttikā sattā yathā yathā
atk-s0519a:638_1: adhimuttā honti. Taṃ taṃ kammasamādānaṃ samādiyantīti adhimuttianurūpaṃ taṃ taṃ attanā
atk-s0519a:638_2: samādiyitabbaṃ kattabbaṃ kammaṃ karonti, tāni kammasamādānāni samuṭṭhānavasena vibhajanto
atk-s0519a:638_3: “te chabbidhaṃ kamma”ntiādimāha. Tattha keci lobhavasena kammaṃ samādiyantīti sambandhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:638_4: Esa nayo sesesupi. Taṃ vibhajjamānanti taṃ samuṭṭhānavasena chabbidhaṃ puna pavattinivattivasena
atk-s0519a:639_0: Yaṃ lobhavasena dosavasena mohavasena ca kammaṃ karotīti dasaakusalakammapathakammaṃ
atk-s0519a:639_1: sandhāya vadati. Tañhi saṃkiliṭṭhatāya kāḷakanti kaṇhaṃ. Apāyesu nibbattāpanato kāḷakavipākanti
atk-s0519a:639_2: kaṇhavipākaṃ. Yaṃ saddhāvasena kammaṃ karotīti dasakusalakammapathakammaṃ. Tañhi
atk-s0519a:639_3: asaṃkiliṭṭhattā paṇḍaranti sukkaṃ. Sagge nibbattāpanato paṇḍaravipākattā sukkavipākaṃ.
atk-s0519a:639_4: Yaṃ lobhavasena dosavasena mohavasena saddhāvasena ca kammaṃ karoti, idaṃ kaṇhasukkanti
atk-s0519a:639_5: vomissakakammaṃ. Kaṇhasukkavipākanti sukhadukkhavipākaṃ. Missakakammañhi katvā akusalavalena
atk-s0519a:639_6: tiracchānayoniyaṃ maṅgalahatthibhāvaṃ upapanno kusalena pavatte sukhaṃ anubhavati,
atk-s0519a:639_7: kusalena rājakule nibbattopi akusalena dukkhaṃ vedayati. Yaṃ vīriyavasena paññāvasena
atk-s0519a:639_8: ca kammaṃ karoti, idaṃ kammaṃ akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākanti kammakkhayakarā
atk-s0519a:639_9: catumaggacetanā. Tañhi yadi kaṇhaṃ bhaveyya, kaṇhavipākaṃ dadeyya. Yadi sukkaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0519a:639_10: sukkaupapattipariyāpannaṃ vipākaṃ dadeyya. Ubhayavipākassa pana appadānato akaṇhaasukkavipākanti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0519a:640_0: Kammasamādāne paṭhamaṃ acelakapaṭipadā kāmesu pātabyatā, dutiyaṃ tibbakilesassa assumukhassāpi
atk-s0519a:640_1: rudato parisuddhabrahmacariyacaraṇaṃ, tatiyaṃ kāmesu apātabyatā acelakapaṭipadā,
atk-s0519a:640_3: Yaṃ evaṃ jātiyaṃ kammasamādānanti yaṃ aññampi evaṃpakāraṃ kammaṃ. Iminā puggalenātiādi
atk-s0519a:640_4: tasmiṃ kammavipāke bhagavato ñāṇassa pavattanākāradassanaṃ. Tattha upacitanti yathā
atk-s0519a:640_5: kataṃ kammaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti, tathā kataṃ upacitaṃ. Avipakkanti na vipakkavipākaṃ.
atk-s0519a:640_6: Vipākāya paccupaṭṭhitanti vipākadānāya katokāsaṃ. Na ca bhabbo abhinibbidhā gantunti
atk-s0519a:640_8: na ca bhabbo. Taṃ bhagavā na ovadatīti taṃ vipākāvaraṇena nivutaṃ puggalaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0519a:640_9: saccapaṭivedhaṃ purakkhatvā na ovadati, vāsanatthaṃ pana tādisānampi dhammaṃ deseti
atk-s0519a:641_0: Upacitanti kātuṃ āraddhaṃ. Tenevāha – “na ca tāva pāripūriṃ gata”nti. Tena micchattaniyāmassa
atk-s0519a:641_1: asamatthataṃ dasseti. Purā pāripūriṃ gacchatīti pāripūriṃ phalanipphādanasamatthataṃ
atk-s0519a:641_2: gacchati purā adhigaccheyya. Micchattaniyatatāya sajjukaṃ phaladhammassa abhājanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0519a:641_3: nibbattayati purā. Tenevāha – “purā veneyyattaṃ samatikkamatī”ti. “Purā aniyataṃ
atk-s0519a:641_4: samatikkamatī”tipi pāṭho, so evattho. Asamatteti kamme asampuṇṇe, te asampuṇṇe vā.
atk-s0519a:642: 61. Evaṃ kilesantarāyamissakaṃ kammantarāyaṃ dassetvā idāni amissakaṃ kammantarāyaṃ dassetuṃ “imassa ca puggalassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0519a:643_0: Sabbesanti imasmiṃ balaniddese vuttānaṃ sabbesaṃ kammānaṃ. Mudumajjhādhimattatāti
atk-s0519a:643_2: viññāyatīti adhippāyo. Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyantiādīsu diṭṭhadhamme imasmiṃ attabhāve
atk-s0519a:643_3: veditabbaṃ phalaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ. Upapajje anantare attabhāve veditabbaṃ phalaṃ
atk-s0519a:643_4: upapajjavedanīyaṃ. Aparasmiṃ attabhāve ito aññasmiṃ yasmiṃ kasmiñci attabhāve veditabbaṃ
atk-s0519a:643_5: phalaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ. Ekajavanavārasmiñhi sattasu cetanāsu paṭhamacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0519a:643_6: nāma. Pariyosānacetanā upapajjavedanīyaṃ nāma. Majjhe pañca cetanā aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0519a:643_7: nāma. Vipākavemattatāñāṇanti vipākavemattatāya vipākavisese ñāṇaṃ. Imassa pana kammavipākassa
atk-s0519a:643_8: gatisampatti gativipatti, upadhisampatti upadhivipatti, kālasampatti kālavipatti,
atk-s0519a:643_9: payogasampatti payogavipattiyo kāraṇaṃ. So ca nesaṃ kāraṇabhāvo “atthekaccāni pāpakāni
atk-s0519a:644_1: “tathā samādinnānaṃ kammāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sekkhaputhujjanasantānesu pavattāni jhānādīni
atk-s0519a:644_2: kammaṃ honti. Tattha tathā samādinnānanti “sukkaṃ sukkavipākaṃ paccuppannasukhaṃ,
atk-s0519a:644_3: āyatiṃ sukhavipāka”nti evamādippakārehi samādinnesu kammesu. Saṃkilesoti paṭipakkhadhammavasena
atk-s0519a:644_4: kiliṭṭhabhāvo. Vodānaṃ paṭipakkhadhammehi visujjhanaṃ. Vuṭṭhānaṃ paguṇavodānaṃ bhavaṅgavuṭṭhānañca.
atk-s0519a:644_5: Evaṃ saṃkilissatītiādīsu ayamevattho – iminā ākārena jhānādi saṃkilissati vodāyati
atk-s0519a:644_6: vuṭṭhahatīti jānanañāṇaṃ bhagavato anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ, na tassa āvaraṇaṃ atthīti.
atk-s0519a:645_0: Kati jhānānītiādi jhānādayo vibhāgena dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ. Cattāri jhānānīti catukkanayavasena
atk-s0519a:645_1: rūpāvacarajjhānāni sandhāyāha. Ekādasāti “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādinā aṭṭhannaṃ tiṇṇañca
atk-s0519a:645_2: suññatavimokkhādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhāti tesu ṭhapetvā lokuttare vimokkhe aṭṭha.
atk-s0519a:645_3: Sattāti tesu eva nirodhasamāpattiṃ ṭhapetvā satta. Tayoti suttantapariyāyena suññatavimokkhādayo
atk-s0519a:645_4: tayo. Dveti abhidhammapariyāyena animittavimokkhassāsambhavato avasesā dve. Ettha
atk-s0519a:645_5: ca paṭipāṭiyā satta appitappitakkhaṇe vikkhambhanavasena paccanīkadhammehi vimuccanato,
atk-s0519a:645_6: ārammaṇe adhimuccanato ca vimokkhā. Nirodhasamāpatti pana sabbaso saññāvedayitehi
atk-s0519a:645_7: vimuttattā apagamavimokkho nāma. Lokuttarā ca taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesehi samucchedavasena
atk-s0519a:646_0: Samādhīsu catukkanayapañcakanayesu paṭhamajjhānasamādhi savitakko savicāro samādhi
atk-s0519a:646_1: nāma. Pañcakanaye dutiyajjhānasamādhi avitakko vicāramatto samādhi nāma. Catukkanaye
atk-s0519a:646_2: pañcakanayepi sesajhānesu samādhi avitakko avicāro samādhi nāma.
atk-s0519a:647_1: Kasmā? Cittekaggatāsabbhāvato. Nirodhasamāpattiyā tadabhāvato na “samādhī”ti nāmaṃ.
atk-s0519a:648_0: Hānabhāgiyo samādhīti appaguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ
atk-s0519a:648_2: kāmarāgabyāpādā saṃkileso”ti vuttattā dutiyajjhānādivasena yojetabbaṃ. Kukkuṭaṃ vuccati
atk-s0519a:648_3: ajaññājigucchanamukhena tapparamatā. Kukkuṭajhāyīti puggalādhiṭṭhānena jhānāni vuttāni,
atk-s0519a:648_4: dve paṭhamadutiyajjhānānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo paṭhamaṃ dutiyaṃ vā jhānaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0519a:648_5: “alamettāvatā”ti saṅkocaṃ āpajjati, uttari na vāyamati, tassa tāni jhānāni cattāripi
atk-s0519a:648_6: “kukkuṭajhānānī”ti vuccanti, taṃsamaṅgino ca kukkuṭajhāyī. Tesu purimāni dve āsannabalavapaccatthikattā
atk-s0519a:648_7: visesabhāgiyatābhāvato ca saṃkilesabhāvena vuttāni. Itarāni pana visesabhāgiyatābhāvepi
atk-s0519a:649_0: Visesabhāgiyo samādhīti paguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ
atk-s0519a:649_2: Heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimañhi paguṇajjhānaṃ uparimassa uparimassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Tasmā
atk-s0519a:649_3: vodānampi “vuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ. Bhavaṅgavasena sabbajhānehi vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti bhavaṅgañca
atk-s0519a:649_4: vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ. Yasmā pana vuṭṭhānavasibhāvena yathāparicchinnakālaṃ samāpattito
atk-s0519a:649_5: vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tasmā samāpattivuṭṭhānakosallaṃ idha “vuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:650_0: 63. Tasseva samādhissāti tassa anantarabalaniddese jhānādipariyāyehi vuttasamādhissa.
atk-s0519a:650_1: Parivārāti parikkhārā. Indriyānīti saddhāsatipaññindriyāni. Balānīti hirottappehi
atk-s0519a:650_2: saddhiṃ tāniyeva. Vīriyassa visuṃ gahaṇaṃ balānaṃ bahūpakāradassanatthaṃ. Vīriyupatthambhena
atk-s0519a:650_3: hi saddhādayo paṭipakkhena akampanīyā honti. Tenevāha – “vīriyavasena balāni bhavantī”ti.
atk-s0519a:650_4: Tesanti indriyānaṃ. Mudumajjhādhimattatāti avisadaṃ mudu. Nātivisadaṃ majjhaṃ. Ativisadaṃ
atk-s0519a:651_0: Veneyyānaṃ indriyānurūpaṃ bhagavato desanāpavattīti dassetuṃ “tattha bhagavā”tiādi
atk-s0519a:651_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha saṃkhittavitthārenāti saṃkhittassa vitthārena. Atha vā saṃkhittenāti
atk-s0519a:651_2: uddiṭṭhamattena. Saṃkhittavitthārenāti uddesena niddesena ca. Vitthārenāti uddesaniddesapaṭiniddesehi.
atk-s0519a:651_3: Mudukanti lahukaṃ apāyabhayavaṭṭabhayādīhi santajjanavasena bhāriyaṃ akatvā. Mudutikkhanti
atk-s0519a:651_4: nātitikkhaṃ. Saṃvegavatthūhi saṃvegajananādivasena bhāriyaṃ katvā. Samathaṃ upadisatīti
atk-s0519a:651_5: samathaṃ adhikaṃ katvā upadisati, na tathā vipassananti adhippāyo. Na hi kevalena
atk-s0519a:651_6: samathena saccappaṭivedho sambhavati. Samathavipassananti samadhuraṃ samathavipassanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:651_7: Vipassananti sātisayaṃ vipassanaṃ upadisati. Yasmā cettha tikkhindriyādayo ugghaṭitaññuādayova,
atk-s0519a:651_8: tasmā “tikkhindriyassa nissaraṇaṃ upadisatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha adhipaññāsikkhāyāti adhipaññāsikkhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:652_0: Yaṃ ettha ñāṇanti ettha indriyānaṃ mudumajjhādhimattatāya yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, idaṃ vuccati
atk-s0519a:652_2: Tassa ñāṇassa pavattanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “ayaṃ imaṃ bhūmi”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:652_3: imaṃ bhūmiṃ bhāvanañca gatoti ayaṃ puggalo evamimaṃ saṃkilesavāsanaṃ vodānaṃ bhavaṅgañca
atk-s0519a:652_4: gato gacchati gamissati ca, kālavacanicchāya abhāvato, yathā duddhanti. Imāya velāya
atk-s0519a:652_5: imasmiṃ samaye imāya mudumajjhatikkhabhedāya anusāsaniyā. Evaṃdhātukoti hīnādivasena
atk-s0519a:652_6: evaṃajjhāsayo evaṃadhimuttiko. Ayañcassa āsayoti imassa puggalassa ayaṃ sassatucchedappakāro,
atk-s0519a:652_7: yathābhūtañāṇānulomakhantippakāro vā āsayo. Idañhi catubbidhaṃ āsayanti ettha sattā
atk-s0519a:652_8: vasantīti āsayoti vuccati. Imaṃ pana bhagavā sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānanto tesaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ
atk-s0519a:652_9: vipassanāñāṇakammassakataññāṇānañca appavattikkhaṇepi jānāti eva. Vuttampi cetaṃ
atk-s0519a:652_10: – “kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti. Kāmaṃ
atk-s0519a:652_11: sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto’ti.
atk-s0519a:652_12: Nekkhammaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti… byāpādaṃ… abyāpādaṃ… thinamiddhaṃ… ālokasaññaṃ sevantaññeva
atk-s0519a:653_0: Ayaṃ anusayoti ayaṃ imassa puggalassa kāmarāgādiko appahīnoyeva anusayitakileso.
atk-s0519a:653_1: Appahīnoyeva hi thāmagato kileso anusayo. Parasattānanti padhānasattānaṃ. Parapuggalānanti
atk-s0519a:653_2: tato paresaṃ sattānaṃ, hīnasattānanti attho. Ekatthameva vā etaṃ padadvayaṃ veneyyavasena
atk-s0519a:653_3: dvidhā vuttaṃ. Indriyaparopariyattavemattatāñāṇanti parabhāvo ca aparabhāvo ca paropariyattaṃ
atk-s0519a:653_4: a-kārassa okāraṃ katvā, tassa vemattatā paropariyattavemattatā. Saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ
atk-s0519a:654_0: Tattha yanti yaṃ anekavihitassa pubbenivāsassa anussaraṇavasena bhagavato ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a:654_1: idaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ tathāgatabalanti sambandho. Anekavihitanti anekavidhaṃ, anekehi vā
atk-s0519a:654_2: pakārehi pavattitaṃ. Pubbenivāsanti anussarituṃ icchitaṃ attano paresañca samanantarātītaṃ
atk-s0519a:654_3: bhavaṃ ādiṃ katvā tattha tattha nivutthasantānaṃ. Anussaratīti “ekampi jātiṃ dvepi
atk-s0519a:654_4: jātiyo”ti evaṃ jātipaṭipāṭiyā anugantvā sarati, anudeva vā sarati, citte abhininnāmitamatte
atk-s0519a:654_5: eva saratīti attho. Bhagavato hi parikammakiccaṃ natthi, āvajjanamatteneva sarati.
atk-s0519a:654_6: Seyyathidanti āraddhappakāranidassanatthe nipāto. Ekampi jātinti ekampi paṭisandhimūlaṃ
atk-s0519a:654_7: cutipariyosānaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ khandhasantānaṃ. Esa nayo dvepi jātiyotiādīsupi.
atk-s0519a:655_0: Anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappetiādīsu pana parihāyamāno kappo saṃvaṭṭakappo, vaḍḍhamāno vivaṭṭakappoti
atk-s0519a:655_1: veditabbo. Tattha saṃvaṭṭena saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī gahito taṃmūlattā, vivaṭṭena ca vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī.
atk-s0519a:655_2: Evañhi sati yāni “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, kappassa asaṅkhyeyyāni. Katamāni cattāri?
atk-s0519a:655_3: Saṃvaṭṭo saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī vivaṭṭo vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī”ti vuttāni, tāni sabbāni pariggahitāni
atk-s0519a:655_4: honti. Amutrāsintiādi saraṇākāradassanaṃ. Tattha amutrāsinti amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe,
atk-s0519a:655_5: amumhi bhave vā yoniyaṃ vā gatiyaṃ vā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyaṃ vā sattāvāse vā sattanikāye
atk-s0519a:655_6: vā. Evaṃnāmoti tisso vā phusso vā. Evaṃgottoti bhaggavo vā gotamo vā. Evaṃvaṇṇoti
atk-s0519a:655_7: odāto vā sāmo vā. Evamāhāroti sālimaṃsodanāhāro vā pavattaphalabhojano vā. Evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedīti
atk-s0519a:655_8: anekappakārena kāyikacetasikānaṃ sāmisanirāmisappabhedānaṃ vā sukhadukkhānaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
atk-s0519a:655_10: vā. So tato cuto amutra udapādinti so tato bhavato, sattanikāyato vā cuto puna amukasmiṃ
atk-s0519a:655_11: nāma sattanikāye udapādiṃ. Atha vā tatrāpi bhave vā sattanikāye vā ahosiṃ. Evaṃnāmotiādi vuttatthameva.
atk-s0519a:656_0: 64. Dibbenātiādīsu dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ. Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattampi pittasemharuhirādīhi
atk-s0519a:656_1: apalibuddhaṃ upakkilesavimuttattā dūrepi ārammaṇaggahaṇasamatthaṃ dibbaṃ pasādacakkhu
atk-s0519a:656_2: hoti. Idampi vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattaṃ ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ,
atk-s0519a:656_3: dibbavihāravasena vā paṭiladdhattā, attanā ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbaṃ,
atk-s0519a:656_5: dibbaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusārena veditabbaṃ. Dassanaṭṭhena cakkhu. Cakkhukiccakaraṇena
atk-s0519a:656_6: cakkhumivātipi cakkhu. Cutūpapātadassanena diṭṭhivisuddhihetuttā visuddhaṃ. Yo hi
atk-s0519a:656_7: cutimattameva passati, na upapātaṃ, so ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Yo upapātamattameva
atk-s0519a:656_8: passati na cutiṃ, so navasattapātubhāvadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Yo pana tadubhayaṃ passati,
atk-s0519a:656_9: so yasmā duvidhampi taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ ativattati. Tasmāssa taṃ dassanaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhihetu
atk-s0519a:656_10: hoti. Tadubhayañca bhagavā passati. Tena vuttaṃ – “cutūpapātadassanena diṭṭhivisuddhihetuttā visuddha”nti.
atk-s0519a:658_0: “So kho ahaṃ anuruddhā ‘vicikicchā cittassa upakkileso’ti iti viditvā vicikicchaṃ
atk-s0519a:658_1: cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahiṃ. ‘Amanasikāro cittassa upakkileso… thinamiddhaṃ… chambhitattaṃ…
atk-s0519a:658_2: uppilaṃ… duṭṭhullaṃ… accāraddhavīriyaṃ… atilīnavīriyaṃ… abhijappā… nānattasaññā…
atk-s0519a:658_3: atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ cittassa upakkileso’ti iti viditvā atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ
atk-s0519a:659_0: Tadevaṃ ekādasaupakkilesavirahato vā visuddhaṃ. Manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā rūpadassanena
atk-s0519a:659_1: atikkantamānusakaṃ, maṃsacakkhuṃ atikkantattā vā atikkantamānusakaṃ. Tena dibbena
atk-s0519a:660_0: Satte passatīti manusso manussaṃ maṃsacakkhunā viya satte passati oloketi. Cavamāne
atk-s0519a:660_1: upapajjamāneti ettha cutikkhaṇe upapattikkhaṇe vā dibbacakkhunāpi daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0519a:660_2: Ye pana āsannacutikā idāni cavissanti, ye ca gahitapaṭisandhikā sampati nibbattā,
atk-s0519a:660_3: te “cavamānā upapajjamānā”ti adhippetā. Te evarūpe cavamāne upapajjamāne. Hīneti
atk-s0519a:660_4: mohanissandayuttattā hīnajātikulabhogādivasena hīḷite paribhūte. Paṇīteti amohanissandayuttattā
atk-s0519a:660_6: dosanissandayuttattā aniṭṭhākantāmanāpavaṇṇayutte abhirūpe virūpe vāti attho. Sugateti
atk-s0519a:660_7: sugatigate, alobhanissandayuttattā vā aḍḍhe mahaddhane. Duggateti duggatigate, lobhanissandayuttattā
atk-s0519a:660_8: vā dalidde appannapānabhojane. Yathākammūpageti yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ upacitaṃ, tena tena
atk-s0519a:660_9: upagate. Tattha purimehi “cavamāne”tiādīhi dibbacakkhukiccaṃ vuttaṃ. Iminā pana padena
atk-s0519a:661_0: Kāyaduccaritenātiādīsu duṭṭhu caritaṃ, duṭṭhaṃ vā caritaṃ kilesapūtikattā duccaritaṃ.
atk-s0519a:661_1: Kāyena duccaritaṃ, kāyato vā pavattaṃ duccaritaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ. Evaṃ vacīmanoduccaritānipi
atk-s0519a:661_2: daṭṭhabbāni. Samannāgatāti samaṅgībhūtā. Ariyānaṃ upavādakāti buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ,
atk-s0519a:661_3: antamaso gihisotāpannānampi antimavatthunā vā guṇaparidhaṃsanena vā upavādakā akkosakā
atk-s0519a:661_5: Ye ca micchādiṭṭhimūlakesu kāyakammādīsu aññepi samādapenti. Tattha vacīmanoduccaritaggahaṇena
atk-s0519a:661_6: ariyūpavādamicchādiṭṭhīsu gahitāsupi tesaṃ puna vacanaṃ mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0519a:662_0: “Seyyathāpi, sāriputta, bhikkhu sīlasampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno diṭṭheva
atk-s0519a:662_1: dhamme aññaṃ ārādheyya, evaṃsampadamidaṃ, sāriputta, vadāmi taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ
atk-s0519a:662_2: cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye”ti.
atk-s0519a:663: Micchādiṭṭhito ca mahāsāvajjataraṃ nāma aññaṃ natthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0519a:664: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi evaṃ mahāsāvajjataraṃ, yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi. Micchādiṭṭhiparamāni, bhikkhave, vajjānī”ti.
atk-s0519a:665_0: Kāyassa bhedāti upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā. Paraṃ maraṇāti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattakkhandhaggahaṇe.
atk-s0519a:665_1: Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā. Paraṃ maraṇāti cutito uddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:665_2: Apāyantiādi sabbaṃ nirayavevacanaṃ. Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā ayā
atk-s0519a:665_3: apetattā, sukhānaṃ vā āyassa abhāvā apāyo. Dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti duggati,
atk-s0519a:665_4: dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā gati duggati. Vivasā nipatanti tattha
atk-s0519a:665_5: dukkaṭakārinoti vinipāto. Natthi ettha assādasaññito ayoti nirayo.
atk-s0519a:666_0: Atha vā apāyaggahaṇena tiracchānayoniṃ dīpeti, tiracchānayoni hi apāyo, sugatito
atk-s0519a:666_1: apetattā. Na duggati, mahesakkhānaṃ nāgarājādīnaṃ sambhavato. Duggatiggahaṇena pettivisayaṃ
atk-s0519a:666_2: dīpeti, so hi apāyo ceva duggati ca sugatito apetattā, dukkhassa ca gatibhūtattā.
atk-s0519a:666_3: Na tu vinipāto asurasadisaṃ avinipatitattā. Petamahiddhikānañhi vimānānipi nibbattanti.
atk-s0519a:666_4: Vinipātaggahaṇena asurakāyaṃ dīpeti, so hi yathāvuttenatthena apāyo ceva duggati
atk-s0519a:666_5: ca sukhasamussayehi vinipātattā vinipātoti vuccati. Nirayaggahaṇena avīciādianekappakāraṃ
atk-s0519a:666_6: nirayameva dīpeti. Upapannāti upagatā, tattha abhinibbattāti adhippāyo. Vuttavipariyāyena
atk-s0519a:667_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – ettha sugatiggahaṇena manussagatimpi saṅgaṇhāti. Saggaggahaṇena
atk-s0519a:667_1: devagatiṃ eva. Tattha sundarā gatīti sugati. Rūpādīhi visayehi suṭṭhu aggoti saggo.
atk-s0519a:667_2: So sabbopi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti ayaṃ vacanattho. Amukāya kappakoṭiyaṃ upacitaṃ
atk-s0519a:667_3: tenāyaṃ etarahi, anāgate vā saggūpago apāyūpago cāti aṭṭhamanavamabalañāṇakiccaṃ
atk-s0519a:667_4: ekajjhaṃ katvā dassitaṃ. Tathā kappasatasahassevātiādīsupi. Tenevāha – “imāni bhagavato dve ñāṇānī”ti.
atk-s0519a:668_0: Nihato māro bodhimūleti nihato samucchinno kilesamāro bodhirukkhamūle. Idaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0519a:668_1: dasamaṃ balanti idaṃ kilesamārassa hananaṃ samucchindanaṃ bhagavato dasamaṃ balaṃ.
atk-s0519a:668_2: Tenevāha – “sabbāsavaparikkhayaṃ ñāṇa”nti. Yasmā pana yadā arahattamaggena savāsanā
atk-s0519a:668_3: sabbe āsavā khepitā, tadā bhagavatā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ adhigataṃ nāma, tasmā “yaṃ sabbaññutā pattā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:669_0: Ayaṃ tāvettha ācariyānaṃ samānatthakathā. Paravādī panāha – “dasabalañāṇaṃ nāma pāṭiekkaṃ
atk-s0519a:669_1: natthi, yasmā ‘sabbaññutā pattā viditā sabbadhammā’ti vuttaṃ, tasmā sabbaññutaññāṇassevāyaṃ
atk-s0519a:669_2: pabhedo”ti, taṃ na tathā daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññameva hi dasabalañāṇaṃ, aññaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:669_3: Dasabalañāṇañhi sakasakakiccameva jānāti, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ tampi tato avasesampi
atk-s0519a:669_4: jānāti. Dasabalañāṇesu hi paṭhamaṃ kāraṇākāraṇameva jānāti. Dutiyaṃ kammaparicchedameva,
atk-s0519a:669_5: tatiyaṃ dhātunānattakāraṇameva, catutthaṃ ajjhāsayādhimuttimeva, pañcamaṃ kammavipākantarameva,
atk-s0519a:669_6: chaṭṭhaṃ jhānādīhi saddhiṃ tesaṃ saṃkilesādimeva, sattamaṃ indriyānaṃ tikkhamudubhāvameva,
atk-s0519a:669_7: aṭṭhamaṃ pubbenivutthakkhandhasantatimeva, navamaṃ sattānaṃ cutūpapātameva, dasamaṃ
atk-s0519a:669_8: saccaparicchedameva. Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana etehi jānitabbañca tato uttariñca pajānāti.
atk-s0519a:669_9: Etesaṃ pana kiccaṃ sabbaṃ na karoti. Tañhi jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ na sakkoti, iddhi
atk-s0519a:669_10: hutvā vikubbituṃ na sakkoti, maggo hutvā kilese khepetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0519a:670_0: Apica paravādī evaṃ pucchitabbo “dasabalañāṇaṃ nāmetaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ
atk-s0519a:670_1: avitakkaavicāraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttara”nti. Jānanto
atk-s0519a:670_2: “paṭipāṭiyā satta savitakkasavicārānī”ti vakkhati, tato parāni dve avitakkaavicārānīti,
atk-s0519a:670_3: āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ siyā savitakkasavicāraṃ, siyā avitakkavicāramattaṃ, siyā avitakkaavicāranti.
atk-s0519a:670_4: Tathā paṭipāṭiyā satta kāmāvacarāni, tato dve rūpāvacarāni, avasāne ekaṃ lokuttaranti
atk-s0519a:670_5: vakkhati. Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana savitakkasavicārameva kāmāvacarameva lokiyamevāti
atk-s0519a:673_0: 65. Evaṃ nānānayehi vicayahārasampātaṃ vitthāretvā idāni yuttihārasampātādīni dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:673_2: gāthāya padattho vitthāritoyeva. Rakkhitacittassa sammāsaṅkappagocaro bhavissatīti
atk-s0519a:673_3: yujjatīti manacchaṭṭhāni dvārāni satikavāṭena pidahitvā viharantassa kāmavitakkādīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:673_4: micchāsaṅkappānaṃ avasaro eva natthīti nekkhammavitakkādiko sammāsaṅkappo eva tassa
atk-s0519a:673_5: gocaro pavattiṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatīti ayamattho yujjati. Yuttiyā ghaṭeti saṃsandati
atk-s0519a:673_6: sametīti attho. Sammāsaṅkappagocaro sammādiṭṭhi bhavissatīti vuttanayena sammāsaṅkappagocaro
atk-s0519a:673_7: puggalo aviparītameva vitakkato sammādiṭṭhi bhavissati. Sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:673_8: purakkhatvā viharanto maggañāṇena pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ asammohato paṭivijjhissati.
atk-s0519a:673_9: Tathā paṭivijjhanto ca dukkhasabhāvattā duggatisaṅkhātā sabbā bhavagatiyo jahissati,
atk-s0519a:673_10: tato eva sabbaṃ vinipātabhayaṃ saṃsārabhayañca samatikkamissatīti sabbopi cāyamattho yutto evāti.
atk-s0519a:676_0: 66. Sakasampattiyā viya susaṃvihitasaṅkappo bhavati. Indriyesu guttadvāratā sucaritapāripūriyā
atk-s0519a:676_1: āsannakāraṇanti āha – “rakkhitacittassāti tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ padaṭṭhāna”nti. Tassattho
atk-s0519a:676_6: tadatikkamanupāyaṃ vipassanaṃ ārabhatīti sammādiṭṭhivipassanāya visesakāraṇanti āha
atk-s0519a:676_8: sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamatīti taṃ paṭhamamaggādhigamassa kāraṇanti āha – “ñatvāna udayabbayanti
atk-s0519a:676_10: vīriyassa āsannakāraṇanti āha – “thinamiddhābhibhū bhikkhūti vīriyassa padaṭṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0519a:676_11: Yadipi ariyamaggakkhaṇe pahānabhāvanā samānakālā ekābhisamayassa icchitattā, tathāpi
atk-s0519a:676_12: pahātabbassa pahānābhāve bhāvanāpāripūrī natthīti pahānanimittā viya katvā bhāvanā
atk-s0519a:676_13: vuttā “sabbā duggatiyo jaheti bhāvanāya padaṭṭhāna”nti. Atha vā “sabbā duggatiyo
atk-s0519a:676_14: jahe”ti idaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ yogīnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ ānisaṃsakittanaṃ hotīti
atk-s0519a:679_0: 67. Indriyesu guttadvāratā satisaṃvaro, satibalena ca nekkhammavitakkādibahulo hotīti
atk-s0519a:679_1: vuttaṃ – “tasmā rakkhitacittassa sammāsaṅkappagocaroti idaṃ satindriya”nti. Tassattho
atk-s0519a:679_2: – “tasmā rakkhitacittassa sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti ettha rakkhitacittatāya ca sammāsaṅkappagocaratā
atk-s0519a:679_3: kāraṇūpacārena idaṃ satindriyaṃ, gahitāni bhavanti pañcindriyāni indriyalakkhaṇena
atk-s0519a:679_4: vimuttiparipācanabhāvena vā ekalakkhaṇattāti adhippāyo. Gahito bhavatīti ettha maggalakkhaṇena
atk-s0519a:679_5: gahaṇaṃ suviññeyyanti taṃ ṭhapetvā kāraṇato gahaṇaṃ dassetuṃ “sammādiṭṭhito hi sammāsaṅkappo
atk-s0519a:679_6: pabhavatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tato eva gahito bhavati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti vatvā vimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanānipi vuttāni.
atk-s0519a:682_0: 68. Rakkhīyatīti rakkhitaṃ. Idaṃ padavasena nibbacanaṃ. Yasmā pana atthavasena nibbacane
atk-s0519a:682_1: vutte padavasena nibbacanaṃ vuttameva hoti, tasmā “rakkhitaṃ paripālīyatīti esā niruttī”ti
atk-s0519a:682_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha iti-saddo ādyattho, pakāre vā. Tena evamādikā evaṃpakārā vā esā niruttīti
atk-s0519a:682_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Tasmā cintetīti cittaṃ. Attano santānaṃ cinotīti cittaṃ, paccayehi citanti
atk-s0519a:682_4: cittaṃ, cittavicittaṭṭhena cittaṃ, cittakaraṇaṭṭhena cittaṃ. Sammā saṅkappetīti sammāsaṅkappotiādinā nirutti veditabbā.
atk-s0519a:683_0: Ayaṃ ettha bhagavato adhippāyoti “rakkhitacitto assā”tiādinā indriyasaṃvarādayo duggatipahānañca
atk-s0519a:683_1: vadato bhagavato ettha gāthāyaṃ adhippāyo. Kokāliko hītiādi nidānaniddeso. Tattha
atk-s0519a:683_2: hi-saddo kāraṇe. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā kokāliko arakkhitacittatāya aggasāvakesu
atk-s0519a:683_3: cittaṃ padosetvā padumanirayaṃ upapanno, tasmā duggatiyo jahitukāmo rakkhitacitto
atk-s0519a:683_4: assāti bhagavā satiārakkhena cetasā samannāgato sabbā duggatiyo jahatīti attho. Suttamhi
atk-s0519a:686_0: 69. Nekkhammasaṅkappabahulo kasiṇavasena mettādivasena vā laddhāya cittekaggatāsaṅkhātāya
atk-s0519a:686_1: cittamañjūsāya cittaṃ ṭhapetvā samādhiṃyeva vā yathāladdhaṃ saṃkilesato rakkhitacitto
atk-s0519a:686_2: nāma hotīti vuttaṃ – “tasmā rakkhitacittassa sammāsaṅkappagocaroti ayaṃ samatho”ti.
atk-s0519a:686_3: Paññāpadhānā vipassanāti āha – “sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāroti ayaṃ vipassanā”ti. Ariyamaggena
atk-s0519a:686_4: dukkhasacce pariññāte udayabbayadassanaṃ matthakappattaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ – “ñatvāna
atk-s0519a:686_5: udayabbayanti dukkhapariññā”ti. “Yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti
atk-s0519a:686_6: hi maggañāṇassa pavattidassanāti. Imāni cattāri saccānīti catusaccadhammavasena āvaṭṭanaṃ
atk-s0519a:686_7: niṭṭhapeti. Tattha purimena saccadvayaṭṭhapanena visabhāgadhammavasena, pacchimena
atk-s0519a:689_0: 70. Kusalapakkho kusalapakkhena niddisitabboti rakkhitacittassāti satisaṃvaro, so
atk-s0519a:689_1: chabbidho dvāravasena cakkhudvārasaṃvaro yāva manodvārasaṃvaroti. Sammāsaṅkappo tividho
atk-s0519a:689_3: dukkhe ñāṇaṃ…pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu ñāṇanti. Udayabbayañāṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:689_4: paññāsavidhaṃ avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo…pe… vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi viññāṇakkhandhassa
atk-s0519a:689_5: vayaṃ passati. Thinamiddhābhibhavanaṃ catubbidhaṃ catumaggavasena. Tattha satisaṃvaro
atk-s0519a:689_6: lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidho. Tesu lokiyo kāmāvacarova, lokuttaro dassanabhāvanābhedato
atk-s0519a:689_7: duvidho. Ekameko cettha catusatipaṭṭhānabhedato catubbidho. Esa nayo sammāsaṅkappādīsupi.
atk-s0519a:690_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – sammāsaṅkappo paṭhamajjhānavasena rūpāvacarotipi nīharitabbo.
atk-s0519a:690_1: Padaṭṭhānavibhāgo padaṭṭhānahārasampāte vuttanayena vattabbo. Akusalapakkhe asaṃvaro
atk-s0519a:690_3: aṭṭhavidho. Micchāsaṅkappo kāmavitakkādivasena tividho. Aññāṇaṃ “dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādinā
atk-s0519a:690_4: aṭṭhavidhā vibhattaṃ. Sammādiṭṭhipaṭipakkhato micchādiṭṭhi dvāsaṭṭhividhena veditabbā.
atk-s0519a:690_5: Thinamiddhaṃ uppattibhūmito pañcavidhanti evaṃ akusalapakkhe vibhatti veditabbā.
atk-s0519a:693_1: bhāvitāyā”ti āha. Lokiyā cettha samathavipassanā daṭṭhabbā. Paṭipakkhenāti “arakkhitena
atk-s0519a:693_2: cittenā”ti gāthāya paṭipakkhenāti adhippāyo. Atha vā vibhattihāre niddiṭṭhassa akusalapakkhassa
atk-s0519a:696_0: 72. “Mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho manoviññāṇadhātū”ti ca cittassa
atk-s0519a:696_1: vevacanaṃ. “Takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā”ti ca sammāsaṅkappassa.
atk-s0519a:696_2: “Paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo”tiādinā sammādiṭṭhiyā. “Thinaṃ thiyanā thiyitattaṃ
atk-s0519a:696_3: cittassa akallatā akammaññatā onāho parināho antosaṅkoco”ti thinassa. “Akallatā akammaññatā
atk-s0519a:696_4: kāyālasiyaṃ supyaṃ supyanā supitatta”nti middhassa. “Bhikkhako bhikkhū”tiādinā bhikkhupadassa.
atk-s0519a:696_5: “Duggati apāyo vinipāto vaṭṭadukkhaṃ saṃsāro”tiādinā duggatiyā vevacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:699_0: 73. Adhiṭṭhahitvā rakkhantiyā satiyā rakkhiyamānaṃ cittaṃ tassā adhiṭṭhānaṃ viya
atk-s0519a:699_1: hotīti katvā vuttaṃ – “rakkhitacittassāti padaṭṭhānapaññatti satiyā”ti. Sesaṃ imasmiṃ
atk-s0519a:699_2: paññattihārasampāte ito paresu otaraṇasodhanahārasampātesupi apubbaṃ natthi. Heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0519a:702_0: 76. Adhiṭṭhānahārasampāte sammādiṭṭhi nāma yaṃ dukkhe ñāṇantiādinā catusaccahetuhetusamuppannapaccayapaccayuppannasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0519a:702_1: visayassa vasena vemattataṃ dassetvā puna yaṃ tattha tattha yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassananti
atk-s0519a:702_2: pāḷipāḷiatthānaṃ avasiṭṭhavisayavaseneva vemattataṃ dīpeti. Tattha yaṃ saccāgamananti
atk-s0519a:702_3: yaṃ saccato aviparītato visayassa āgamanaṃ, adhigamoti attho. “Yaṃ paccāgamana”ntipi
atk-s0519a:702_4: pāṭho, tassa yaṃ paṭipāṭivisayassa āgamanaṃ, taṃtaṃvisayādhigamoti attho. Sesamettha
atk-s0519a:702_5: parikkhārasamāropanahārasampātesu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ pubbe vuttanayattā uttānameva.
atk-s0519a:705: Api cettha hārasampātaniddeso imināpi nayena veditabbo –
atk-s0519a:707: Manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
atk-s0519a:709_0: Tattha katamo desanāhārasampāto? Manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti manoti khandhavavatthānena
atk-s0519a:709_1: viññāṇakkhandhaṃ deseti. Āyatanavavatthānena manāyatanaṃ, dhātuvavatthānena viññāṇadhātuṃ,
atk-s0519a:709_2: indriyavavatthānena manindriyaṃ. Katame dhammā pubbaṅgamā? Cha dhammā pubbaṅgamā,
atk-s0519a:709_3: kusalānaṃ kusalamūlāni, akusalānaṃ akusalamūlāni, sādhipatikānaṃ adhipati, sabbacittuppādānaṃ
atk-s0519a:709_4: indriyāni. Api ca imasmiṃ sutte mano adhippeto. Yathā balaggassa rājā pubbaṅgamo,
atk-s0519a:709_5: evamevaṃ dhammānaṃ mano pubbaṅgamo. Tattha tividhena mano pubbaṅgamo nekkhammachandena
atk-s0519a:709_6: abyāpādachandena avihiṃsāchandena. Tattha alobhassa nekkhammachandena manopubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0519a:709_7: adosassa abyāpādachandena manopubbaṅgamaṃ, amohassa avihiṃsāchandena manopubbaṅgamaṃ.
atk-s0519a:710_0: Manoseṭṭhāti mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ seṭṭhaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ mūlaṃ pamukhaṃ
atk-s0519a:710_1: pāmokkhaṃ, tena vuccati “manoseṭṭhā”ti. Manomayāti manena katā, manena nimmitā, manena
atk-s0519a:710_2: nibbattā, mano tesaṃ paccayo, tena vuccati “manomayā”ti. Te pana dhammā chandasamudānitā
atk-s0519a:710_4: Manasā ce pasannenāti yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo. Iti iminā pasādena
atk-s0519a:710_5: upeto samupeto upagato samupagato sampanno samannāgato, tena vuccati “pasannenā”ti
atk-s0519a:710_6: idaṃ manokammaṃ. Bhāsati vāti vacīkammaṃ. Karoti vāti kāyakammaṃ. Iti dasakusalakammapathā dassitā.
atk-s0519a:711_0: Tatoti dasavidhassa kusalakammassa katattā upacitattā. Nanti yo so katapuñño katakusalo
atk-s0519a:711_1: katabhīruttāṇo, taṃ puggalaṃ. Sukhanti duvidhaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ cetasikañca. Anvetīti anugacchati.
atk-s0519a:712_0: Idhassu puriso appahīnānusayo saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādaṃ anupassati, so saṃyojaniyesu
atk-s0519a:712_1: dhammesu assādaṃ anupassanto yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāsutaṃ sampattibhavaṃ pattheti. Iccassa
atk-s0519a:712_2: avijjā ca bhavataṇhā ca anubaddhā honti, so yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāsutaṃ sampattibhavaṃ
atk-s0519a:712_3: patthento pasādanīyavatthusmiṃ cittaṃ pasādeti saddahati okappeti. So pasannacitto
atk-s0519a:712_4: tividhaṃ puññakiriyavatthuṃ anutiṭṭhati dānamayaṃ sīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ kāyena vācāya
atk-s0519a:712_5: manasā. So tassa vipākaṃ paccanubhoti diṭṭheva dhamme upapajje vā aparāpare vā pariyāye.
atk-s0519a:712_6: Iti kho panassa avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā
atk-s0519a:712_7: nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, saḷāyatanapaccayā sukhavedanīyo phasso, phassapaccayā
atk-s0519a:712_8: vedanāti evaṃ santaṃ taṃ sukhamanveti. Tassevaṃ vedanāya aparāparaṃ parivattamānāya
atk-s0519a:712_9: uppajjati taṇhā. Taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ…pe… samudayo hotīti.
atk-s0519a:713_0: Tattha yaṃ mano, ye ca manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, yañca sukhaṃ, ime vuccanti pañcakkhandhā,
atk-s0519a:713_1: te dukkhasaccaṃ. Tesaṃ purimakāraṇabhūtā avijjā bhavataṇhā ca samudayasaccaṃ. Tesaṃ
atk-s0519a:713_2: pariññāya pahānāya bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti, dukkhassa pariññāya samudayassa pahānāya.
atk-s0519a:713_3: Yena parijānāti, yena pajahati, ayaṃ maggo. Yattha ca maggo pavattati, ayaṃ nirodho.
atk-s0519a:713_4: Imāni cattāri saccāni evaṃ āyatanadhātuindriyamukhenāpi niddhāretabbāni. Tattha samudayena
atk-s0519a:713_5: assādo, dukkhena ādīnavo, magganirodhehi nissaraṇaṃ, sukhassa anvayo phalaṃ, manasā
atk-s0519a:713_6: pasannena kāyavacīsamīhā upāyo, manopubbaṅgamattā dhammānaṃ attano sukhakāmena pasannena
atk-s0519a:713_7: manasā vacīkammaṃ kāyakammañca pavattetabbanti ayaṃ bhagavato āṇatti. Ayaṃ desanāhārasampāto.
atk-s0519a:714_0: Tattha katamo vicayahārasampāto? Mananato ārammaṇavijānanato mano. Mananalakkhaṇe
atk-s0519a:714_1: sampayuttesu ādhipaccakaraṇato pubbaṅgamo īhābhāvato nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena dhammā.
atk-s0519a:714_2: Gāmesu gāmaṇi viya padhānaṭṭhena mano seṭṭho etesanti manoseṭṭhā. Sahajātādipaccayabhūtena
atk-s0519a:714_3: manasā nibbattāti manomayā. Akālussiyato, ārammaṇassa okappanato ca pasannena vacīviññattivipphārato
atk-s0519a:714_4: tathā sādiyanato ca bhāsati. Copanakāyavipphārato tathā sādiyanato ca karoti. Tathā
atk-s0519a:714_5: pasutattā anaññattā ca “tato”ti vuttaṃ. Sukhanato sātabhāvato iṭṭhabhāvato ca “sukha”nti
atk-s0519a:714_6: vuttaṃ. Katūpacitattā avipakkavipākattā ca “anvetī”ti vuttaṃ. Kāraṇāyattavuttito
atk-s0519a:714_7: asaṅkantito ca “chāyāva anapāyinī”ti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ anupadavicayato vicayahārasampāto.
atk-s0519a:715_0: Tattha katamo yuttihārasampāto? Manassa dhammānaṃ ādhipaccayogato pubbaṅgamatā yujjati.
atk-s0519a:715_1: Tato eva tesaṃ manassa anuvattanato dhammānaṃ manoseṭṭhatā yujjati. Sahajātādipaccayavasena
atk-s0519a:715_2: manasā nibbattattā dhammānaṃ manomayatā yujjati. Manasā pasannena samuṭṭhānānaṃ kāyavacīkammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:715_3: kusalabhāvo yujjati. Yena kusalakammaṃ upacitaṃ, taṃ chāyā viya sukhaṃ anvetīti yujjati.
atk-s0519a:716_0: Tattha katamo padaṭṭhāno hārasampāto? Mano manopavicārānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ. Manopubbaṅgamā
atk-s0519a:716_1: dhammā sabbassa kusalapakkhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. “Bhāsatī”ti sammāvācā, “karotī”ti sammākammanto,
atk-s0519a:716_2: te sammāājīvassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sammāvāyāmo
atk-s0519a:716_3: sammāsatiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sammāsati sammāsamādhissa padaṭṭhānaṃ. “Manasā pasannenā”ti
atk-s0519a:716_4: ettha pasādo saddhindriyaṃ, taṃ sīlassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sīlaṃ samādhissa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:716_5: Samādhi paññāyāti yāva vimuttiñāṇadassanā yojetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ padaṭṭhānahārasampāto.
atk-s0519a:717_0: Tattha katamo lakkhaṇo hārasampāto? “Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti manopubbaṅgamatāvacanena
atk-s0519a:717_1: dhammānaṃ chandapubbaṅgamatāpi vīriyapubbaṅgamatāpi vīmaṃsāpubbaṅgamatāpi vuttā hoti
atk-s0519a:717_2: ādhipateyyalakkhaṇena chandādīnaṃ manasā ekalakkhaṇattā. Tathā nesaṃ saddhādipubbaṅgamatāpi
atk-s0519a:717_3: vuttā hoti indriyalakkhaṇena saddhādīnaṃ manasā ekalakkhaṇattā. “Manasā ce pasannenā”ti
atk-s0519a:717_4: yathā manassa pasādasamannāgamo taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ kāyavacīkammānaṃ anavajjabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:717_5: Evaṃ cittassa satiādisamannāgamopi nesaṃ anavajjabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ yonisomanasikārasamuṭṭhānabhāvena
atk-s0519a:717_7: anugamo vutto hoti tesampi kammapaccayatāya ekalakkhaṇattāti. Ayaṃ lakkhaṇahārasampāto.
atk-s0519a:718_1: nibbacanaṃ niruttaṃ, taṃ padatthaniddesavasena veditabbaṃ. Padattho ca vuttanayena
atk-s0519a:718_2: suviññeyyova. Ye sukhena atthikā, tehi pasannena manasā kāyavacīmanokammāni pavattetabbānīti
atk-s0519a:718_3: ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo. Puññakiriyāya aññesampi pubbaṅgamā hutvā tattha tesaṃ
atk-s0519a:718_4: sammā upanetāro imissā desanāya nidānaṃ. “Chadvārādhipatī rājā, cittānuparivattino
atk-s0519a:718_5: dhammā, cittassa ekadhammassa, sabbeva vasamanvagū”ti evamādisamānayanena imissā
atk-s0519a:718_6: desanāya saṃsandanā desanānusandhi. Padānusandhiyo pana suviññeyyāvāti. Ayaṃ catubyūho hārasampāto.
atk-s0519a:719_0: Tattha katamo āvaṭṭo hārasampāto? “Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti tattha yāni tīṇi kusalamūlāni,
atk-s0519a:719_1: tāni aṭṭhannaṃ sammattānaṃ hetu. Ye sammattā, ayaṃ aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. Yaṃ manosahajanāmarūpaṃ,
atk-s0519a:719_2: idaṃ dukkhaṃ. Asamucchinnā purimanipphannā avijjā bhavataṇhā, ayaṃ samudayo. Yattha
atk-s0519a:719_3: tesaṃ pahānaṃ, ayaṃ nirodhoti imāni cattāri saccāni. Ayaṃ āvaṭṭo hārasampāto.
atk-s0519a:720_0: Tattha katamo vibhattihārasampāto? “Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, manasā ce pasannena, tato
atk-s0519a:720_1: naṃ sukhamanvetī”ti nayidaṃ yathārutavasena gahetabbaṃ. Yo hi samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo
atk-s0519a:720_2: vā pāṇātipātimhi micchādiṭṭhike micchāpaṭipanne sakaṃ cittaṃ pasādeti, pasannena
atk-s0519a:720_3: ca cittena abhūtaguṇābhitthavanavasena bhāsati vā nipaccakāraṃ vāssa yaṃ karoti,
atk-s0519a:720_4: na tato naṃ sukhamanveti. Dukkhameva pana taṃ tato cakkaṃva vahato padamanveti. Iti
atk-s0519a:720_5: hi idaṃ vibhajjabyākaraṇīyaṃ. Yaṃ manasā ce pasannena bhāsati vā karoti vā, tañce
atk-s0519a:720_6: vacīkammaṃ kāyakammañca sukhavedanīyanti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Sammattagatehi sukhavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0519a:720_7: micchāgatehi dukkhavedanīyanti. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ pasādo daṭṭhabbo? Nāyaṃ pasādo, pasādapatirūpako
atk-s0519a:721_0: Tattha katamo parivattano hārasampāto? Manopubbaṅgamātiādi. Yaṃ manasā paduṭṭhena
atk-s0519a:721_1: bhāsati vā karoti vā dukkhassānugāmī. Idañhi suttaṃ etassa ujupaṭipakkho. Ayaṃ parivattano hārasampāto.
atk-s0519a:722_0: Tattha katamo vevacano hārasampāto? “Manopubbaṅgamā”ti mano cittaṃ manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ
atk-s0519a:722_1: manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇadhātūti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Pubbaṅgamā purecārino puregāminoti
atk-s0519a:722_2: pariyāyavacanaṃ. Dhammā attā sabhāvāti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Seṭṭhaṃ padhānaṃ pavaranti
atk-s0519a:722_3: pariyāyavacanaṃ. Manomayā manonibbattā manosambhūtāti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Pasannena
atk-s0519a:722_4: saddahantena okappentenāti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Sukhaṃ sātaṃ vedayitanti pariyāyavacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:722_5: Anveti anugacchati anubandhatīti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Ayaṃ vevacano hārasampāto.
atk-s0519a:723_0: Tattha katamo paññattihārasampāto? Manopubbaṅgamāti ayaṃ manaso kiccapaññatti. Dhammāti
atk-s0519a:723_2: sahajātapaññatti. Pasannenāti saddhindriyena samannāgatapaññatti, assaddhiyassa paṭikkhepapaññatti.
atk-s0519a:723_3: Bhāsati vā karoti vāti sammāvācāsammākammantānaṃ nikkhepapaññatti. Tato naṃ sukhamanvetīti
atk-s0519a:723_4: kammassa phalānubandhapaññatti, kammassa avināsapaññattīti. Ayaṃ paññattihārasampāto.
atk-s0519a:724_0: Tattha katamo otaraṇo hārasampāto? Manoti viññāṇakkhandho. Dhammāti vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhā.
atk-s0519a:724_1: Bhāsati vā karoti vāti kāyavacīviññattiyo. Tāsaṃ nissayā cattāro mahābhūtāti rūpakkhandhoti
atk-s0519a:724_2: ayaṃ khandhehi otaraṇo. Manoti abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇanti manoggahaṇena avijjāpaccayā
atk-s0519a:724_3: saṅkhārā gahitāti. Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ…pe… samudayo hotīti ayaṃ paṭiccasamuppādena
atk-s0519a:725_0: Tattha katamo sodhano hārasampāto? Manoti ārambho neva padasuddhi, na ārambhasuddhi.
atk-s0519a:725_1: Manopubbaṅgamāti padasuddhi, na ārambhasuddhi. Tathā dhammāti yāva sukhanti padasuddhi,
atk-s0519a:725_2: na ārambhasuddhi. Sukhamanvetīti pana padasuddhi ceva ārambhasuddhi cāti. Ayaṃ sodhano hārasampāto.
atk-s0519a:726_0: Tattha katamo adhiṭṭhāno hārasampāto? Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayāti
atk-s0519a:726_1: ekattatā. Manasā ce pasannenāti vemattatā, tathā manasā ce pasannenāti ekattatā.
atk-s0519a:726_2: Bhāsati vā karoti vāti vemattatā, tathā manasā ce pasannenāti ekattatā. So pasādo
atk-s0519a:726_3: duvidho ajjhattañca byāpādavikkhambhanato, bahiddhā ca okappanato. Tathā sampattibhavahetubhūtopi
atk-s0519a:726_4: vaḍḍhihetubhūtovāti ayaṃ vemattatā. Tayidaṃ suttaṃ dvīhi ākārehi adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ hetunā
atk-s0519a:726_5: ca yo pasannamānaso, vipākena ca yo sukhavedanīyoti. Ayaṃ adhiṭṭhāno hārasampāto.
atk-s0519a:727_0: Tattha katamo parikkhāro hārasampāto? Manopubbaṅgamāti ettha manoti kusalaviññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:727_1: Tassa ca ñāṇasampayuttassa alobho adoso amohoti tayo sampayuttā hetū, ñāṇavippayuttassa
atk-s0519a:727_2: alobho adosoti dve sampayuttā hetū. Sabbesaṃ avisesena yonisomanasikāro hetu, cattāri
atk-s0519a:727_3: sampatticakkāni paccayo. Tathā saddhammassavanaṃ, tassa ca dānādivasena pavattamānassa
atk-s0519a:727_4: deyyadhammādayo paccayo. Dhammāti cettha vedanādīnaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇādayo. Tathā tayo
atk-s0519a:728_0: Tattha katamo samāropano hārasampāto? Manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti manoti puññacittaṃ,
atk-s0519a:728_1: taṃ tividhaṃ – dānamayaṃ, sīlamayaṃ, bhāvanāmayanti. Tattha dānamayassa alobho padaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a:728_2: sīlamayassa adoso padaṭṭhānaṃ, bhāvanāmayassa amoho padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sabbesaṃ abhippasādo
atk-s0519a:728_3: padaṭṭhānaṃ, “saddhājāto upasaṅkamati, upasaṅkamanto payirupāsatī”ti suttaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:728_4: Kusalacittaṃ sukhassa iṭṭhavipākassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yonisomanasikāro kusalacittassa
atk-s0519a:728_5: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yoniso hi manasi karonto kusalacittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti kusalacittaṃ bhāveti,
atk-s0519a:728_6: so anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti, uppannānaṃ
atk-s0519a:728_7: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ…pe… padahati. Tassevaṃ catūsu sammappadhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro
atk-s0519a:728_8: satipaṭṭhānā yāva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchatīti ayaṃ bhāvanāya
atk-s0519a:728_9: samāropanā. Sati ca bhāvanāya pahānañca siddhamevāti. Ayaṃ samāropano hārasampāto.
atk-s0519a:730: “Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyati;
atk-s0519a:731: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṃ, rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbuto”ti. ;
atk-s0519a:732_0: Tattha dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu vuttaṃ. Saṃyamato veraṃ
atk-s0519a:732_1: na cīyatīti sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu vuttaṃ. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti lobhassa
atk-s0519a:732_2: ca dosassa ca mohassa ca pahānamāha. Tena bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:733_0: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti alobho kusalamūlaṃ. Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti adoso
atk-s0519a:733_1: kusalamūlaṃ. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti amoho kusalamūlaṃ. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa
atk-s0519a:734_0: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti sīlakkhandhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti
atk-s0519a:734_1: samādhikkhandhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti paññākkhandhassa vimuttikkhandhassa
atk-s0519a:734_2: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Dānena oḷārikānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ, sīlena majjhimānaṃ, paññāya sukhumānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:735: Dadato puññaṃ…pe… jahāti pāpakanti sekkhabhūmi dassitā. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti aggaphalaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:736_0: Tathā dadato puññaṃ…pe… na cīyatīti lokiyakusalamūlaṃ vuttaṃ. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti
atk-s0519a:736_1: lokuttarakusalamūlaṃ vuttaṃ. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti lokuttarassa kusalamūlassa phalaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:737: Dadato…pe… na cīyatīti puthujjanabhūmi dassitā. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti sekkhabhūmi dassitā. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti asekkhabhūmi dassitā.
atk-s0519a:738: Dadato …pe… na cīyatīti saggagāminī paṭipadā vuttā. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti sekkhavimutti. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti asekkhavimutti vuttā.
atk-s0519a:739_0: Dadato…pe… na cīyatīti dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ lokiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ desanamāha.
atk-s0519a:739_1: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti loke ādīnavānupassanāya saddhiṃ sāmukkaṃsikaṃ dhammadesanamāha.
atk-s0519a:739_2: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti tassā desanāya phalamāha.
atk-s0519a:740_0: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti dhammadānaṃ āmisadānañca vadati. Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti
atk-s0519a:740_1: pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā sattānaṃ abhayadānaṃ vadati. Evaṃ sabbānipi sikkhāpadāni vitthāretabbāni.
atk-s0519a:740_2: Tena ca sīlasaṃyamena sīle patiṭṭhito cittaṃ saṃyameti, tassa samatho pāripūriṃ gacchati.
atk-s0519a:740_3: Evaṃ so samathe ṭhito vipassanākosallayogato kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṃ rāgaṃ jahāti,
atk-s0519a:740_4: dosaṃ jahāti, mohaṃ jahāti, ariyamaggena sabbepi pāpake akusale dhamme jahāti. Evaṃ
atk-s0519a:740_5: paṭipanno ca rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti rāgādīnaṃ parikkhayā dvepi vimuttiyo
atk-s0519a:741_0: Tattha katamo desanāhārasampāto? Imasmiṃ sutte kiṃ desitaṃ? Dve sugatiyo devā ca
atk-s0519a:741_1: manussā ca, dibbā ca pañca kāmaguṇā, mānusakā ca pañca kāmaguṇā, dibbā ca pañcupādānakkhandhā,
atk-s0519a:741_2: mānusakā ca pañcupādānakkhandhā. Idaṃ vuccati dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ. Tassa kāraṇabhāvena
atk-s0519a:741_3: purimapurimanipphannā taṇhā samudayo ariyasaccaṃ. Tayidaṃ vuccati assādo ca ādīnavo
atk-s0519a:741_4: ca. Sabbassa purimehi dvīhi padehi niddeso “dadato…pe… na cīyatī”ti. Kusalo ca jahāti
atk-s0519a:741_5: pāpakanti maggo vutto. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti dve nibbānadhātuyo saupādisesā
atk-s0519a:741_6: ca anupādisesā ca. Idaṃ nissaraṇaṃ. Phalādīni pana yathārahaṃ veditabbānīti. Ayaṃ desanāhārasampāto.
atk-s0519a:742_0: Vicayoti “dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”ti iminā paṭhamena padena tividhampi dānamayaṃ
atk-s0519a:742_1: sīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu vuttaṃ. Dasavidhassapi deyyadhammassa pariccāgo
atk-s0519a:742_2: vutto. Tathā chabbidhassapi rūpādiārammaṇassa. “Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatī”ti dutiyena
atk-s0519a:742_3: padena averā asapattā abyāpādā ca paṭipadā vuttā. “Kusalo ca jahāti pāpaka”nti tatiyena
atk-s0519a:742_4: padena ñāṇuppādo aññāṇanirodho sabbopi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo sabbepi bodhipakkhiyā
atk-s0519a:742_5: dhammā vuttā. “Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbuto”ti rāgakkhayena rāgavirāgā cetovimutti,
atk-s0519a:742_6: mohakkhayena avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti vuttāti. Ayaṃ vicayo hārasampāto.
atk-s0519a:743_0: Yuttīti dāne ṭhito ubhayaṃ paripūreti macchariyappahānañca puññābhisandañcāti atthesā
atk-s0519a:743_1: yutti. Sīlasaṃyame ṭhito ubhayaṃ paripūreti upacārasamādhiṃ appanāsamādhiñcāti atthesā
atk-s0519a:743_2: yutti. Pāpake dhamme pajahanto dukkhaṃ parijānāti, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ
atk-s0519a:743_3: bhāvetīti atthesā yutti. Rāgadosamohesu sabbaso parikkhīṇesu anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0519a:744_0: Padaṭṭhānanti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti cāgādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Saṃyamato
atk-s0519a:744_1: veraṃ na cīyatīti saccādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti paññādhiṭṭhānassa
atk-s0519a:744_2: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti upasamādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānanti. Ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:745_0: Lakkhaṇoti “dadato”ti etena peyyavajjaṃ atthacariyaṃ samānattatā ca dassitāti veditabbā
atk-s0519a:745_2: dassitāti veditabbā verānuppādanalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā. “Veraṃ na cīyatī”ti etena
atk-s0519a:745_5: sammāsaṅkappādayo dassitā maggaṅgādibhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā. “Jahāti pāpaka”nti etena
atk-s0519a:745_7: etena avasiṭṭhakilesādīnampi khayā dassitā khepetabbabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattāti ayaṃ lakkhaṇo.
atk-s0519a:746_0: Catubyūhoti dadatoti gāthāyaṃ bhagavato ko adhippāyo? Ye mahābhogataṃ patthayissanti,
atk-s0519a:746_1: te dānaṃ dassanti dāliddiyappahānāya. Ye averataṃ icchanti, te pañca verāni pajahissanti.
atk-s0519a:746_2: Ye kusaladhammehi chandakāmā, te aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvessanti. Ye nibbāyitukāmā,
atk-s0519a:746_3: te rāgadosamohaṃ pajahissantīti ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo. Evaṃ nibbacananidānasandhayo
atk-s0519a:747_0: Āvaṭṭoti yañca adadato macchariyaṃ, yañca asaṃyamato veraṃ, yañca akusalassa pāpassa
atk-s0519a:747_1: appahānaṃ, ayaṃ paṭipakkhaniddesena samudayo. Tassa alobhena ca adosena ca amohena
atk-s0519a:747_2: ca dānādīhi pahānaṃ, imāni tīṇi kusalamūlāni. Tesaṃ paccayo aṭṭha sammattāni, ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:747_3: maggo. Yo rāgadosamohānaṃ khayo, ayaṃ nirodhoti. Ayaṃ āvaṭṭo.
atk-s0519a:748_0: Vibhattīti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti ekaṃsena yo bhayahetu deti, rāgahetu deti,
atk-s0519a:748_1: āmisakiñcikkhahetu deti, na tassa puññaṃ vaḍḍhati. Yañca daṇḍadānaṃ satthadānaṃ paraviheṭhanatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:748_2: apuññaṃ assa pavaḍḍhati. Yaṃ pana kusalena cittena anukampanto vā apacāyamāno vā
atk-s0519a:748_3: annaṃ deti, pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathaṃ padīpeyyaṃ deti,
atk-s0519a:748_4: sabbasattānaṃ vā abhayadānaṃ deti, mettacitto hitajjhāsayo nissaraṇasaññī dhammaṃ
atk-s0519a:748_5: deseti. Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti ekaṃsena abhayūparatassa cīyati, kiṃkāraṇaṃ?
atk-s0519a:748_6: Yaṃ asamattho, bhayūparato diṭṭhadhammikassa bhāyati “mā maṃ rājāno gahetvā hatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:748_7: vā chindeyyuṃ…pe… jīvantampi sūle uttāseyyu”nti, tena saṃyamena averaṃ cīyati. Yo
atk-s0519a:748_8: pana evaṃ samāno veraṃ na cīyati. Yo pana evaṃ samādiyati, pāṇātipātassa pāpako vipāko
atk-s0519a:748_9: diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāye ca, evaṃ sabbassa akusalassa, so tato āramati, iminā
atk-s0519a:748_10: saṃyamena veraṃ na cīyati. Saṃyamo nāma sīlaṃ. Taṃ catubbidhaṃ cetanā sīlaṃ, cetasikaṃ
atk-s0519a:748_11: sīlaṃ, saṃvaro sīlaṃ, avītikkamo sīlanti. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti pāpapahāyakā
atk-s0519a:748_12: sattattiṃsa bodhipakkhiyā dhammā vattabbāti. Ayaṃ vibhatti.
atk-s0519a:749_0: Parivattanoti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, adadatopi puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, na dānamayikaṃ.
atk-s0519a:749_1: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyati asaṃyamatopi veraṃ na cīyati, yaṃ dānena paṭisaṅkhānabalena
atk-s0519a:749_2: bhāvanābalena. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṃ, akusalo pana na jahāti. Rāgadosamohakkhayā
atk-s0519a:749_3: sa nibbuto, tesaṃ aparikkhayā natthi nibbutīti. Ayaṃ parivattano.
atk-s0519a:750_0: Vevacanoti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati. Pariccāgato kusalaṃ upacīyati. Anumodatopi puññaṃ
atk-s0519a:750_1: pavaḍḍhati cittappasādatopi veyyāvaccakiriyāyapi. Saṃyamatoti sīlasaṃvarato soraccato.
atk-s0519a:750_2: Veraṃ na cīyatīti pāpaṃ na vaḍḍhati, akusalaṃ na vaḍḍhati. Kusaloti paṇḍito nipuṇo
atk-s0519a:750_3: medhāvī parikkhako. Jahātīti samucchindati samugghāṭeti. Ayaṃ vevacano.
atk-s0519a:751_0: Paññattīti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti lobhassa paṭinissaggapaññatti, alobhassa nikkhepapaññatti.
atk-s0519a:751_1: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti dosassa vikkhambhanapaññatti, adosassa nikkhepapaññatti.
atk-s0519a:751_2: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti mohassa samugghātapaññatti, amohassa bhāvanāpaññatti.
atk-s0519a:751_4: sa nibbutoti kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhipaññatti, nibbānassa sacchikiriyapaññattīti. Ayaṃ paññatti.
atk-s0519a:752_0: Otaraṇoti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti dānaṃ nāma saddhādīhi indriyehi hotīti ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:752_1: indriyehi otaraṇo. Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti saṃyamo nāma sīlakkhandhoti ayaṃ khandhehi
atk-s0519a:752_2: otaraṇo. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti pāpappahānaṃ nāma tīhi vimokkhehi hoti. Tesaṃ
atk-s0519a:752_3: upāyabhūtāni tīṇi vimokkhamukhānīti ayaṃ vimokkhamukhehi otaraṇo. Rāgadosamohakkhayā
atk-s0519a:752_4: sa nibbutoti vimuttikkhandho. So ca dhammadhātu dhammāyatanañcāti ayaṃ dhātūhi ca
atk-s0519a:753: Sodhanoti dadatotiādikā padasuddhi, no ārambhasuddhi. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti ayaṃ padasuddhi ca ārambhasuddhi cāti. Ayaṃ sodhano.
atk-s0519a:754_0: Adhiṭṭhānoti dadatoti ayaṃ ekattatā, cāgo pariccāgo dhammadānaṃ āmisadānaṃ abhayadānaṃ,
atk-s0519a:754_1: aṭṭha dānāni vitthāretabbāni. Ayaṃ vemattatā. Saṃyamoti ayaṃ ekattatā. Pātimokkhasaṃvaro
atk-s0519a:754_2: satisaṃvaroti ayaṃ vemattatā. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti ayaṃ ekattatā. Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0519a:754_3: pajahati vicikicchaṃ pajahatītiādikā ayaṃ vemattatā. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti
atk-s0519a:754_4: ayaṃ ekattatā. Saupādisesā nibbānadhātu anupādisesā nibbānadhātūti ayaṃ vemattatāti. Ayaṃ adhiṭṭhāno.
atk-s0519a:755_0: Parikkhāroti dānassa pāmojjaṃ paccayo. Alobho hetu, saṃyamassa hirottappādayo paccayo.
atk-s0519a:755_1: Yonisomanasikāro adoso ca hetu, pāpappahānassa samādhi yathābhūtañāṇadassanañca paccayo.
atk-s0519a:755_2: Tisso anupassanā hetu, nibbutiyā maggasammādiṭṭhi hetu, sammāsaṅkappādayo paccayoti. Ayaṃ parikkhāro.
atk-s0519a:756_0: Samāropano hārasampātoti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu,
atk-s0519a:756_1: taṃ sīlassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu,
atk-s0519a:756_2: taṃ samādhissa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sīlena hi jhānenapi rāgādikilesā na cīyanti. Yepissa
atk-s0519a:756_3: tappaccayā uppajjeyyuṃ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, tepissa na honti. Kusalo ca jahāti
atk-s0519a:756_4: pāpakanti pahānapariññā, taṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa
atk-s0519a:756_5: nibbutoti rāgassapi khayā dosassapi khayā mohassapi khayā. Tattha rāgoti yo rāgo
atk-s0519a:756_6: sārāgo cetaso sārajjanā lobho lubbhanā lubbhitattaṃ abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
atk-s0519a:756_7: Dosoti yo doso dussanā dussitattaṃ byāpādo cetaso byāpajjanā doso akusalamūlaṃ. Mohoti
atk-s0519a:756_8: yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ anabhisamayo asambodho appaṭivedho dummejjhaṃ bālyaṃ asampajaññaṃ
atk-s0519a:756_9: moho akusalamūlaṃ. Iti imesaṃ rāgādīnaṃ khayo nirodho paṭinissaggo nibbuti nibbāyanā
atk-s0519a:756_10: parinibbānaṃ saupādisesā nibbānadhātu anupādisesā nibbānadhātūti. Ayaṃ samāropano hārasampāto.
atk-s0519a:759_0: 79. Evaṃ nānāsuttavasena ekasuttavasena ca hāravicāraṃ dassetvā idāni nayavicāraṃ
atk-s0519a:759_1: dassetuṃ “tattha katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Kasmā panettha yathā “tattha
atk-s0519a:759_2: katamo desanāhāro, assādādīnavatāti gāthā. Ayaṃ desanāhāro kiṃ desayatī”tiādinā hāraniddeso
atk-s0519a:759_3: āraddho, evaṃ “tattha katamo nandiyāvaṭṭo, taṇhañca avijjampi cāti gāthā, ayaṃ nandiyāvaṭṭo
atk-s0519a:759_4: kiṃ nayatī”tiādinā anārabhitvā samuṭṭhānamukhena āraddhanti? Vuccate – hāranayānaṃ
atk-s0519a:759_5: visayabhedato. Yathā hi hārā byañjanamukhena suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanā, na evaṃ nayā.
atk-s0519a:759_6: Nayā pana nānāsuttato niddhāritehi taṇhāvijjādīhi mūlapadehi catusaccayojanāya nayato
atk-s0519a:759_7: anubujjhiyamāno dukkhādiattho. So hi maggañāṇaṃ nayati sampāpetīti nayo. Paṭivijjhantānaṃ
atk-s0519a:759_8: pana ugghaṭitaññuādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ veneyyānaṃ vasena mūlapadavibhāgato tidhā vibhattā.
atk-s0519a:759_9: Ekameko cettha yato neti, yañca neti, tesaṃ saṃkilesavodānānaṃ vibhāgato dvisaṅgaho
atk-s0519a:759_10: catuchaaṭṭhadiso cāti bhinno hāranayānaṃ visayo. Tathā hi vuttaṃ – “hārā byañjanavicayo,
atk-s0519a:759_11: suttassa nayā tayo ca suttattho”ti. Evaṃ visiṭṭhavisayattā hāranayānaṃ hārehi aññathā
atk-s0519a:760_0: Tatthāyaṃ vacanattho – samuṭṭhahanti etenāti samuṭṭhānaṃ. Ke samuṭṭhahanti? Nayā.
atk-s0519a:760_1: Nayānaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Kiṃ pana taṃ? Taṃtaṃmūlapadehi catusaccayojanā.
atk-s0519a:760_2: Sā hi nandiyāvaṭṭādīnaṃ nayānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānatāya samuṭṭhānaṃ bhūmīti ca vuccati.
atk-s0519a:760_3: Tathā ca vakkhati – “ayaṃ vuccati nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmī”ti. Pubbā koṭi na
atk-s0519a:760_4: paññāyati avijjāya ca bhavataṇhāya cātiādi nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmidassanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:760_5: Tattha pubbā koṭi na paññāyatīti asukassa nāma buddhassa bhagavato, asukassa vā cakkavattino
atk-s0519a:760_6: kāle avijjā bhavataṇhā ca uppannā. Tato pubbe nāhosīti evaṃ avijjābhavataṇhānaṃ na
atk-s0519a:760_7: kāci purimā mariyādā upalabbhati. Kasmā? Anamataggattā saṃsārassa. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0519a:760_8: “anamataggoyaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyatī”ti vitthāro. Tatthāti
atk-s0519a:760_9: avijjābhavataṇhāsu. Yadipi avijjāya saṃyojanabhāvo, taṇhāya ca nīvaraṇabhāvo pāḷiyaṃ
atk-s0519a:760_10: vutto, tathāpi avijjāya paṭicchāditādīnavehi bhavehi taṇhā saṃyojetīti imassa atthassa
atk-s0519a:761_0: Avijjāsaṃyuttāti avijjāya missitā, avijjāya vā abhinivesavatthūsu baddhā. Avijjāpakkhena
atk-s0519a:761_1: vicarantīti avijjāpakkhena avijjāsahāyena dvādasavidhena vipallāsena abhinivesavatthubhūte
atk-s0519a:761_2: ārammaṇe pavattanti. Te vuccanti diṭṭhicaritāti te avijjābhibhūtā rūpādīni niccādito
atk-s0519a:761_3: abhinivisantā diṭṭhicaritāti vuccanti, diṭṭhicaritā nāmāti attho. Taṇhāpakkhenāti
atk-s0519a:761_4: aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritena. Diṭṭhivicarite taṇhāvicarite ca paṭipattiyā vibhajitvā
atk-s0519a:761_5: dassetuṃ “diṭṭhicaritā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha attakilamathānuyoganti attano kāyassa
atk-s0519a:761_6: kilissanapayogaṃ attaparitāpanapaṭipattiṃ. Kāmasukhallikānuyoganti kāmasukhassa allīyanapayogaṃ kāmesu pātabyataṃ.
atk-s0519a:762_0: Yadipi bāhirakā “dukkhaṃ taṇhā”ti ca jānanti “idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ dukkha”nti, “ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:762_1: taṇhā, ayaṃ tassā virāgo”ti pariññeyyapahātabbabhāvena pana na jānanti, iti pavattipavattihetumattampi
atk-s0519a:762_2: na jānanti. Kā pana kathā nivattinivattihetūsūti āha – “ito bahiddhā natthi saccavavatthāna”ntiādi.
atk-s0519a:762_5: samathaṃ adhippetaṃ. Upasamasukhappattīti kilesānaṃ vūpasamasukhādhigamo. Viparītacetāti
atk-s0519a:762_6: micchābhiniviṭṭhacetā. Natthi sukhena sukhanti yaṃ anavajjapaccayaparibhogasukhena
atk-s0519a:762_7: kāyaṃ cittañca paṭippassaddhadarathaṃ katvā ariyehi pattabbaṃ upasamasukhaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0519a:763_0: So lokaṃ vaḍḍhayatīti so kāme paṭisevento attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ lokaṃ vaḍḍheti pīneti.
atk-s0519a:763_1: Puttanattuparamparāya vā saṃsārassa anupacchedanato sattalokaṃ vaḍḍheti. Bahuṃ puññaṃ
atk-s0519a:763_2: pasavatīti attano pañcahi kāmaguṇehi santappanena puttamukhadassanena ca bahuṃ puññaṃ
atk-s0519a:763_3: uppādeti. Abhinivesassa nātidaḷhatāya evaṃsaññī. Daḷhatāya evaṃdiṭṭhī dukkhena sukhaṃ
atk-s0519a:764_0: Tadabhiññā santāti tathāsaññino samānā. Rogameva vaḍḍhayantīti attabhāvarogameva
atk-s0519a:764_1: kilesarogameva vā aparāparaṃ vaḍḍhenti. Gaṇḍasallesupi eseva nayo. Rogābhitunnāti
atk-s0519a:764_6: roganigghātakanti rogavūpasamanaṃ. “Saṃkileso dukkha”ntiādinā saccāni tesaṃ pariññeyyādibhāvena katheti.
atk-s0519a:765_1: tehi vā saṃkilissamāno rūpārūpakāyo dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ. Tadabhisaṅgo taṇhāti tattha
atk-s0519a:766_1: “diṭṭhicaritā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha diṭṭhicaritā rūpaṃ attato upagacchantīti diṭṭhicaritā
atk-s0519a:766_2: diṭṭhābhinivesassa balavabhāvato rūpaṃ “attā”ti gaṇhanti. Tesañhi attābhiniveso balavā,
atk-s0519a:766_3: na tathā attaniyābhiniveso. Esa nayo vedanantiādīsupi. Taṇhācaritā rūpavantaṃ attānanti
atk-s0519a:766_4: taṇhācaritā taṇhābhinivesassa balavabhāvato rūpaṃ attano kiñcanapalibodhabhāve ṭhapetvā
atk-s0519a:766_5: avasesaṃ vedanādiṃ “attā”ti gaṇhanti. Attani vā rūpanti attādhāraṃ vā rūpaṃ. Rūpasmiṃ
atk-s0519a:766_6: vā attānanti rūpādhāraṃ vā attānaṃ. Vedanāvantantiādīsupi eseva nayo. Etesañhi attaniyābhiniveso
atk-s0519a:766_7: balavā, na tathā attābhiniveso. Tasmā yathāladdhaṃ attaniyanti kappetvā tadaññaṃ
atk-s0519a:766_8: “attā”ti gaṇhanti. Ayaṃ vuccati vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhīti ayaṃ pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu
atk-s0519a:766_9: ekekasmiṃ catunnaṃ catunnaṃ gāhānaṃ vasena vīsativatthukā sati vijjamāne khandhapañcakasaṅkhāte
atk-s0519a:766_10: kāye, satī vā vijjamānā tattha diṭṭhīti sakkāyadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0519a:767_0: Lokuttarā sammādiṭṭhīti paṭhamamaggasammādiṭṭhi. Anvāyikāti sammādiṭṭhiyā anugāmino.
atk-s0519a:767_1: Yadā sammādiṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pajahanavasena pavattā, tadā tassā anuguṇabhāvena
atk-s0519a:767_2: pavattamānakāti attho. Ke pana teti? Āha “sammāsaṅkappo”tiādi. “Te tayo khandhā”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:767_3: ariyamaggato khandhamukhena samathavipassanā niddhāreti. “Tattha sakkāyo”tiādi catusaccaniddhāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:768_0: Puna “tattha ye rūpaṃ attato upagacchantī”tiādinā sakkāyadassanamukhena ucchedādiantadvayaṃ,
atk-s0519a:768_1: majjhimañca paṭipadaṃ niddhāreti. Tattha ime vuccanti ucchedavādinoti ime rūpādike
atk-s0519a:768_2: pañcakkhandhe attato upagacchantā rūpādīnaṃ aniccabhāvato ucchijjati attā vinassati
atk-s0519a:768_3: na hoti paraṃ maraṇāti evaṃ abhinivisanato “ucchedavādino”ti vuccanti. Ime vuccanti
atk-s0519a:768_4: sassatavādinoti ime “rūpavantaṃ vā attāna”ntiādinā rūpādivinimutto añño koci attāti
atk-s0519a:768_5: upagacchantā “so nicco dhuvo sassato”ti abhinivisanato “sassatavādino”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0519a:768_6: “Ucchedasassatavādā ubho antā, ayaṃ saṃsārapavattī”tiādi saccaniddhāraṇaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyaṃ.
atk-s0519a:769_0: Ucchedasassataṃ samāsato vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhīti attā ucchijjati attā niccoti
atk-s0519a:769_1: ca ādippavattanato ucchedasassatadassanaṃ saṅkhepato vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi
atk-s0519a:769_2: eva hoti. Sabbopi hi attavādo sakkāyadiṭṭhiantogadho evāti. Vitthārato dvāsaṭṭhi
atk-s0519a:769_3: diṭṭhigatānīti ucchedasassatadassanaṃ vitthārena brahmajāle āgatāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni.
atk-s0519a:769_4: Tesanti evaṃ saṅkhepavitthāravantānaṃ ucchedasassatadassanānaṃ. Paṭipakkhoti pahāyakapaṭipakkho.
atk-s0519a:769_5: Tecattālīsaṃ bodhipakkhiyā dhammāti aniccasaññā dukkhasaññā anattasaññā pahānasaññā
atk-s0519a:769_6: virāgasaññā nirodhasaññā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā…pe… ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti ete tecattālīsaṃ
atk-s0519a:770_0: Evaṃ vipassanāvasena paṭipakkhaṃ dassetvā puna samathavasena dassetuṃ “aṭṭha vimokkhā
atk-s0519a:770_1: dasa ca kasiṇāyatanānī”ti vuttaṃ. Dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni mohajālanti dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni
atk-s0519a:770_2: mohajālahetukattā mohajālañca. Anādianidhanappavattanti purimāya koṭiyā abhāvato
atk-s0519a:770_3: anādi. Asati paṭipakkhādhigame santānavasena anupacchedena pavattanato anidhanappavattaṃ.
atk-s0519a:770_4: Yasmā pana mohajālahetukāni diṭṭhigatāni mohajāle padālite padālitāni honti, tasmā
atk-s0519a:771_0: Tattha ñāṇavajiranti vajirūpamañāṇaṃ. Aṭṭha samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā tejetvā tikkhasabhāvaṃ
atk-s0519a:771_1: āpāditaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggañāṇañca ñāṇavajiraṃ. Idameva hi ñāṇaṃ bhagavato pavattaṃ
atk-s0519a:771_2: “mahāvajirañāṇa”nti vuccati. Taṃ pana sasambhāraṃ katvā dassento “tecattālīsaṃ bodhipakkhiyā
atk-s0519a:771_3: dhammā”ti āha. Mohajālappadālananti pubbabhāge vikkhambhanavasena maggakkhaṇe samucchedavasena
atk-s0519a:771_4: avijjābhavataṇhānaṃ padālanaṃ. Atītādibhedabhinnesu rūpādīsu sakaattabhāvādīsu ca
atk-s0519a:771_5: saṃsibbanavasena pavattanato jālaṃ bhavataṇhā. Tassā hi taṇhā jālinī sibbinī jālanti
atk-s0519a:771_8: saṃkilesapakkhaṃ nigamento “tena vuccati pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya ca bhavataṇhāya cā”ti āha.
atk-s0519a:772_1: anupaddutasallekhavutti. Kasmā? Yasmā sallekhe tibbagāravo. Diṭṭhicarito hi tapojigucchādinā
atk-s0519a:772_2: anupāyenapi yebhuyyena kilesānaṃ sallekhanādhippāyena carati, tasmā so sāsane pabbajito
atk-s0519a:772_4: Diṭṭhiyā savisaye paññāsadisī pavattīti so visujjhamāno paññādhiko hotīti āha – “diṭṭhicarito
atk-s0519a:772_5: sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamanto dhammānusārī bhavatī”ti. Taṇhāvasena micchāvimokkho hotīti
atk-s0519a:772_6: taṇhācarito visujjhamāno saddhādhikova hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ – “taṇhācarito sammattaniyāmaṃ
atk-s0519a:772_7: okkamanto saddhānusārī bhavatī”ti. Diṭṭhicarito sukhāya paṭipadāyātiādi paṭipadāniddeso
atk-s0519a:772_8: heṭṭhā desanāhāravibhaṅge āgato eva, atthopi tattha sabbappakārato vutto eva.
atk-s0519a:773_0: Apubbapadesu pana viveciyamānoti vimociyamāno. Paṭinissaratīti niyyāti vimuccatīti
atk-s0519a:773_1: attho. Dandhañca dhammaṃ ājānātīti taṇhācaritassa mandapaññassa vasena vuttaṃ. Tikkhapañño
atk-s0519a:773_2: pana khippaṃ dhammaṃ ājānātīti. “Sattāpi duvidhā”tiādinā indriyavibhāgena puna paṭipadāvibhāgaṃ
atk-s0519a:774_0: “Ye hi kecī”tiādinā tāsaṃ paṭipadānaṃ niyyāne tīsupi kālesu ekantikabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a:774_1: Tattha imāhi eva catūhi paṭipadāhīti imāhi eva catūhi paṭipadāhi, tabbinimuttāya
atk-s0519a:774_2: aññāya paṭipadāya abhāvato. Catukkamagganti paṭipadācatukkaṃ, paṭipadā hi maggoti.
atk-s0519a:774_3: Atha vā catukkamagganti nandiyāvaṭṭassa catuddisāsaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ. Tā pana catasso
atk-s0519a:774_4: disā disālocananaye āgamissanti. Kimatthaṃ pana catukkamaggaṃ paññapentīti āha “abudhajanasevitāyā”tiādi.
atk-s0519a:774_6: Rattavāsiniyāti rattesu rāgābhibhūtesu vasatīti rattavāsinī, tassā. Nandiyāti tatra
atk-s0519a:774_7: tatrābhinandanaṭṭhena nandīsaṅkhātāya. Avaṭṭanatthanti samucchindanatthaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0519a:774_8: nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmīti ayaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ vasena saṃkilesapakkhe dve disā
atk-s0519a:774_9: samathavipassanānaṃ vasena vodānapakkhepi dve disā catusaccayojanā nandiyāvaṭṭassa
atk-s0519a:775_0: 82. Evaṃ nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmiṃ niddisitvā idāni tassa disābhūtadhamme niddisantena
atk-s0519a:775_1: yasmā cassa disābhūtadhammesu vuttesu disālocananayo vuttoyeva hoti, tasmā “veyyākaraṇesu
atk-s0519a:775_2: hi ye kusalākusalā”ti disālocanalakkhaṇaṃ ekadesena paccāmasitvā “te duvidhā upaparikkhitabbā”tiādi
atk-s0519a:775_3: āraddhaṃ. Tattha teti disābhūtadhammā. Duvidhāti “ime saṃkilesadhammā, ime vodānadhammā”ti
atk-s0519a:775_4: evaṃ duvidhena. Upaparikkhitabbāti upapattito parito ikkhitabbā, dhammayuttito taṃtaṃdisābhāvena
atk-s0519a:776_0: Yaṃ pakāraṃ sandhāya “duvidhā upaparikkhitabbā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ dasseti “lokavaṭṭānusārī
atk-s0519a:776_1: ca lokavivaṭṭānusārī cā”ti. Tassattho – loko eva vaṭṭaṃ lokavaṭṭaṃ. Lokavaṭṭabhāvena
atk-s0519a:776_2: anusarati pavattatīti lokavaṭṭānusārī, saṃkilesadhammoti attho. Lokassa, lokato vā
atk-s0519a:776_3: vivaṭṭaṃ lokavivaṭṭaṃ, nibbānaṃ. Taṃ anusarati anulomanavasena gacchatīti lokavivaṭṭānusārī,
atk-s0519a:776_4: vodānadhammoti attho. Tenevāha – “vaṭṭaṃ nāma saṃsāro, vivaṭṭaṃ nibbāna”nti.
atk-s0519a:777_0: Taṃ kathaṃ daṭṭhabbanti taṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena daṭṭhabbanti ce? Upacayena. Yathā
atk-s0519a:777_1: kataṃ kammaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti, tathā kataṃ upacitanti vuccati. Evaṃ upacitabhāve
atk-s0519a:777_2: kammaṃ nāma hoti, vipākavaṭṭassa kāraṇaṃ hotīti attho. Sabbepi kilesā catūhi vipallāsehi
atk-s0519a:777_3: niddisitabbā, dasannampi kilesānaṃ vipallāsahetubhāvato. Te kattha daṭṭhabbāti te
atk-s0519a:777_4: pana vipallāsā kattha passitabbāti āha – “dasa vatthuke kilesapuñje”ti. Dasavidhakāraṇe
atk-s0519a:777_5: kilesasamūheti attho. Tattha kilesāpi kilesavatthu, kilesānaṃ paccayadhammāpi kilesavatthu.
atk-s0519a:777_6: Tesu kāraṇabhāvena purimasiddhā kilesā parato paresaṃ kilesānaṃ paccayabhāvato kilesāpi
atk-s0519a:777_7: kilesavatthu. Ayonisomanasikāro, ayonisomanasikāraparikkhatā ca dhammā kilesuppattihetubhāvato
atk-s0519a:778_0: Cattāro āhārāti ettha āhārasīsena tabbisayā kilesāpi adhippetā. Catasso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyoti
atk-s0519a:778_1: etthāpi eseva nayo. “Paṭhame āhāre”tiādinā dasavatthuke kilesapuñje purimaṃ purimaṃ
atk-s0519a:778_2: pacchimassa pacchimassa kāraṇanti dasseti. Tattha paṭhame āhāreti visayabhūte paṭhame
atk-s0519a:778_3: āhāre paṭhamo vipallāso pavattatīti attho. Sesāhāresupi eseva nayo. Paṭhame vipallāseti
atk-s0519a:778_4: paṭhame vipallāse appahīne sati paṭhamaṃ upādānaṃ pavattatīti attho. Sesapadesupi
atk-s0519a:778_5: eseva nayo. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ niddeseyeva kathayissāma.
atk-s0519a:779_0: 83. Idāni dasavatthukaṃ kilesapuñjaṃ taṇhāvijjāvasena dve koṭṭhāse karonto “yo ca
atk-s0519a:779_1: kabaḷīkāro āhāro”tiādimāha. Tattha kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ phassāhārañca aparijānantassa
atk-s0519a:779_2: taṇhācaritassa yathākkamaṃ kāyavedanāsu tibbo chandarāgo hoti, iti upakkilesassa
atk-s0519a:779_3: chandarāgassa hetubhāvato yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro, yo ca phasso āhāro, ime taṇhācaritassa
atk-s0519a:779_4: puggalassa upakkilesāti vuttā. Tathā manosañcetanāhāraṃ viññāṇāhārañca aparijānanto
atk-s0519a:779_5: diṭṭhicarito tesu attasaññī niccasaññī ca hotīti vuttanayeneva te diṭṭhicaritassa
atk-s0519a:779_6: puggalassa upakkilesāti vuttā. Tathā purimakā dve vipallāsā purimakāni eva ca dve
atk-s0519a:779_8: taṇhāvisayattā ca taṇhācaritassa upakkilesāti vuttā. Pacchimakāni pana tāni diṭṭhipadhānattā
atk-s0519a:779_9: diṭṭhisabhāvattā diṭṭhivisayattā ca diṭṭhicaritassa upakkilesāti vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a:780_0: 84. Kabaḷīkāre āhāre “asubhe subha”nti vipallāsoti catūsu āhāresu kabaḷīkāre āhāre
atk-s0519a:780_1: catūsu ca vipallāsesu “asubhe subha”nti vipallāso daṭṭhabbo kabaḷīkārāhārassa asubhasabhāvattā
atk-s0519a:780_2: asubhasamuṭṭhānattā ca. Tathā phassāhārassa dukkhasabhāvattā dukkhapaccayattā ca
atk-s0519a:780_3: visesato tattha “dukkhe sukha”nti vipallāso. Tathā yebhuyyena sattā viññāṇe niccasaññino,
atk-s0519a:780_4: saṅkhāresu ca attasaññino, cetanāpadhānā ca saṅkhārāti vuttaṃ – “viññāṇe āhāre…pe…
atk-s0519a:780_5: attāti vipallāso”ti. Paṭhame vipallāse ṭhito kāme upādiyatīti “asubhe subha”nti vipariyesaggāhī
atk-s0519a:780_6: kilesakāmena vatthukāme daḷhaṃ gaṇhāti. Idaṃ vuccati kāmupādānanti yaṃ tathā kāmānaṃ
atk-s0519a:780_7: gahaṇaṃ, idaṃ vuccati kāmupādānaṃ. “Dukkhe sukha”nti vipariyesaggāhī “sīlabbatehi
atk-s0519a:780_8: anāgate bhavavisuddhīti taṃ nibbutisukha”nti daḷhaṃ gaṇhāti. “Anicce nicca”nti vipariyesaggāhī
atk-s0519a:780_9: “sabbe bhavā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā”ti saṃsārābhinandiniṃ bhavadiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0519a:780_10: daḷhaṃ gaṇhāti. “Anattani attā”ti vipariyesaggāhī “asati attani kassidaṃ kammaphalaṃ,
atk-s0519a:780_11: tasmā so karoti, so paṭisaṃvedetī”ti attadiṭṭhiṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhātīti imamatthaṃ dasseti
atk-s0519a:781_0: Ayaṃ vuccati kāmayogoti yena kāmarāgasaṅkhātena kāmupādānena vatthukāmehi saha satto
atk-s0519a:781_1: saṃyojīyati, ayaṃ kāmarāgo “kāmayogo”ti vuccati. Ayaṃ vuccati bhavayogoti yato sīlabbatupādānasaṅkhātena
atk-s0519a:781_2: bhavupādānena bhavena saha satto saṃyojīyati, ayaṃ bhavarāgo “bhavayogo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0519a:781_3: Ayaṃ vuccati diṭṭhiyogoti yāya ahetukadiṭṭhiādisaṅkhātāya pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā, sakkāyadiṭṭhiādiavasiṭṭhadiṭṭhiyā
atk-s0519a:781_4: ca satto dukkhena saha saṃyojīyati, ayaṃ pāpikā diṭṭhi “diṭṭhiyogo”ti vuccati. Ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:781_5: vuccati avijjāyogoti yāya attavādupādānena sakalavaṭṭadukkhena ca saha satto saṃyojīyati,
atk-s0519a:782_0: Yasmā pana kāmayogādayo abhijjhākāyaganthādīnaṃ paccayā honti, tasmā “paṭhame yoge
atk-s0519a:782_1: ṭhito abhijjhāya kāyaṃ ganthatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha abhijjhāya kāyaṃ ganthatīti
atk-s0519a:782_2: parābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇāya abhijjhāya nāmakāyaṃ ganthati ghaṭṭetīti attho. Tathā bhavapatthanāya
atk-s0519a:782_3: appahīnattā bhavadiṭṭhibhavarāgavasena āghātavatthūsu sattā cittāni padūsentīti āha
atk-s0519a:782_4: – “dutiye yoge ṭhito byāpādena kāyaṃ ganthatī”ti. Tathā diṭṭhivasena avijjāvasena
atk-s0519a:782_5: ca sīlabbatehi sujjhati, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ca abhinivisatīti āha – “tatiye…pe…
atk-s0519a:783_0: Tassāti tassa abhijjhādīhi samannāgatassa puggalassa. Evaṃ ganthitāti evaṃ abhijjhāyanādivasena
atk-s0519a:783_1: nāmakāyaṃ ganthitvā ṭhitā. Āsavantīti āsavabhāvena pavattanti. Kuto ca vuccati āsavantīti
atk-s0519a:783_2: kuto pana hetuto te kilesā āsavantīti āsavahetuṃ pucchati. Yasmā pana kilesā kusalappavattiṃ
atk-s0519a:783_3: nivāretvā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantā, maggena asamucchinnā eva vā āsavānaṃ uppattihetu
atk-s0519a:783_4: honti, tasmā “anusayato vā pariyuṭṭhānato vā”ti vuttaṃ. Abhijjhākāyaganthena kāmāsavoti
atk-s0519a:783_5: abhijjhākāyaganthena siddhena kāmarāgasabhāvattā kāmāsavo siddho hoti. Katthacideva
atk-s0519a:783_6: visaye domanassito tappaṭipakkhe visaye tabbisayabahule ca bhave patthetīti āha –
atk-s0519a:783_8: siddhena taṃsabhāvattā aparāparaṃ vā diṭṭhiyo ganthentassa diṭṭhāsavo siddho hoti.
atk-s0519a:783_10: ayonisomanasikārato anekehi akusalehi dhammehi saddhiṃ avijjāsavo uppajjati, sabbesaṃ
atk-s0519a:783_11: vā akusaladhammānaṃ avijjāpubbaṅgamattā idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthena siddhena tassa
atk-s0519a:784: Yasmā pana āsavā eva paribuddhā vaṭṭasmiṃ ohananti osādentīti “oghā”ti vuccanti, tasmā vuttaṃ – “tassa ime cattāro āsavā”tiādi.
atk-s0519a:785_0: Anusayasahagatāti anusayabhāvaṃ appaṭikkhipitvā gatā pavattā, anusayabhūtā vā. Ajjhāsayanti
atk-s0519a:785_1: cittaṃ. Anupaviṭṭhāti ogāḷhā. Hadayaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhantīti cittassa abbhantarasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a:785_2: hadayaṃ āhantvā tiṭṭhanti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “abbhantaraṭṭhena hadaya”nti.
atk-s0519a:785_3: Tena vuccanti sallāti yasmā ajjhāsayaṃ anupaviṭṭhā hadayaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti, tena
atk-s0519a:785_4: vuccanti “sallā”ti. Pīḷājananaṃ duruddharaṇatā ca sallaṭṭho. “Eso me attā”ti gahaṇamukhena
atk-s0519a:785_5: “esohamasmī”ti gahaṇaṃ hotīti diṭṭhiṃ nissāyapi mānaṃ jappentīti āha “diṭṭhoghena mānasallo”ti.
atk-s0519a:786_0: Pariyādinnanti aññassa okāsaṃ adatvā samantato gahitaṃ. Catūsu dhammesu saṇṭhahatīti
atk-s0519a:786_1: ārammaṇapaccayatāya ārammaṇabhūtesu catūsu dhammesu patiṭṭhahati. Tāni sarūpato dasseti
atk-s0519a:786_2: “rūpe vedanāya saññāya saṅkhāresū”ti. Nandūpasecanenāti lobhasahagatassa sampayuttā
atk-s0519a:786_3: nandī sahajātakoṭiyā, itarassa upanissayakoṭiyā upasecananti nandūpasecanaṃ, tena
atk-s0519a:786_4: nandūpasecanena. Kena pana taṃ nandūpasecananti āha – “rāgasallena nandūpasecanena viññāṇenā”ti.
atk-s0519a:787_0: Tattha rāgasallenāti rāgasallena hetubhūtena nandūpasecanena viññāṇenāti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe
atk-s0519a:787_1: karaṇavacanaṃ. Rūpūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhitīti rūpameva ārammaṇakaraṇavasena upagantabbato,
atk-s0519a:787_2: viññāṇassa patiṭṭhābhāvato ca rūpūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti. Tiṭṭhati etthāti ṭhiti. Pañcavokārabhavasmiñhi
atk-s0519a:787_3: abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ rūpakkhandhaṃ nissāya tiṭṭhati. Dosasallenāti sahajātena dosasallena.
atk-s0519a:787_4: Yadā vedanūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti vuccati, tadā upanissayakoṭiyāva nandiyā upasittaṃ
atk-s0519a:787_5: viññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vedanāpi domanassavedanāva. Yadā ca upanissayapaccayabhūtena
atk-s0519a:787_6: dosasallena vedanūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti vuccati, tadā sahajātakoṭiyā, upanissayakoṭiyā
atk-s0519a:787_7: vā nandiyā upasittaṃ viññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vedanā pana tissopi tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ
atk-s0519a:787_9: vasena vutto. Dutiyo sabbavedanārammaṇassa vasenāpi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:788_0: Mānasallenāti mānasallena sahajātena, upanissayabhūtena vā. Mohasallenāti etthāpi
atk-s0519a:788_1: eseva nayo. Ettha ca anādimatisaṃsāre itthipurisā rūpābhirāmāti rāgasallavasena paṭhamā
atk-s0519a:788_2: viññāṇaṭṭhiti yojitā. Sabbāyapi vedanāya dukkhapariyāyasabbhāvato dukkhāya ca doso
atk-s0519a:788_3: anusetīti dosasallavasena dutiyā, saññāvasena “seyyohamasmī”ti maññanā hotīti mānasallavasena
atk-s0519a:788_4: tatiyā, saṅkhāresu samūhaghanaṃ dubbinibbhoganti mohasallavasena catutthī viññāṇaṭṭhiti yojitāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a:789_0: Upatthaddhanti olubbhārammaṇabhūtāhi viññāṇaṭṭhitīhi upatthambhitaṃ. Tañca kammanti
atk-s0519a:789_1: yaṃ “cetanā cetasika”nti pubbe vuttaṃ. Ime ca kilesāti ime ca dasavatthukā kilesā.
atk-s0519a:790_0: 85. Idāni āhārādayo nayānaṃ saṃkilesapakkhe disābhāvena vavatthapetuṃ “imā catasso
atk-s0519a:790_1: disā”tiādi āraddhaṃ, taṃ uttānameva. Puna kabaḷīkāro āhārotiādi āhārādīsuyeva yassa
atk-s0519a:790_2: puggalassa upakkilesā, taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ. Tattha dasannaṃ suttānanti
atk-s0519a:790_3: ekadesesu samudāyavohārena vuttaṃ. Samudāyesu hi pavattā samaññā avayavesupi dissati,
atk-s0519a:790_4: “yathā paṭo daḍḍho, samuddo diṭṭho”ti ca. Eko atthoti ekassa atthassa nipphādanato
atk-s0519a:790_5: vuttaṃ. Byañjanameva nānanti ettha byañjanaggahaṇena byañjanatthopi gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:790_6: Dasahipi suttapadehi savatthukā taṇhā vuttā. Taṇhā ca rāgacaritaṃ puggalaṃ khippaṃ
atk-s0519a:790_7: dūsetīti āha – “ime rāgacaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā”ti. Yathā ca paṭhamadisābhāvena
atk-s0519a:790_8: vuttadhammā rāgacaritassa upakkilesā, evaṃ dutiyadisābhāvena vuttadhammā dosacaritassa.
atk-s0519a:790_9: Tatiyacatutthadisābhāvena vuttadhammā yathākkamaṃ diṭṭhicaritassa mandassa tikkhassa
atk-s0519a:790_10: ca upakkilesā vuttā. Tesaṃ upakkilesabhāvo vuttanayānusārena veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:791_0: Āhāravipallāsādayo yadipi sabbehi tīhi vimokkhamukhehi pubbabhāge yathārahaṃ pariññeyyā
atk-s0519a:791_1: pahātabbā ca. Yassa pana dukkhānupassanā purime āhāradvaye dukkhākārena bahulaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0519a:791_2: tassa vasena yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro, yo ca phasso āhāro, ime appaṇihitena vimokkhamukhena
atk-s0519a:791_3: pariññaṃ gacchantīti vuttaṃ. Esa nayo sesesu. Evañcetaṃ, na aññathā. Na hi ariyamaggānaṃ
atk-s0519a:791_4: viya pahātabbesu vimokkhamukhānaṃ pariññeyyapahātabbesu koci niyamo sambhavati. Iti
atk-s0519a:791_5: sabbe lokavaṭṭānusārino dhammā niyyanti, te lokā tīhi vimokkhamukhehīti nigamanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:791_6: Tassattho – iti evaṃ vuttappakārā sabbe āhārādayo lokasaṅkhātavaṭṭānusārino dhammā
atk-s0519a:791_7: te lokabhūtā vaṭṭato niyyanti aniccānupassanādīhi tīhi vimokkhamukhehīti.
atk-s0519a:792_0: 86. Evaṃ saṃkilesapakkhe disābhūtadhamme niddisitvā idāni vodānapakkhe disābhūtadhamme
atk-s0519a:792_1: dassetuṃ “catasso paṭipadā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha dibbabrahmaariyaāneñjavihāroti cattāro
atk-s0519a:792_3: dhammā. Saccādhiṭṭhānādīni cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni. Chandasamādhibhāvanādayo catasso
atk-s0519a:792_4: samādhibhāvanā. Indriyasaṃvaro tapasaṅkhāto puññadhammo bojjhaṅgabhāvanā sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a:793_0: Paṭhamā paṭipadātiādi paṭipadāsatipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ abhedasandassanaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā
atk-s0519a:793_1: visuṃ gahaṇaṃ katanti? Dasavatthukassa kilesapuñjassa paṭipakkhabhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:793_2: paṭipadādidasakaniddeso. Tathā hi vakkhati – “cattāro āhārā tesaṃ paṭipakkho catasso
atk-s0519a:793_3: paṭipadā”tiādi. Kiñcāpi catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu “idaṃ nāma satipaṭṭhānaṃ imāya eva
atk-s0519a:793_4: paṭipadāya ijjhatī”ti niyamo natthi, tathāpi paṭhamāya paṭipadāya paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:793_5: sambhavatīti sambhavavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ – “paṭhamā paṭipadā, paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0519a:793_6: Yasmā pana āhāravipallāsādīnaṃ viya paṭipadāsatipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ atthato nānattaṃ natthi.
atk-s0519a:793_7: Satipaṭṭhānāniyeva hi tathā tathā paṭipajjamānāni dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiññādināmakāni
atk-s0519a:793_8: honti, tasmā yathā saṃkilesapakkhe “paṭhame āhāre paṭhamo vipallāso”tiādinā adhikaraṇabhedena
atk-s0519a:793_9: vuttaṃ, evaṃ adhikaraṇabhedaṃ akatvā “paṭhamā paṭipadā, paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhāna”ntiādi
atk-s0519a:794_0: Andhassa pabbatārohanaṃ viya kadācideva uppajjanakaṃ acchariyaṃ, accharāyoggaṃ acchariyanti
atk-s0519a:794_1: porāṇā. Abhūtapubbaṃ bhūtanti abbhutaṃ. Ubhayampetaṃ vimhayāvahassa adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:794_2: Na hi mānappahānādito aññaṃ durabhisambhavataraṃ vimhanīyañca upalabbhatīti adhitiṭṭhati
atk-s0519a:794_3: etena, ettha vā adhiṭṭhānamattameva vā tanti adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Saccañca taṃ adhiṭṭhānañca,
atk-s0519a:794_4: saccassa vā adhiṭṭhānaṃ, saccaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ etassāti vā saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Sesesupi
atk-s0519a:794_5: eseva nayo. Samādhi eva bhāvetabbatāya samādhibhāvanā. Sukhaṃ bhajatīti sukhabhāgiyo,
atk-s0519a:794_6: sukhabhāgassa vā sukhakoṭṭhāsassa hitoti sukhabhāgiyo. Ekassapi sattassa asubhabhāvanādayo
atk-s0519a:794_7: viya ekadese avattitvā anavasesapariyādānato natthi etissā pamāṇanti appamaññā.
atk-s0519a:795_0: Paṭhamā paṭipadā bhāvitā bahulīkatā paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ paripūretīti paṭhamāya
atk-s0519a:795_1: paṭipadāya bhāvanābahulīkāro paṭhamassa satipaṭṭhānassa bhāvanāpāripūrīti attho.
atk-s0519a:795_2: Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Yathā hi ariyamagge bhāvite satipaṭṭhānādayo bodhipakkhiyadhammā
atk-s0519a:795_3: sabbepi bhāvitā eva honti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:796_0: Kāyānupassanāya kāmarāgassa ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato “paṭhamo satipaṭṭhāno bhāvito bahulīkato
atk-s0519a:796_1: kāmapaṭipakkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paripūretī”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā pītipaṭisaṃvedanādivasena
atk-s0519a:796_2: pavattamānaṃ dutiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ, sappītikassa dutiyajjhānassa cittassa abhippamodanavasena
atk-s0519a:796_3: pavattamānaṃ tatiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ ukkaṃsagatasukhassa tatiyajjhānassa aniccavirāgādivasena
atk-s0519a:796_4: pavattiyā saṅkhāresu upekkhakaṃ catutthaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvato
atk-s0519a:797_0: Yasmā pana rūpāvacarapaṭhamajjhānaṃ rūpāvacarasamāpattīnaṃ, dutiyajjhānaṃ byāpādavitakkādidūrībhāvena
atk-s0519a:797_1: brahmavihārānaṃ, tatiyajjhānaṃ pītivirāgena sukhena vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ
atk-s0519a:797_3: visesato paccayo hoti, tasmā “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ paṭhamaṃ vihāraṃ
atk-s0519a:797_4: paripūretī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Iti yo yassa visesapaccayo, so taṃ paripūretīti vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:798_0: 87. Idāni paṭipadādayo vodānapakkhe disābhāvena vavatthapetuṃ “tattha imā catasso
atk-s0519a:798_1: disā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ suviññeyyameva. Puna “paṭhamā paṭipadā”tiādi paṭipadācatukkādīsu
atk-s0519a:798_2: yena yassa puggalassa vodānaṃ, taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0519a:798_3: Yadipi tīsu vimokkhamukhesu “idaṃ nāma vimokkhamukhaṃ imāya eva paṭipadāya ijjhatī”ti
atk-s0519a:798_4: niyamo natthi. Yesaṃ pana puggalānaṃ purimāhi dvīhi paṭipadāhi appaṇihitena vimokkhamukhena
atk-s0519a:798_5: ariyamaggādhigamo. Tathā yassa tatiyāya paṭipadāya suññatavimokkhamukhena, yassa
