atk-s0519a:798_6: ca catutthāya paṭipadāya animittavimokkhamukhena ariyamaggādhigamo, tesaṃ puggalānaṃ
atk-s0519a:798_7: vasena ayaṃ paṭipadāvimokkhamukhasaṃsandanā. Satipaṭṭhānādīhi vimokkhamukhasaṃsandanāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-s0519a:799_0: Tesaṃ vikkīḷitanti tesaṃ asantāsanajavaparakkamādivisesayogena sīhānaṃ buddhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:799_1: paccekabuddhānaṃ buddhasāvakānañca vikkīḷitaṃ viharaṇaṃ. Yadidaṃ āhārādikilesavatthusamatikkamanamukhena
atk-s0519a:799_2: saparasantāne paṭipadādisampādanā. Idāni āhārādīnaṃ paṭipadādīhi yena samatikkamanaṃ,
atk-s0519a:799_3: taṃ nesaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvaṃ dassento “cattāro āhārā tesaṃ paṭipakkho catasso paṭipadā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:799_4: Tattha tesaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvo pahātabbabhāvo pahāyakabhāvo ca āhāraviññāṇaṭṭhitīnañcettha
atk-s0519a:799_6: sacchikiriyā cā”tiādi tassāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – tesaṃ vikkīḷitanti ettha yadetaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ
atk-s0519a:799_7: nāma bhāvetabbānaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ bhāvanā, sacchikātabbānaṃ phalanibbānānaṃ
atk-s0519a:799_8: sacchikiriyā ca. Tathā pahātabbassa dasavatthukassa kilesapuñjassa tadaṅgādivasena
atk-s0519a:799_9: pahānaṃ byantīkiriyā anavasesananti. Idāni taṃ saṅkhepena dassento “indriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:800_0: Indriyādhiṭṭhānanti indriyānaṃ pavattanaṃ bhāvanā sacchikiriyā ca. Vipariyāsānadhiṭṭhānanti
atk-s0519a:800_1: vipallāsānaṃ apavattanaṃ pahānaṃ anuppādanaṃ. Indriyāni saddhammagocaroti indriyāni
atk-s0519a:800_2: cettha saddhammassa gocarabhūtāni pavattihetūti adhippetāni saddhindriyādīnīti attho.
atk-s0519a:800_3: Vipariyāsā kilesagocaroti vipallāsā saṃkilesapakkhassa pavattiṭṭhānaṃ pavattihetūti.
atk-s0519a:800_4: Ayaṃ vuccati sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmīti yāyaṃ “cattāro āhārā”tiādinā saṃkilesapakkhe
atk-s0519a:800_5: dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ, “catasso paṭipadā”tiādinā vodānapakkhepi dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ
atk-s0519a:800_6: taṇhācaritādīnaṃ upakkilesavodānavibhāvanāmukhena niddhāraṇā, ayaṃ sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmi nāma.
atk-s0519a:801_1: yasmā pana nayānaṃ aññamaññānuppavesassa icchitattā sīhavikkīḷitanayato tipukkhalanayo
atk-s0519a:801_2: niggacchati, tasmā paṭipadāvibhāgato cattāro puggale sīhavikkīḷitanayassa bhūmiṃ
atk-s0519a:801_3: niddisitvā tato eva ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalattaye niddhāretuṃ “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādi
atk-s0519a:801_4: āraddhaṃ. Tattha ime dve puggalāti ime purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena dve puggalā.
atk-s0519a:801_5: Esa nayo itaratthāpi. Puna “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādi yathāvuttapuggalacatukkato
atk-s0519a:801_6: ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalattayaṃ niddhāretuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha yo sādhāraṇāyāti dukkhāpaṭipadāya
atk-s0519a:801_7: khippābhiññāya, sukhāpaṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya ca niyyātīti sambandho. Kathaṃ pana
atk-s0519a:801_8: paṭipadādvayaṃ ekassa sambhavatīti? Nayidamevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekassa puggalassa ekasmiṃ
atk-s0519a:801_9: dve paṭipadā sambhavantīti. Yathāvuttāsu pana dvīsu paṭipadāsu yo yāya kāyaci niyyāti,
atk-s0519a:801_10: ayaṃ vipañcitaññūti ayamettha adhippāyo. Yasmā pana aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ paṭipadā calati
atk-s0519a:801_11: na calatīti vicāraṇāyaṃ “calatī”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā ekassapi puggalassa jhānantaramaggantaresu
atk-s0519a:802_0: “Tattha bhagavā”tiādinā desanāvibhāgehipi tameva puggalavibhāgaṃ vibhāveti. Taṃ heṭṭhā
atk-s0519a:802_1: vuttanayameva. Tattha adhicittanti adhicittasikkhañcāti ca-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho.
atk-s0519a:802_2: Tena adhicittasikkhañca adhipaññāsikkhañca vipañcitaññussa paññapetīti attho. Adhisīlanti
atk-s0519a:802_3: etthāpi eseva nayo. Adhisīlasikkhaṃ adhicittasikkhaṃ adhipaññāsikkhañcāti yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:803: Cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavantīti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, cattāro puggalā hutvā tayo puggalā hontīti attho.
atk-s0519a:804: Ayaṃ saṃkilesoti ayaṃ akusalamūlādidvādasattikasaṅgaho saṃkilissati etenāti saṃkilesoti katvā. Idaṃ vodānanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
atk-s0519a:805: Tīṇi hutvā dve bhavantīti nandiyāvaṭṭanayassa disābhūtadhammadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenevāha – “taṇhā ca avijjā cā”tiādi, taṃ sabbaṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0519a:806_0: Kasmā panettha nayānaṃ uddesānukkamena niddeso na katoti? Nayānaṃ nayehi sambhavadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0519a:806_1: Paṭhamanayato hi puggalādhiṭṭhānavasena tatiyanayassa, tatiyanayato ca dutiyanayassa
atk-s0519a:806_2: sambhavoti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ paṭhamanayānantaraṃ tatiyanayo, tatiyanayānantarañca
atk-s0519a:806_3: dutiyanayo niddiṭṭho. Dhammādhiṭṭhānavasena pana tatiyanayato dutiyanayo, dutiyanayato
atk-s0519a:806_4: paṭhamanayopi sambhavatīti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ ante “taṇhā ca avijjā cā”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:806_5: paṭhamanayassa bhūmi dassitā. Teneva hi “cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavanti, tīṇi hutvā
atk-s0519a:806_6: dve bhavantī”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “dve hutvā cattāri bhavanti, dve hutvā tīṇi bhavanti,
atk-s0519a:806_7: tīṇi hutvā cattāri bhavantī”ti ayampi nayo vattabbo siyāti? Saccametaṃ, ayaṃ pana
atk-s0519a:806_8: nayo atthato dassito evāti katvā na vutto. Yasmā tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anuppaveso
atk-s0519a:806_9: icchito, sati ca anuppavese tato viniggamopi sambhavati evāti. Ayañca attho peṭakopadesena vibhāvetabbo.
atk-s0519a:807_0: Tatthāyaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya vibhāvanā – cattāro puggalā taṇhācarito duvidho mudindriyo
atk-s0519a:807_1: tikkhindriyo ca. Tathā diṭṭhicaritoti. Tattha taṇhācarito mudindriyo dukkhāya paṭipadāya
atk-s0519a:807_2: dandhābhiññāya niyyāti, tikkhindriyo dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyāti,
atk-s0519a:807_3: diṭṭhicarito pana mudindriyo sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyāti, tikkhindriyo
atk-s0519a:807_4: sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyāti. Iti imāsu paṭipadāsu yathārahaṃ ṭhitehi
atk-s0519a:807_6: Cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāvetvā cattāro vipallāsā daṭṭhabbāti sabbo yathāvuttanayo anugantabbo.
atk-s0519a:808_0: Tatthāyaṃ pāḷi – tattha ye diṭṭhicaritā sattā, te kāmesu dosadiṭṭhī, na ca ye kāmesu
atk-s0519a:808_1: anusayā samūhatā, te attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti. Tesaṃ satthā vā dhammaṃ
atk-s0519a:808_2: deseti aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī “kāmehi natthi attho”ti, te ca pubbeyeva
atk-s0519a:808_3: kāmehi anatthikā, iti kāme appakasirena paṭinissajjanti, te cetasikena dukkhena anajjhositā.
atk-s0519a:808_4: Tena vuccati “sukhā paṭipadā”ti. Ye pana taṇhācaritā sattā, te kāmesu ajjhositā,
atk-s0519a:808_5: tesaṃ satthā vā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā bhikkhu “kāmehi natthi attho”ti, te piyarūpaṃ
atk-s0519a:808_6: dukkhena paṭinissajjanti. Tena vuccati “dukkhā paṭipadā”ti. Iti ime sabbe sattā dvīsu
atk-s0519a:809_0: Tattha ye diṭṭhicaritā sattā, te dvidhā tikkhindriyā ca mudindriyā ca. Tattha ye
atk-s0519a:809_1: diṭṭhicaritā sattā tikkhindriyā, te sukhena paṭinissajjanti, khippañca abhisamenti.
atk-s0519a:809_2: Tena vuccati – “sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā”ti. Tattha ye diṭṭhicaritā sattā mudindriyā
atk-s0519a:809_3: paṭhamaṃ tikkhindriyaṃ upādāya dandhataraṃ abhisamenti, te sukhena paṭinissajjanti,
atk-s0519a:809_4: dandhañca abhisamenti. Tena vuccati – “sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā”ti. Tattha taṇhācaritā
atk-s0519a:809_5: sattā duvidhā tikkhindriyā ca mudindriyā ca. Tattha ye taṇhācaritā sattā tikkhindriyā,
atk-s0519a:809_6: te dukkhena paṭinissajjanti, khippañca abhisamenti. Tena vuccati – “dukkhā paṭipadā
atk-s0519a:809_7: khippābhiññā”ti. Tattha ye taṇhācaritā sattā mudindriyā paṭhamaṃ tikkhindriyaṃ upādāya
atk-s0519a:809_8: dandhataraṃ abhisamenti, te dukkhena paṭinissajjanti, dandhañca abhisamenti. Tena
atk-s0519a:809_9: vuccati – “dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā”ti. Imā catasso paṭipadāyo apañcamā achaṭṭhā.
atk-s0519a:809_10: Ye hi keci nibbutā nibbāyanti nibbāyissanti vā imāhi catūhi paṭipadāhi anaññāhi,
atk-s0519a:809_11: ayaṃ paṭipadā catukkamaggena kilese niddisati. Yā catukkamaggena ariyadhammesu niddisitabbā,
atk-s0519a:810: Tatrime cattāro āhārā, cattāro vipallāsā upādānā yogā ganthā āsavā oghā sallā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo agatigamanānīti evaṃ imāni sabbāni dasa padāni. Ayaṃ suttassa saṃsandanā.
atk-s0519a:811: Cattāro āhārā, tattha yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro, yo ca phasso āhāro, ime taṇhācaritena pahātabbā. Tattha yo ca manosañcetanāhāro, yo ca viññāṇāhāro, ime diṭṭhicaritena pahātabbā.
atk-s0519a:812_0: Tattha paṭhamo āhāro paṭhamo vipallāso, dutiyo āhāro dutiyo vipallāso, tatiyo āhāro
atk-s0519a:812_1: tatiyo vipallāso, catuttho āhāro catuttho vipallāso, ime cattāro vipallāsā apañcamā
atk-s0519a:813_0: Tattha paṭhame vipallāse ṭhito kāme upādiyati, idaṃ kāmupādānaṃ. Dutiye vipallāse
atk-s0519a:813_1: ṭhito anāgataṃ bhavaṃ upādiyati, idaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ. Tatiye vipallāse ṭhito viparītadiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0519a:813_2: upādiyati, idaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Catutthe vipallāse ṭhito khandhe attato upādiyati,
atk-s0519a:814_0: Tattha kāmupādāne ṭhito kāme abhijjhāya ganthati, ayaṃ abhijjhākāyagantho. Sīlabbatupādāne
atk-s0519a:814_1: ṭhito byāpādaṃ ganthati, ayaṃ byāpādakāyagantho. Diṭṭhupādāne ṭhito parāmāsaṃ ganthati,
atk-s0519a:814_2: ayaṃ parāmāsakāyagantho. Attavādupādāne ṭhito papañcento ganthati, ayaṃ idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyagantho.
atk-s0519a:815_0: Tassa ganthaganthitā kilesā āsavanti. Kiṃ pana vuccati āsavantīti? Vippaṭisārā. Ye
atk-s0519a:815_1: vippaṭisārā, te anusayā. Tattha abhijjhākāyaganthena kāmāsavo, byāpādakāyaganthena
atk-s0519a:816: Te cattāro āsavā vepullaṃ gatā oghā honti, tena vuccanti “oghā”ti. Tattha kāmāsavo kāmogho, bhavāsavo bhavogho, avijjāsavo avijjogho, diṭṭhāsavo diṭṭhogho.
atk-s0519a:817_0: Te cattāro oghā āsayamanupaviṭṭhā anusayasahagatā vuccanti sallāti hadayamāhacca
atk-s0519a:817_1: tiṭṭhanti. Tattha kāmogho rāgasallaṃ, bhavogho dosasallaṃ, avijjogho mohasallaṃ,
atk-s0519a:818_0: Imehi catūhi sallehi pariyādinnaṃ viññāṇaṃ catūsu dhammesu tiṭṭhati rūpe vedanāya
atk-s0519a:818_1: saññāya saṅkhāresu. Imā catasso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo. Tattha rāgasallena nandūpasecanaṃ
atk-s0519a:818_2: rūpūpagaṃ viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhati. Dosasallena vedanūpagaṃ. Mohasallena saññūpagaṃ. Diṭṭhisallena
atk-s0519a:819_0: Catūhi viññāṇaṭṭhitīhi catubbidhaṃ agatiṃ gacchanti chandā dosā bhayā mohā. Rāgena
atk-s0519a:819_1: chandā agatiṃ gacchati, dosena dosā agatiṃ gacchati, mohena mohā agatiṃ gacchati,
atk-s0519a:819_2: diṭṭhiyā bhayā agatiṃ gacchati, iti imāni ca kammāni ime ca kilesā ayaṃ saṃsārahetu.
atk-s0519a:820_0: Tatthimā catasso disā kabaḷīkāro āhāro “asubhe subha”nti vipallāso kāmupādānaṃ kāmayogo
atk-s0519a:820_1: abhijjhākāyagantho kāmāsavo kāmogho rāgasallaṃ rūpūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti chandā agatigamanaṃ, ayaṃ paṭhamā disā.
atk-s0519a:821: Phasso āhāro “dukkhe sukha”nti vipallāso sīlabbatupādānaṃ bhavayogo byāpādakāyagantho bhavāsavo bhavogho dosasallaṃ vedanūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti dosā agatigamanaṃ, ayaṃ dutiyā disā.
atk-s0519a:822_0: Manosañcetanāhāro “anattani attā”ti vipallāso diṭṭhupādānaṃ diṭṭhiyogo parāmāsakāyagantho
atk-s0519a:822_1: diṭṭhāsavo diṭṭhogho diṭṭhisallaṃ saññūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti bhayā agatigamanaṃ, ayaṃ tatiyā disā.
atk-s0519a:823_0: Viññāṇāhāro “anicce nicca”nti vipallāso attavādupādānaṃ avijjāyogo idaṃsaccābhinivesokāyagantho
atk-s0519a:823_1: avijjāsavo avijjogho mohasallaṃ saṅkhārūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti mohā agatigamanaṃ, ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:823_2: catutthī disā. Iti imesaṃ dasannaṃ suttānaṃ paṭhamena padena paṭhamāya disāya ālokanaṃ,
atk-s0519a:823_3: dutiyena padena dutiyāya disāya, tatiyena padena tatiyāya disāya, catutthena padena
atk-s0519a:823_4: catutthiyā disāya ālokanaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati disā ālokanā. Iminā nayena sabbe kilesā
atk-s0519a:824_0: Catasso paṭipadā, cattāri jhānāni, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro vihārā dibbo brahmā
atk-s0519a:824_1: ariyo āneñjo, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, cattāro adhiṭṭhānā,
atk-s0519a:824_2: cattāro samādhayo chandasamādhi vīriyasamādhi cittasamādhi vīmaṃsāsamādhi, cattāro
atk-s0519a:824_3: dhammā sukhabhāgiyā nāññatra bojjhaṅgā nāññatra tapasā nāññatra indriyasaṃvarā nāññatra
atk-s0519a:825_0: Tattha dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā bhāviyamānā bahulīkariyamānā paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:825_1: paripūreti, paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ paripūreti, paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0519a:825_2: satipaṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ vihāraṃ paripūreti, paṭhamo vihāro paripuṇṇo paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0519a:825_3: sammappadhānaṃ paripūreti, paṭhamaṃ sammappadhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ acchariyaṃ
atk-s0519a:825_4: abbhutaṃ dhammaṃ paripūreti, paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo paripuṇṇo paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0519a:825_5: adhiṭṭhānaṃ paripūreti, paṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ chandasamādhiṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a:825_6: chandasamādhi paripuṇṇo indriyasaṃvaraṃ paripūreti, indriyasaṃvaro paripuṇṇo paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0519a:825_7: appamāṇaṃ paripūreti. Evaṃ yāva sabbanissaggā catutthaṃ appamāṇaṃ paripūreti.
atk-s0519a:826_0: Tattha paṭhamā ca paṭipadā paṭhamañca jhānaṃ paṭhamañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ dibbo ca vihāro
atk-s0519a:826_1: paṭhamañca sammappadhānaṃ paṭhamo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saccādhiṭṭhānañca chandasamādhi
atk-s0519a:826_2: ca indriyasaṃvaro ca mettā ca appamāṇaṃ. Ayaṃ paṭhamā disā.
atk-s0519a:827_0: Dutiyā ca paṭipadā khippābhiññā dutiyañca jhānaṃ dutiyañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ brahmā ca
atk-s0519a:827_1: vihāro dutiyañca sammappadhānaṃ dutiyo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo cāgādhiṭṭhānañca
atk-s0519a:827_2: cittasamādhi ca tapo ca karuṇā ca appamāṇaṃ. Ayaṃ dutiyā disā.
atk-s0519a:828_0: Tatiyā ca paṭipadā dandhābhiññā tatiyañca jhānaṃ tatiyañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ ariyo ca
atk-s0519a:828_1: vihāro tatiyañca sammappadhānaṃ tatiyo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saccādhiṭṭhānañca
atk-s0519a:828_2: vīriyasamādhi ca bojjhaṅgā ca muditā ca appamāṇaṃ. Ayaṃ tatiyā disā.
atk-s0519a:829_0: Catutthī ca paṭipadā khippābhiññā catutthañca jhānaṃ catutthañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ āneñjo
atk-s0519a:829_1: ca vihāro catutthañca sammappadhānaṃ catuttho ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo upasamādhiṭṭhānañca
atk-s0519a:829_2: vīmaṃsāsamādhi ca sabbanissaggo ca upekkhā ca appamāṇaṃ. Ayaṃ catutthī disā. Imāsaṃ
atk-s0519a:829_3: catunnaṃ disānaṃ yā ālokanā, ayaṃ vuccati disālocano nāma nayo.
atk-s0519a:830_0: Tatthāyaṃ yojanā – cattāro ca āhārā, catasso ca paṭipadā, cattāro ca vipallāsā, cattāro
atk-s0519a:830_1: ca satipaṭṭhānā, cattāri ca upādānāni, cattāri ca jhānāni, cattāro ca yogā, cattāro
atk-s0519a:830_2: ca vihārā, cattāro ca ganthā, cattāro ca sammappadhānā, cattāro ca āsavā, cattāro
atk-s0519a:830_3: ca acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, cattāro ca oghā, cattāri ca adhiṭṭhānāni, cattāri ca
atk-s0519a:830_4: sallāni, cattāro ca samādhayo, catasso ca viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, cattāro ca sukhabhāgiyā
atk-s0519a:830_5: dhammā, cattāri ca agatigamanāni cattāri ca appamāṇāni. Iti kusalākusalānaṃ pakkhapaṭipakkhavasena
atk-s0519a:831_0: Tassa cattāri sāmaññaphalāni pariyosānaṃ, tattha paṭhamāya disāya sotāpattiphalaṃ
atk-s0519a:831_1: pariyosānaṃ, dutiyāya sakadāgāmiphalaṃ, tatiyāya anāgāmiphalaṃ, catutthiyā arahattaphalaṃ pariyosānanti.
atk-s0519a:832_0: Tattha katamo tipukkhalanayo? Paṭipadāvibhāgena catūsu puggalesu yo sukhāya paṭipadāya
atk-s0519a:832_1: khippābhiññāya niyyāti, ayaṃ ugghaṭitaññū. Yo sukhāya vā paṭipadāya, dandhābhiññāya,
atk-s0519a:832_2: dukkhāya vā paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyāti, ayaṃ vipañcitaññū. Yo dukkhāya paṭipadāya
atk-s0519a:832_3: dandhābhiññāya niyyāti, ayaṃ neyyo. Iti cattāro hutvā tayo honti. Tattha ugghaṭitaññussa
atk-s0519a:832_4: samathapubbaṅgamā vipassanā sappāyā. Neyyassa vipassanāpubbaṅgamo samatho, vipañcitaññussa
atk-s0519a:832_5: samathavipassanā yuganaddhā. Ugghaṭitaññussa mudukā desanā, neyyassa tikkhā desanā,
atk-s0519a:833_0: Ugghaṭitaññussa adhipaññāsikkhā, vipañcitaññussa adhicittasikkhā ca adhipaññāsikkhā
atk-s0519a:833_1: ca, neyyassa adhisīlasikkhā ca adhicittasikkhā ca adhipaññāsikkhā ca. Iti imesaṃ
atk-s0519a:834: Tatthāyaṃ saṃkilesapakkho, tīṇi akusalamūlāni, tayo phassā, tisso vedanā, tayo upavicārā, tayo kilesā, tayo vitakkā, tayo pariḷāhā, tīṇi saṅkhatalakkhaṇāni, tisso dukkhatā.
atk-s0519a:835_0: Tīṇi akusalamūlānīti lobho akusalamūlaṃ, doso akusalamūlaṃ, moho akusalamūlaṃ. Tayo
atk-s0519a:835_1: phassāti sukhavedanīyo phasso, dukkhavedanīyo phasso, adukkhamasukhavedanīyo phasso.
atk-s0519a:835_2: Tisso vedanāti sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā. Tayo upavicārāti
atk-s0519a:835_3: somanassūpavicāro, domanassūpavicāro, upekkhūpavicāro. Tayo kilesāti lobho, doso,
atk-s0519a:835_4: moho. Tayo vitakkāti kāmavitakko, byāpādavitakko, vihiṃsāvitakko. Tayo pariḷāhāti
atk-s0519a:835_5: rāgajo, dosajo, mohajo. Tīṇi saṅkhatalakkhaṇānīti uppādo, ṭhiti, vayo. Tisso dukkhatāti
atk-s0519a:836_0: Tattha lobho akusalamūlaṃ manāpikena ārammaṇena samuṭṭhahati. Tadeva manāpikārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:836_1: paṭicca uppajjati sukhavedanīyo phasso, sukhavedanīyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati
atk-s0519a:836_2: sukhā vedanā, sukhaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca uppajjati somanassūpavicāro, somanassūpavicāraṃ
atk-s0519a:836_3: paṭicca uppajjati rāgo, rāgaṃ paṭicca uppajjati kāmavitakko, kāmavitakkaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0519a:836_4: uppajjati rāgajo pariḷāho, rāgajaṃ pariḷāhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati uppādo saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a:837_0: Doso akusalamūlaṃ amanāpikena ārammaṇena samuṭṭhahati. Tadeva amanāpikārammaṇaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0519a:837_1: uppajjati dukkhavedanīyo phasso, dukkhavedanīyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati dukkhā
atk-s0519a:837_2: vedanā, dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca uppajjati domanassūpavicāro, domanassūpavicāraṃ paṭicca
atk-s0519a:837_3: uppajjati doso, dosaṃ paṭicca uppajjati byāpādavitakko, byāpādavitakkaṃ paṭicca uppajjati
atk-s0519a:837_4: dosajo pariḷāho, dosajaṃ pariḷāhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a:837_5: ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati dukkhadukkhatā.
atk-s0519a:838_0: Moho akusalamūlaṃ upekkhāṭhāniyaṃ ārammaṇena samuṭṭhahati. Tadeva upekkhāṭhāniyaṃ
atk-s0519a:838_1: ārammaṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati adukkhamasukhavedanīyo phasso, adukkhamasukhavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0519a:838_2: phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0519a:838_3: uppajjati upekkhūpavicāro, upekkhūpavicāraṃ paṭicca uppajjati moho, mohaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0519a:838_4: uppajjati vihiṃsāvitakko, vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ paṭicca uppajjati mohajo pariḷāho, mohajaṃ
atk-s0519a:838_5: pariḷāhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati vayo saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ, vayaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0519a:838_6: uppajjati saṅkhāradukkhatā. Iti ayaṃ tīhi ākārehi kilesānaṃ niddeso. Yo koci akusalapakkho,
atk-s0519a:839_0: Tattha katamo kusalapakkho? Tīṇi kusalamūlāni alobho, adoso, amoho. Tisso paññā sutamayī,
atk-s0519a:839_1: cintāmayī, bhāvanāmayī. Tayo samādhī savitakkasavicāro, avitakkavicāramatto, avitakkaavicāro.
atk-s0519a:839_2: Tisso sikkhā adhisīlasikkhā, adhicittasikkhā, adhipaññāsikkhā. Tīṇi nimittāni samathanimittaṃ,
atk-s0519a:839_3: paggahanimittaṃ, upekkhānimittaṃ. Tayo vitakkā nekkhammavitakko, abyāpādavitakko,
atk-s0519a:839_4: avihiṃsāvitakko. Tīṇi indriyāni anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ, aññindriyaṃ, aññātāvindriyaṃ.
atk-s0519a:839_5: Tayo upavicārā nekkhammūpavicāro, abyāpādūpavicāro, avihiṃsūpavicāro tisso esanā
atk-s0519a:839_6: kāmesanā, bhavesanā, brahmacariyesanā. Tayo khandhā sīlakkhandho, samādhikkhandho, paññākkhandho.
atk-s0519a:840_0: Tattha alobho kusalamūlaṃ sutamayipaññaṃ paripūreti. Sutamayi paññā paripuṇṇā savitakkasavicāraṃ
atk-s0519a:840_1: samādhiṃ paripūreti, savitakkasavicāro samādhi paripuṇṇo adhisīlasikkhaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a:840_2: adhisīlasikkhā paripuṇṇā samathanimittaṃ paripūreti, samathanimittaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ nekkhammavitakkaṃ
atk-s0519a:840_3: paripūreti, nekkhammavitakko paripuṇṇo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ paripūreti, anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ
atk-s0519a:840_4: paripuṇṇaṃ nekkhammasitūpavicāraṃ paripūreti, nekkhammūpavicāraṃ paripuṇṇo kāmesanaṃ
atk-s0519a:841_0: Adoso kusalamūlaṃ cintāmayipaññaṃ paripūreti, cintāmayipaññā paripuṇṇā avitakkavicāramattaṃ
atk-s0519a:841_1: samādhiṃ paripūreti, avitakkavicāramatto samādhi paripuṇṇo adhicittasikkhaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a:841_2: adhicittasikkhā paripuṇṇā upekkhānimittaṃ paripūreti, upekkhānimittaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:841_3: abyāpādavitakkaṃ paripūreti, abyāpādavitakko paripuṇṇo aññindriyaṃ paripūreti, aññindriyaṃ
atk-s0519a:841_4: paripuṇṇaṃ abyāpādūpavicāraṃ paripūreti, abyāpādūpavicāro paripuṇṇo bhavesanaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0519a:842_0: Amoho kusalamūlaṃ bhāvanāmayipaññaṃ paripūreti, bhāvanāmayipaññā paripuṇṇā avitakkaavicāraṃ
atk-s0519a:842_1: samādhiṃ paripūreti, avitakkaavicāro samādhi paripuṇṇo adhipaññāsikkhaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a:842_2: adhipaññāsikkhā paripuṇṇā paggahanimittaṃ paripūreti, paggahanimittaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:842_3: avihiṃsāvitakkaṃ paripūreti, avihiṃsāvitakko paripuṇṇo aññātāvindriyaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a:842_4: aññātāvindriyaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ avihiṃsūpavicāraṃ paripūreti, avihiṃsūpavicāro paripuṇṇo
atk-s0519a:842_5: brahmacariyesanaṃ paripūreti, brahmacariyesanā paripuṇṇā paññākkhandhaṃ paripūreti.
atk-s0519a:843_0: Iti ime tayo dhammā akusalapakkhikā kusalapakkhikā ca tikaniddesehi niddiṭṭhā tipukkhalanayassa
atk-s0519a:843_1: disā nāma. Tassa pariyosānaṃ tayo vimokkhā appaṇihito suññato animitto, ayaṃ tipukkhalo nāma dutiyo nayo.
atk-s0519a:844_0: Tattha ye ime tayo puggalā ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyoti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ
atk-s0519a:844_1: dve puggalā sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya, sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya
atk-s0519a:844_2: ca niyyanti, dveyeva puggalā dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya, dukkhāya paṭipadāya
atk-s0519a:844_3: dandhābhiññāya ca niyyanti, ime cattāro. Te visesena dve honti diṭṭhicarito ca taṇhācarito
atk-s0519a:844_4: ca. Ime cattāro hutvā tayo honti, tayo hutvā dve honti. Imesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ
atk-s0519a:844_5: ayaṃ saṃkileso – avijjā ca taṇhā ca ahirīkañca anottappañca asati ca asampajaññañca
atk-s0519a:844_6: nīvaraṇāni ca saṃyojanāni ca ajjhosānañca abhiniveso ca ahaṃkāro ca mamaṃkāro ca
atk-s0519a:844_7: assaddhiyañca dovacassatā ca kosajjañca ayonisomanasikāro ca vicikicchā ca avijjā
atk-s0519a:845: Tattha avijjā ca ahirīkañca asati ca nīvaraṇāni ca ajjhosānañca ahaṃkāro ca assaddhiyañca kosajjañca vicikicchā ca asaddhammassavanañca, ayaṃ ekā disā.
atk-s0519a:846_0: Taṇhā ca anottappañca asampajaññañca saṃyojanāni ca abhiniveso ca mamaṃkāro ca dovacassatā
atk-s0519a:846_1: ca ayonisomanasikāro ca avijjā ca asamāpatti ca, ayaṃ dutiyā disā. Dasannaṃ dukānaṃ
atk-s0519a:846_2: dasa padāni paṭhamā disāti kātabbāni. Saṃkhittena atthaṃ ñāpenti paṭipakkhe kaṇhapakkhassa
atk-s0519a:846_3: dasannaṃ dukānaṃ dasa padāni dutiyakāni, ayaṃ dutiyā disā.
atk-s0519a:847_0: Tattha katamo kusalapakkho? Samatho ca vipassanā ca vijjā ca caraṇañca sati ca sampajaññañca
atk-s0519a:847_1: hirī ca ottappañca ahaṃkārappahānañca mamaṃkārappahānañca sammāvāyāmo ca yonisomanasikāro
atk-s0519a:847_2: ca sammāsati ca sammāsamādhi ca paññā ca nibbidā ca samāpatti ca saddhammassavanañca
atk-s0519a:848_0: Dasannaṃ dukānaṃ samathādīni somanassapariyosānāni paṭhamāni dasa padāni paṭhamā
atk-s0519a:848_1: disā, vipassanādīni dhammānudhammapaṭipattipariyosānāni dutiyāni dasa padāni dutiyā
atk-s0519a:848_2: disā. Iti akusalapakkhe kusalapakkhe ca nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa catasso disā.
atk-s0519a:849_0: Tāsu kusalapakkhe samathādīhi akusalapakkhe taṇhādayo pahānaṃ gacchanti, tesaṃ pahānā
atk-s0519a:849_1: rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, kusalapakkhe vipassanādīhi akusalapakkhe avijjādayo pahānaṃ
atk-s0519a:849_2: gacchanti, tesaṃ pahānā avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti. Iti imā dve vimuttiyo nandiyāvaṭṭanaye pariyosānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:850_0: Tattha taṇhā avijjā samatho vipassanāti cattāri padāni, tesu aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni
atk-s0519a:850_1: samosaranti. Kathaṃ? Samatho ca alobho ca adoso ca asubhasaññā ca dukkhasaññā cāti
atk-s0519a:850_2: imāni pañca padāni samathaṃ bhajanti, vipassanā ca amoho ca aniccasaññā ca anattasaññā
atk-s0519a:850_3: cāti imāni cattāri padāni vipassanaṃ bhajanti. Evaṃ nava padāni kusalāni dvīsu padesu
atk-s0519a:850_4: samosaranti. Taṇhā ca lobho ca doso ca subhasaññā ca sukhasaññā cāti imāni pañca
atk-s0519a:850_5: padāni taṇhaṃ bhajanti, avijjā ca moho ca niccasaññā ca attasaññā cāti imāni cattāri
atk-s0519a:850_6: padāni avijjaṃ bhajanti. Evaṃ nava padāni akusalāni dvīsu padesu samosaranti. Iti
atk-s0519a:850_7: tipukkhalo ca sīhavikkīḷito ca nandiyāvaṭṭanayaṃ anuppavisanti.
atk-s0519a:851_0: Kathaṃ tipukkhale naye itare dve nayā anuppavisanti? Vipassanā ca amoho ca aniccasaññā
atk-s0519a:851_1: ca anattasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni amoho, samatho ca alobho ca asubhasaññā
atk-s0519a:851_2: ca dukkhasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni alobho, adoso adoso eva. Evaṃ nava padāni
atk-s0519a:851_3: kusalāni tīsu padesu samosaranti. Taṇhā ca lobho ca subhasaññā ca sukhasaññā cāti
atk-s0519a:851_4: imāni cattāri padāni lobho, avijjā ca moho ca niccasaññā ca attasaññā cāti imāni
atk-s0519a:851_5: cattāri padāni moho, doso doso eva. Evaṃ nava padāni akusalāni tīsu padesu samosaranti.
atk-s0519a:851_6: Iti tipukkhale naye itare dve nayā anuppavisanti.
atk-s0519a:852_0: Kathaṃ catūsu padesu aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni samosaranti? Taṇhā ca subhasaññā ca, ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:852_1: paṭhamo vipallāso. Lobho ca sukhasaññā ca, ayaṃ dutiyo vipallāso. Avijjā ca niccasaññā
atk-s0519a:852_2: ca, ayaṃ tatiyo vipallāso. Moho ca attasaññā ca, ayaṃ catuttho vipallāso. Iti nava
atk-s0519a:852_3: padāni akusalāni catūsu padesu samosaranti. Samatho ca asubhasaññā ca paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a:852_4: alobho ca dukkhasaññā ca dutiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ, vipassanā ca aniccasaññā ca tatiyaṃ
atk-s0519a:852_5: satipaṭṭhānaṃ, amoho ca anattasaññā ca catutthaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Iti nava padāni kusalāni
atk-s0519a:852_6: catūsu padesu samosaranti. Evaṃ sīhavikkīḷitanaye itare dve nayā anuppavisanti. Tiṇṇañhi
atk-s0519a:852_7: nayānaṃ yā bhūmiyo gocaro, so ekekaṃ nayaṃ anuppavisati. Tasmā ekekassa nayassa akusale
atk-s0519a:852_8: vā dhamme viññāte kusale vā paṭipakkho anvesitabbo. Paṭipakkhaṃ anvesitvā so nayo
atk-s0519a:852_9: niddisitabbo. Tamhi naye niddiṭṭhe yathā ekamhi naye itaresaṃ nayānaṃ mūlapadāni
atk-s0519a:852_10: anuppaviṭṭhāni, tato tato nīharitvā niddisitabbāni. Ekekasmiñhi naye aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni anuppaviṭṭhāni.
atk-s0519a:853_0: Tattha ekekasmiṃ dhamme viññāte sabbe dhammā viññātā honti. Imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ nayānaṃ
atk-s0519a:853_1: sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa cattāri phalāni pariyosānaṃ paṭhamāya disāya paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ,
atk-s0519a:853_2: dutiyāya disāya dutiyaṃ phalaṃ, tatiyāya disāya tatiyaṃ phalaṃ, catutthāya disāya
atk-s0519a:854: Tipukkhalassa nayassa tayo vimokkhā pariyosānaṃ paṭhamāya disāya appaṇihito, dutiyāya suññato, tatiyāya animitto vimokkho pariyosānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:855_0: Nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa dve vimuttiyo pariyosānaṃ paṭhamāya disāya taṇhāvirāgā cetovimutti,
atk-s0519a:855_1: dutiyāya disāya avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti pariyosānaṃ. Imesu tīsu nayesu yā aṭṭhārasannaṃ
atk-s0519a:855_2: padānaṃ ālocanā, ayaṃ disālocano nayo. Yā āloketvā kusalapakkhe akusalapakkhe ca
atk-s0519a:855_3: “ayaṃ dhammo imaṃ dhammaṃ bhajatī”ti jānantena sammā yojanā, ayaṃ aṅkuso nayoti ime pañca nayā.
atk-s0519a:858_0: 89. Evaṃ sabbathā nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ vibhajitvā idāni sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ vibhajanto yasmā
atk-s0519a:858_1: saṅgahavārādīsu mūlapadeheva paṭṭhānaṃ saṅgahetvā sarūpato na dassitaṃ, tasmā yathā
atk-s0519a:858_2: mūlapadehi paṭṭhānaṃ niddhāretabbaṃ, evaṃ paṭṭhānatopi mūlapadāni niddhāretabbānīti
atk-s0519a:858_3: dassanatthaṃ “aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbā? Sāsanapaṭṭhāne”ti āha. Mūlapadasāsanapaṭṭhānānañhi
atk-s0519a:858_4: aññamaññasaṅgaho pubbe dassito evāti. Atha sāsanapaṭṭhānanti ko vacanattho? Sāsanassa
atk-s0519a:858_5: paṭṭhānanti sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ, sāsanaṃ desanā, tassā veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:858_6: pakārehi ṭhānaṃ pavatti sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ. Idha pana tassa tathābhāvadīpanaṃ “sāsanapaṭṭhāna”nti
atk-s0519a:858_7: veditabbaṃ. Atha vā sāsanaṃ adhisīlasikkhādayo. Tesaṃ pavattanupāyabhāvato patiṭṭhahanti
atk-s0519a:858_8: etehīti paṭṭhānāni, saṃkilesādidhammā. Tesaṃ pavedanato tadupacārena suttāni paṭṭhānāni.
atk-s0519a:858_9: Tesaṃ pana samūhabhāvato ayaṃ pakaraṇappadeso paṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0519a:859_0: Aparo nayo – kenaṭṭhena paṭṭhānaṃ? Paṭṭhitaṭṭhena gamanaṭṭhenāti attho. “Ye te goṭṭhā
atk-s0519a:859_1: paṭṭhitagāvo”ti āgataṭṭhānasmiñhi yena paṭṭhānena te “goṭṭhā paṭṭhitagāvo”ti vuttā,
atk-s0519a:859_2: taṃ atthato gamanaṃ hoti. Iti nātivitthāritanayesu hāranayesu anissaṅgagamanassa
atk-s0519a:859_4: nissaṅgavasena pavattagamanattā te saṃkilesabhāgiyādayo lokiyādayo ca visuṃ visuṃ
atk-s0519a:859_5: vomissā ca adhikaraṇavasena paṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Tesaṃ pakāsanato ayaṃ pakaraṇappadeso
atk-s0519a:860_1: pavattaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ. Vāsanā puññabhāvanā, vāsanābhāge pavattaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ,
atk-s0519a:860_2: vāsanaṃ bhajāpetīti vā vāsanābhāgiyaṃ. Nibbijjhanaṃ lobhakkhandhādīnaṃ padālanaṃ
atk-s0519a:860_3: nibbedho. Nibbedhabhāge pavattaṃ, nibbedhaṃ bhajāpetīti vā nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ. Pariniṭṭhitasikkhādhammā
atk-s0519a:860_4: asekkhā, asekkhabhāve pavattaṃ, asekkhe bhajāpetīti vā asekkhabhāgiyaṃ. Tesu yattha
atk-s0519a:860_5: taṇhādisaṃkileso vibhatto, idaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ. Yattha dānādipuññakiriyavatthu
atk-s0519a:860_6: vibhattaṃ, idaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ. Yattha sekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo vibhattā, idaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ.
atk-s0519a:860_7: Yattha pana asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo vibhattā, idaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ. Itarāni tesaṃ
atk-s0519a:861_0: Tāni pana cha dukā cattāro tikā ekaṃ catukkaṃ aparampi ekaṃ catukkanti dvādasa honti.
atk-s0519a:861_1: Tesu cattāro dukā dve ca tikā uddhaṭā, itare na uddhaṭā, anuddharaṇe kāraṇaṃ natthi.
atk-s0519a:861_2: Iminā nayena tepi gahetuṃ sakkāti pāḷiyaṃ saṃkhittāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati
atk-s0519a:861_3: – “imāni cattāri suttāni, sādhāraṇāni katāni aṭṭha bhavantī”tiādi. Tattha yasmā katthaci
atk-s0519a:861_4: sutte taṇhāsaṃkilesova niddisīyati, katthaci diṭṭhisaṃkilesova, katthaci duccaritasaṃkilesova
atk-s0519a:861_5: niddisīyati, tasmā saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ tidhā vibhajitvā uddiṭṭhaṃ “taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ
atk-s0519a:861_6: sutta”ntiādinā. Tathā vodānaṃ nāma saṃkilese sati hotīti vodānabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesavibhāgena
atk-s0519a:861_7: tidhāva uddiṭṭhaṃ “taṇhāvodānabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādinā. Taṃ pana atthato vāsanābhāgiyādi
atk-s0519a:861_8: eva hoti. Ayañca nayo kesuci potthakesu natthi.
atk-s0519a:862_1: visayadassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ. Tattha yadi āsatti uppajjati bhavesūti bhavesu chandarāgaṃ
atk-s0519a:862_2: pajahituṃ asakkontassa yadi bhavapatthanā uppajjati. Evaṃ sāyanti evamassa puggalassa
atk-s0519a:862_4: Tatrūpapattiyā saṃvattatīti tatra tatra bhave upapattiyā saṃvattati. Imāni cattāri
atk-s0519a:862_5: suttānīti imāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādīni cattāri suttāni. Sādhāraṇāni katānīti saṃkilesabhāgiyañca
atk-s0519a:862_7: vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañcāti evaṃ padantarasaṃyojanavasena missitāni katāni.
atk-s0519a:862_8: Aṭṭha bhavantīti purimāni cattāri imāni cattārīti evaṃ aṭṭha bhavanti.
atk-s0519a:863_0: Tāniyeva aṭṭha suttāni sādhāraṇāni katāni soḷasa bhavantīti tāniyeva yathāvuttāni
atk-s0519a:863_1: aṭṭha suttāni vāsanābhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca, asekkhabhāgiyañca
atk-s0519a:863_6: na asekkhabhāgiyañcāti evaṃ sādhāraṇāni katāni purimāni aṭṭha imāni aṭṭhāti soḷasa
atk-s0519a:863_7: bhavanti. Tesu cattāro ekakā, cha dukā, cattāro tikā, eko catukko, aparopi eko catukkoti
atk-s0519a:863_8: ayampi vibhāgo veditabbo. Tatthāpi dve dukā, dve tikā, dve catukkā ca pāḷiyaṃ anāgatāti veditabbā.
atk-s0519a:864_0: Idāni imassa paṭṭhānassa sakalasāsanasaṅgahitabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “imehi soḷasahi suttehi
atk-s0519a:864_1: bhinnehi navavidhaṃ suttaṃ bhinnaṃ bhavatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tassattho – imehi saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi
atk-s0519a:864_2: soḷasahi suttehi paṭṭhānanayena vibhattehi suttageyyādinavavidhaṃ pariyattisāsanasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a:864_3: suttaṃ bhinnaṃ soḷasadhā vibhattaṃ hoti. Iminā soḷasavidhena paṭṭhānena asaṅgahito
atk-s0519a:864_4: pariyattisāsanassa padeso natthīti adhippāyo. Kathaṃ pana saṃkilesabhāgiyādibhāvo
atk-s0519a:864_5: gahetabboti? Āha “gāthāya gāthā anuminitabbā”tiādi. Tattha gāthāya gāthā anuminitabbāti
atk-s0519a:864_6: ayaṃ gāthā viya gāthā saṃkilesabhāgiyāti vā vāsanābhāgiyāti vā nibbedhabhāgiyāti
atk-s0519a:864_7: vā asekkhabhāgiyāti vā anuminitabbā, anu anu minitvā takketvā jānitabbāti attho.
atk-s0519a:864_8: Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Ettha ca gāthāveyyākaraṇavinimuttā sabbā pariyatti “suttenā”tipadena
atk-s0519a:865_0: 90. Idāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādīni suttāni yathāniddiṭṭhāni udāharaṇavasena vibhāvetuṃ
atk-s0519a:865_1: “tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha “kāmandhā jālasañchannā”ti
atk-s0519a:865_2: gāthāya attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Yathā imassa, evaṃ ito parānampi heṭṭhā vuttatthānaṃ
atk-s0519a:866_0: Agatigamanānīti kāyādīhi ayuttagamanāni, akattabbakaraṇānīti attho. Chandāti chandahetu
atk-s0519a:866_1: icchāpaccayā. Agatiṃ gacchatīti agantabbaṃ gatiṃ gacchati, akattabbaṃ karotīti attho.
atk-s0519a:866_2: Dhammanti sādhūnaṃ ariyānaṃ dhammaṃ. Ativattatīti atimadditvā vītikkamati. Nihīyatīti
atk-s0519a:866_3: hāyati. Yasoti kitti ca parivāro ca.
atk-s0519a:867_0: “Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti gāthāyaṃ manoti yadipi kāmāvacarakusalādibhedaṃ sabbampi
atk-s0519a:867_1: catubhūmakacittaṃ mano, imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne cakkhupālattherassa purimajātiyaṃ vejjabhūtassa
atk-s0519a:867_2: uppannavasena niyamiyamānaṃ paṭighasampayuttacittameva labbhati. So mano pubbaṅgamo
atk-s0519a:867_3: etesanti manopubbaṅgamā, manasā paṭhamagāminā samannāgatāti attho. Dhammāti nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena
atk-s0519a:867_4: dhammā, te pana vedanādayo tayo arūpino khandhā. Ete hi manopubbaṅgamā. Kathaṃ panetehi
atk-s0519a:867_5: saddhiṃ ekasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ekasmiñca ārammaṇe ekakkhaṇe uppajjamāno mano pubbaṅgamo
atk-s0519a:867_6: nāma hotīti? Uppādapaccayaṭṭhena. Yathā hi bahūsu ekato gāmaghātādikammāni karontesu
atk-s0519a:867_7: “ko etesaṃ pubbaṅgamo”ti vutte yo tesaṃ paccayo hoti, yaṃ yaṃ nissāya te taṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0519a:867_8: karonti, so datto vā mitto vā tesaṃ pubbaṅgamoti vuccati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:867_9: Iti uppādapaccayaṭṭhena mano pubbaṅgamo etesanti manopubbaṅgamā. Na hi te mane anuppajjante
atk-s0519a:867_10: uppajjituṃ sakkuṇanti, mano pana ekaccesu cetasikesu anuppajjantesupi uppajjati eva.
atk-s0519a:868_0: Adhipativasena mano seṭṭho etesanti manoseṭṭhā. Yathā hi corādīnaṃ corajeṭṭhakādayo
atk-s0519a:868_1: adhipatino seṭṭhā, tathā tesampi mano seṭṭho. Yathā pana dāruādīhi nipphannāni bhaṇḍāni
atk-s0519a:868_2: dārumayādīni nāma honti, tathā etepi manato nipphannattā manomayā nāma. Paduṭṭhenāti
atk-s0519a:868_3: abhijjhādīhi dosehi paduṭṭhena dūsitena bhāsati vā karoti vā. So hi bhāsanto catubbidhaṃ
atk-s0519a:868_4: vacīduccaritameva bhāsati, karontopi tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritameva karoti, abhāsanto
atk-s0519a:868_5: akaronto tehi abhijjhādīhi paduṭṭhamanatāya tividhaṃ manoduccaritaṃ pūreti. Evamassa
atk-s0519a:868_6: dasa akusalakammapathā pāripūriṃ gacchanti. Tato naṃ dukkhamanvetīti tato tividhaduccaritato
atk-s0519a:868_7: taṃ puggalaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti duccaritānubhāvena catūsu apāyesu dukkhaṃ anugacchati.
atk-s0519a:868_8: Yathā kiṃ? Cakkaṃva vahato padanti, yathā nāma sakaṭaṃ vahato balībaddassa padaṃ
atk-s0519a:868_9: paharantaṃ cakkaṃ anugacchati, evaṃ naṃ puggalaṃ dukkhamanugacchatīti.
atk-s0519a:869_0: “Middhī yadā hotī”ti gāthāyaṃ middhīti thinamiddhābhibhūto. Mahagghasoti mahābhojano
atk-s0519a:869_3: Nivāpapuṭṭhoti kuṇḍakādinā sūkarabhattena puṭṭho. Gharasūkaro hi bālakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0519a:869_4: posiyamāno thūlasarīrakāle gehato bahi nikkhamituṃ alabhanto heṭṭhāmañcādīsu samparivattitvā
atk-s0519a:869_5: samparivattitvā assasanto passasanto sayateva. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadā puriso middhī
atk-s0519a:869_6: ca hoti mahagghaso ca, nivāpapuṭṭho mahāvarāho viya aññena iriyāpathena yāpetuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0519a:869_7: niddāsīlo saṃparivattasāyī, tadā so “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni manasi
atk-s0519a:869_8: kātuṃ na sakkoti. Tesaṃ amanasikārā mandapañño punappunaṃ gabbhaṃ upeti, gabbhavāsato na parimuccatīti.
atk-s0519a:870_0: “Ayasāva mala”nti gāthāyaṃ ayasāti ayato. Samuṭṭhitanti jātaṃ. Tatuṭṭhāyāti tato
atk-s0519a:870_1: uṭṭhahitvā. Atidhonacārinanti dhonā vuccati cattāro paccaye idamatthitāya alametenāti
atk-s0519a:870_2: paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanapaññā, taṃ atikkamitvā caranto atidhonacārī nāma. Idaṃ
atk-s0519a:870_3: vuttaṃ hoti – yathā ayato malaṃ samuṭṭhāya yato taṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ, tameva khādati vināseti,
atk-s0519a:870_4: evamevaṃ cattāro paccaye appaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantaṃ atidhonacārinaṃ sāni kammāni
atk-s0519a:870_5: attano santāne uṭṭhitattā attano santakāneva tāni kammāni duggatiṃ nayantīti.
atk-s0519a:871_0: “Coro yathā”ti gāthāyaṃ coro yathā sandhimukhe gahītoti yathā coro gharasandhiṃ chinditvā
atk-s0519a:871_1: gehaṃ pavisanto gharasandhimukhe eva rājapurisehi gahito. Sakammunā haññati bajjhate
atk-s0519a:871_2: cāti tena attanā katakammena kasābhitāḷanādinā haññati ceva addubandhanādinā bajjhati
atk-s0519a:871_3: ca. Evaṃ ayaṃ pecca pajā paratthāti evampi ayaṃ pāpakārinī pajā ito cavitvā paraloke.
atk-s0519a:871_4: Sakammunā haññati bajjhate cāti attanāva katena pāpakammena nirayādīsu nānappakārehi
atk-s0519a:872_0: “Sukhakāmānī”ti gāthāyaṃ yo daṇḍena vihiṃsatīti yo puggalo daṇḍena vā leḍḍuādīhi
atk-s0519a:872_1: vā vibādhati. Pecca so na labhe sukhanti so puggalo paraloke manussasukhaṃ vā dibbasukhaṃ
atk-s0519a:872_2: vā na labhati, nibbānasukhe pana vattabbameva natthi.
atk-s0519a:873_0: Gunnaṃ ce taramānānanti gāvīsu mahoghaṃ tarantīsu. Jimhaṃ gacchati puṅgavoti yadi
atk-s0519a:873_1: yūthapati usabho kuṭilaṃ gacchati. Sabbā tā jimhaṃ gacchantīti sabbāpi tā gāviyo
atk-s0519a:873_2: kuṭilameva gacchanti. Kasmā? Nette jimhaṃ gate satīti nettari kuṭilaṃ gate sati,
atk-s0519a:873_3: nettassa kuṭilaṃ gatattāti attho. So hi tāsaṃ paccayiko upaddavaharo ca.
atk-s0519a:874_0: “Evameva”nti gāthāyaṃ yathā cetaṃ, evamevaṃ yo manussesu padhānasammato, yadi so
atk-s0519a:874_1: adhammacārī siyā. Ye tassa anujīvino, sabbepi adhammikāva honti. Sāmisampadā hi pakatisampadaṃ
atk-s0519a:874_2: sampādeti. Yasmā ca etadeva, tasmā sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ seti, rājā ce hoti adhammiko.
atk-s0519a:874_3: Sukiccharūpā vatāti suṭṭhu kicchāpannarūpā vata. Upadhīsūti kāmaguṇūpadhīsu. Rattāti
atk-s0519a:875_0: Kukkuccajanakeneva pattavaṭṭippabhavassa upacchinnattā phaluppatti kadaliyā parābhavāya
atk-s0519a:875_1: hotīti āha – “phalaṃ ve kadaliṃ hantī”ti. Tathā phalapariyosānattā osadhīnaṃ “phalaṃ
atk-s0519a:875_2: veḷuṃ phalaṃ naḷa”nti vuttaṃ. Vaḷavāya kucchismiṃ gadrabhassa jātā assatarī nāma,
atk-s0519a:875_3: sā gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā kāle sampatte vijāyituṃ na sakkoti. Pādehi bhūmiṃ paharantī tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0519a:875_4: athassa cattāro pāde catūsu khāṇukesu bandhitvā kucchiṃ phāletvā potakaṃ nīharanti,
atk-s0519a:875_5: sā tattheva marati. Tena vuttaṃ – “gabbho assatariṃ yathā”ti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti –
atk-s0519a:875_6: yathā attano phalaṃ kadaliveḷunaḷepi vināseti, gabbho ca assatariṃ, evaṃ attano kammaphalabhūto
atk-s0519a:876_0: Kodhamakkhagarūti kujjhanalakkhaṇaṃ kodhaṃ, paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇaṃ makkhañca garuṃ
atk-s0519a:876_1: katvā uddhaṃ katvā ukkhipitvā caranto. Sukhetteti sukhettepi. Pūtibījaṃvāti pūtibhāvaṃ
atk-s0519a:876_2: gataṃ bījaṃ viya. Chakaṇarasādiparibhāvanasukkhāpanasukhasayādīni akaraṇena bījadosaduṭṭhanti attho.
atk-s0519a:877: 91. Cetasāti attano cittena. Cetoti tassa puggalassa cittaṃ. Pariccāti paricchinditvā. Iriyatīti pavattati. Yathābhatanti yathā kiñci āharitvā ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0519a:878: Mākatthāti mā akattha. Na pamutyatthīti pamokkho natthi. Upeccāpīti sañciccāpi, buddhipubbenāpīti attho.
atk-s0519a:879_1: Tenevāha – “ekaṃ dhammaṃ atītassā”tiādi, tathā “evaṃ parittaṃ kho, rāhula, tesaṃ
atk-s0519a:879_2: sāmaññaṃ, yesaṃ natthi sampajānamusāvāde lajjā”tiādi. Taṃ kathaṃ nu bhavissatīti
atk-s0519a:879_3: taṃ dhanaṃ kena nu pakārena tesaṃ bhavissati. Adhammena tesaṃ sambhatattā tesu naciraṭṭhitikaṃ
atk-s0519a:879_4: hotīti attho. Antarāyā su bhavissantīti adhammiyavohārādito rājantarāyādayo bhavissanti.
atk-s0519a:879_5: Sūti nipātamattaṃ. Sambhatassa vinassatīti imassa sambhataṃ sajjitaṃ vinassati. Sagganti
atk-s0519a:879_6: sugatiṃ. Sā hi rūpādīhi sobhanehi aggoti saggoti adhippetā. Ettāvatāti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānaṃ
atk-s0519a:880: Vivaṭṭateti nivaṭṭati. Lobhā khaṇati attānanti lobhahetu apuññāni karonto kāyavisamādiyogena attānaṃ khaṇati nāma. Mittehi jīratīti mittabhāvehi hāyati.
atk-s0519a:881_0: Carantīti catūhi iriyāpathehi akusalameva karontā vicaranti. Bālāti idhalokatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:881_1: paralokatthañca ajānantā idha bālā nāma. Dummedhāti nippaññā. Na hi paññāya duṭṭhattaṃ
atk-s0519a:881_2: nāma atthi. Amittenevāti amittabhūtena viya verinā viya hutvā. Kaṭukapphalanti tikhiṇaphalaṃ,
atk-s0519a:881_3: dukkhaphalanti attho. Na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, yaṃ katvā anutappatīti yaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0519a:881_4: nirayādīsu nibbattanasamatthaṃ dukkhudayaṃ katvā anussaritānussaritakkhaṇe anutappati
atk-s0519a:881_5: anusocati, taṃ kataṃ na sādhu na sundaraṃ na bhaddakaṃ. Yassa assumukhoti yassa assūhi
atk-s0519a:882_1: dukkaraṃ. Samādānato paṭṭhāya khaṇḍaṃ akatvā visesato ādibrahmacariyakassa carimakacittaṃ
atk-s0519a:882_2: pāpetabbatāya duttitikkhaṃ, sīlasaṃvarādayo vā aparikkhate katvā sampādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya
atk-s0519a:882_3: dukkaraṃ. Adhivāsetabbānaṃ pana dussahanato khantisaṃvaraṃvasena duttitikkhaṃ. Abyattenāti
atk-s0519a:882_4: mandapaññena. Sāmaññanti samaṇabhāvo. Tatthāti tassa sāmaññassa. Sambādhāti dunnivatthaduppārutamātugāmādisammaddā.
atk-s0519a:882_6: Atha vā dukkarantipadassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ duttitikkhanti vuttaṃ. Duttitikkhanti dukkhamaṃ
atk-s0519a:882_7: duradhivāsiyaṃ. Abyattenāti bālena. Sāmaññanti samaṇadhammo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃ
atk-s0519a:882_8: paṇḍitā kulaputtā dasapi vassāni vīsatipi…pe… saṭṭhipi vassāni dantebhi dantamādhāya
atk-s0519a:882_9: jivhāya tāluṃ āhacca cetasā cittaṃ abhiniggaṇhitvā ekāsanaṃ ekabhattaṃ paṭisevamānā
atk-s0519a:882_10: āpāṇakoṭikaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carantā sāmaññaṃ karonti, taṃ bālā abyattā kātuṃ na sakkontīti.
atk-s0519a:882_11: Bahūhi tattha sambādhāti tasmiṃ sāmaññasaṅkhāte ariyamagge bahū sambādhā, maggādhigamāya
atk-s0519a:883_0: Appameyyaṃ paminantoti appameyyaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalaṃ “ettakasīlo ayaṃ ettakasamādhi
atk-s0519a:883_1: ettakapañño”ti evaṃ minanto. Kodha vidvā vikappayeti ko idha vidvā medhāvī vikappeyya,
atk-s0519a:883_2: khīṇāsavova khīṇāsavaṃ minanto vikappeyyāti dīpeti. Nivutaṃ maññeti yo pana puthujjano
atk-s0519a:883_3: minetuṃ ārabhati, taṃ nivutaṃ avakujjapaññaṃ maññāmi. Akissavanti kissavā vuccati
atk-s0519a:884_0: Kuṭhārīti attacchedakaṭṭhena kuṭhārisadisī pharusavācā. Chindatīti kusalamūlasaṅkhāte
atk-s0519a:884_1: mūleyeva nikantati. Visaṃ halāhalaṃ ivāti halāhalasaṅkhātaṃ visaṃ iva. Evaṃ viraddhaṃ
atk-s0519a:884_2: pātetīti viraddhaṃ aparaddhaṃ khalitapuggalaṃ evaṃ apāyesu vinipāteti. Vācā dubbhāsitā
atk-s0519a:885_0: 92. Nindiyanti nindanīyaṃ. Taṃ vā nindati yo pasaṃsiyoti yo guṇavisiṭṭhatāya pasaṃsāraho
atk-s0519a:885_1: puggalo, taṃ vā so pāpicchatādīni āropetvā garahati. Vicinātīti upacināti. Kalinti
atk-s0519a:885_2: aparādhaṃ. Ayaṃ kalīti ayaṃ aparādho. Akkhesūti jūtakīḷanakkhesu. Sabbassāpi sahāpi
atk-s0519a:885_3: attanāti sabbena attano dhanenāpi attanāpi saddhiṃ. Sugatesūti sobhanagamanattā,
atk-s0519a:885_4: sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā, sammā gatattā, sammā ca gadattā sugatasaṅkhātesu buddhādīsu.
atk-s0519a:885_5: Manaṃ padosayeti yo manaṃ padoseyya, tassa ayaṃ manopadoso eva mahattaro kalīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0519a:885_6: hoti. Kasmā? Yasmā sataṃ sahassānaṃ…pe… pāpakanti. Tattha sataṃ sahassānanti nirabbudagaṇanāya
atk-s0519a:885_7: satasahassaṃ. Chattiṃsatīti aparāni chattiṃsati nirabbudāni. Pañca cāti abbudagaṇanāya
atk-s0519a:885_8: pañca ca abbudāni. Tasmā vassagaṇanāya ettako so kālo, yaṃ kālaṃ ariyagarahivācaṃ
atk-s0519a:885_9: manañca paṇidhāya pāpakaṃ nirayaṃ upeti, tattha paccatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Idañca saṅkhepena
atk-s0519a:885_10: padumaniraye āyuppamāṇaṃ, vitthārena pana parato āgamissati.
atk-s0519a:886_0: Lobhaguṇeti “guṇo”ti bālehi diṭṭhattā, anekakkhattuṃ pavattitattā ca lobhoyeva lobhaguṇo,
atk-s0519a:886_1: tasmiṃ lobhaguṇe, taṇhāyāti attho. Anuyuttoti anu anu yutto. Avadaññūti avacanaññū,
atk-s0519a:886_2: buddhānampi ovādassa aggahaṇato. Maccharīti pañcavidhamacchariyena maccharī. Pesuṇiyaṃ
atk-s0519a:886_3: anuyuttoti pesuṇiyasmiṃ anuyutto aggasāvakānaṃ bhedanena. Kokālikañhi mīyamānaṃ ovadantena
atk-s0519a:886_4: āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena bhāsitā imā gāthāti. Mukhaduggāti mukhavisama. Vibhūtāti
atk-s0519a:886_5: vigatabhūta alikavādi. Anariyāti asappurisa. Bhūnahūti bhūtihanaka attano buddhivināsaka.
atk-s0519a:886_6: Purisantāti purisādhama. Kalīti alakkhipurisa. Avajātakaputtāti buddhassa bhagavato
atk-s0519a:886_7: avajātaputta. Mā bahubhāṇidha nerayikosīti idāni bahubhāṇī mā hohi, nerayiko asi
atk-s0519a:886_8: jāto. Rajamākirasīti kilesarajaṃ attani pakkhipasi. Santeti samitakilese khīṇāsave.
atk-s0519a:887: Idaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyanti idaṃ taṇhādīnaṃ sabhāvabhedato avatthābhedato ca anekabhedakaṃ dassetuṃ anekehi suttapadehi udāharaṇavasena dassitaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:889_0: 93. Iddhanti hatthūpagasīsūpagādialaṅkārehi maṇikanakādīhi ca samiddhaṃ. Phītanti
atk-s0519a:889_1: telamadhuphāṇitādīhi ca dhanadhaññādīhi ca vipulaṃ. Ākiṇṇamanussanti nirantaramanussaṃ.
atk-s0519a:889_2: Sambādhabyūhanti byūhā vuccanti anibbiddharacchāyo. Yesu paviṭṭhamaggeneva niggacchanti,
atk-s0519a:889_3: te sambādhā byūhakā etthāti sambādhabyūhaṃ. Imināpi tassa nagarassa ghanavāsameva
atk-s0519a:889_4: dīpeti. Bhantenāti damathaṃ anupagatena, ito cito ca paribbhamantena vā. Apāpakanti
atk-s0519a:889_5: alāmakaṃ. Aveccappasādenāti acalappasādena, saccappaṭivedhato āgatena pasādena.
atk-s0519a:890: Pecca so labhateti yo bhūte daṇḍena na hiṃsati, so puggalo paraloke manussabhūto manussasukhaṃ devabhūto dibbasukhaṃ ubhayaṃ atikkanto nibbānasukhaṃ labhatīti attho.
atk-s0519a:891_0: 94. Cārikaṃ pakkamissatīti janapadacārikaṃ gamissati. Kasmā pana bhagavā janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0519a:891_1: caratīti? Sattahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto janapadacārikaṃ caranti – desantaragatānaṃ
atk-s0519a:891_2: veneyyānaṃ vinayanattaṃ, tatra ṭhitānaṃ ussukkasamuppādanaṃ, bhāvakānaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0519a:891_3: nibaddhavāsapariharaṇaṃ attano ca tattha anāsaṅgadassanaṃ, sambuddhavasitaṭṭhānatāya
atk-s0519a:891_4: desānaṃ cetiyabhāvasampādanaṃ, bahūnaṃ sattānaṃ dassanūpasaṅkamanādīhi puññoghappasavanaṃ,
atk-s0519a:891_5: avuṭṭhiādiupaddavūpasamanañcāti imehi sattahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0519a:892_0: Isidattapurāṇāti isidatto ca purāṇo ca, tesu isidatto sakadāgāmī. Purāṇo sotāpanno.
atk-s0519a:892_1: Sāketeti “sāketo”ti laddhanāme attano bhogagāmake. Magge purisaṃ ṭhapesunti tesaṃ
atk-s0519a:892_2: kira gāmadvārena bhagavato gamanamaggo, tasmā “sace bhagavā amhākaṃ suttānaṃ vā pamattānaṃ
atk-s0519a:892_3: vā gaccheyya, atha passituṃ na labheyyāmā”ti maggamajjhe purisaṃ ṭhapesuṃ. Anubandhiṃsūti
atk-s0519a:892_4: na dūratova, piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhiṃsu. Bhagavā hi sakaṭamaggassa majjhe jaṅghamaggena
atk-s0519a:892_5: agamāsi, itare ubhosu passesu anugacchantā agamaṃsu. Maggā okkammāti buddhā hi kenaci
atk-s0519a:892_6: saddhiṃ gacchantāva paṭisanthāraṃ karonti kenaci saddhiṃ ṭhitā kenaci saddhiṃ divasabhāgampi
atk-s0519a:892_7: nisinnā, tasmā bhagavā cintesi – “ime mayhaṃ sāsane vallabhā āgataphalā, imehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0519a:892_8: nisīditvā divasabhāgaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karissāmī”ti. Maggato okkamitvā yenaññataraṃ
atk-s0519a:892_9: rukkhamūlaṃ tenupasaṅkami. Paññatte āsane nisīdīti te kira chattupāhanakattaradaṇḍapādabbhañjanatelāni
atk-s0519a:892_10: ceva aṭṭhavidhañca pānakaṃ sarabhapādapallaṅkañca gāhāpetvā āgamaṃsu. Atha naṃ pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0519a:892_11: paññapetvā adaṃsu. Satthā tattha nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsūti “chattupāhanādīni
atk-s0519a:892_12: bhikkhusaṅghassa dethā”ti vatvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0519a:893_0: Sāvatthiyā kosalesu cārikaṃ pakkamissatītiādi sabbaṃ majjhimadesavaseneva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:893_1: Kasmā? Niyatāciṇṇattā. Bhagavato hi cārikacaraṇaṃ majjhimadeseyeva. Sacepi paccantadese
atk-s0519a:893_2: gacchati, majjhimadeseyeva aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetīti niyatāciṇṇaṃ, tasmā majjhimadesavaseneva
atk-s0519a:893_3: vuttaṃ. Kāsīsūti kāsiraṭṭhato. Tathā magadhesūti magadharaṭṭhato. Āsanne no bhagavā
atk-s0519a:893_4: bhavissatīti ettha na kevalaṃ āsannattā eva tesaṃ somanassaṃ hoti, atha kho “idāni
atk-s0519a:893_5: dānaṃ dātuṃ gandhamālādipūjaṃ kātuṃ dhammaṃ sotuṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ labhissāmā”ti
atk-s0519a:894_0: Tasmātiha thapatayo sambādho gharāvāsoti thapatayo yasmā tumhākaṃ mayi dūrībhūte
atk-s0519a:894_1: anappakaṃ domanassaṃ āsanne anappakaṃ somanassaṃ hoti, tasmāpi veditabbametaṃ “sambādho
atk-s0519a:894_2: gharāvāso”ti. Gharāvāsassa hi dosena tumhākaṃ evaṃ hoti. Sace pana gharāvāsaṃ pahāya
atk-s0519a:894_3: pabbajitā assatha, evaṃ vo mayā saddhiṃyeva gacchantānañca āgacchantānañca taṃ na
atk-s0519a:894_4: bhaveyyāti imamatthaṃ dīpento evamāha. Tattha sakiñcanasapalibodhaṭṭhena sambādhatā
atk-s0519a:894_5: veditabbā. Mahāghare vasantassāpi hi sakiñcanasapalibodhaṭṭhena gharāvāso sambādhova.
atk-s0519a:894_6: Rajopathoti rāgādirajānaṃ āgamanapatho, āgamanaṭṭhānanti attho. Abbhokāso pabbajjāti
atk-s0519a:894_7: pabbajjā pana akiñcanaapalibodhaṭṭhena abbhokāso. Caturatanikepi hi gabbhe dvinnaṃ
atk-s0519a:894_8: bhikkhūnaṃ pallaṅkena pallaṅkaṃ ghaṭṭetvā nisinnānampi akiñcanāpalibodhaṭṭhena pabbajjā
atk-s0519a:894_9: abbhokāso nāma hoti. Alañca pana vo thapatayo appamādāyāti evaṃ sambādhagharāvāse
atk-s0519a:894_10: vasantānaṃ tumhākaṃ appamādameva kātuṃ yuttanti attho.
atk-s0519a:895_0: Nāgāti hatthino. Opavayhāti rañño ārohanayoggā. Ekaṃ purato ekaṃ pacchato nisīdāpemāti
atk-s0519a:895_1: te kira dvepi janā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā dvīsu nāgesu tā itthiyo evaṃ nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0519a:895_2: rañño nāgaṃ majjhe katvā ubhosu passesu gacchanti, tasmā evamāhaṃsu. Nāgopi rakkhitabboti
atk-s0519a:895_3: yathā kiñci visesitaṃ na karoti, evaṃ rakkhitabbo hoti. Tāpi bhaginiyoti yathā pamādaṃ
atk-s0519a:895_4: nāpajjanti, evaṃ rakkhitabbā honti. Attāpīti sitakathitavikkhepitādīni akarontehi
atk-s0519a:895_5: attāpi rakkhitabbo hoti. Evaṃ karonto hi “sāmidubbhako eso”ti niggahetabbo hoti.
atk-s0519a:896_0: Tasmātiha thapatayoti yasmā tumhe rājā niccaṃ rājabhaṇḍaṃ paṭicchāpeti, tasmāpi sambādho
atk-s0519a:896_1: gharāvāso rajopatho. Yasmā pana paṃsukūlikaṃ bhikkhuṃ evaṃ paṭicchāpento natthi,
atk-s0519a:896_2: tasmā abbhokāso pabbajjā, evaṃ sabbatthāpi. Alañca kho thapatayo appamādāya, appamādameva karothāti dasseti.
atk-s0519a:897_0: Muttacāgoti vissaṭṭhacāgo. Payatapāṇīti āgatāgatānaṃ dānatthāya dhotahattho. Vosaggaratoti
atk-s0519a:897_1: vosaggasaṅkhāte cāge rato. Yācayogoti yācitabbayutto. “Yājayogo”tipi pāṭho, dānayuttoti
atk-s0519a:897_2: attho. Dānasaṃvibhāgaratoti etena appamattakampi kiñci labhitvā tatopi saṃvibhāge
atk-s0519a:897_3: rato. Appaṭivibhattanti “idaṃ amhākaṃ bhavissati, idaṃ ayyāna”nti evaṃ akatavibhāgaṃ,
atk-s0519a:897_4: sabbaṃ dātabbameva hutvā ṭhitanti attho. Imehi kho thapatayo catūhi dhammehi samannāgato
atk-s0519a:897_5: ariyasāvako sotāpanno hotīti sotāpanno imehi dhammehi samannāgato hotīti attho. Etena
atk-s0519a:897_6: sotāpannena imesaṃ catunnaṃ dhammānaṃ ekantato labbhamānataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a:898: Evaṃ tesaṃ thapatīnaṃ imehi catūhi dhammehi samannāgataṃ pariyāyena dassetvā idāni nippariyāyena taṃ dassetuṃ “tumhe kho thapatayo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:899_0: 95. Sahassaṃ kappakoṭiyoti sahassaṃ attabhāvā ahesunti attho. “Asīti kappakoṭiyo”tipi
atk-s0519a:899_1: pāṭho, asītiāyukappakoṭiyo ahesunti attho. Kattha pana te ahesunti? Āha “deve ceva
atk-s0519a:899_2: manusse cā”ti, devesu ceva manussesu cāti attho. Saṃviruḷhamhīti samantato pallavaggahaṇena
atk-s0519a:899_3: viruḷhe. Alabhiṃhanti alabhiṃ ahaṃ. Ajja tiṃsaṃ tato kappāti tato kappato ajja sampati
atk-s0519a:899_4: ayaṃ kappo tiṃsatimo. Tassā saññāya vāsanāti tassa buddhagatāya saññāya vāsanato.
atk-s0519a:900_0: Taṇhānighātakoti taṇhāya samucchedako. Vaṭaṃsakoti pupphamayakaṇṇiko. Sabbapupphehilaṅkatoti
atk-s0519a:900_1: nānāpupphehi alaṅkato. Lapanantarāti uttarādharoṭṭhānaṃ antarato. Okkāti pabhā. Muddhanantaradhāyathāti
atk-s0519a:900_2: muddhani antaradhāyatha. Kaṅkhaṃ vitarāti vimatiṃ vinodehi. Yassa taṃ sabbadhammesu,
atk-s0519a:900_3: sadā ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti tanti nipātamattaṃ. Yassa sabbadhammesu ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhattā
atk-s0519a:900_4: sadā ñāṇaṃ pavattati. So sabbaññū bhagavā theraṃ ānandaṃ etadabravīti sambandho.
atk-s0519a:900_5: Rājā raṭṭhe bhavissatīti sabbasmiṃ raṭṭhe rājā bhavissati. Carimanti carimabhavaṃ.
atk-s0519a:900_6: Sacchikatvāti paccakkhaṃ katvā. Dhammatanti catusaccadhammaṃ, paccekabodhiṃ vā.
atk-s0519a:901_0: 96. Suvaṇṇacchadanaṃ nāvanti ubhosu passesu suvaṇṇālaṅkārehi paṭimaṇḍitavasena chāditaṃ
atk-s0519a:901_1: suvaṇṇanāvaṃ. Pañhaṃ puṭṭhā viyākāsi, sakkassa iti me sutanti yathā sā devatā pañhaṃ
atk-s0519a:901_2: puṭṭhā sakkassa byākāsi, evaṃ mayāpi sutanti āyasmā mahāmoggallāno attanā yathāsutaṃ
atk-s0519a:902: Paṃsuthūpesūti sarīradhātuṃ abbhantare ṭhapetvā paṃsūhi katathūpesu. Evañhi te bhagavantaṃ uddissakatā nāma honti, tenevāha – “uddissakatesu dasabaladharāna”nti.
atk-s0519a:903_1: Uḷāraṃ vata taṃ āsīti taṃ mayā kataṃ puññaṃ uḷāraṃ vata ahosi. Yāhanti yā ahaṃ. Satasahassaṃ
atk-s0519a:903_2: kappe, mudito thūpaṃ apūjesīti thūpaṃ pūjetvā satasahassaṃ āyukappe ahaṃ muditoti
atk-s0519a:903_3: attho. Anāgantuna vinipātanti apāyupapattiṃ anupagantvā. Yaṃ cakkhunti yaṃ paññācakkhuṃ.
atk-s0519a:903_4: Paṇihitanti ṭhapitaṃ. Vimuttacittamhīti vimuttacitto amhi. Vidhūtalatoti vidhūtataṇhālato,
atk-s0519a:904_0: 98. Sāmākapatthodanamattanti sāmākatiṇānaṃ nāḷikodanamattaṃ. Akhileti pañcannaṃ cetokhilānaṃ
atk-s0519a:904_1: abhāvena akhile. Tasmiñca okappayi dhammamuttamanti tasmiṃ paccekabuddhe uttamadhammaṃ
atk-s0519a:904_2: paccekabodhiṃ “uttamadhammena nāma imasmiṃ bhavitabba”nti saddahiṃ. “Tasmiñca dhamme
atk-s0519a:904_3: paṇidhesiṃ mānasa”nti iminā paṭiladdhadhammaṃ ahampi sacchikareyyanti cittaṃ paṇidahiṃ.
atk-s0519a:904_4: Bhave kudāsupi ca mā apekkhavāti katthaci bhave apekkhavā mā bhaveyyanti ca paṇidhesiṃ
atk-s0519a:905_0: Kurūsūti uttarakurūsu. Dīghāyukesūti tesaṃ vassasahassāyukatāya vuttaṃ. Amamesūti
atk-s0519a:905_1: apariggahesu. Pāṇīsūti sattesu. Ahīnagāmīsūti yathāladdhasampattīhi yāvatāyukaṃ aparihīnasabhāvesu.
atk-s0519a:905_2: Tidasopapajjathāti tāvatiṃso hutvā upapajjiṃ, tidase vā tāvatiṃsabhavane upapajjiṃ.
atk-s0519a:905_3: Visiṭṭhakāyūpagatoti visiṭṭhakāyesu nānāvaṇṇakāyesu upagato. Yasassisūti parivāravantesu.
atk-s0519a:905_4: Hitāhitāsihīti kusalākusale vītivattīhi. Paccakkhaṃ khvimanti paccakkhaṃ kho imaṃ
atk-s0519a:906: Sakāsīti so akāsi. Balimābhihārīti pūjābaliṃ abhihari. Patitassa ekanti tassa hatthato ekapupphaṃ patitaṃ.
atk-s0519a:907_0: Upariṭṭhanti upari vehāse ṭhitaṃ. Ariṭṭhanti ariṭṭhaṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ. Ajjhattañca
atk-s0519a:907_1: bahiddhā cāti ajjhattavisayā ca bahiddhavisayā ca. Ye me vijjiṃsūti ye me pubbe vijjamānā
atk-s0519a:907_2: ahesuṃ. Jātimaraṇasaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavoti punappunaṃ jāyanamīyanabhūto
atk-s0519a:907_3: saṃsāro punabbhavoti ca vuccati, so ca dāni natthīti attho.
atk-s0519a:908: Idaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttanti idaṃ vāsanābhāgapuññavibhāvanānaṃ nānāsuttapadānaṃ udāharaṇavasena dassitaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:909: 99. “Uddhaṃ adho…pe… apunabbhavāyā”ti idaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttanti vuttaṃ oghataraṇassa ariyamaggakiccattā. Na cetanā karaṇīyāti na cittaṃ uppādetabbaṃ. Dhammatāti dhammasabhāvo.
atk-s0519a:910_0: 100. Yadā haveti yasmiṃ have kāle. Pātubhavantīti uppajjanti. Dhammāti anulomapaccayākārapaṭivedhasādhakā
atk-s0519a:910_1: bodhipakkhiyadhammā. Pātubhavantīti vā pakāsenti, abhisamayavasena pākaṭā honti.
atk-s0519a:910_2: Dhammāti catuariyasaccadhammā. Ātāpo vuccati kilesasantāpanaṭṭhena vīriyaṃ. Ātāpinoti
atk-s0519a:910_4: ca jhānena jhāyantassa. Brāhmaṇassāti bāhitapāpassa khīṇāsavassa. Athassa kaṅkhā
atk-s0519a:910_5: vapayanti sabbāti athassa evaṃ pātubhūtadhammassa yā tā “ko nu kho, bhante, phusatīti?
atk-s0519a:910_6: No kallo pañhoti bhagavā avocā”tiādinā nayena “katamaṃ nu kho, bhante, jarāmaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a:910_7: kassa panidaṃ jarāmaraṇanti? No kallo pañhoti bhagavā avocā”tiādinā ca nayena paccayākārakaṅkhā
atk-s0519a:910_8: vuttā. Yā ca paccayākārasseva appaṭividdhattā “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādikā
atk-s0519a:910_9: soḷasakaṅkhā “buddhe kaṅkhati dhamme kaṅkhatī”tiādikā aṭṭha ca kaṅkhā āgatā, tā sabbā
atk-s0519a:910_10: vapayanti apagacchanti nirujjhanti, kasmā? Yato pajānāti sahetudhammaṃ, yasmā avijjādikena
atk-s0519a:910_11: hetunā sahetukaṃ imaṃ saṅkhārādiṃ kevalaṃ dukkhakkhandhadhammaṃ pajānāti aññāsi paṭivijjhati.
atk-s0519a:911_0: Yato khayaṃ paccayānaṃ avedīhi yasmā paccayānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ avedi aññāsi
atk-s0519a:911_1: paṭivijjhi, tasmā yadāssa ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa vuttappakārā dhammā pātubhavanti.
atk-s0519a:911_2: Athassa yā nibbānassa aviditattā kaṅkhā uppajjeyyuṃ, sabbāpi tā kaṅkhā vapayantīti.
atk-s0519a:912_0: Āraññanti āraññakaṃ. Aññātuñchena yāpentanti kulesu aññāto niccanavoyeva hutvā uñchena
atk-s0519a:912_1: piṇḍacariyāya yāpentaṃ. Atha vā abhilakkhitesu issarajanagehesu kaṭukabhaṇḍasambhāraṃ
atk-s0519a:912_2: sugandhabhojanaṃ pariyesantassa uñchanaṃ ñātuñchanaṃ nāma, gharapaṭipāṭiyā pana dvāre
atk-s0519a:912_3: ṭhitena laddhamissakabhojanaṃ aññātuñchanaṃ nāma. Idaṃ idha adhippetaṃ. Tena yāpentaṃ.
atk-s0519a:913_0: Chetvāti vadhitvā. Sukhaṃ setīti kodhapariḷāhena aparidayhamānattā sukhaṃ sayati.
atk-s0519a:913_1: Na socatīti kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanassattā na socati. Visamūlassāti dukkhavipākassa.
atk-s0519a:913_2: Madhuraggassāti yaṃ akkuṭṭhassa paccakkositvā pahaṭassa paṭippaharitvā sukhaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0519a:913_3: taṃ sandhāya so “madhuraggo”ti vutto. Imasmiñhi ṭhāne pariyosānaṃ “agga”nti vuttaṃ. Ariyāti buddhādayo.
atk-s0519a:914: Haneti haneyya. Uppatitanti asamugghāṭitaṃ avikkhambhituppannavasena samudācāruppannavasena samudācarantaṃ. Vinodayeti attano santānato nīhareyya.
atk-s0519a:915_0: 101. Sattiyāti desanāsīsametaṃ, ekatodhārādinā satthenāti attho. Omaṭṭhoti pahaṭo.
atk-s0519a:915_1: Cattāro hi pahārā omaṭṭho ummaṭṭho maṭṭho vimaṭṭhoti. Tattha upari ṭhatvā adhomukhaṃ
atk-s0519a:915_2: dinnappahāro omaṭṭho nāma, adho ṭhatvā uddhaṃ mukhaṃ dinnappahāro ummaṭṭho nāma,
atk-s0519a:915_3: aggaḷasūci viya vinivijjhitvā kato maṭṭho nāma, seso sabbopi vimaṭṭho nāma. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0519a:915_4: pana ṭhāne omaṭṭho gahito. So hi sabbadāruṇo duruddharaṇasallo duttikiccho antodoso
atk-s0519a:915_5: antopubbalohito ca hoti. Pubbalohitaṃ anikkhamitvā vaṇamukhaṃ pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0519a:915_6: Pubbalohitaṃ nīharitukāmehi mañcena saddhiṃ bandhitvā adhosiro kātabbo hoti, maraṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:915_7: vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ pāpuṇāti. Paribbajeti vihareyya.
atk-s0519a:916_0: Imāya gāthāya kiṃ kathitaṃ? Yathā sattiyā omaṭṭhapuriso sallubbāhanavaṇatikicchanānaṃ
atk-s0519a:916_1: atthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati payogaṃ karoti parakkamati. Yathā ca dayhamāne matthake
atk-s0519a:916_2: ādittasiro tassa nibbāpanatthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati payogaṃ karoti parakkamati, evamevaṃ
atk-s0519a:916_3: bhikkhu kāmarāgappahānāya sato appamatto hutvā vihareyya bhagavāti kathesi.
atk-s0519a:917_0: Evaṃ devatāya kathite atha bhagavā cintesi – “imāya devatāya upamā daḷhaṃ katvā ānītā,
atk-s0519a:917_1: atthaṃ pana parittakaṃ gahetvā ṭhitā. Punappunaṃ kathentīpi hi esā kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanappahānameva
atk-s0519a:917_2: katheyya, yāva ca kāmarāgo maggena na samugghāṭiyyati, tāva anubandhova hotī”ti tameva
atk-s0519a:917_3: upamaṃ gahetvā paṭhamamaggavasena devatāya vinivaṭṭetvā dassento “sattiyā viya omaṭṭho”ti
atk-s0519a:918_0: Lokāmisanti kāmaguṇo. Santipekkhoti sabbasaṅkhārūpasamaṃ nibbānaṃ apekkhamāno. Paññavāti
atk-s0519a:918_1: paññavanto. Pahitattoti nibbānaṃ patipesitacitto. Virato kāmasaññāyāti yāya kāyaci
atk-s0519a:918_3: pāṭho. Kāmasaññāyāti pana bhummavacanaṃ hoti. Sagāthāvagge “kāmasaññāsū”ti pāṭho.
atk-s0519a:918_4: Catūhi maggehi dasannampi saṃyojanānaṃ atītattā sabbasaṃyojanātīto. Catutthamaggeneva
atk-s0519a:918_5: vā uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanātīto tatra tatrābhinandanato nandisaṅkhātāya taṇhāya tiṇṇañca
atk-s0519a:918_6: bhavānaṃ parikkhīṇattā nandibhavaparikkhīṇo. So tādiso khīṇāsavo bhikkhu gambhīre
atk-s0519a:919_0: Saddahānoti yena pubbabhāge kāyasucaritādibhedena, aparabhāge ca sattattiṃsabodhipakkhiyabhedena
atk-s0519a:919_1: dhammena arahanto buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakā nibbānaṃ pattā. Taṃ saddahāno arahataṃ
atk-s0519a:919_2: dhammaṃ nibbānappattiyā lokiyalokuttarapaññaṃ labhati, tañca kho na saddhāmattakeneva.
atk-s0519a:919_3: Yasmā pana saddhājāto upasaṅkamati, upasaṅkamanto payirupāsati, payirupāsanto sotaṃ
atk-s0519a:919_4: odahati, odahitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, tasmā upasaṅkamanato paṭṭhāya yāva dhammassavanena
atk-s0519a:920_0: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Taṃ dhammaṃ saddahitvāpi ācariyupajjhāye kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvāpi
atk-s0519a:920_1: vattakaraṇena payirupāsitvā yadā payirupāsanāya ārādhitacittā kiñci vattukāmā honti.
atk-s0519a:920_2: Atha adhigatāya sotukāmatāya sotaṃ odahitvā suṇanto labhatīti evaṃ sussūsampi ca
atk-s0519a:920_3: satiavippavāsena appamatto subhāsitadubbhāsitaññutāya vicakkhaṇo eva labhati, na
atk-s0519a:921_0: Patirūpakārīti desakālādīni ahāpetvā lokiyassa lokuttarassa dhammassa patirūpaṃ adhigamūpāyaṃ
atk-s0519a:921_1: karotīti patirūpakārī. Dhuravāti cetasikavīriyavasena anikkhittadhuro. Uṭṭhātāti
atk-s0519a:921_2: kāyikavīriyavasena uṭṭhānasampanno asithilaparakkamo. Vindate dhananti lokiyalokuttaradhanaṃ
atk-s0519a:921_3: adhigacchati. Saccenāti vacīsaccena paramatthasaccena ca. Buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakā
atk-s0519a:921_4: nibbutiṃ pāpuṇantā kittimpi pāpuṇantiyeva. Dadanti paresaṃ yaṃ kiñci icchitaṃ patthitaṃ
atk-s0519a:921_5: dento mittāni ganthati sampādeti karotīti attho. Duddadaṃ vā dadanto ganthati, dānamukhena
atk-s0519a:921_6: cattāripi saṅgahavatthūni gahitānīti veditabbāni. Tehi mittāni karonti. Asmā lokā
atk-s0519a:921_7: paraṃ lokaṃ, sa ve pecca na socatīti yassa puggalassa ime saddhādayo dhammā vijjanti,
atk-s0519a:921_8: so imasmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gantvā na socati, sokakāraṇaṃ tassa natthīti attho.
atk-s0519a:923: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, sa ve pecca na socatī”ti. –
atk-s0519a:924: Gāthaṃ avasesaṃ katvā udāhaṭaṃ. Āḷavakasutte hi imā gāthā āḷavakena “kathaṃ su labhate pañña”ntiādinā puṭṭhena bhagavatā bhāsitāti.
atk-s0519a:925_0: Yena kenaci vaṇṇenāti yena kenaci kāraṇena, pakārena vā. Saṃvāsoti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0519a:925_1: sahavāso samāgamo. Tanti tathā samāgataṃ anukampitabbaṃ purisaṃ. Manasā ce pasannenāti
atk-s0519a:925_2: karuṇāsamussāhitena pasādena pasannena manasā. Na tena hoti saṃyuttoti tena yathāvuttena
atk-s0519a:925_3: anusāsanena kāmacchandādīnaṃ saṃyojanavasena saṃyutto nāma na hoti. Yānukampā anuddayāti
atk-s0519a:925_4: yā ariyamaggasampāpanavasena karuṇāyanā, mettāyanā cāti attho.
atk-s0519a:926_0: 102. Rāgo ca doso cāti rāgadosā heṭṭhā vuttanayāva. Kutonidānāti kiṃnidānā kiṃhetukā.
atk-s0519a:926_1: Paccattavacanassa hi ayaṃ to-ādeso, samāse cassa lopābhāvo veditabbo. Aratī ratī
atk-s0519a:926_2: lomahaṃso kutojāti yāyaṃ pantesu senāsanesu, adhikusalesu ca dhammesu arati ukkaṇṭhitā,
atk-s0519a:926_3: yā ca pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rati abhirati āsatti kīḷanādi, yo ca lomahaṃsasamuṭṭhānato
atk-s0519a:926_4: lomahaṃsasaṅkhāto cittutrāso, ime tayo dhammā kuto jātā kuto nibbattāti pucchā. Kuto
atk-s0519a:926_5: samuṭṭhāyāti kuto uppajjitvā. Manoti kusalacittaṃ. Vitakkāti kāmavitakkādayo. Kumārakā
atk-s0519a:926_6: dhaṅkamivosajantīti yathā kumārakā kīḷantā kākaṃ suttena pāde bandhitvā osajanti
atk-s0519a:926_7: khipanti, evaṃ kusalamanaṃ akusalavitakkā kuto samuṭṭhāya osajantīti pucchā.
atk-s0519a:927_0: Rāgo cāti dutiyagāthā tassā vissajjanaṃ. Tattha itoti attabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha. Attabhāvanidānā
atk-s0519a:927_1: hi rāgadosā, arati rati lomahaṃsā ca attabhāvato jātā. Kāmavitakkādayo attabhāvato
atk-s0519a:927_2: eva samuṭṭhāya kusalamanaṃ osajanti. Tena tadaññaṃ pakatiādikāraṇaṃ paṭikkhipanto
atk-s0519a:927_3: āha – “itonidānā ito samuṭṭhāyā”ti. Purimagāthāya vuttanayenettha saddasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0519a:928_0: Idāni yvāyaṃ “itonidānā”tiādīsu attabhāvanidānā attabhāvato jātā attabhāvato samuṭṭhāyāti
atk-s0519a:928_1: attho vutto, taṃ sādhento āha – “snehajā attasambhūtā”ti. Ete hi rāgādayo vitakkapariyosānā
atk-s0519a:928_2: taṇhāsnehena jātā. Tathā jāyantā ca pañcupādānakkhandhabhede attabhāvasaṅkhāte attani
atk-s0519a:928_3: sambhūtā. Tenāha – “snehajā attasambhūtā”ti. Idāni tadatthajotikaṃ upamaṃ dasseti
atk-s0519a:928_4: “nigrodhasseva khandhajā”ti. Tattha khandhajāti khandhesu jātā pārohā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0519a:928_5: hoti – yathā nigrodhassa khandhajasaṅkhātā pārohā āporasasaṅkhāte snehe sati jāyanti,
atk-s0519a:928_6: jāyantā ca tasmiṃyeva nigrodhe tesu tesu sākhappadesesu sambhavanti, evaṃ ete rāgādayo
atk-s0519a:928_7: ajjhattaṃ taṇhāsnehe sati jāyanti, jāyantā ca tasmiṃyeva attabhāve tesu tesu cakkhādippadesesu
atk-s0519a:928_8: iṭṭhārammaṇesu sambhavanti. Tena vuttaṃ – “snehajā attasambhūtā”ti. Puthu visattā
atk-s0519a:928_9: kāmesūti yasmā rāgopi pañcakāmaguṇikādivasena, dosopi āghātavatthuādivasena aratiādayopi
atk-s0519a:928_10: tassa tassa bhedassa vasenāti sabbathā sabbepime kilesā puthu anekappakārā hutvā
atk-s0519a:928_11: vatthudvārārammaṇādivasena tesu tesu kāmesu tathā tathā visattā laggā saṃsibbitvā
atk-s0519a:928_12: ṭhitā. Kimiva? Māluvāva vitatā vane yathā vane vitatā māluvā tesu tesu rukkhasākhappasākhādibhedesu
atk-s0519a:928_13: visattā hoti laggā saṃsibbitvā ṭhitā, evaṃ ete kilesā dhammā, tasmā ettha puthupabhedesu
atk-s0519a:929_0: Ye naṃ pajānanti yatonidānaṃ, te naṃ vinodenti suṇohi yakkha. Tassattho – ye sattā
atk-s0519a:929_1: naṃ kilesagahanaṃ “itonidānaṃ esa uppajjatī”ti jānanti, te naṃ taṇhāsinehasinehite
atk-s0519a:929_2: attabhāve uppajjatīti ñatvā taṃ taṇhāsinehaṃ ādīnavānupassanādibhāvanāñāṇagginā visosentā
atk-s0519a:929_3: vinodenti pajahanti, evaṃ amhākaṃ bhāsitaṃ suṇohi yakkhāti. Te duttaraṃ oghamimaṃ
atk-s0519a:929_4: taranti, atiṇṇapubbaṃ apunabbhavāyāti ye hi saṃkilesagahanaṃ vinodenti, te ekantena
atk-s0519a:929_5: maggaṃ bhāventi. Na hi maggabhāvanaṃ vinā kilesavinodanaṃ atthi. Evaṃ maggaṃ bhāventā
atk-s0519a:929_6: te pakatiñāṇena duttaraṃ kāmoghādiṃ catubbidhaṃ oghaṃ iminā dīghena addhunā supinantenapi
atk-s0519a:930_0: Dukkaraṃ bhagavāti eko kira devaputto pubbayogāvacaro bahalakilesatāya sappayogena
atk-s0519a:930_1: kilese vikkhambhento samaṇadhammaṃ katvā pubbahetumandatāya ariyabhūmiṃ appatvāva
atk-s0519a:930_2: kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatto, so tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā dukkarabhāvaṃ ārocento
atk-s0519a:930_3: evamāha. Tattha dukkaranti dasapi vassāni…pe… saṭṭhipi vassāni ekantaparisuddhassa
atk-s0519a:930_4: samaṇadhammassa karaṇaṃ nāmetaṃ dukkaraṃ. Sekkhāti satta sekkhā. Sīlasamāhitāti sīlena
atk-s0519a:930_5: samāhitā samupetā. Ṭhitattāti patiṭṭhitasabhāvā. Evaṃ pucchitapañhaṃ vissajjitvā
atk-s0519a:930_7: anagāriyaṃ niggehabhāvaṃ upagatassa, pabbajitassāti attho. Tuṭṭhīti catupaccayasantoso.
atk-s0519a:931_0: Bhāvanāyāti cittavūpasamabhāvanāya. Te chetvā maccuno jālanti ye rattindivaṃ indriyūpasame
atk-s0519a:931_1: ratā, te dussamādahaṃ cittaṃ samādahanti. Ye samāhitacittā, te catupaccayasantosaṃ
atk-s0519a:931_2: pūrentā na kilamanti. Ye santuṭṭhā, te sīlaṃ pūrentā na kilamanti. Ye sīle patiṭṭhitā
atk-s0519a:931_3: satta sekkhā, te ariyā maccuno jālasaṅkhātaṃ kilesajālaṃ chinditvā gacchanti.
atk-s0519a:932_0: Duggamoti saccametaṃ, bhante, ye indriyūpasame ratā, te dussamādahaṃ cittaṃ samādahanti.
atk-s0519a:932_1: Ye samāhitacittā, te catupaccayasantosaṃ pūrentā na kilamanti. Ye santuṭṭhā, te sīlaṃ
atk-s0519a:932_2: pūrentā na kilamanti. Ye sīle paramaggāhino satta sekkhā, te ariyā maccuno jālasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a:932_3: kilesajālaṃ chinditvā gacchanti. Kiṃ na gamissanti, ayaṃ pana duggamo “bhagavā visamo
atk-s0519a:932_4: maggo”ti āha. Tattha kiñcāpi ariyamaggo neva duggamo na visamo, pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya
atk-s0519a:932_5: panassa bahū parissayā honti, tasmā evaṃ vutto. Avaṃsirāti ñāṇasirena adhosirā hutvā
atk-s0519a:932_6: papatanti. Ariyamaggaṃ ārohituṃ asamatthatāya eva te magge papatantīti vuccanti.
atk-s0519a:932_7: Ariyānaṃ samo maggoti sveva maggo ariyānaṃ samo hoti. Visame samāti visamepi sattakāye samā eva.
atk-s0519a:933_0: 103. Idañhi taṃ jetavananti anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto jetavanassa ceva buddhādīnañca
atk-s0519a:933_1: vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ āgantvā evamāha. Isisaṅghanisevitanti bhikkhusaṅghanivesitaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-s0519a:933_2: paṭhamagāthāya jetavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni ariyamaggassa vaṇṇaṃ kathento “kammaṃ
atk-s0519a:933_3: vijjā”tiādimāha. Tattha kammanti maggacetanā. Vijjāti maggapaññā. Dhammoti samādhi,
atk-s0519a:933_4: samādhipakkhikā vā dhammā. Sīlaṃ jīvitamuttamanti sīle patiṭṭhitassa jīvitañca uttamanti
atk-s0519a:933_5: dasseti. Atha vā vijjāti diṭṭhisaṅkappā. Dhammoti vāyāmasatisamādhayo. Sīlanti vācākammantājīvā.
atk-s0519a:933_6: Jīvitamuttamanti etasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhitassa jīvitaṃ nāma uttamanti. “Etena maccā
atk-s0519a:933_7: sujjhantī”ti etena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena sattā visujjhanti.
atk-s0519a:934_0: Tasmāti yasmā maggena sujjhanti, na gottadhanehi, tasmā. Yoniso vicine dhammanti
atk-s0519a:934_1: upāyena bodhipakkhiyadhammaṃ vicineyya. Evaṃ tattha visujjhatīti evaṃ tasmiṃ ariyamagge
atk-s0519a:934_2: visujjhati. Atha vā yoniso vicine dhammanti upāyena ariyasaccadhammaṃ vicineyya.
atk-s0519a:934_3: Evaṃ tattha visujjhatīti evaṃ tesu catūsu ariyasaccesu visujjhati. Idāni sāriputtattherassa
atk-s0519a:934_4: vaṇṇaṃ kathento “sāriputtovā”tiādimāha. Tattha sāriputtovāti avadhāraṇavacanaṃ, etehi
atk-s0519a:934_5: paññādīhi sāriputtova seyyoti vadati. Upasamenāti kilesavūpasamena. Pāraṅgatoti nibbānaṃ
atk-s0519a:934_6: gato, yo koci nibbānapatto bhikkhu, na tādiso. Etāvaparamo siyā, na therā uttaritaro
atk-s0519a:935_0: Atītanti atīte pañcakkhandhe. Nānvāgameyyāti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi nānugaccheyya. Nappaṭikaṅkheti
atk-s0519a:935_1: taṇhādiṭṭhīhi na pattheyya. Yadatītanti idamettha kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yasmā yaṃ atītaṃ,
atk-s0519a:935_2: taṃ pahīnaṃ niruddhaṃ atthaṅgataṃ, tasmā taṃ nānugaccheyya. Yasmā ca yaṃ tattha anāgataṃ,
atk-s0519a:935_3: taṃ appattaṃ ajātaṃ anibbattaṃ, tasmā tampi na pattheyya. Tattha tatthāti paccuppannampi
atk-s0519a:935_4: dhammaṃ yattha yattheva so uppanno, tattha tattheva naṃ aniccānupassanādīhi sattahi
atk-s0519a:935_5: anupassanāhi vipassati, araññādīsu vā tattha tattha vipassati. Asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppanti
atk-s0519a:935_6: idaṃ vipassanāpaṭivipassanādassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Vipassanā hi rāgādīhi na saṃhirati
atk-s0519a:935_7: na kuppatīti asaṃhīrā asaṃkuppā, taṃ anubrūhaye vaḍḍheyya paṭivipasseyyāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0519a:935_8: hoti. Atha vā nibbānaṃ rāgādīhi na saṃhirati na kuppatīti asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0519a:935_9: vidvā paṇḍito bhikkhu anubrūhaye, punappunaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appento vaḍḍheyyāti attho.
atk-s0519a:936_0: Tassa pana anubrūhanassa atthāya ajjeva kiccamātappanti kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanena
atk-s0519a:936_1: “ātappa”nti laddhanāmaṃ vīriyaṃ ajjeva kātabbaṃ. Ko jaññā maraṇaṃ suveti sve jīvitaṃ
atk-s0519a:936_2: vā maraṇaṃ vā ko jānāti. Ajjeva dānaṃ dassāmi, sīlaṃ vā rakkhissāmi, aññataraṃ vā
atk-s0519a:936_3: pana kusalaṃ karissāmi, “ajja tāva papañco atthi, sve vā punadivase vā jānissāmī”ti
atk-s0519a:936_4: cittaṃ anuppādetvā “ajjeva karissāmī”ti evaṃ vīriyaṃ kātabbanti dasseti. Mahāsenenāti
atk-s0519a:936_5: ahivicchikavisasatthādīni hi anekāni maraṇakāraṇāni tassa senāti tāya mahatiyā senāya
atk-s0519a:936_6: vasena mahāsenena evarūpena maccunā saddhiṃ “katipāhaṃ tāva āgamehi, yāvāhaṃ buddhapūjādiṃ
atk-s0519a:936_7: attano avassayaṃ kammaṃ karomī”ti evaṃ mittasanthavākārasaṅkhāto vā “idaṃ sataṃ vā
atk-s0519a:936_8: sahassaṃ vā gahetvā katipāhaṃ āgamehī”ti evaṃ lañjānuppadānasaṅkhāto vā “iminā balarāsinā
atk-s0519a:936_9: paṭibāhissāmī”ti evaṃ balarāsisaṅkhāto vā saṅgaro natthi. Saṅgaroti hi mittakaraṇalañjadānabalarāsisaṅkaḍḍhanānaṃ
atk-s0519a:936_10: nāmaṃ, tasmā ayamattho vutto. Atanditanti analasaṃ uṭṭhāhakaṃ. Evaṃ paṭipannattā
atk-s0519a:936_11: bhaddo ekaratto assāti bhaddekaratto. Itīti evaṃ paṭipannaṃ puggalaṃ “bhaddekaratto
atk-s0519a:937: Cakkhunā paññāya cāti cakkhunā ca paññāya ca. Cakkhubhūtāya vā paññāya. Satiyā paññāya cāti satiyā ca paññāya ca, sativisiṭṭhāya vā paññāya. Kāyenāti nāmakāyena.
atk-s0519a:938_0: Dibbacakkhu suvisuddhanti dibbaṃ cakkhu suvisuddhaṃ, yaṃ sacchikarotīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a:938_1: Pubbenivāsāti purimāsu jātīsu nivutthakkhandhā. Iddhividhāti iddhikoṭṭhāsā. Nirodhoti
atk-s0519a:939_0: 104. Yassa selūpamaṃ cittanti ekaghanaṃ selaṃ viya pakativātehi lokadhammavātehi
atk-s0519a:939_1: akampanīyato yassa cittaṃ selūpamaṃ. Tenāha – “ṭhitaṃ nānupakampatī”ti. Rajanīyesūti
atk-s0519a:939_2: lābhādīsu. Kopaneyyeti alābhādike. Kuto naṃ dukkhamessatīti taṃ evaṃ bhāvitacittaṃ
atk-s0519a:940_0: Yo brāhmaṇoti bāhitapāpadhammatāya brāhmaṇo, na diṭṭhamaṅgalikatāya huṃhuṅkārakasāvādipāpadhammayutto
atk-s0519a:940_1: hutvā kevalaṃ jātimattena brāhmaṇoti paṭijānāti. So brāhmaṇo bāhitapāpadhammattā
atk-s0519a:940_2: huṃhuṅkārappahānena nihuṃhuṅko. Rāgādikasāvābhāvena nikkabhāvo. Sīlasaṃvarena saṃyatacittatāya
atk-s0519a:940_3: yatatto. Catumaggañāṇasaṅkhātehi vedehi antaṃ nibbānaṃ, vedānaṃ vā antaṃ gatattā
atk-s0519a:940_4: vedantagū. Maggabrahmacariyassa vusitattā vūsitabrahmacariyo. Dhammena so brahmavādaṃ
atk-s0519a:940_5: vadeyyāti so “brāhmaṇo aha”nti etaṃ vādaṃ vadeyya. Yassa sakalalokasannivāse kuhiñci
atk-s0519a:940_6: ekārammaṇepi rāgussado dosussado mohussado mānussado diṭṭhussadoti ime ussadā natthīti attho.
atk-s0519a:941_0: Na gādhatīti na patiṭṭhahati. Sukkāti sukkasaṅkhātā gahā. Yadi candimasūriyādīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:941_1: pabhā tattha natthi, tamo eva ca siyāti āsaṅkamāne sandhāyāha “tamo tattha na vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0519a:941_2: Yadā ca attanāvedītiādīsu evaṃvidhaṃ nibbānaṃ attapaccakkhena ñāṇena yadā vindati,
atk-s0519a:941_3: atha rūpārūpadhammato sukhadukkhato ca vippamutto hotīti.
atk-s0519a:942_0: Sakesu dhammesūti sakaattabhāvasaṅkhātesu upādānakkhandhesu. Yebhuyyena hi ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0519a:942_1: vipassanābhiniveso hotīti. Etaṃ pisācanti ajakalāpaka, etaṃ tayā vuttaṃ pisācaṃ kilesapisācañca.
atk-s0519a:942_2: Pakkulanti tayā kataṃ akkulaṃ pakkulakaraṇañca. Ativattatīti atikkamati.
atk-s0519a:943_0: Nābhinandati āyantinti purāṇadutiyikaṃ āgacchantiṃ aññaṃ vā na abhinandati cittena
atk-s0519a:943_1: na sampaṭicchati. Tameva pakkamantiṃ na socati. Saṅgā saṅgāmajiṃ muttanti pañcavidhāpi
atk-s0519a:944: Bahvetthāti bahu ettha nhāyati jano, na tena so suddho nāma hotīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a:945_0: Jātibalaṃ nisedhanti jātibalassa nisedhakaṃ. Sahāyā vatāti samathavipassanābhāvanāya
atk-s0519a:945_1: saha ayanavasena sahāyā vata. Kālena kālaṃ sappāyadhammassa savanavasena cirarattaṃ
atk-s0519a:945_2: sameti samāgamo etesanti cirarattasametikā. Sithilamārabbhāti sithilaṃ vīriyaṃ katvā.
atk-s0519a:946_0: 105. Tatra kho, bhikkhave, ko visesoti satthu sāvakassa ca pañcasveva upādānakkhandhesu
atk-s0519a:946_1: nibbidādayoti pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyaṃ anupādāvimuttiyañca heṭṭhā upari ca visesābhāvaṃ
atk-s0519a:946_2: dasseti. Vuttañhetaṃ – “natthi vimuttiyā nānatta”nti. Tattha visesābhāvaṃ paccāmasati
atk-s0519a:946_3: “tatra ko viseso”ti. Adhippayāsoti adhikapayogo. Nānākaraṇanti ca visesoyeva vutto.
atk-s0519a:947_0: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, visesoti bhikkhave, yadipi sāvakassa satthu ca vimuttiyaṃ viseso
atk-s0519a:947_1: natthi, sayambhuñāṇena pana savāsanasabbakilese khepetvā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā
atk-s0519a:947_3: sammāsambuddhassa paññāvimuttato visesoti. Tattha anuppannassāti avattamānassa. Ariyamaggañhi
atk-s0519a:947_4: kassapasammāsambuddho uppādesi. Antarā añño satthā uppādetā nāma nāhosi, tasmā ayaṃ
atk-s0519a:947_5: bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā nāma. Asañjātassāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Anakkhātassāti
atk-s0519a:947_6: akathitassa. Maggaṃ jānātīti maggaññū. Maggaṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsīti maggavidū.
atk-s0519a:947_7: Magge ca amagge ca kovidoti maggakovido. Maggānugāti maggaṃ anugacchantā. Pacchāsamannāgatāti
atk-s0519a:947_8: ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ samannāgato, sāvakā pacchā samannāgatā.
atk-s0519a:948_0: 106. “Nīce kule paccājāto”tiādinā tamena yuttoti tamo. Kāyaduccaritādīhi puna nirayatamupagamanato
atk-s0519a:948_1: tamaparāyaṇo. Iti ubhayenapi khandhatamova kathito hoti. “Aḍḍhe kule paccājāto”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:948_2: jotinā yuttoti joti, ālokabhūtoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kāyasucaritādīhi puna saggūpapattibhavūpagamanato
atk-s0519a:948_3: jotiparāyaṇo. Iminā nayena itarepi dve veditabbā.
atk-s0519a:949_0: Na taṃ daḷhaṃ bandhanamāhu dhīrāti ettha dhīrāti buddhādayo paṇḍitapurisā. Yaṃ saṅkhalikasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a:949_1: ayena nibbattaṃ āyasaṃ addubandhanasaṅkhātaṃ dārumayañca pabbajatiṇehi rajjuṃ katvā
atk-s0519a:949_2: katarajjubandhanañca, taṃ asiādīhi chindituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāya “thira”nti na vadantīti
atk-s0519a:949_3: attho. Sārattarattāti rattā hutvā rattā. Balavarāgarattāti attho. Maṇikuṇḍalesūti
atk-s0519a:949_4: maṇīsu ca kuṇḍalesu ca, maṇicittesu vā kuṇḍalesu. Etaṃ daḷhanti ye maṇikuṇḍalesu
atk-s0519a:949_5: sārattarattā, tesu yo rāgo, yā ca puttadāresu apekkhā taṇhā, etaṃ kilesamayaṃ bandhanaṃ
atk-s0519a:950_0: Ohārinanti ākaḍḍhitvā catūsu apāyesu pātanato avaharati heṭṭhā haratīti ohārinaṃ.
atk-s0519a:950_1: Sithilanti bandhanaṭṭhāne chaviādīni akopetvā bandhanabhāvampi ajānāpetvā jalapathathalapathādīsu
atk-s0519a:950_2: kammaṃ kātuṃ detīti sithilaṃ. Duppamuñcanti lobhavasena hi ekavārampi uppannaṃ kilesabandhanaṃ
atk-s0519a:950_3: daṭṭhaṭṭhānato kacchapo viya dummocayaṃ hotīti duppamuñcaṃ. Etampi chetvānāti etaṃ
atk-s0519a:950_4: daḷhampi kilesabandhanaṃ ñāṇakhaggena chinditvā anapekkhino hutvā kāmasukhaṃ pahāya
atk-s0519a:951_0: 107. Cetetīti akusalacetanāvasena ceteti. Pakappetīti tameva akusalacetanaṃ kāyavacīkammabhāvaṃ
atk-s0519a:951_1: pāpanavasena kappeti. Anusetīti rāgādianusayova santāne appahīnabhāvena anuseti.
atk-s0519a:951_2: Ārammaṇametaṃ hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyāti yadetaṃ cetanaṃ pakappanaṃ anusayanañca,
atk-s0519a:951_3: etaṃ abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa ṭhitiyā pavattiyā paccayo hotīti attho. Ārammaṇe sati
atk-s0519a:951_4: patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa hotīti yathāvuttapaccaye sati abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa kammaṃ javāpetvā
atk-s0519a:951_6: hotīti āyatiṃ punabbhavasaṅkhātā viññāṇādīnaṃ abhinibbatti hoti.
atk-s0519a:952_0: “No ce, bhikkhave, cetetī”tiādinā akusalakammameva paṭikkhipati. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho,
atk-s0519a:952_1: yadipi kadāci yonisomanasikārā akusalacetanā nappavattati, anusayā pana appahīnāti,
atk-s0519a:952_2: te kusalassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa patiṭṭhā honti yevāti. Sati ca abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇe
atk-s0519a:952_3: āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti hotīti vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Tatiyavāro vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:953_0: 108. “Neso, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye samuddo”tiādi yadi duppūraṇaṭṭhena saṃsīdanaṭṭhena
atk-s0519a:953_1: duratikkamanaṭṭhena sāgaro “samuddo”ti vucceyya, tato satabhāgenapi sahassabhāgenapi
atk-s0519a:953_2: cakkhuādīsveva ayaṃ nayo labbhatīti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha – “cakkhu, bhikkhave,
atk-s0519a:953_3: purisassa samuddo, tassa rūpamayo vego”ti, rūpesu sattānaṃ āviñchanato rūpāyatanameva
atk-s0519a:954_0: Yo taṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ sahatīti yo bhikkhu saha visayena cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato
atk-s0519a:954_1: anattato sammasanto tattha ca nibbindanto virajjanto tappaṭibaddhato kilesajālato
atk-s0519a:954_2: vimuccanto abhibhavati. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, atari cakkhusamuddanti ayaṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0519a:955_0: Aparo nayo – cakkhu, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye samuddoti yadipi duppūraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0519a:955_1: yadi vā samudanaṭṭhena samuddo, cakkhumeva samuddo. Tassa hi pathavito yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā
atk-s0519a:955_2: nīlādiārammaṇaṃ samosarantaṃ paripuṇṇabhāvaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti. Evaṃ duppūraṇaṭṭhenapi
atk-s0519a:955_3: samuddo. Cakkhu ca tesu tesu nīlādiārammaṇesu samudeti asaṃvutaṃ hutvā osaramānaṃ
atk-s0519a:955_4: kilesuppattiyā kāraṇabhāvena sadosabhāvena gacchatīti samudanaṭṭhenapi samuddo. Tathā
atk-s0519a:955_5: cakkhuṃ taṇhāsotādīnaṃ uppattidvāratāya tehi santānassa samudanaṭṭhena temanaṭṭhena
atk-s0519a:955_6: samuddo. Tassa rūpamayo vegoti samuddassa appamāṇo ūmimayo vego viya tassāpi cakkhusamuddassa
atk-s0519a:955_7: samosarantassa nīlādibhedassa ārammaṇassa vasena appameyyo rūpamayo vego veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:955_8: Yo taṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ sahatīti yo taṃ cakkhusamudde samosarantaṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ
