atk-s0519a:955_9: manāpe rūpe rāgaṃ, amanāpe dosaṃ, asamapekkhane mohanti evaṃ rāgādikilese anuppādento
atk-s0519a:956_0: Saūmintiādīsu kilesaūmīhi saūmiṃ. Kilesavaṭṭehi sāvaṭṭaṃ. Kilesagahehi sagahaṃ. Kilesarakkhasehi
atk-s0519a:956_1: sarakkhasaṃ. Kodhupāyāsassa vā vasena saūmiṃ. Kāmaguṇavasena sāvaṭṭaṃ. Mātugāmavasena
atk-s0519a:956_2: sagahaṃ sarakkhasaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “ūmibhayanti kho, bhikkhave, kodhupāyāsassetaṃ
atk-s0519a:956_3: adhivacanaṃ. Tathā āvaṭṭanti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:956_4: Gaharakkhasoti kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmassetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Sesadvāresupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0519a:957: Saūmibhayaṃ duttaraṃ accatarīti aniccatādiūmibhayena sabhayaṃ duratikkamaṃ atikkami. Lokantagūti saṃsāralokassa antaṃ gato. Pāragatoti vuccatīti nibbānaṃ gatoti kathīyati.
atk-s0519a:958_0: Baḷisāti sattānaṃ anatthahetutāya baḷisā viya baḷisā. Anayāyāti anatthāya. Byābādhāyāti
atk-s0519a:958_1: dukkhāya. Iṭṭhāti pariyiṭṭhā vā apariyiṭṭhā vā sukhārammaṇatāya iṭṭhā. Kāmanīyaṭṭhena
atk-s0519a:958_2: kantā. Manassa vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena manāpā. Piyasabhāvatāya piyarūpā. Kilesakāmasahitattā
atk-s0519a:958_3: kāmūpasaṃhitā. Rāgajananaṭṭhena cittassa rañjanato rajanīyā. Tañceti taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a:958_4: nīlādivasena anekabhedabhinnampi hi rūpāyatanaṃ rūpārammaṇabhāvena cakkhuviññeyyabhāvena
atk-s0519a:958_5: ca ekavidhataṃ nātivattatīti taṃsabhāvasāmaññaṃ gahetvā “tañce”ti vuttaṃ. Abhinandatīti
atk-s0519a:958_6: abhinandanabhūtāya sappītikataṇhāya abhimukho nandati. Abhivadatīti “aho sukhaṃ,
atk-s0519a:958_7: aho sukha”nti vadāpentiyā taṇhāyanavasena abhivadati. Ajjhosāya tiṭṭhatīti gilitvā
atk-s0519a:958_8: pariniṭṭhapetvā tiṭṭhati. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitabaḷiso mārassāti
atk-s0519a:958_9: ayaṃ, bhikkhu, kilesamārassa baḷisabhūtaṃ rūpataṇhaṃ gilitvā ṭhitoti vuccati. Sesavāresupi
atk-s0519a:958_10: iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Abhedīti bhindi. Paribhedīti sabbabhāgena bhindi. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0519a:959_0: 109. Ayaṃ loko santāpajātoti ayaṃ sattaloko jātasantāpo ñātibyasanādivasena uppannasokasantāpo
atk-s0519a:959_1: ca rāgādivasena uppannapariḷāhasantāpo cāti attho. Phassaparetoti anekehi dukkhaphassehi
atk-s0519a:959_2: abhibhūto. Rodaṃ vadati attatoti taṃ taṃ attanā phuṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ abhāvitakāyatāya
atk-s0519a:959_3: adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto “aho dukkhaṃ, īdisaṃ dukkhaṃ mayhaṃ sattunopi mā hotū”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:959_4: vilapanto vadati. Kasmā? Yena yena hi maññanti, tato taṃ hoti aññathā, yasmā ete
atk-s0519a:959_5: sattā yena yena pakārena attano dukkhassa paṭikāraṃ maññanti āsīsanti, taṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0519a:959_6: tato aññena pakārena tikicchitabbaṃ hoti. Yena vā pakārena attano vaḍḍhiṃ maññanti,
atk-s0519a:959_7: tato aññathā avaḍḍhi eva pana hoti. Evaṃ aññathābhāvitaṃ icchāvighātaṃ eva pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0519a:959_8: Ayaṃ bhavasatto kāmādibhavesu satto sattaloko, tathāpi bhavamevābhinandati, na tattha
atk-s0519a:959_9: nibbindati. Yadabhinandati taṃ bhayanti yaṃ kāmādibhavaṃ abhinandati, taṃ jarāmaraṇādianekabyasanānubandhattā
atk-s0519a:959_10: ativiya bhayānakaṭṭhena bhayaṃ. Yassa bhāyatīti yato jarāmaraṇādito bhāyati, taṃ
atk-s0519a:960_0: Bhavavippahānāyāti bhavassa pajahanatthāya. Khoti avadhāraṇatthe nipāto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0519a:960_1: hoti – ekanteneva kāmādibhavassa samudayappahānena pahānatthaṃ idaṃ mayā adhigataṃ
atk-s0519a:961_0: Evaṃ ariyassa maggassa ekaṃseneva niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni aññamaggassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0519a:961_1: paṭikkhipanto “ye hi kecī”tiādimāha. Tattha bhavenāti rūpabhavena vā arūpabhavena
atk-s0519a:961_2: vā. Bhavassāti saṃsārassa. Vippamokkhanti bhavato vimuttiṃ, saṃsārasuddhinti attho.
atk-s0519a:961_3: Kiñcāpi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā tattha nibbānasaññino, bhavagāmikammena pana rūpārūpajjhānena,
atk-s0519a:961_4: taṃnibbattena ca upapattibhavena bhavavisuddhiṃ vadantā bhavena bhavavippamokkhaṃ
atk-s0519a:961_5: vadanti nāma. Tenāha – “sabbe te avippamuttā bhavasmāti vadāmī”ti. Atha vā bhavenāti
atk-s0519a:961_6: bhavadiṭṭhiyā, bhavati tiṭṭhati sassatanti hi pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhi “bhavadiṭṭhī”ti
atk-s0519a:961_7: vuccati. Bhavadiṭṭhi eva uttarapadalopena “bhavo”ti vuttā bhavataṇhātiādīsu viya.
atk-s0519a:961_8: Bhavadiṭṭhivasena hi idhekacce bhavavisesaṃyeva bhavavippamokkhaṃ maññanti. Yathā
atk-s0519a:961_9: taṃ bako brahmā āha – “idaṃ niccaṃ, idaṃ dhuvaṃ, idaṃ sassataṃ, idaṃ avipariṇāmadhamma”nti.
atk-s0519a:961_10: Vibhavenāti ucchedadiṭṭhiyā. Vibhavati vinassati ucchijjatīti hi pavattanato ucchedadiṭṭhi
atk-s0519a:961_11: vuttanayena “vibhavo”ti vuccati. Bhavassa nissaraṇamāhaṃsūti saṃsārasuddhiṃ vadiṃsu.
atk-s0519a:961_12: Ucchedadiṭṭhivasena hi idhekacce saṃsārasuddhiṃ vadanti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a:962: “Yato kho, bho, ayaṃ attā rūpī cātumahābhūtiko…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati. Ettāvatā kho, bho, ayaṃ attā sammā samucchinno hotī”ti.
atk-s0519a:963_0: Anissaṭāti anikkhantā. Tattha kāraṇamāha – “upadhiñhi paṭicca dukkhamidaṃ sambhotī”ti.
atk-s0519a:963_1: Tattha upadhinti khandhādiupadhiṃ. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yattha ime diṭṭhigatikā nibbānasaññino,
atk-s0519a:963_2: tattha khandhūpadhikilesūpadhiabhisaṅkhārūpadhayo adhigatā ñātā. Kuto tassa dukkhanissaraṇatāti.
atk-s0519a:963_3: Yaṃ pana paramatthato dukkhanissaraṇaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “sabbupādānakkhayā natthi dukkhassa sambhavo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:964_0: Lokamimaṃ passāti bhagavā attano cittaṃ ālapati. Puthūti visuṃ visuṃ. Avijjāya paretanti
atk-s0519a:964_1: mohena abhibhūtaṃ. Bhūtanti khandhapañcakaṃ. Bhūtaratanti itthī purise, puriso itthiyāti
atk-s0519a:964_2: evaṃ aññamaññaṃ sattesu rataṃ, tato eva bhavā aparimuttā. Ye hi keci bhavāti ittarakhaṇā
atk-s0519a:964_3: vā dīghāyukā vā sātavanto vā asātavanto vā bhavā. Sabbadhīti uddhaṃ adho tiriyanti
atk-s0519a:964_4: sabbattha. Sabbatthatāyāti sabbabhāvena. Sabbe te bhavātiādīsu “sabbepi bhavā aniccā”tiādinā
atk-s0519a:964_5: vipassanāsahitāya maggapaññāya aviparītaṃ passato bhavataṇhāpi pahīyati nirujjhati,
atk-s0519a:964_6: vibhavaṃ ucchedampi nābhinandati na pattheti, tassa sabba taṇhānaṃ anavasesato maggena
atk-s0519a:964_7: nirujjhanato nibbānaṃ nibbuti hoti. Tassa evaṃ nibbutassa bhikkhuno anupādā kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ
atk-s0519a:964_8: anupādānato aggahaṇato punabbhavo na hoti. Evaṃbhūtena ca abhibhūto pañcavidhopi
atk-s0519a:964_9: māro vijito assa anena mārena saṅgāmo, sabbepi bhave samatikkanto iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīsu
atk-s0519a:965: Anusotagāmī andhaputhujjano paṭisotagāmī kalyāṇaputhujjano. Ṭhitatto sekkho. Itaro asekkho.
atk-s0519a:966_0: 110. Abhijātikoti jātiyo. Kaṇhābhijātikoti kaṇhe nīce kule jāto. Kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyatīti
atk-s0519a:966_1: kāḷakaṃ dasavidhaṃ dussīladhammaṃ pasavati karoti, so taṃ abhijāyitvā niraye nibbattati.
atk-s0519a:966_2: Sukkaṃ dhammanti “ahaṃ pubbepi puññānaṃ akatattā nīce kule nibbatto, idāni puññaṃ
atk-s0519a:966_3: karissāmī”ti puññasaṅkhātaṃ sukkaṃ paṇḍaraṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyati, so tena sagge nibbattati.
atk-s0519a:966_4: Akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ nibbānanti nibbānañhi sace kaṇhaṃ bhaveyya, kaṇhavipākaṃ dadeyya.
atk-s0519a:966_5: Sukkaṃ, sukkavipākaṃ dadeyya. Dvinnampi appadānato pana “akaṇhaṃ asukka”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:966_6: Nibbānanti cettha arahattaṃ adhippetaṃ. Tañhi kilesanibbānante jātattā nibbānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0519a:966_7: Taṃ esa abhijāyati pasavati karoti. Sukkābhijātikoti sukke ucce kule jāto. Sesaṃ
atk-s0519a:966_8: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. “Kaṇhaṃ kaṇhavipāka”ntiādikassa kammacatukkassa attho heṭṭhā
atk-s0519a:967_0: 111. Mānusattanti manussabhāvaṃ, manussayoninti attho. Dveti kiccaṃ akiccameva cāti
atk-s0519a:967_1: dve. Kiccāni tveva kattabbāni, na cākiccaṃ kiñci kattabbanti dasseti. Sukiccantiādi
atk-s0519a:968_0: Padhānānīti uttamāni visiṭṭhāni. Purimasmiṃ pabbajitesūti visaye bhummaṃ. Dutiye
atk-s0519a:968_1: adhikaraṇe. Tattha nibbānanti arahattaṃ adhippetaṃ. Kasmā panettha āmisapariccāgo
atk-s0519a:968_2: arahattena samadhuro niddiṭṭhoti? Dakkhiṇeyyesu dakkhiṇāya mahapphalabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0519a:968_3: Yena yena vā pana vatthunāti ucchedādivatthunā. Ajjhositāti bhavataṇhādivasena ajjhositā.
atk-s0519a:968_4: Dutiye yena yena vā pana vatthunāti amarāvikkhepavatthuādinā.
atk-s0519a:969_0: Iminā asubhena kammavipākenāti asubhassa kāyaduccaritādikammassa vipākattā asubhena
atk-s0519a:969_1: asivena kammavipākena. Idaṃ bālalakkhaṇaṃ nibbattatīti purimasmiṃ bhave duccaritasamaṅgitāya
atk-s0519a:969_2: bālo ayaṃ bhavatīti upalakkhaṇaṃ jāyati. Idaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttanti idaṃ evaṃ
atk-s0519a:970_0: Iminā subhenāti ettha vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo. Tattha mahāpurisalakkhaṇanti
atk-s0519a:970_1: paṇḍitalakkhaṇaṃ. Kilesabhūmīhīti kilesaṭṭhānehi kilesāvatthāhi vā. Sānusayassa pariyuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:970_2: jāyatīti appahīnānusayassa paccayasamāyoge rāgādayo pariyuṭṭhānavasena pavattanti.
atk-s0519a:970_3: Pariyuṭṭhito saṃyujjatīti yo rāgādīhi pariyuṭṭhitacitto, so kāmarāgādīhi saṃyujjati
atk-s0519a:970_4: nāma. Saṃyujjanto upādiyatīti yo kāmarāgasaṃyojanādīhi saṃyutto, so kāmupādānādīni
atk-s0519a:970_5: akusalakammāni ca upādiyati. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
atk-s0519a:971_0: 112. Evaṃ soḷasavidhena sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nānāsuttehi udāharaṇavasena vibhajitvā idāni
atk-s0519a:971_1: aṭṭhavīsatividhena sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ dassentena yasmā ayampi paṭṭhānavibhāgo mūlapadehi
atk-s0519a:971_2: saṅgahito, na imassāpi tehi asaṅgahito padeso atthi, tasmā mūlapadaṃ vibhajitabbatañca
atk-s0519a:971_3: dassetuṃ “tattha katame aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā”ti pucchāya vasena mūlapadāni uddharitvā
atk-s0519a:971_4: “lokiyaṃ lokuttara”ntiādinā navatikā, thavo cāti aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:971_5: uddiṭṭhaṃ. Tattha lokiyanti loke niyutto, loke vā vidito lokiyo. Idha pana lokiyo
atk-s0519a:971_6: attho yasmiṃ sutte vutto, taṃ suttaṃ lokiyaṃ. Tathā lokuttaraṃ. Yasmiṃ pana sutte
atk-s0519a:971_7: padesena lokiyo, padesena lokuttaro vutto, taṃ lokiyañca lokuttarañca. Yañca satte
atk-s0519a:971_8: adhiṭṭhāya sattapaññattimukhena desitaṃ, taṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Dhammavaseneva desitaṃ
atk-s0519a:971_9: dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Ubhayavasena desitaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānañca dhammādhiṭṭhānañca. Iminā
atk-s0519a:971_10: nayena sabbapadesu attho veditabbo. Buddhādīnaṃ pana guṇābhitthavanavasena pavattaṃ suttaṃ thavo nāma.
atk-s0519a:972_0: Tattha sajjukhīranti taṅkhaṇaṃyeva dhenuyā thanehi nikkhantaṃ abbhuṇhakhīraṃ. Muccatīti
atk-s0519a:972_1: pariṇamati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā dhenuyā thanato nikkhantaṃ khīraṃ taṅkhaṇaṃyeva
atk-s0519a:972_2: na muccati na pariṇamati na dadhibhāvaṃ gacchati, takkādiambilasamāyogato pana parato
atk-s0519a:972_3: kālantarena pakatiṃ jahati dadhibhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti, evamevaṃ pāpakammampi kiriyakkhaṇeyeva
atk-s0519a:972_4: na vipaccati. Yadi vipacceyya, nānāgatīnaṃ sabhāvaṭṭhānaṃ siyā, na koci pāpakammaṃ
atk-s0519a:972_5: kātuṃ visaheyya. Yāva pana kusalābhinibbattakkhandhā caranti, tāva taṃ te rakkhanti,
atk-s0519a:972_6: tesaṃ bhedā apāyesu nibbattāpanavasena vipaccati. Vipaccamānañca ḍahantaṃ bālamanveti,
atk-s0519a:972_7: kiṃ viya? Bhasmacchannova pāvako. Yathā hi chārikāya paṭicchanno vītaccitaṅgāro akkantopi
atk-s0519a:972_8: chārikāya paṭicchannattā na tāva ḍahati, chārikaṃ pana tāpetvā cammādīni ḍahanavasena
atk-s0519a:972_9: yāva matthaluṅgā ḍahanto gacchati, evamevaṃ pāpakammampi yena kataṃ, taṃ bālaṃ dutiye
atk-s0519a:972_10: vā tatiye vā attabhāve nirayādīsu nibbattaṃ ḍahantaṃ anugacchatīti.
atk-s0519a:973_0: Yassindriyānīti tatthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yassa bhikkhuno chekena sārathinā sudantā
atk-s0519a:973_1: assā viya cha indriyāni samathaṃ dantabhāvaṃ nibbisevanabhāvaṃ gatāni, tassa navavidhaṃ
atk-s0519a:973_2: mānaṃ pahāya ṭhitattā pahīnamānassa catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ abhāvena anāsavassa tādibhāve
atk-s0519a:973_3: ṭhitassa tathārūpassa devāpi pihayanti, manussāpi dassanañca āgamanañca patthentiyevāti.
atk-s0519a:973_4: Āhāre satīti āhārapaṭibaddhe chandarāge appahīne sati.
atk-s0519a:974_0: 113. Sabbā disā anuparigamma cetasāti parito dasapi disā cittena anugantvā. Nevajjhagāti
atk-s0519a:974_1: neva adhigaccheyya. Piyataranti atisayena piyaṃ. Attanāti attato. Evaṃ piyo puthu
atk-s0519a:974_2: attā paresanti evaṃ kassacipi attanā piyatarassa anupalabbhanavasena visuṃ visuṃ
atk-s0519a:974_3: paresaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyo. Yasmā ca etadeva, tasmā na hiṃse paraṃ attakāmo attano sukhakāmoti.
atk-s0519a:975: Bhūtāti jātā nibbattā. Bhavissantīti nibbattissanti. Bhūtāti vā khīṇāsavā. Te hi pahīnabhavattā bhūtā eva. Gamissantīti paralokaṃ gamissanti. Khīṇāsavā pana anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:976: Piyo ca hotīti suparisuddhāya sīlasampattiyā, suparisuddhāya ca diṭṭhisampattiyā samannāgato piyo piyāyitabbo hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0519a:978: Attano kammakubbānaṃ, taṃ jano kurute piya”nti. ;
atk-s0519a:979_0: Pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garukātabbatāya garu. Uttarimanussadhammavasena sambhāvetabbatāya
atk-s0519a:979_1: bhāvanīyo. Sīlaguṇena vā piyagaruādibhāvā veditabbā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ – “ākaṅkheyya
atk-s0519a:979_2: ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca assaṃ manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo
atk-s0519a:980_0: Vattāti “kālena vakkhāmī”tiādipañcadhamme attani upaṭṭhāpetvā sabrahmacārīnaṃ ullumpanabhāve
atk-s0519a:980_1: ṭhatvā vattā. Vacanakkhamoti sabrahmacārīhi yena kenaci vuccamāno subbaco hutvā padakkhiṇaggāhitāya
atk-s0519a:980_2: tesaṃ vacanaṃ khamatīti vacanakkhamo. Vattāti vā dhammakathāvasena vacanasīlo. Vacanakkhamoti
atk-s0519a:980_3: dhammaṃ saṃvaṇṇento parehi asaṃhīro hutvā tesaṃ pucchāvacanakkhamatāya vacanakkhamo.
atk-s0519a:980_4: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattāti saccapaṭiccasamuppādādiṃ, aññaṃ vā gambhīrakathaṃ kattā.
atk-s0519a:980_5: Na caṭṭhāne niyojakoti dhammavinayādiṃ adhammāvinayādivasena avatvā dhammavinayādivaseneva
atk-s0519a:981_0: Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvāti ettha “taṇhā janeti purisa”nti vacanato tīsu bhavesu sattānaṃ
atk-s0519a:981_1: jananato taṇhā mātā nāma. “Ahaṃ asukassa nāma rañño, rājamahāmattassa vā putto”ti
atk-s0519a:981_2: pitaraṃ nissāya asmimānassa uppajjanato asmimāno pitā nāma. Loko viya rājānaṃ yasmā
atk-s0519a:981_3: sabbadiṭṭhigatāni dve sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo bhajanti, tasmā sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo
atk-s0519a:981_4: dve khattiyā rājāno nāma. Dvādasāyatanāni vitthataṭṭhena raṭṭhasadisattā raṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0519a:981_5: nāma. Āyasādhako āyuttakapuriso viya taṃnissito nandirāgo anucaro nāma.
atk-s0519a:982: Anīghoti niddukkho. Brāhmaṇoti khīṇāsavo. Etena hi taṇhādayo arahattamaggañāṇāsinā hatā bāhitā. Yātīti so brāhmaṇo niddukkho hutvā yātīti.
atk-s0519a:983_0: Kāyeti karajakāye. Cittanti pādakajjhānacittaṃ. Samodahatīti pakkhipati. Yadā dissamānena
atk-s0519a:983_1: kāyena gantukāmo hoti, tadā kāyagatikaṃ pādakajjhānacittaṃ adhiṭṭhahatīti attho.
atk-s0519a:983_2: Cittepi kāyaṃ samodahatīti yadā sīghaṃ gantukāmo hoti, tadā pādakajjhānacitte kāyaṃ
atk-s0519a:983_3: pakkhipati, cittagatikaṃ kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahatīti attho. Kāye sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca
atk-s0519a:983_4: okkamitvāti “seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ
atk-s0519a:983_5: vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyyā”ti vuttanayena iddhimā kāye sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā
atk-s0519a:983_6: paresaṃ dissamānena kāyena ārāmarāmaṇeyyakādīni pekkhamāno cittakkhaṇeneva icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0519a:984_0: 114. Yaṃ taṃ lokuttaraṃ ñāṇanti sabbaṃ lokaṃ uttaritvā abhibhavitvā ṭhitattā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a:984_1: na pana lokuttarabhūmikattā. Sabbakāle pavattatīti āvajjanapaṭibaddhavuttittā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a:984_2: na satataṃ samitaṃ pavattatīti. Na hi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ bhagavato sabbasmiṃyeva kāle
atk-s0519a:985_0: Kittayissāmi te santinti sabbakilesavūpasamahetutāya santiṃ nibbānaṃ dassessāmi.
atk-s0519a:985_1: Diṭṭhe dhammeti diṭṭhe dukkhādidhamme, imasmiṃ eva vā attabhāve. Anītihanti itihāsāti
atk-s0519a:985_2: evaṃ na itikirāya pavattaṃ, attapaccakkhanti attho. Yaṃ viditvā sato caranti “sabbe
atk-s0519a:985_3: saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā nayena sato hutvā caranto ariyamaggena yaṃ santiṃ viditvā.
atk-s0519a:985_4: Tare loke visattikanti saṅkhāraloke visappanato visattikasaṅkhātaṃ taṇhaṃ tare tareyya
atk-s0519a:986_0: Tañcāhaṃ abhinandāmīti taṃ vuttappakāraṃ santijotakaṃ tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ ahaṃ patthayāmi,
atk-s0519a:986_1: taṃ eva vā santiṃ uttamaṃ abhinandāmīti dhotako vadati. Uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjheti
atk-s0519a:986_2: ettha uddhanti anāgataṃ upari ca. Adhoti atītaṃ heṭṭhā ca. Tiriyañcāpi majjheti paccuppannaṃ
atk-s0519a:986_3: parito ca. Etaṃ viditvā saṅgotīti etaṃ anāgatādiṃ saṅgajananaṭṭhānanti ñatvā. Bhavābhavāyāti
atk-s0519a:986_4: khuddakānañceva mahantānañca bhavānaṃ atthāya, sassatucchedāya vā.
atk-s0519a:987_0: Ariyasaccānanti ariyabhāvakarānaṃ saccānaṃ. Ananubodhāti abujjhanena ajānanena. Appaṭivedhāti
atk-s0519a:987_1: appaṭivijjhanena. Sandhāvitanti bhavato bhavassa gamanena sandhāvitaṃ. Saṃsaritanti
atk-s0519a:987_2: punappunaṃ gamanavasena saṃsaritaṃ. Mamañceva tumhākañcāti mayā ceva tumhehi ca.
atk-s0519a:987_3: Atha vā sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritanti sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca ahosīti
atk-s0519a:987_4: attho. Bhavanettīti bhavābhavaṃ nayanasamatthā taṇhārajju. Saṃsitanti saṃsaritaṃ.
atk-s0519a:988_0: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti paccayehi saṅkharīyantīti “saṅkhārā”ti laddhanāmā pañcakkhandhā.
atk-s0519a:988_1: Ādiantavantato aniccantikato tāvakālikato khaṇaparittato ca na niccāti aniccā. Yadā
atk-s0519a:988_2: paññāya passatīti yadā vipassanāpaññāya passati. Atha imasmiṃ vaṭṭadukkhe nibbindati,
atk-s0519a:988_3: nibbindanto dukkhaparijānanādivasena saccāni paṭivijjhati. Esa maggo visuddhiyāti
atk-s0519a:988_4: yvāyaṃ vuttanayena saccappaṭivedho, esa visuddhatthāya maggo. Sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhāti
atk-s0519a:988_5: sabbe saṅkhārā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena khayaṭṭhena ca dukkhāti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0519a:988_6: Sabbe dhammā anattāti sabbepi tebhūmakadhammā parato tucchato suññato asārato avasavattanato
atk-s0519a:989_0: Seyyoti visiṭṭho uttamo. Sadisoti samāno. Hīnoti lāmako. Omānopi hi attano avaṅkaraṇamukhenapi
atk-s0519a:989_1: saṃpaggaṇhanavaseneva pavattati. Tena vuttaṃ “hīnohamasmī”ti. Kimaññatra yathābhūtassa
atk-s0519a:989_2: adassanāti sarasapabhaṅgutāya ekanteneva anavaṭṭhitasabhāvehi rūpadhammehi seyyādivasena
atk-s0519a:989_3: attano ukkhipanassa tesaṃ yathābhūtaṃ adassanaṃ aññāṇaṃ vinā kiṃ aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ siyā,
atk-s0519a:989_4: aññaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ tassa natthīti attho. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Vuttavipariyāyena
atk-s0519a:990_0: 115. Ye ariyasaccāni vibhāvayantīti dukkhādīni ariyasaccāni paññāobhāsena saccappaṭicchādakakilesandhakāraṃ
atk-s0519a:990_1: vidhametvā attano pakāsāni pākaṭāni karonti. Gambhīrapaññenāti appameyyapaññatāya
atk-s0519a:990_2: sadevakassapi lokassa ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhapaññena sabbaññunāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a:990_3: Sudesitānīti saṅkhepavitthārādīhi tehi tehi nayehi suṭṭhu desitāni. Kiñcāpi te honti
atk-s0519a:990_4: bhusaṃ pamattāti te vibhāvitaariyasaccā puggalā kāmaṃ devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:990_5: āgamma bhusaṃ pamattā honti, tathāpi sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa
atk-s0519a:990_6: nirodhena ṭhapetvā satta bhave anamatagge saṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca,
atk-s0519a:990_7: tesaṃ niruddhattā na aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ ādiyanti, sattamabhaveyeva pana vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā
atk-s0519a:991_0: Yathindakhīloti ettha yathāti upamāvacanaṃ. Indakhīloti nagaradvārathirakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:991_1: ummārabbhantare aṭṭha vā dasa vā hatthe pathaviṃ khaṇitvā ākoṭitassa sāradārumayassa
atk-s0519a:991_2: thambhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Pathavissito siyāti gambhīranemitāya anto pavisitvā bhūminissito
atk-s0519a:991_3: siyā bhaveyya. Catubbhi vātehīti catūhi disāhi āgatavātehi. Asampakampiyoti kampetuṃ
atk-s0519a:991_4: vā cāletuṃ vā asakkuṇeyyo. Tathūpamaṃ…pe… passatīti yo cattāri ariyasaccāni paññāya
atk-s0519a:991_5: ajjhogāhetvā passati, taṃ sappurisaṃ uttamapurisaṃ tathā dassanato sabbatitthiyavādavātehi
atk-s0519a:992_0: Sotāpattiyaṅgehīti ariyasotāpajjanassa aṅgabhūtehi. Ariyasāvakoti ariyassa buddhassa
atk-s0519a:992_1: bhagavato saddhammassavanante jātattā ariyasāvako. Khīṇanirayomhīti khīṇanirayo amhi.
atk-s0519a:992_2: Khīṇāpāyaduggativinipātoti idaṃ nirayādīnaṃyeva vevacanavasena vuttaṃ. Nirayādayo
atk-s0519a:992_3: hi vaḍḍhisaṅkhātato ayato apetattā apāyā. Dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti duggatiyo.
atk-s0519a:992_4: Dukkaṭakārino vivasā ettha nipatantīti vinipātā. Sotaṃ ariyamaggaṃ ādito patto adhigatoti
atk-s0519a:992_5: sotāpanno. Akuppadhammatāya maggaphalānaṃ puthujjanabhāvasaṅkhāte virūpe na nipatanasabhāvoti
atk-s0519a:992_6: avinipātadhammo. Tato eva dhammaniyāmena niyatatāya niyato. Uparimaggattayasaṅkhātā
atk-s0519a:992_7: sambodhi avassaṃ pattabbatāya assa paraṃ ayanaṃ gati paṭisaraṇanti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
atk-s0519a:993_0: Niviṭṭhātiādīni padāni aññamaññavevacanāneva. Sahadhammiyāti sabrahmacārino. Ariyakantehīti
atk-s0519a:993_1: ariyānaṃ kantehi piyehi manāpehi. Pañca sīlāni hi ariyasāvakānaṃ kantāni honti, bhavantarepi
atk-s0519a:993_2: avijahanato. Tāni sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabbopi panettha saṃvaro labbhatiyeva. Sotāpannohamasmīti
atk-s0519a:993_4: Yato sabbesampi sikkhāpadāvirodhena yuttaṭṭhāne byākaraṇaṃ anuññātamevāti.
atk-s0519a:994_0: Yassindriyānīti yassa ariyapuggalassa saddhādīni indriyāni. Subhāvitānīti ariyamaggabhāvanāvasena
atk-s0519a:994_1: suṭṭhu bhāvitāni. Ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā cāti orambhāgiyānaṃ uddhambhāgiyānañca saṃyojanānaṃ
atk-s0519a:995_0: Dhammapadānīti dhammakoṭṭhāsāni. Anabhijjhā dhammapadaṃ nāma alobho vā alobhasīsena
atk-s0519a:995_2: anabhijjhā dhammapadaṃ. Catubrahmavihāravasena adhigatāni abyāpādo dhammapadaṃ. Dasānussatiāhārepaṭikkūlasaññāvasena
atk-s0519a:995_3: adhigatāni sammāsati dhammapadaṃ. Dasakasiṇaānāpānavasena adhigatāni sammāsamādhi dhammapadaṃ.
atk-s0519a:996_0: Pañca chindeti heṭṭhā apāyupapattisaṃvattanikāni pañca orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni pāde
atk-s0519a:996_1: baddharajjuṃ viya puriso satthena heṭṭhā maggattayena chindeyya. Pañca jaheti uparidevalokasampāpakāni
atk-s0519a:996_2: pañca uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni puriso gīvāya baddharajjuṃ viya arahattamaggena jaheyya
atk-s0519a:996_3: chindeyyevāti attho. Pañca cuttari bhāvayeti uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ pahānatthāya
atk-s0519a:996_4: saddhādīni pañcindriyāni uttari bhāveyya. Pañca saṅgātigoti evaṃ sante pañcannaṃ
atk-s0519a:997_0: Anaññātaṃ appaṭividdhaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ, amatapadaṃyeva vā ñassāmi jānissāmīti paṭipannassa
atk-s0519a:997_2: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ājānāti paṭhamamaggena ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā jānātīti añño, tassa
atk-s0519a:997_3: indriyanti aññindriyaṃ, heṭṭhā tīsu phalesu, upari tīsu maggesu ca ñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:997_4: Aññātāvino catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitakiccassa arahato indriyanti aññātāvindriyaṃ, aggaphalañāṇassetaṃ
atk-s0519a:998_1: gahetuṃ nimittāni kāraṇāni. Bālāpadānānīti bālassa porāṇāni viruḷhāni kammāni. “Duccintitacintī”tiādīsu
atk-s0519a:998_2: duccintitaṃ abhijjhaṃ byāpādaṃ micchādassanañca cintetīti duccintitacintī. Dubbhāsitaṃ
atk-s0519a:998_3: musāvādādiṃ bhāsatīti dubbhāsitabhāsī. Dukkaṭaṃ pāṇātipātādikammaṃ karotīti dukkaṭakammakārī.
atk-s0519a:999_0: Bhiyyoti uparūpari. Pakujjheyyunti virujjheyyuṃ. “Pakuppeyyu”ntipi pāṭho. Bhusenāti
atk-s0519a:999_1: daḷhena. Daṇḍenāti daṇḍadānena. Dhīroti paṇḍito sappaññajātiko. Nisedhayeti paṭibāheyya.
atk-s0519a:999_2: Puna kiñci kātuṃ vattuṃ vā asamatthaṃ kareyyāti attho.
atk-s0519a:1000: Paranti paccatthikaṃ. Yo sato upasammatīti yo satimā hutvā upasammati, tassa upasamaṃyevāhaṃ bālassa paṭisedhanaṃ maññāmīti attho.
atk-s0519a:1001_0: Vajjanti dosaṃ. Yadā naṃ maññatīti yasmā naṃ maññati. Ajjhāruhatīti ajjhottharati.
atk-s0519a:1001_1: Gova bhiyyo palāyinanti yathā goyūthe tāvadeva dve gāvo yujjhante gogaṇo olokento
atk-s0519a:1001_2: tiṭṭhati yāva na eko palāyati, yadā pana palāyati, atha taṃ palāyīnaṃ sabbo gogaṇo
atk-s0519a:1001_3: bhiyyo ajjhottharati, evaṃ dummedho khamantaṃ bhiyyo ajjhottharatīti attho.
atk-s0519a:1002_0: Sadatthaparamāti sakatthaparamā. Khantyā bhiyyo na vijjatīti tesu sakatthaparamesu
atk-s0519a:1002_1: atthesu khantito uttaritaro añño attho na vijjati. Tamāhu paramaṃ khantinti yo balavā
atk-s0519a:1002_2: titikkhati, tassa taṃ khantiṃ paramaṃ āhu. Bālabalaṃ nāma aññāṇabalaṃ. Taṃ yassa
atk-s0519a:1002_3: balaṃ, abalameva taṃ, na taṃ balanti āhu kathenti dīpenti. Dhammaguttassāti dhammena
atk-s0519a:1002_4: rakkhitassa dhammaṃ vā rakkhantassa. Paṭivattāti paṭippharitvā vattā, paṭipparitvā
atk-s0519a:1002_5: vā yaṃ vā taṃ vā vadeyyāsi. Dhammaṭṭhaṃ pana cāletuṃ samattho nāma natthi. Tasseva
atk-s0519a:1002_6: tena pāpiyoti tena kodhena tasseva puggalassa pāpaṃ hoti. Katarassāti? Yo kuddhaṃ
atk-s0519a:1002_7: paṭikujjhati, tassa. Tattha kuddhanti sampadāne upayogavacanaṃ, kuddhassāti attho.
atk-s0519a:1002_8: Tikicchantānanti ekavacane bahuvacanaṃ, tikicchantanti attho. Janā maññantīti evarūpaṃ
atk-s0519a:1002_9: attano ca parassa cāti ubhinnaṃ atthaṃ tikicchantaṃ nipphādentaṃ puggalaṃ “bālo aya”nti
atk-s0519a:1002_10: andhabālaputhujjanā evaṃ maññanti. Ye dhammassa akovidāti ye catusaccadhamme akovidā
atk-s0519a:1003_0: 117. Pattanti adhigataṃ etarahi anubhuyyamānaṃ kāmūpakaraṇaṃ pattabbanti tadeva anāgate
atk-s0519a:1003_1: adhigantabbaṃ anubhavitabbaṃ, ubhayametaṃ rajānukiṇṇanti tadubhayampi rāgarajādīhi
atk-s0519a:1003_2: avakiṇṇaṃ. Āturassāti rāgādikilesāturassa. Anusikkhatoti kilesabahulapuggale anusikkhato.
atk-s0519a:1003_3: Ye ca sikkhāsārāti ye yathāsamādinnaṃ sīlavatādisaṅkhātaṃ sikkhaṃ sārato gahetvā
atk-s0519a:1003_4: ṭhitā. Tenāha – “sīlaṃ vataṃ jīvitaṃ brahmacariya”nti. Tattha yaṃ “na karomī”ti oramati,
atk-s0519a:1003_5: taṃ sīlaṃ. Yaṃ vesabhojanakiccacaraṇādi, taṃ vataṃ. Jīvitanti ājīvo. Brahmacariyanti
atk-s0519a:1003_6: methunavirati. Upaṭṭhānasārāti etesaṃ sīlādīnaṃ anuṭṭhānasārā. Etehi eva saṃsārasuddhīti
atk-s0519a:1004_0: Iccete ubho antāti iti sīlabbataparāmāsamukhena attakilamathānuyogo, kāmesu anavajjasaññitāmukhena
atk-s0519a:1004_1: kāmasukhallikānuyogo cāti ete ubho antā. Te ca kho yathākkamaṃ āyatiṃ pattabbe, etarahi
atk-s0519a:1004_2: patte ca rāgarajādiokiṇṇe kāmaguṇe allīnehi kilesāturānaṃ anusikkhantehi, sayañca
atk-s0519a:1004_3: kilesātureheva paṭipajjitabbā, tato eva ca te kaṭasivaḍḍhanā aparāparaṃ jarāmaraṇehi
atk-s0519a:1004_4: sivathikāya vaḍḍhanasīlā ekanteneva kaṭasiṃ vaḍḍhenti, sayaṃ vaḍḍhantā pare ca antadvaye
atk-s0519a:1005_0: Ubho ante anabhiññāyāti yathāvutte ubho ante ajānitvā. Olīyanti eketi “sassato attā
atk-s0519a:1005_1: ca loko cā”ti olīyanataṇhābhinivesavasena avalīyanti ekacce. Atidhāvanti eketi ekacce
atk-s0519a:1005_2: – “ucchijjati vinassati attā ca loko cā”ti atidhāvanābhinivesavasena atikkamanti.
atk-s0519a:1006: Na amaññiṃsu tesañca taṇhādimaññanānaṃ pahīnattā. Tato eva anupādāparinibbānato tividhampi vaṭṭaṃ tesaṃ paññāpanāya natthīti.
atk-s0519a:1007_0: Jaññāti jāneyya. Saṃyujeti saṃyojeyya. Mānusanti manussānaṃ idanti mānusaṃ, manussabhavapariyāpannaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1007_1: Kiñhi tassa sakaṃ hotīti tassa maccumukhaṃ pavisantassa sattassa kiṃ aññaṃ sakaṃ
atk-s0519a:1007_2: nāma aññatra kalyāṇakammato. Kammassakā hi sattā. Tenāha – “tasmā kareyya kalyāṇa”ntiādi.
atk-s0519a:1008_0: 118. Ime dhammāti ime kusalā vā akusalā vā dhammā. Evaṃgahitāti evaṃ samādinnā uppāditā.
atk-s0519a:1008_1: Idaṃ phalanti idaṃ iṭṭhavipākaṃ aniṭṭhavipākañca phalaṃ. Ayamatthoti ayaṃ vuḍḍhi,
atk-s0519a:1008_2: ayaṃ hānīti attho. Aññampi evaṃjātiyanti ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyaṃ vadati.
atk-s0519a:1009: Ākaṅkhato na jāneyyunti tattha yena hetunā bhagavato yā ākaṅkhā, sā aññesaṃ avisayoti āha – “kintaṃ bhagavā ākaṅkhatīti. Idaṃ avisajjanīya”nti.
atk-s0519a:1010_1: Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Iriyāyanti kāyavacīsamācāre. Pabhāveti ānubhāve. Hitesitāyanti
atk-s0519a:1010_2: mettāya. Iddhiyanti iddhividhāya. Ettakā buddhaguṇā, te ca paccekaṃ evaṃpabhāvā.
atk-s0519a:1010_3: Tathā maggaphalanibbānāni evamānubhāvāni. Ariyasaṅgho evaṃvidhaguṇehi yuttoti.
atk-s0519a:1011_0: Tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ mahānubhāvatā na sabbathā aññesaṃ visayo, bhagavato eva visayoti
atk-s0519a:1011_1: āha – “buddhavisayo avisajjanīyo”ti. Tena yo aññopi attho buddhavisayo, so avisajjanīyoti
atk-s0519a:1011_2: dasseti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “buddhavisayo acinteyyo na cintetabbo, yaṃ cintento
atk-s0519a:1011_3: ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti. Katamā pubbā koṭīti avisajjanīyanti “katamā pubbā
atk-s0519a:1011_4: koṭī”ti kenaci kataṃ pucchanaṃ avisajjanīyaṃ. Kasmā? Saṃsārassa purimāya koṭiyā abhāvato.
atk-s0519a:1011_5: Tenevāha – “purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyatī”ti. Tattha na paññāyatīti na dissati,
atk-s0519a:1011_6: na upalabbhatīti attho. Na paññāyatīti aññassa ñāṇavisayo na hotīti pana atthaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0519a:1011_7: “na paññāyatīti sāvakānaṃ ñāṇavekallenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha attūpanāyikāti attā
atk-s0519a:1011_8: upanetabbo etissāti attūpanāyikā. Natthi buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ avijānanāti etena
atk-s0519a:1011_9: purimāya koṭiyā abhāvato eva na paññāyati, na tattha ñāṇassa paṭighātoti dasseti.
atk-s0519a:1012_0: Yaṃ pana atthi, taṃ aññesaṃ appameyyampi bhagavato na appameyyanti bhagavato sabbattha
atk-s0519a:1012_1: appaṭihataññāṇataṃ dassetuṃ “yathā bhagavā kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbhā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:1012_2: Tattha aññataraṃ bhikkhunti nāmagottena apākaṭaṃ. “Kīva dīghaṃ nu kho, bhante, padume
atk-s0519a:1012_3: niraye āyuppamāṇa”nti pañhaṃ pucchitvā nisinnaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ evamāhāti. Etthāyaṃ
atk-s0519a:1012_4: pāṭhaseso – dīghaṃ kho, bhikkhu, padume niraye āyuppamāṇaṃ, taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātuṃ
atk-s0519a:1012_5: “ettakāni vassānī”ti vā “ettakāni vassasatānī”ti vā “ettakāni vassasahassānī”ti vā
atk-s0519a:1012_6: “ettakāni vassasatasahassānī”ti vāti. Sakkā pana, bhante, upamā kātunti. “Sakkā bhikkhū”ti
atk-s0519a:1012_7: bhagavā avoca. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho. Tato puriso
atk-s0519a:1012_8: vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekamekaṃ tilaṃ uddhareyya. Khippataraṃ kho so,
atk-s0519a:1012_9: bhikkhu, vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ
atk-s0519a:1012_10: gaccheyya, na tveva eko abbudo nirayo. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati abbudā nirayā,
atk-s0519a:1013_0: Tattha vīsatikhārikoti māgadhakena patthena cattāro patthā kosalaraṭṭhe eko pattho
atk-s0519a:1013_1: hoti. Tena patthena cattāro patthā āḷhakaṃ, cattāri āḷhakāni doṇaṃ, catudoṇā mānikā,
atk-s0519a:1013_2: catumānikā khārī. Tāya khāriyā vīsatikhāriko tilavāho. Tilavāhoti tilasakaṭaṃ. Abbudo
atk-s0519a:1013_3: nirayoti abbudo nāma eko paccekanirayo natthi, avīcimhi eva pana abbudagaṇanāya paccanokāso
atk-s0519a:1014_0: Tattha vassagaṇanāpi evaṃ veditabbā – yathā hi sataṃsatasahassāni koṭi hoti. Evaṃ
atk-s0519a:1014_1: sataṃsatasahassakoṭiyo pakoṭi nāma. Sataṃsatasahassapakoṭiyo koṭipakoṭi nāma. Sataṃsatasahassakoṭipakoṭiyo
atk-s0519a:1014_2: nahutaṃ. Sataṃsatasahassanahutāni ninnahutaṃ. Sataṃsatasahassāni ninnahutāni eko
atk-s0519a:1014_3: abbudo. Tato vīsatiguṇo nirabbudo. Esa nayo sabbattha. Ayañca gaṇanā aparicitānaṃ
atk-s0519a:1014_4: dukkarāti vuttaṃ – “taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātu”nti. Keci pana “tattha tattha paridevanānattena
atk-s0519a:1014_5: kammakāraṇanānattenapi imāni nāmāni laddhānī”ti vadanti. Apare “sītanarakā ete”ti.
atk-s0519a:1015_0: 119. Kathaṃ jinoti pakārapucchā. Kena jinoti kāraṇapucchā. Kena kāraṇena kena hetunā
atk-s0519a:1015_1: kāya paṭipattiyā jinoti pucchati. Kathanti pana kena pakārena kiṃ atītānaṃ, udāhu
atk-s0519a:1015_2: anāgatānaṃ paccuppannānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānena jinoti pucchati, tasmā taṃ “visajjanīya”nti
atk-s0519a:1015_3: vuttaṃ. Katamo jinoti kiṃ rūpaṃ jino, udāhu vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ jino.
atk-s0519a:1015_4: Rūpādivinimutto vā añño jino, yo “attā”ti vuccatīti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha “avisajjanīya”nti.
atk-s0519a:1016_0: Atthi tathāgatoti atthi satto. Yvāyamāyasmā “evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto”ti pañcakkhandhe
atk-s0519a:1016_1: upādāya paññapīyati, tassa puggalassa adhippetattā vuttaṃ “visajjanīya”nti. Rūpaṃ
atk-s0519a:1016_2: tathāgatoti rūpaṃ attāti sakkāyadiṭṭhivasena pucchatīti katvā vuttaṃ “avisajjanīya”nti.
atk-s0519a:1017_0: 120. Bālaṃ pīṭhasamāruḷhantiādīni sāmiatthe upayogavacanāni. Kāyena duccaritānīti
atk-s0519a:1017_1: kāyena duṭṭhu katāni. Olabbhantīti avalambanti avatthariyanti. Sesapadadvayaṃ tasseva
atk-s0519a:1017_2: vevacanaṃ. Olambanādiākārena hi tāni upaṭṭhahanti, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Mahatanti mahantānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1017_3: Pathaviyaṃ olambantīti pathavitale pattharanti. Sesapadadvayaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1017_4: Pattharaṇākāroyeva hesa. Tatra, bhikkhave, bālassāti tasmiṃ upaṭṭhahanākāre bālassa evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a:1018_0: Lābhā vo, bhikkhaveti bhikkhave, ye ime tumhehi paṭiladdhā manussattasaddhāpaṭilābhādayo,
atk-s0519a:1018_1: lābhā vo tumhākaṃ lābhā eva. Suladdhanti yampidaṃ pabbajitvā catupārisuddhisīlādisampādanaṃ
atk-s0519a:1018_2: laddhaṃ, tampi suladdhaṃ. Khaṇo vo paṭiladdhoti aṭṭhaakkhaṇavajjito navamoyaṃ khaṇo
atk-s0519a:1018_3: paṭiladdho maggabrahmacariyavāsāya. “Diṭṭhā mayā”tiādinā ekadesanidassanena aṭṭha akkhaṇe vibhāveti.
atk-s0519a:1019: 121. Yahiṃ yahinti yaṃ yaṃ duggatiṃ yo gacchati. So naṃ adhammoti yo adhammo tena carito, so naṃ adhammacāriṃ puggalaṃ. Hanātīti bādhati.
atk-s0519a:1020: Appesakkhatāti appānubhāvatā. Dubbaṇṇatāti virūpatā bībhacchatā. Duppaññatāti nippaññatā ahetukapaṭisandhivasena eḷamūgatā.
atk-s0519a:1021_0: 122. Vācānurakkhīti catunnaṃ vacīduccaritānaṃ parivajjanena vācānurakkhī. Abhijjhādīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:1021_1: anuppādanena manasā suṭṭhu saṃvuto. Pāṇātipātādayo pajahanto kāyena ca akusalaṃ na
atk-s0519a:1021_2: kayirā, ete tayo kammapathe visodhaye. Evaṃ visodhento hi sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esakehi
atk-s0519a:1021_3: buddhādīhi isīhi paveditaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ ārādheyyāti. Dukkaṭanti kāyena
atk-s0519a:1021_4: vācāya manasā ca dukkaṭaṃ sāvajjaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ duggatisaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ yassa
atk-s0519a:1021_5: natthi. Saṃvutaṃ tīhi ṭhānehīti etehi tīhi kāraṇehi kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ pavesanivāraṇato
atk-s0519a:1022_0: Accantadussīlyanti ekantadussīlabhāvo. Gihī vāpi jātito paṭṭhāya dasa akusalakammapathe
atk-s0519a:1022_1: karonto, pabbajito vāpi upasampannadivasato paṭṭhāya garukāpattiṃ āpajjamāno accantadussīlo
atk-s0519a:1022_2: nāma. Idha pana yo dvīsu tīsu attabhāvesu dussīlo, tassa gatiyā āgataṃ dussīlabhāvaṃ
atk-s0519a:1022_3: sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Dussīlabhāvoti cettha dussīlassa cha dvārāni nissāya uppannā
atk-s0519a:1022_4: taṇhā veditabbā. Māluvā sālamivotthatanti yassa puggalassa taṃ taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1022_5: Yathā nāma māluvā sālaṃ otthataṃ deve vassante pattehi udakaṃ paṭicchitvā saṃbhañjanavasena
atk-s0519a:1022_6: sabbatthakameva pariyonandhati, evaṃ attabhāvaṃ otthataṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ so
atk-s0519a:1022_7: māluvāya saṃbhañjitvā bhūmiyaṃ pātiyamāno rukkho viya tāya dussīlyasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya
atk-s0519a:1022_8: saṃbhañjitvā apāyesu pātiyamāno, yathā naṃ anatthakāmo diso icchati, tathā attānaṃ
atk-s0519a:1023_0: “Attanā hi kata”nti gāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yathā pāsāṇamayaṃ pāsāṇasambhavaṃ
atk-s0519a:1023_1: vajiraṃ tameva asmamayaṃ maṇiṃ attano uṭṭhānaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ pāsāṇamaṇiṃ khāyitvā
atk-s0519a:1023_2: chiddāchiddaṃ khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ katvā aparibhogaṃ karoti, evamevaṃ attanā kataṃ attani
atk-s0519a:1023_3: jātaṃ attasambhavaṃ pāpaṃ dummedhaṃ nippaññaṃ puggalaṃ catūsu apāyesu abhimatthati
atk-s0519a:1024_0: Niseviyāti katvā. Garahāti gārayhā. Bālamatīti mandabuddhino. Khayā ca kammassāti
atk-s0519a:1024_1: kammakkhayakarañāṇena kammassa khepanato. Vimuttacetasoti samucchedavimuttiyā paṭippassaddhivimuttiyā
atk-s0519a:1024_2: ca vimuttacitto. Nibbanti te jotirivindhanakkhayāti yathā nāma anupādāno jātavedo
atk-s0519a:1024_3: nibbāyati, evamevaṃ abhisaṅkhārassa viññāṇassa anavasesakkhayā nibbāyati.
atk-s0519a:1025_0: 123. “Yathāpi bhamaro”ti gāthāyaṃ bhamaroti yā kāci madhukarajāti. Pupphanti pupphārāme
atk-s0519a:1025_1: caranto pupphañca tassa vaṇṇañca gandhañca aheṭhayaṃ aheṭhayanto avināsento caratīti
atk-s0519a:1025_2: attho. Evaṃ caritvā ca paleti rasamādāyāti yāvadatthaṃ rasaṃ pivitvā aparampi madhukaraṇatthāya
atk-s0519a:1025_3: rasaṃ gahetvā ḍeti. So ekaṃ vanagahanaṃ ajjhogāhetvā rukkhasusirādīsu taṃ rajamissakaṃ
atk-s0519a:1025_4: rasaṃ ṭhapetvā anupubbena madhurarasaṃ madhuṃ karoti, na tassa pupphārāme caritapaccayā
atk-s0519a:1025_5: pupphaṃ vā tassa vaṇṇo vā gandho vā vinassati, atha kho pupphaṃ pākatikameva hoti.
atk-s0519a:1025_6: Evaṃ gāme munī careti evaṃ sekkho asekkho vā anagāriyamuni kulapaṭipāṭiyā gāme bhikkhaṃ
atk-s0519a:1025_7: gaṇhanto careyyāti attho. Na hi tassa gāme caraṇapaccayā saddhāhāni vā bhogahāni
atk-s0519a:1025_8: vā hoti, saddhāpi bhogāpi pākatikāva honti. Evaṃ caritvā ca pana gāmato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0519a:1025_9: bahigāme udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā nisinno akkhabhañjana- vaṇalepanaputtamaṃsūpamavasena
atk-s0519a:1025_10: paccavekkhanto piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā tathārūpaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ anupavisitvā ajjhattikakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:1025_11: sammasanto maggaphalāni hatthagatāneva karoti. Asekkhamuni pana diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāramanuyuñjati.
atk-s0519a:1025_12: Ayamassa bhamarena madhukarena sarikkhatā. Khīṇāsavo panettha adhippetoti.
atk-s0519a:1026_0: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatīti yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi
atk-s0519a:1026_1: dukkhehīti pātimokkho. So eva kāyikavācasikassa vītikkamassa saṃvaraṇato pidahanato
atk-s0519a:1026_2: saṃvaro. Tena pātimokkhasaṃvarena saṃvuto samannāgato hutvā sabbiriyāpathesu carati.
atk-s0519a:1026_3: Ācāragocarasampannoti ācārena ca gocarena ca sampanno. Aṇumattesūti appamattakesu.
atk-s0519a:1026_4: Vajjesūti akusaladhammesu. Bhayadassāvīti bhayaṃ dassī. Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti
atk-s0519a:1026_5: sikkhāpadesu yaṃ kiñci sikkhitabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ sammā ādiyitvā sikkhati.
atk-s0519a:1027_0: Kāyakammavacīkammena samannāgato, kusalena parisuddhājīvoti ettha ācāragocaraggahaṇeneva
atk-s0519a:1027_1: kusale kāyakamme vacīkamme ca gahitepi yasmā idaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ na ākāsādīsu
atk-s0519a:1027_2: uppajjati, kāyavacīdvāresu eva pana uppajjati, tasmā tassa uppattidvāradassanatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:1027_3: “kāyavacīkammena samannāgato, kusalenā”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana tena samannāgato, tasmā
atk-s0519a:1027_4: parisuddhājīvo, ājīvapārisuddhipi sīlamevāti dassanatthaṃ etaṃ vuttaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0519a:1027_5: – “katame ca thapati kusalā sīlā? Kusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ kusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ, parisuddhaṃ
atk-s0519a:1027_6: ājīvampi kho ahaṃ thapati sīlasmiṃ vadāmī”ti. Āraddhavīriyoti yassa kāyikaṃ cetasikañca
atk-s0519a:1027_7: vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ hoti, so “āraddhavīriyo”ti vuccati. Tattha yo gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodetvā
atk-s0519a:1027_8: catūsu iriyāpathesu aṭṭhaārambhavatthuvasena ekako hoti, tassa kāyikaṃ vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ
atk-s0519a:1027_9: nāma hoti. Yo cittasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodetvā aṭṭhasamāpattivasena ekako hoti, gamanādīsu
atk-s0519a:1027_10: uppannakilesaṃ uppannaṭṭhāneyeva niggaṇhitvā jhānaṃ nibbatteti, tassa cetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ
atk-s0519a:1027_11: āraddhaṃ nāma hoti. Evaṃ āraddhavīriyo. Thāmavāti ṭhitimā. Daḷhaparakkamoti thiraparakkamo.
atk-s0519a:1027_13: sampādanatthaṃ, paccakkhakaraṇatthañca dhuraṃ anikkhipitvā vīriyaṃ ussukkāpento viharati.
atk-s0519a:1027_14: Paññavāti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayabbayapariggāhikāya paññāya samannāgato. Tenāha
atk-s0519a:1028_0: Natthi puttasamaṃ pemanti mātāpitaro virūpepi attano puttake suvaṇṇabimbakaṃ viya
atk-s0519a:1028_1: maññanti mālāguḷe viya sīsādīsu katvā pariharamānā. Tehi uhaditāpi omuttitāpi gandhavilepanaṃ
atk-s0519a:1028_2: paṭicchantā viya somanassaṃ āpajjanti. Tenāha – “natthi puttasamaṃ pema”nti. Puttapemena
atk-s0519a:1028_3: samaṃ pemaṃ nāma natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Gosamitanti gohi samaṃ godhanasadisaṃ aññaṃ
atk-s0519a:1028_4: dhanaṃ nāma natthi. Sūriyasamā ābhāti sūriyābhāya samā aññā ābhā nāma natthi. Samuddaparamāti
atk-s0519a:1028_5: ye keci aññe sarā nāma, sabbe te samuddaparamā. Samuddo tesaṃ uttamo, samuddasadisaṃ
atk-s0519a:1028_6: aññaṃ udakaṃ nidānaṃ nāma natthi bhagavāti vadati.
atk-s0519a:1029_0: Yasmā pana attapemena samaṃ pemaṃ natthi. Mātāpitaro hi chaḍḍetvāpi puttadhītaro
atk-s0519a:1029_1: aposetvā attānameva posenti. Dhaññena ca samaṃ dhanaṃ nāma natthi. Tathārūpe hi kāle
atk-s0519a:1029_3: gahetvā gacchanti. Paññāya ca samā ābhā nāma natthi. Sūriyādayo hi ekadesaṃyeva obhāsenti,
atk-s0519a:1029_4: paccuppannameva ca tamaṃ vinodenti, paññā pana dasasahassimpi lokadhātuṃ ekapajjotaṃ
atk-s0519a:1029_5: kātuṃ sakkoti, atītaṃsādipaṭicchādakañca tamaṃ vidhamati. Meghavuṭṭhiyā ca samo saro
atk-s0519a:1029_6: nāma natthi. Nadī vā hi hotu taḷākādīni vā, vuṭṭhisamo saro nāma natthi. Meghavuṭṭhiyā
atk-s0519a:1029_7: hi pacchinnāya mahāsamudde aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṃ na hoti, vuṭṭhiyā pana
atk-s0519a:1029_8: pavattamānāya yāva ābhassarabhavanāpi ekodakaṃ hoti. Tasmā bhagavā devatāvacanaṃ
atk-s0519a:1030_0: 124. Kiṃsūdha bhītāti kiṃ nu bhītā. Maggo canekāyatano pavuttoti aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇavasena
atk-s0519a:1030_1: anekehi kāraṇehi maggo kathito, evaṃ sante kissa bhītā hutvā ayaṃ janatā dvāsaṭṭhi
atk-s0519a:1030_2: diṭṭhiyo aggahesīti vadati. Bhūripaññāti bahupañña ussannapañña. Paralokaṃ na bhāyeti
atk-s0519a:1030_3: imasmā lokā paralokaṃ gacchanto na bhāyeyya.
atk-s0519a:1031_0: Paṇidhāyāti ṭhapetvā. Gharamāvasantoti anāthapiṇḍikādayo viya bahvannapāne ghare
atk-s0519a:1031_1: vasanto. Saṃvibhāgīti accharāya gahitampi nakhena phāletvā parassa datvāva bhuñjanasīlo.
atk-s0519a:1031_2: Vadaññūti yācakānaṃ yācanavasena vuttavacanaññū, vacanīyo vā. Ettha ca vācanti cattāri
atk-s0519a:1031_3: vacīsucaritāni gahitāni. Mananti tīṇi manosucaritāni. Kāyenāti tīṇi kāyasucaritāni.
atk-s0519a:1031_4: Ime dasa kusalakammapathā pubbasuddhiaṅgaṃ nāma. “Bahvannapānaṃ gharamāvasanto”ti
atk-s0519a:1031_5: iminā yaññaupakkharo gahito. Saddhoti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, mudūti ekaṃ, saṃvibhāgīti ekaṃ,
atk-s0519a:1031_6: vadaññūti ekanti imāni cattāri aṅgāni sandhāya “etesu dhammesu ṭhito catūsū”ti āha.
atk-s0519a:1032: Aparo nayo – “vāca”ntiādīni tīṇi aṅgāni, “bahvannapāna”nti iminā yaññaupakkharova gahito, “saddho mudu saṃvibhāgī vadaññū”ti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1033_0: Aparo dukanayo nāma hoti – “vācaṃ manañcā”ti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, “kāyena pāpāni akubbamāno
atk-s0519a:1033_1: bahvannapānaṃ gharamāvasanto”ti ekaṃ, “saddho mudū”ti ekaṃ, “saṃvibhāgī vadaññū”ti
atk-s0519a:1033_2: ekanti etesu catūsu dhammesu ṭhito dhamme ṭhito nāma hoti. So ito paralokaṃ gacchantona bhāyati.
atk-s0519a:1034_0: Kāyasamācārampītiādi pātimokkhasaṃvaradassanaṃ. Tattha duvidhenāti dvividhena, dvīhi
atk-s0519a:1034_1: koṭṭhāsehīti attho. Jaññāti jāneyya. Sīlakathā ca nāmesā kammapathavasena vā paṇṇattivasena
atk-s0519a:1034_2: vā kathetabbā. Tattha kammapathavasena tāva kathentena asevitabbakāyasamācāro pāṇātipātādinnādānamicchācārehi
atk-s0519a:1034_4: pāṇātipātādiveramaṇīhi ceva kāyadvāre paññattasikkhāpadaavītikkamena ca kathetabbo.
atk-s0519a:1035_1: ca kathetabbo. Sevitabbavacīsamācāro musāvādādiveramaṇīhi ceva vacīdvāre paññattasikkhāpadaavītikkamena ca kathetabbo.
atk-s0519a:1036_0: Pariyesanā pana kāyavācāhi pariyesanā eva, sā kāyavacīsamācāraggahaṇena gahitāpi
atk-s0519a:1036_1: yasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ nāma etasmiṃyeva dvāradvaye uppajjati, na ākāse, tasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakasīladassanatthaṃ
atk-s0519a:1036_2: visuṃ vuttā. Tattha nasevitabbapariyesanā anariyapariyesanāya kathetabbā, sevitabbapariyesanā
atk-s0519a:1036_3: ariyapariyesanāya. Vuttañhetaṃ – “katamā ca, bhikkhave, anariyapariyesanā? Idha,
atk-s0519a:1036_4: bhikkhave, ekacco attanā jātidhammo samāno jātidhammaṃyeva pariyesatī”tiādi. Tathā
atk-s0519a:1036_5: “katamā ca, bhikkhave, ariyapariyesanā? Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanā jātidhammo
atk-s0519a:1036_6: samāno jātidhamme ādīnavaṃ viditvā ajātaṃ anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyesatī”tiādi.
atk-s0519a:1037_0: 170. Maggānaṭṭhaṅgikoti jaṅghamaggādayo vā hontu dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatamaggā vā, sabbesampi
atk-s0519a:1037_1: maggānaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīhi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi micchādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a:1037_2: pahānakaro nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā catūsupi saccesu dukkhaparijānanādikiccaṃ sādhayamāno
atk-s0519a:1037_3: aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo seṭṭho uttamo. Saccānaṃ caturo padāti “saccaṃ bhaṇe na kujjheyyā”ti
atk-s0519a:1037_4: āgataṃ vacīsaccaṃ vā hotu, “sacco brāhmaṇo, sacco khattiyo”tiādibhedaṃ sammutisaccaṃ
atk-s0519a:1037_5: vā, “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti diṭṭhisaccaṃ vā, “ekañhi saccaṃ na dutiyamatthī”ti
atk-s0519a:1037_6: vuttaṃ paramatthasaccaṃ vā hotu. Sabbesampi imesaṃ saccānaṃ parijānitabbaṭṭhena pahātabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0519a:1037_8: ariyasacca”ntiādayo caturo padā seṭṭhā nāma. Virāgo seṭṭho dhammānanti “yāvatā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0519a:1037_9: dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ dhammānaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti vacanato
atk-s0519a:1037_10: nibbānasaṅkhāto virāgo sabbadhammānaṃ seṭṭho. Dvipadānañca cakkhumāti sabbesampi
atk-s0519a:1037_11: devamanussādibhedānaṃ dvipadānaṃ pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā bhagavāva seṭṭhoti.
atk-s0519a:1038_0: Aggānīti uttamāni. Yāvatāti yattakā. Apadāti nippadā ahimacchādayo. Dvipadāti manussapakkhijātādayo.
atk-s0519a:1038_1: Catuppadāti hatthiassādayo. Bahuppadāti satapadiādayo. Rūpinoti kāmāvacararūpāvacarasattā.
atk-s0519a:1038_2: Asaññinoti asaññībhave nibbattasattā. Nevasaññīnāsaññinoti bhavagge nibbattasattā.
atk-s0519a:1038_3: Aggamakkhāyatīti guṇehi aggo uttamo seṭṭho akkhāyati.
atk-s0519a:1039_0: Asaṅkhatānanti nibbānameva vuttaṃ. Virāgotiādīni ca nibbānasseva nāmāni. Tañhi āgamma
atk-s0519a:1039_1: sabbe kilesā virajjanti, sabbe rāgamadādayo madā nimmadā honti abhāvaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0519a:1039_2: sabbā pipāsā vinayaṃ upenti, sabbe ālayā samugghātaṃ gacchanti, vaṭṭāni upacchijjanti,
atk-s0519a:1039_3: taṇhā khīyati, sabbapariḷāhā vūpasammanti, vaṭṭadukkhaṃ nirujjhati nibbāyati. Tasmā
atk-s0519a:1040_0: Dhammo ca kusalakkhatoti tassa satthuno dhammo ca kusalo anavajjo, anavajjattā eva
atk-s0519a:1040_1: paṭipakkhehi rāgādīhi kilesehi sabbatitthiyavādehi ca aparikkhato. Tāni tīṇi visissareti
atk-s0519a:1040_2: etāni tīṇi ratanāni loke sabbaratanehi visissanti guṇavasena sabbalokaṃ atisentīti attho.
atk-s0519a:1041_0: Samaṇapadumasañcayo gaṇoti padumasadisānaṃ ariyasamaṇānaṃ samūhasaṅkhāto gaṇo. Padumanti
atk-s0519a:1041_1: hi paripuṇṇasatapattassa saroruhassa nāmaṃ. Ariyapuggalā ca sabbathāpi paripuṇṇaguṇāti
atk-s0519a:1041_2: padumasadisā vuttā. Vidūnaṃ sakkatoti vidūhi paṇḍitehi sakkato. Naravaradamakoti
atk-s0519a:1041_3: naravaro ca purisānaṃ damako nāyako cāti attho. Lokassa uttarīti lokassa upari ṭhitāni,
atk-s0519a:1042_0: Nirupadāhoti rāgapariḷāhādīhi anupadāho. Saccanāmoti avitathanāmo yathābhuccaguṇehi
atk-s0519a:1042_1: āgatanāmo. Sabbābhibhūti sabbalokaṃ attano guṇehi abhibhavitvā ṭhito. Saccadhammoti
atk-s0519a:1042_2: vaṭṭato ekantanissaraṇabhāvena avitatho saha pariyattiyā navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo,
atk-s0519a:1042_3: tato eva natthañño tassa uttarīti tassa uttari adhikaguṇo añño ca dhammo natthīti
atk-s0519a:1042_4: attho. Ariyasaṅghova niccaṃ sabbakālaṃ vidūhi sabbapaṇḍitehi pūjito.
atk-s0519a:1043: “Ekāyana”nti gāthāya ekāyananti ekaṃ maggaṃ. Maggassa hi –
atk-s0519a:1045: Nāvā uttarasetu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅgamo”ti. –
atk-s0519a:1046_0: Bahūni nāmāni, svāyaṃ idha ayananāmena vutto. Tasmā ekāyananti ekamaggaṃ, na dvedhāpathabhūtanti
atk-s0519a:1046_1: attho. Atha vā ekena ayitabbanti ekāyanaṃ. Gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya vivekaṭṭhena pavivittena
atk-s0519a:1046_2: paṭipajjitabbanti attho. Ayanti vā etenāti ayano, saṃsārato nibbānaṃ gacchantīti
atk-s0519a:1046_3: attho. Ekassa vā sabbasattaseṭṭhassa bhagavato ayanoti ekāyano. Kiñcāpi hi tena aññepi
atk-s0519a:1046_4: ayanti, tathāpi bhagavatova so ayano, tena uppāditattā. Yathāha – “so hi, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0519a:1046_5: bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā”tiādi. Ayatīti vā ayano, gacchati pavattatīti
atk-s0519a:1046_6: attho. Ekasmiṃ imasmiṃyeva dhammavinaye ayano, na aññatthāti ekāyano. Yathāha – “imasmiṃ
atk-s0519a:1046_7: kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhatī”ti. Api ca pubbabhāge
atk-s0519a:1046_8: nānāmukhabhāvanāya pavattopi aparabhāge ekaṃ nibbānameva ayati gacchatīti ekāyano, taṃ ekāyanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1047_0: Jātikhayantadassīti jātiyā khayasaṅkhāto anto jātikhayanto. Jātiyā accantakhayanto
atk-s0519a:1047_1: nibbānaṃ, taṃ passīti jātikhayantadassī. “Maggaṃ pajānāti hitānukampī”tipi pāṭho.
atk-s0519a:1047_2: Tassattho – vuttappakāraṃ ekāyanasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ sayambhuñāṇena bhagavā pajānāti,
atk-s0519a:1047_3: jānanto ca tena tena hitena satte anukampatīti. Idāni tassa maggassa ekāyanabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0519a:1047_4: tīsupi kālesu ekantaniyyānatañca vibhāvetuṃ “etena maggena tariṃsu pubbe, tarissanti
atk-s0519a:1047_5: ye ca taranti ogha”nti āha. Tassattho – ye atītamaddhānaṃ kāmoghādicatubbidhaṃ oghaṃ
atk-s0519a:1047_6: tariṃsu, ye taṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ tarissanti, etarahi ca taranti, te sabbe eteneva
atk-s0519a:1047_7: maggena, na aññenāti. Visuddhipekkhāti caturoghanittharaṇena accantavisuddhiṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0519a:1048_0: Evaṃ duvidhampi sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nānāsuttapadāni udāharantena vibhajitvā idāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi
atk-s0519a:1048_1: saṃsanditvā dassetuṃ puna “lokiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha dassanabhāgiyena
atk-s0519a:1048_2: ca bhāvanābhāgiyena cāti nibbedhabhāgiyena. Nibbedhabhāgiyameva hi dassanabhāgiyaṃ
atk-s0519a:1048_3: bhāvanābhāgiyanti dvidhā bhinditvā dassitaṃ. Lokiyañca lokuttarañcāti lokiyaṃ lokuttarañca
atk-s0519a:1048_4: suttaṃ, saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi dassanabhāgiyādīhi cāti ubhayehi niddisitabbanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a:1048_5: Yasmiṃ suttetiādi niddisanākāradassanaṃ. Tattha saṃkilesabhāgiyanti saṃkilesakoṭṭhāsasahitaṃ,
atk-s0519a:1049_0: Evaṃ lokiyattikassa saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi catūhi padehi saṃsandanaṃ dassetvā iminā
atk-s0519a:1049_1: nayena sesatikānaṃ sesapadānañca saṃsandanaṃ suviññeyyanti taṃ anuddharitvā saṃkilesabhāgiyādīnaṃ
atk-s0519a:1049_2: samatikkamanaṃ dassetuṃ “vāsanābhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yadipi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ
atk-s0519a:1049_3: suttaṃ, vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ lokiyameva. Tathāpi lokuttarasuttāni viya lokiyasuttānaṃ
atk-s0519a:1049_4: vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyassa samatikkamāya hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:1049_5: “vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyassa suttassa nigghātāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0519a:1049_6: nigghātāyāti pahānāya. Suttasīsena cettha suttattho gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yasmā ca
atk-s0519a:1049_7: vodānadhammā viya saṃkilesadhammānaṃ dassanabhūmisamatikkamaneneva bhāvanābhūmi adhigantabbā,
atk-s0519a:1049_8: tasmā “bhāvanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ dassanabhāgiyassa suttassa paṭinissaggāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1049_9: Yasmā pana asekkhadhammesu uppannesu maggabhāvanākiccaṃ nāma natthi. Jhānabhāvanāpi
atk-s0519a:1049_10: diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthā eva hoti, tasmā “asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ bhāvanābhāgiyassa
atk-s0519a:1049_11: suttassa paṭinissaggāya, asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārattha”nti ca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1050: Idāni tikapadeheva saṃsanditvā dassetuṃ “lokuttara”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Ekabījinātiādīsu yo sotāpanno hutvā ekameva attabhāvaṃ janetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ ekabījī nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0519a:1051_0: “Katamo ca puggalo ekabījī? Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno
atk-s0519a:1051_1: hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo. So ekaṃyeva mānusakaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0519a:1051_2: dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ekabījī”ti.
atk-s0519a:1052: Yo pana dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ kolaṃkolo nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0519a:1053: “Katamo ca puggalo kolaṃkolo? Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ…pe… parāyaṇo. So dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo kolaṃkolo”ti.
atk-s0519a:1054: Tattha kulānīti bhave. Dve vā tīṇi vāti idamettha desanāmattameva. Yāva chaṭṭhabhavā saṃsarantopi kolaṃkolo hoti eva.
atk-s0519a:1055: Yo pana satta bhave saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ sattakkhattuparamo nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0519a:1056_0: “Katamo ca puggalo sattakkhattuparamo? Idhekacco…pe… parāyaṇo. So sattakkhattuṃ deve
atk-s0519a:1056_1: ceva mānuse ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo
atk-s0519a:1057_0: Ko pana tesaṃ etaṃ pabhedaṃ niyametīti? Keci tāva “pubbahetu niyametī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0519a:1057_1: Keci “paṭhamamaggo”, keci “upari tayo maggā”. Keci “tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā”ti.
atk-s0519a:1057_2: Tattha pubbahetu niyametīti vāde paṭhamamaggassa upanissayo kato nāma hoti. Upari
atk-s0519a:1057_3: tayo maggā nirupanissayā uppannāti āpajjati. Paṭhamamaggo niyametīti vāde upari tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0519a:1057_4: maggānaṃ niratthakatā āpajjati. Upari tayo maggā niyamentīti vāde “paṭhamamagge anuppanne
atk-s0519a:1057_5: eva upari tayo maggā uppannā”ti āpajjati. Vipassanā niyametīti vādo pana yujjati.
atk-s0519a:1057_6: Sace hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā balavatī hoti, ekabījī nāma hoti. Tato mandatarā
atk-s0519a:1057_7: kolaṃkolo. Tato mandatarā sattakkhattuparamoti. Ettha ca yo manussesu eva sattakkhattuṃ
atk-s0519a:1057_8: saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, yo ca devesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0519a:1057_9: pāpuṇāti, ime na idhādhippetā. Yo pana kālena devesu, kālena manussesūti vomissakanayena
atk-s0519a:1057_10: saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, so idhādhippeto. Tasmā “sattakkhattuparamo”ti idaṃ
atk-s0519a:1057_11: idhaṭṭhakavokiṇṇavaṭṭajjhāsayassa vasena veditabbaṃ. Vaṭṭajjhāsayo hi ādito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0519a:1057_12: cha devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā parinibbāyissati.
atk-s0519a:1058_0: Tattha yo saddhaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti, so maggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī
atk-s0519a:1058_1: nāma hoti. Phalakkhaṇe pana saddhāvimutto nāma hutvā vuttanayena ekabījiādibhedo
atk-s0519a:1058_2: hoti. Yo pana paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti, so maggakkhaṇe dhammānusārī
atk-s0519a:1058_3: nāma. Phalakkhaṇe pana diṭṭhippatto nāma hutvā ekabījiādibhedo hoti. Idañca aṭṭhannaṃ
atk-s0519a:1058_4: vimokkhānaṃ alābhino vasena vuttaṃ. Lābhī pana phalakkhaṇe kāyasakkhī nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a:1058_5: Tattha ye saddhāvimuttadiṭṭhippattakāyasakkhināmakā tayo sotāpannā, te ekabījiādīhi
atk-s0519a:1058_6: tīheva saṅgahetvā vuttaṃ – “pañcahi puggalehi niddisitabbaṃ ekabījinā…pe… dhammānusārinā”ti, evaṃ pañcahi.
atk-s0519a:1059_0: Dvādasahi puggalehīti sakadāgāmimaggaṭṭho, sakadāgāmī, anāgāmimaggaṭṭho, abhedena
atk-s0519a:1059_2: bhedena aṭṭhāti, evaṃ dvādasahi. Tattha hi yo avihādīsu tattha tattha āyuvemajjhaṃ
atk-s0519a:1059_3: appatvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ antarāparinibbāyī. Yo pana āyuvemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0519a:1059_4: pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ upahaccaparinibbāyī. Tathā yo avihādīsu upapanno asaṅkhārena appayogena
atk-s0519a:1059_5: arahattaṃ adhigacchati, ayaṃ asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī. Yo pana sasaṅkhārena sappayogena
atk-s0519a:1059_6: arahattaṃ adhigacchati, ayaṃ sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī. Uddhaṃ uparūpari brahmaloke upapattisoto
atk-s0519a:1059_7: etassāti uddhaṃsoto. Paṭisandhivasena akaniṭṭhe gacchatīti akaniṭṭhagāmī.
atk-s0519a:1060_0: Tattha atthi uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī atthi uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī, atthi na
atk-s0519a:1060_1: uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī atthi na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmīti. Tattha yo idha anāgāmiphalaṃ
atk-s0519a:1060_2: patvā avihādīsu nibbatto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā uparūpari nibbattitvā akaniṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0519a:1060_3: pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Yo pana avihādīsu nibbatto tattheva
atk-s0519a:1060_4: aparinibbāyitvā akaniṭṭhampi appatvā uparūpari brahmaloke parinibbāyati, ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto
atk-s0519a:1060_5: na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Yo ito cavitvā akaniṭṭheyeva nibbattati, ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto
atk-s0519a:1060_6: akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Yo pana avihādīsu catūsu aññatarasmiṃ nibbattitvā tattheva parinibbāyati,
atk-s0519a:1060_7: ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Saddhāvimuttādayo vuttavibhāgāyeva.
atk-s0519a:1061_0: Navahi puggalehīti ettha aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ alābhī arahā paññāvimutto nāma. Tesaṃ
atk-s0519a:1061_1: pana lābhī vikkhambhanasamucchedavimokkhavasena ubhohi bhāgehi rūpakāyanāmakāyasaṅkhātato
atk-s0519a:1061_2: ubhato bhāgato vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma. Samasīsināti ettha tividho samasīsī
atk-s0519a:1062_0: Tatra yo ṭhānādīsu iriyāpathesu yeneva iriyāpathena samannāgato hutvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0519a:1062_1: ārabhati, teneva iriyāpathena arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ iriyāpathasamasīsī
atk-s0519a:1062_2: nāma. Yo pana ekaṃ rogaṃ patvā antoroge eva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā
atk-s0519a:1062_3: teneva rogena parinibbāyati, ayaṃ rogasamasīsī nāma. Palibodhasīsaṃ taṇhā, bandhanasīsaṃ
atk-s0519a:1062_4: māno, parāmāsasīsaṃ diṭṭhi, vikkhepasīsaṃ uddhaccaṃ, kilesasīsaṃ avijjā, adhimokkhasīsaṃ
atk-s0519a:1062_5: saddhā, paggahasīsaṃ vīriyaṃ, upaṭṭhānasīsaṃ sati, avikkhepasīsaṃ samādhi, dassanasīsaṃ
atk-s0519a:1062_6: paññā, pavattasīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ, gocarasīsaṃ vimokkho, saṅkhārasīsaṃ nirodhoti
atk-s0519a:1062_7: terasasu sīsesu kilesasīsaṃ avijjaṃ arahattamaggo pariyādiyati, pavattasīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ
atk-s0519a:1062_8: cuticittaṃ pariyādiyati. Tattha avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ pariyādātuṃ
atk-s0519a:1062_9: na sakkoti. Jīvitindriyapariyādāyakaṃ avijjaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti. Aññaṃ avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ
atk-s0519a:1062_10: cittaṃ, aññaṃ jīvitindriyapariyādāyakaṃ. Yassa cetaṃ sīsadvayaṃ samaṃ pariyādānaṃ
atk-s0519a:1063_0: Kathaṃ panidaṃ samaṃ hotīti? Vārasamatāya. Yasmiñhi vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, sotāpattimagge
atk-s0519a:1063_1: pañca paccavekkhaṇāni, sakadāgāmimagge pañca, anāgāmimagge pañca, arahattamagge cattārīti
atk-s0519a:1063_2: ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyato imāya
atk-s0519a:1063_3: vārasamatāya idaṃ ubhayasīsapariyādānampi samaṃ hoti nāma. Tenāyaṃ puggalo “jīvitasamasīsī”ti
atk-s0519a:1063_4: vuccati, ayameva idhādhippeto. Evaṃ suññatavimuttādayo tayo saddhāvimutto paññāvimutto
atk-s0519a:1063_5: ubhatobhāgavimutto samasīsīti satta sāvakā arahanto, paccekabuddho, sammāsambuddhoti
atk-s0519a:1063_6: imehi navahi puggalehi asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1064_0: Rāgacaritoti rāgasahitaṃ caritaṃ etassāti rāgacarito. Rāgena vā carito pavattito
atk-s0519a:1064_1: rāgacarito, rāgajjhāsayo rāgādhikoti attho. Esa nayo sesesupi. Rāgamukhe ṭhitoti
atk-s0519a:1064_2: rāgapariyuṭṭhāne ṭhito, pariyuṭṭhitarāgoti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0519a:1065_0: Vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttanti lokiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ. Lokiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:1065_1: saṃkilesabhāgiyañhi suttaṃ rāgacaritehi puggalehi niddiṭṭhaṃ. Tattha “lokiyaṃ, sattādhiṭṭhāna”nti
atk-s0519a:1065_2: padadvayaṃ anuvattamānaṃ katvā vuttaṃ “vāsanābhāgiya”nti. Sīlavantehīti sīlavantādīhi
atk-s0519a:1065_3: puggalehi. Pakatisīlantiādi yehi samannāgatā, te puggalā. Tesaṃ dassanena puggalānaṃ
atk-s0519a:1065_4: upalakkhaṇaṃ. Atha vā dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ pakatisīlādivasena, sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ pakatisīlavantādivasena
atk-s0519a:1065_5: veditabbanti imassa nayassa dassanatthaṃ “sīlavantehi niddisitabba”nti vatvā “pakatisīla”ntiādi
atk-s0519a:1065_6: vuttaṃ. Taṃ pakatisīlādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ eva gahaṇaṃ nidassanamattaṃ, pattidānaabbhanumodanadhammassavanadesanādiṭṭhijukammādīnampi
atk-s0519a:1065_7: cettha sambhavato. Tesampi vā ettheva saṅgahetvā dassanatthaṃ “pañcā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1066_0: Tattha pakatisīlanti sampattaviratisīlaṃ. Cittappasādoti kammaphalasaddhā ratanattayasaddhā
atk-s0519a:1066_1: ca. Ñāṇaṃ paññāya niddisitabbanti yasmiṃ sutte paññā āgatā, taṃ suttaṃ ñāṇanti niddisitabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1066_2: Na kevalaṃ paññāpariyāyeneva, atha kho paññindriyādipariyāyenapi yattha paññā āgatā,
atk-s0519a:1066_3: taṃ suttaṃ ñāṇanti niddisitabbanti dassetuṃ “paññindriyenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho
atk-s0519a:1066_4: – heṭṭhā vutto eva. Yaṃ vā panātiādīsu yaṃ vā aññaṃ kiñci paññāya adhivacanaṃ. Sabbaṃ
atk-s0519a:1066_5: taṃ yattha katthaci sutte āgataṃ, taṃ suttaṃ ñāṇanti niddisitabbanti attho.
atk-s0519a:1067_0: Ajjhattikabāhirehīti yasmiṃ sutte ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, bāhirāni ca āyatanāni āgatāni,
atk-s0519a:1067_1: taṃ suttaṃ tehi āyatanehi ñāṇaṃ ñeyyanti niddisitabbaṃ. Paññāpi ārammaṇabhūtā ñeyyanti
atk-s0519a:1067_2: ñeyyato visuṃ katvā paññā vuttā. Tathā hi paññā ñāṇantarassa ārammaṇanti katthaci
atk-s0519a:1067_3: sutte ñeyyabhāvenapi vuccati. Yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇabhūtanti yaṃ kiñci ñāṇassa visayabhūtaṃ
atk-s0519a:1067_4: rūpādi. Ajjhattikaṃ vā bāhiraṃ vāti vā-saddena oḷārikādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Sabbaṃ taṃ
atk-s0519a:1067_5: saṅkhatena asaṅkhatena cāti sabbaṃ taṃ yathāsambhavaṃ saṅkhatabhāvena asaṅkhatabhāvena
atk-s0519a:1067_6: ca ñeyyanti niddisitabbaṃ. Ñeyyadhammavasena hi ñeyyasuttaṃ ñeyyanti vuccatīti.
atk-s0519a:1068_0: Yaṃ vā pana kiñci bhagavā aññataravacanaṃ bhāsatīti lokiyalokuttarādisuttesu ekasmiṃ
atk-s0519a:1068_1: sutte dve. Tesu yaṃ vā pana kiñci aññataravacanaṃ ekasseva kathanaṃ bhāsati niddisati.
atk-s0519a:1068_2: Sabbaṃ taṃ yathāniddiṭṭhaṃ dhārayitabbanti taṃ yathā sabbaṃ suttaṃ lokiyādīsu yadi
atk-s0519a:1068_3: aññataravasena, atha ubhayavasena yathā yathā niddiṭṭhaṃ, tathā tathā gahetabbaṃ,
atk-s0519a:1069_0: Kilesasahitaññeva kammaṃ vipākassa hetu, na itaranti vuttaṃ “duvidho hetu yañca kammaṃ
atk-s0519a:1069_1: ye ca kilesā”ti. Samudayo kilesāti ettha “samudayo”ti etena samudayapakkhiyā vuttā.
atk-s0519a:1069_2: “Kilesā”ti ca kilesavanto, saṃkiliṭṭhāti attho. Yaṃ dissatīti yaṃ yaṃ dissati. Tāsu
atk-s0519a:1069_3: tāsu bhūmīsūti puthujjanabhūmiādīsu. Kappiyānulomenāti kappiyena ca kappiyānulomena
atk-s0519a:1069_4: ca. Tattha kappiyaṃ pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato vuttaṃ, kappiyānulomaṃ mahāpadesavasena nayato
atk-s0519a:1069_5: dassitaṃ. Paṭikkhittakāraṇenāti yena kāraṇena bhagavatā yaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ, tena kāraṇena
atk-s0519a:1069_6: taṃ niddisitabbaṃ. Ekantena sarāgādisaṃvattanameva hi bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0519a:1069_7: sarāgāya saṃvattanādikāraṇena niddisitabbaṃ. Dhammassāti asaṅkhatadhammassa. Ariyadhammānanti
atk-s0519a:1070_0: Ettha ca yathā saṃkilesabhāgiyādīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṃsaggato anekavidho paṭṭhānabhedo
atk-s0519a:1070_1: icchito, evaṃ lokiyasattādhiṭṭhānādisaṃsaggatopi anekavidho paṭṭhānabhedo sambhavati.
atk-s0519a:1070_2: Pāḷiyaṃ pana ubhayatthāpi ekadesadassanavasena āgatattā nayadassananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1070_3: Sakkā hi iminā nayena viññunā te niddhāretunti. Yathā ca saṃkilesabhāgiyādīnaṃ lokiyādīnañca
atk-s0519a:1070_4: visuṃ visuṃ saṃsaggabhedavasena ayaṃ paṭṭhānabhedo anekavidho labbhati, evaṃ ubhayesampi
atk-s0519a:1070_5: saṃsaggavasena ayaṃ nayo yathārahaṃ labbhateva. Labbhati hi lokiyaṃ suttaṃ kiñci
atk-s0519a:1070_6: saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ, kiñci vāsanābhāgiyaṃ. Tathā lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ kiñci nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ,
atk-s0519a:1071_0: Evaṃ soḷasavidhe paṭṭhāne aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ pakkhipitvā, aṭṭhavīsatividhe
atk-s0519a:1071_1: ca paṭṭhāne soḷasavidhaṃ pakkhipitvā yathārahaṃ dukatikādibhedena sambhavato paṭṭhānavibhāgo
atk-s0519a:1071_2: veditabbo, so ca kho tīsu piṭakesu labbhamānassa suttapadassa vasena. Yasmā pana
atk-s0519a:1071_3: tāni tāni suttapadāni udāharaṇavasena niddhāretvā imasmiṃ atthe vitthāriyamāne atipapañco
atk-s0519a:1071_4: hoti, atibhāriyā ca nettisaṃvaṇṇanā, sakkā ca iminā nayena viññunā ayamattho viññātuṃ,
atk-s0519a:1071_5: tasmā na taṃ vitthārayimha. Teneva hi pāḷiyaṃ aññamaññasaṃsaggavasena paṭṭhānavibhāgo
atk-s0519a:1085: Iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
atk-s0519a:1090: Tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
